Erin
1112112121212111211.content:
Brandon collapsed back onto his bed, narrowly missing the wall. This was a bit much for him. For the past 8 or so months he has to to deal with heaps of pregnancy errands. Brandon can I get a foot massage, Brandon can you get me Icecream? Oh and pickles! Sigh, it was getting a little much. But atleast tonight will be different, with the hot gal from the maternity store, what was her name? Kelly? Kate? "KATIE!" He exclaimed.
"That's not my name, you dingus!" Came a voice from outside. It was Erin from the Parker's, only more clothed. " oh thank god you are alright!" She said in relief. " hey you left this odd jewellery thing with orange gems." Brandon looked down at the amulet in his bed. " uh, I don't know what you are talking about, maybe it was something in pool equipment, you can keep it" Brandon replied " I gotta go, can we catch up tomorrow?"
"Sure, I'll see you then!" Erin replied as she walked back to her place.


Meanwhile in the batca- I mean, downstairs.

Ashley had just finished getting the roast, just the way she liked it, her recipe called for turning it every one to two hours, by the time Katie comes round, it will be ready, now she needed SOMEONE to clean up the table. "Sarah? How are you coping over there?" Ashley called out to her daughter. Sarah didn't know how she did it. She finished everything off, the chips, the biscuits, even that pack of blue vines and she looked exactly the same as before, oh right, with four babies on the way and a bra that is 3 sizes too small. " I'm fine muuummmm" she groaned as she tried to lift herself up. Alas to no avail. "Brandon, can you please help me up?" She pleaded to Brandon.

Brandon sighed, " here we go again" he muttered walking downstairs. he just wanted some time to him self that's all. He actually liked some of the chores, hell even the belly runs were- no, he couldn't think like that, Sarah is her sister. But who else is pregnant? Picking up his amulet, he thought about
1112112121212111211.title: Lay on his bed until he felt better

choices: Skip to the Dinner
Getting ready for Dinner
11121121212121112112.content:
Why couldn’t Erin be the one whose was pregnant with quads,

PING!

She’s ‘only’ having having one. This itself would have normally been great for Brandon as Erin already had looks that made him weak at the knee and with addition of her being pregnant, but living in a house hold that was about to double in number changed Brandon’s perception appearance in pregnancy. Whilst Erin had grown immensely from her pre maternal shape and became just as ungainly, in comparison to the women of the Page house hold she was as agile svelte as a gymnast. He was rather jealous as she was having a baby with someone else granted no one, even Erin herself, didn’t know who was the father, all that Brandon knew was that it wasn’t him and that grated him slightly. Besides he wasn’t allowed to see the Parker’s maybe his mother did want them stealing her chore helper, which what Brandon felt he had become. ‘That’s it,’ he thought to himself as he got to the bottom of the stairs, ‘tomorrow I’m going out, either to see a friend or go shopping for some computer games hell even go to the library just not to be around pregnant women.’

Meanwhile down the street at the Parker’s residence, Louise opened the door to guest bed room but instead of it being set out as the normal guest bed, with the second hand or cheap furniture in it, it was set up as a nursery. Why this was the case Louise did not know, Brodie had his own room, slept in a bed not a crib and was too old to require the use of some of the other furniture found in there such as the change table. The only people that she knew were expecting were the Page family and whilst were probably going to need the extra room soon she wasn’t going to help them not after the way Ashely had spoken to her. Then why had the guest bed room been converted into a nursery?

PING!

What was she thinking about it was it was Erin’s baby, how could she forget.
After an embarrassing few minutes of getting Sarah unsteadily to her feet Brandon made his way to the kitchen, where he found his rotund mother working feverishly over tonight’s dinner. By looks of it nearly every appliance was being used; with mixing bowls on the bench, empty bar a few dregs, several pots and pans, boiling and frying on the stove, something turning in the microwave and with pride of place a large roast in the oven. Over this factory of culinary production was Ashley wearing an old shirt and sweat pants both covered in stains of one description or another, sticking out between these two items of clothing was her gravid belly with the size, roundness and apparent weight of a medicine ball, it had a shine across its surface where its owner had absentmindedly rubbed it without bothering to wash the oil or grease off her hands first. ‘She really is cooking a lot,’ Brandon thought, but then reminded himself that she was cooking for eleven most of which were herself and Sarah.
It was at that point that Ashley noticed her son was in the kitchen, “Feeling a better sweetie?”
“A bit.”
“Could you clear the table for me then, your father isn’t home yet, Sarah isn’t physically able to do it and I’ve got my hands full here.”
“Sure,” said Brandon, there was no point in arguing, what she said was true and clearing the table wasn’t that bad a task.

It was whilst he was doing this Brandon wondered, not for the first time, why Katie was coming over for dinner at all, they barely knew the woman (though she about Brandon’s age and the term girl might be better at least in comparison to Ashley), they hand only met her twice and whilst she was nice and had taken a shine to them and vice versa, at least in Ashley’s case, it still was weird to invite her to dinner. What was just as strange was that Katie agreed to come instead of being suspicious that a group of strangers invited her over to their place for dinner especially as two of them looked like they had eaten the last few. There were several strange things that made Brandon uneasy such as why hadn’t Ashley and Sarah bought any maternity clothes earlier on, both of them were having multiples and were pretty far along an yet only in the last two days did they buy clothes that actually ‘fitted’ (even then half of them seem to be too small), it wasn’t like they both ballooned up overnight. Something was not quite right and he couldn’t get his mind to focus on the idea, it was like trying to keep a dream in your head.

When he had just finished up Ashley said, “You’re finished?...good, now get cleaned up and dressed in some good clothes for this evening, tell Sarah to do the same, After that come back here keep an eye on the cooking whilst I get ready and dressed for this evening.
11121121212121112112.title: Erin

choices: Dinner Time
More preparation for dinner
111211212121211121122.content:
Brandon took time with his appearance, after all Katie was a nice looking girl, maybe not curvaceous as Erin and of course she wasn’t pregnant but she did work in a maternity store and the look on her face as she stared at Ashley and Sarah made Brandon pretty sure that she one day wanted to be.

It was few minutes after taking over keeping an eye on the cooking when Sarah entered the kitchen wearing what was essentially a large blue dress but since it was meant to be worn by a woman pregnant with two-less babies it was incredible tight and as such appear smaller than it really was. “Mom want’s your help getting dressed up stairs,” she said.
“What?! Why can’t you help?” Brandon blurted out.
Sarah put her hands on her hips and jutted her belly at Brandon who leaned back, “In case you have forgotten, I’m having quadruplets,” she said, “and dad hasn’t got back from work yet, besides it’s not like she naked or anything, she just needs help zipping the dress up.”

Wishing that he stayed in bed longer Brandon made his way up stair grumbling all the way. When he got to his parents room Brandon was relieved to see that Sarah was telling the truth and that his mother was more or less dressed.He was less pleased to see what she was wearing; it was a black dress, Sarah’s blue dress was essentially a large blue sheet that was expertly cut and sown into the shape of a dress, most women far along with multiples know that any clothes they wear at that stage weren’t going to be wore much afterwards and so not much had been done to make it look fancy.
Ashley on the other hand wasn’t one of these women as the dress she wore looked like sheath dress. The words ‘looked like’ had to be used as a sheath dress goes out at the top and the bottom and in in the middle, and whilst Ashley had a lot of out for the top and the bottom she had a lot more out in the middle and so the dress stretch in directions that it wasn’t meant to. Brandon assumed that this was what she had bought at the boutique as it had frills and lace and stuff that made it look like it was from a boutique and he didn’t remember seeing her try it on at the store where Katie worked, Brandon wondered if the dress was made /adjusted to fit his mother’s current figure or had bought one that was meant for rather large woman. Either way it hadn’t worked and the dress didn’t fit, well it did fit in that it covered what it was meant to reaching down over her rear part way down Ashley’s thighs and even managed the impressive task of covering her bulging belly but it was a near thing, and if she ate like she had in the last few meals it might not, but it still looked taxed in places that it wasn’t meant to be.
Ashley looked around from the task she was doing, which was trying to do the zipper up on the upper back of the dress, it looked impossible for her to do, in fact Brandon was surprised she managed to get this far by herself, given her size. “Ah there you are,” said Ashley, “could you help me get this troublesome zipper done up?” she said turning around giving Brandon a view of the ‘V’ shape exposed flesh of her back. Knowing that he had no choice in the matter Brandon wordlessly crossed the room and started to try and do the zipper up, he did an internal groan as he saw her bra strap which frilly and lacy enough to tell him that the dress wasn’t the only thing his mom had bought at the boutique.

He managed to get zipper done up but that was after a few minutes of trying as the zipper slider was one of those small fiddly ones that was difficult to use at the best of times.
“Woo, that was difficult,” said Ashley when her dress was finally ‘on’ “sorry about that but it just looked so nice in the shop and I thought I could adjust after I had the babies.”
It was at that this point that Sarah’s voice drifted up from down stairs saying “Dad’s here.”
“Now he comes,” muttered Brandon to himself.
“I think everything you can help with is done,” said Ashley, “just don’t mess yourself up before dinner tonight.”
Taking the opportunity to hide in his room, Brandon walked as fast as he could to the door without causing offence. ‘Why does she care so much about impressing some girl she recently met who works at a maternity store?’
111211212121211121122.title: Getting ready for Dinner

Katie arrived exactly at half past six the agreed time, Brandon had a feeling that she arrived a lot earlier she seemed very anxious when Brandon opened the door and remained so until she saw Ashley lumbering down the stairs at which point her face took on a blissful blankness. There was not much small talk as Sarah and Ashley wanted to start dinner as soon as possible and after Katie went to the toilet they sat down for dinner.

It was rather cramped around the circular table Brandon sat with his sister on one side and his dad on the other, across from Katie who looked like she was in heaven wedge between the two swollen Page women. Even without the addition of Katie it would still be cramped around the table, whilst both Ashley and Sarah still sat on one chair each and their bellies primarily projected forward in front of both of them they seemed to take up more horizontal space at the table both physically and in personal space.
There wasn’t much talking at the table primarily eating; needless to say most of the eating was done by Ashley and Sarah. Sarah eating sullenly like she did at lunch whilst Ashley brazenly consumed food and occasionally tried to strike up a conversation, but since she didn’t stop eating all it achieved was to occasionally spray crumbs across the table. The only times she said something without her mouth full was when she asked people to pass something over. So it was when she asked Brandon to pass the gravy that he accidently bumped the amulet transferring the last child stored in it to…
1112112121212111211221.title: Dinner Time

choices: The next morning
Someone's dream
11121121212121112112211.content:
PING

There was an odd noise such an already inflated balloon being inflated just that little bit more, Brandon watched in horror as he saw his mother’s belly, already swollen with Quadruplets, grow until it became clear that out of the two pregnant women in the Page household, she was having the most. and Brandon did notice it, whatever powers the amulet had to change people’s memories wasn’t working on him and he stared in disbelief as his mother’s belly balloon out even further gently push up against the table and out against the people next to her, the black dressed stretching until it became slightly opaque. Brandon sat there looking around at the table to see if anyone else had notice, both his dad and sister seemed unaware of the imminent new family member, not like it sticks out with all the other imminent new family members on the way. That was another thing how many of the multitude that his mother and sister were expecting were natural? Brandon still couldn’t quite remember if either of them had originally been pregnant or if so with how many, all he did know was that after he knocked the amulet his mother’s belly grew right in front of his eyes. And he couldn’t help but continue to look at it, her belly button now an outie (it had been since the amulet was first used on her) stretch noticeably past its normal size,
“Are you all right sweetie?” asked Ashely, Brandon opened his mouth but nothing but an indistinct noise came out, “sweetie?” she repeated with a bit more concern.
Brandon regained control of himself, well some of it, enough to blurt out “You’re bigger.”
His mother seemed to relax and said in a joking babying tone, “Yes because mommy has five babies inside her and soon you are going to be a big brother.”
“And an uncle,” said Sarah dourly under her breath, but no one heard her.
“But you’re bigger just now,” said Brandon recovering some more of his dictation since the shock.
“Because the babies make mommy very hungry and I just ate a lot,” said Ashley in the same voice and to Brandon’s horror (and another feeling that he tried to quash down) she pulled up the dress to reveal her belly in all its glory. Her fair skin stretch over a bulge the size of a beach ball free of stretch marks but with one or two freckles from her youth.
“I-I-I…I need to lay down some more,” said Brandon standing up abruptly, “still a bit dizzy from that bump on the head earlier.”
Brandon went to his room as fast as he could, he was so shocked with the growth of his mother’s belly he didn’t notice the only other person that was aware of it, Katie patted the book in her pocket.

Brandon frantically looked around his room for the instruction manual of the amulet, it was on his bedside table and now it was missing, he should have read it properly before even if it just was for the pictures. After exhausting himself looking for it, with no avail, Brandon collapsed on his bed and fell asleep.

Meanwhile down stairs everyone else had their desert, “Woo, that enough,” said Ashley finishing off Brandon’s desert (as it was apparent that he had turned in for the night by the time she had finished her own) “If I have any more I burst,” she continued patting her still bare belly.
“You look it,” said Sarah to herself, getting up, “I going to bed now,” she said to the room as a whole.
“Goodnight Honey,” said Ashley.
“I should go home too,” said Katie ‘accidently’ brushing Ashley belly as she stood up.
“Do you need a lift home?” said Ashley.
“That would be nice I don’t think the train I caught here isn’t running at this time, could you?”
“Well I can’t obviously,” said Ashley and gave a brief laugh, “Tanner should able to.”
“I live on Oak road.”
“I know where that is,” said Tanner Page, “I’ll just get the car out of the garage; I’ll see you in about half an hour.”
This last bit was directed at his wife who said, “I be waiting,” in coquettish tones that Tanner failed to register otherwise he would have taken a lot longer to get back in the hope Ashley would be asleep by then. “It’s a shame we didn’t get a chance to more but the babies can’t be ignored,” said Ashley pulling the dress back down over her belly before standing up, with Katie’s assistance before walking out toward the front door.
“I’ll sure there be another time we cou…” began Katie but trailed off at the sight of the amulet that Sarah had and now left on the desk next to the front door, Katie knew it to be the same as the one pictured on the cover of the instruction manual and that Brandon had used on his mother at dinner.
“Of course like when the babies are born,” said Ashley.
“Uhuh,” said Katie looking at Ashley and nodding whilst really focusing on picking up the amulet, she needn’t of tried so hard as Ashley was unable to see her own feet little lone Katie reaching for the amulet.

PING

As Katie’s fingers grasped it and rammed it into her pocket Ashely’s belly gurgled and swelled for the second time that night, the dress riding up so far it was fast becoming a shirt, a sliver of pale skin could be seen as it rode up her belly.
“Well Tanner has probably got the car ready, “I should get ready for when he gets back,” she said giving Katie a wink before waddling up the stairs.

When Tanner Page got home, as he said about half an hour later, he was looking forward to going to bed he had a long day at work and he was going to have to take Ashley and Sarah to their fitness or yoga class or whatever it was called. He entered his and Ashley’s room and saw it lit by mood lighting, Ashley was lounging on the bed as best she could, given her current condition, wearing a frilly bra and panties. “Brandon and Sarah are both asleep and so are the rest of the children,” she said patting her belly, “we’ve got the night to ourselves.” Tanner wanted to go to sleep he really did, but his wife not going let him yet and he dared not refuse and provoke a mood swing not whilst she was pregnant especially this pregnant. Whilst Ashely had fewer wrinkles since becoming pregnant and had fuller breasts and hips Tanner Page didn’t share his son’s attraction to pregnant women and the fact that his wife appeared to have double in size and weight since become pregnant most of which was in the belly (which seemed a bit bigger to him since he dropped Katie home) was a major turn off to him. But since she was taking up most off the bed, he wasn’t going to get to sleep until he satisfied her.
“Uh yeah, let’s get started then.”
11121121212121112112211.title: Ashley

choices: The Page family (minus Tanner) head back to the mall
Reader's choice
111211212121211121122111.content:
Ashley woke up slowly, stretching and rubbing her belly. She couldn't exactly roll over with her massive belly, but she was in a good enough spot that she could see around her room. Ashely had taken to sleeping on her back because if she slept on one side, her sextuplet-filled belly would hang off the side of the bed and if she turned the other way, her husband wouldn't have enough room to sleep. Sure, with six full-grown babies inside her, lying on her back added a lot of weight on top of Ashely that wasn't entirely pleasant, but with some well-placed pillows, she did alright.

She scooted up so she could sit up in bed, both hands on her belly, looking over at her husband disapprovingly. He was still asleep, clutching as much of the bed's covers as he could. Ashley put her hands on her hips and pouted. Last night was the first time in many months Ashley even had an opportunity for sex and it was the first time she'd had sex while pregnant. And Tanner couldn't have been less interested. It was like her pregnant body disgusted him. Ashley sighed and stroked her wide curves. She'd never thought about adultery before but...things were different during a pregnancy. Especially one like this. Hell, Ashely was still surprised camera crews weren't over her 24/7, asking about her impressive pregnancy. She thought at least TLC would want to make a reality show about the house with a mother and daughter who are both pregnant with five or more babies.

Tanner grumbled in his sleep and rolled over a little, bumping against Ashley's belly and quickly turning the other way. She pouted some more, returning her hands to her big bulge. You would have enough room to sleep if you'd spoon with me like I suggested, Ashley thought to herself. Seems adultery is going to have to be the way to go. There must be someone nearby who's attracted to pregnant women. And for that one person, I must be every Victoria's Secret model and superstar actress rolled into one... Ashley chuckled to herself at the prospect of finding someone, anyone, who was that attracted to her belly and stroked her hugeness more sensually.

Then, the little ones inside her started kicking and Ashley groaned softly, heaving herself out of bed, one leg first, then the other, sitting on the edge of the bed as she caught her breath. Her movement shook the bed and woke her husband up. "Oh...g'morning, Ashley."

"Good morning," Ashley said through her teeth.

"So...I think that until the babies are born, we should think about sleeping in different beds," Tanner said. "You know, I don't want my tossing and turning to keep you awake. You need all the sleep you can get at this point."

Sleep isn't what I need, Ashley thought, cursing that she was too big to turn around and stare daggers at the man who put these six inside her. "Maybe that's for the best," Ashely said, pretending to smile kindly. "But I get this bed. You can take the guest room. Downstairs."

Tanner nodded. "That's fair. Well, what do you have planned for today?"

With one big push, Ashley heaved her huge pregnant body off of the bed and waddled to the bathroom, scratching and stroking her proportionally-inflated ass. "I need to help Sarah buy some maternity clothes at the mall and I like to spend time there too," she said, wondering if she could pick up any handsome men at the mall. Maybe Sarah would steal away all the pregnant fetishists. "I'll drag Brandon along too. He hates it but he's helpful."

Tanner rubbed his eyes. "Sounds good, sounds good," he said, conflicted between his desire to see Ashely and Sarah wear clothes that cover up their gross big, round bellies and his knowledge of how much those maternity clothes were costing him.

----

Katie woke up in bed suddenly, looking around before seeing the book and amulet in her hands. She grinned nervously. It wasn't a dream. Somehow she'd really come across some kind of magical artifact that let her control pregnancies in people. Reading through the guidebook and thinking about the things she could do to pregnant women, Katie got so aroused it started to drain her energy. When she got to the handy illustrations of women with up to 8 and more babies inside them, it was too much for her to handle and she fell asleep right there.

But now, Katie was eager to test it out on the people around her, especially at her job at the maternity clothing store at the mall. She giggled and looked at the strange and beautiful amulet in the sunlight. Truthfully, she'd read enough of the manual to know how to use it on herself, but it was either fear or greed, but she only wanted to watch pregnancy spring forth in another woman.

And only woman came to her mind: Ashley Page. That's probably why she was as big as she was in the first place: for some reason, she had this amulet with her and it doubtlessly gave her the fertility goddess belly that she had. Her daughter had a nice big belly too, even bigger than Ashley's when she came in the mall.

Katie quickly got showered and dressed, hoping that she might get to see some members of the Page family again and see if her reading of the amulet's manual was accurate.

---

Sarah woke up as she normally did: grumbling, rubbing her belly and hoping that today was the day she went into labor and wouldn't have to carry this load around anymore. But, with any luck, she'd last another month or so with a huge quintuplet tummy, getting glaring looks when she tried to walk around, not being able to do the things she used to, not even fitting in some doorways.

As she tried to get up, another round of sharp kicking resounded throughout her swollen womb. Sarah groaned and rubbed and rubbed, trying to quiet her brood to no avail. "Ugh, the only thing that calmed these brats down was a belly rub from Brandon..."

Sarah stopped and thought about it. Yeah, come to think of it...that did calm them down and let Sarah have the first good sleep in a long time. But no, she couldn't ask him to do that again. Besides, Brandon was a total dweeb! Three kicks, one in each kidney and one in the bladder, made Sarah bend over and want to run to the bathroom all at once.

"No choice, I guess," Sarah groaned, looking in the mirror and making sure she was in a good enough condition. She had on a grey woolen sleeveless top that just managed to conceal her swollen, F-cup breasts, but at least allowed enough padding to leave a lot up the the imagination. Her belly, on the other hand, had no mystery surrounding it, aside from maybe "how does she stay upright with that thing?"

Around her also-growing ass was a pair of black booty shorts that ironically still fit, miraculously. Sarah sighed and figured this was good enough. Waddling down the hall, she knocked on her dorky brother's door, looking nervously over at the door just a few feet down the hall where her even more-bloated mother slept. After a few moments, Brandon cautiously opened the door, looking at his sister surprised. "Sarah?"

"H-hi Brandon," Sarah said, looking away and trying not to blush as brightly as she was. "Um, the...babies are kicking a lot and I was wondering if you could try and...rub and quiet them down? You have a...knack for this, it seems."

Brandon started to shake nervously, wishing he had pajama bottoms that did a better job to conceal what may become an erection. "S-sure, come inside," he said, opening the door as widely as he could to let Sarah squeeze inside. One hand was already rested on her belly and she could feel the kicks staying strong. "Um, sit on the bed, I guess."

"You could sit next to me," Sarah said. "Y-you know, if you want. I think that would be easiest." Brandon nodded and sat down beside his pregnant sister, moving one hand to her belly and rubbing in slow circles. Sarah hated to admit it, but it felt great and the kicking quickly died down.

Brandon looked over his sister's belly as she closed her eyes in bliss. When he saw that she was just breathing rhythmically, he gulped and took a look at her chest too. It was true: pregnancy made everything bigger. But no! This was his sister! His sister who was always mean to him, might he add.

"Doing okay?" Sarah asked, opening one eye curiously. "You stopped rubbing."

"Y-yeah," Brandon said. "Everything's fine." He moved both hands to her hugeness and rubbed slowly, which forced Sarah to let a little coo sneak out. "Um, Sarah, do you know about something called...PregTech?"

"PregTech?" Sarah said, opening both eyes and looking at her brother curiously. "No, why? Is that some kind of maternity brand?"

"No, I dunno," Brandon said, turning red. "I just keep having this dream where you're involved with something called PregTech and it's related to the work you're doing now. I thought it was a weird coincedence."

"Well, you're around two huge pregnant women all the time now so something's probably going to seep in there," Sarah said with a tiny grin, tapping Brandon on the forehead. "But you can tell me about your dream on the drive to the mall. Something tells me Mom wants to go back."

"Probably," Brandon said, smiling, glad to have a nice talk with his sister. "So, feeling better?"

Sarah looked down at her belly and stood up, flustered. "Y-yeah, fine! I mean...thanks. Whatever," she waddled out the door as quickly as she could, leaving Brandon to blush as well, embarrassed at his dumb question about a dream.

"If I hadn't found that damn necklace, none of this would have...wait a minute," Brandon said, looking around the room. He knew he lost the manual, but he couldn't have sworn he still had the amulet. He looked and looked but something deep down inside him told him it was gone. "Well..this isn't good."

1112112121212111211221111.content:
The three family members almost literally piled into the car, the car tilting like a see-saw when either pregnant member got in. For obvious reasons, Brandon was in the drivers seat, Sarah sat in the seat next to him and Ashley in her gargantuan state took up the back seats.

They drove past Erin's place and Brandon couldn't help but think about Erin in her current pregnant situation. He could imagine her in the morning sun, bathing in the light, rubbing sun tan oil on her huge be- "SSTTOOPPPP" Sarah shouted at Brandon, causing him to push down on the breaks. Brandon noticed he had almost ran over Arcee, Ms Strong's cat. The cat scampered over to 76 trimesta lane. Sarah almost slapped Brandon over the head, but then thought against it. He has been better lately, she thought, I should cut him some slack.

"Brandon!" Ashley said in her harsh tone " when we get back you are going to go and apologise to ms Strong, she may be Sarah's age but she is very anxious, oh I'm sorry, I shouldn't be yelling" Ashley's mood swings were starting up again, and it was all Tanner's stupid fault.

As they came close to the mall, Brandon's phone started going off like crazy. " Sarah, can you see who is messaging me?" Brandon said turning into the car park. Sarah picked up the phone and saw the list of unread messages. Two from rick, one from Joel and 7 FROM ERIN? "Uh you have a couple of messages from your work mate" she said casually scrolling " Joel your 'bro' wants to know if you are coming to tonight's premiere of kick-puncher and I think Erin is stalking you." Halting the car Brandon snatched the phone from her, an objective "hey!" Coming from his pregnant sister, Brandon saw in big red alerting letters <EMERGENCY, PLEASE COME, IM STUCK>. " okay, I need you guys to head out the door now" Brandon anxiously said trying to heard them off.
"I'm afraid it will take a bit more than that" Ashley stated pointing to her large belly as Brandon parked the car. Getting out Brandon helped Ashley heave out of the car, by try three they were successful. Sarah was disappointed, she was hoping to get to know her brother a bit more today. Coming over to her side, Brandon couldn't help but gaze upon his gorgeous sist- no, he couldn't think like that, it was wrong. Opening the doors, he closed his eyes as he helped the pregnant beauty out of the car. "Hey!" She protested " I'm not a monster, you can open your eyes". Brandon opened his eyes to see a large amount of cleavage with something familiar stuck in there.

"Um, Sarah," Brandon said curiously" did you by any chance get an amulet of your own?". Sarah looked down to see the red gems shining in the light of the parking lot. " oh yeah, I found this one after yours accidentally broke, did you want it?" She asked.
" No it's cool, I just can't find mine that's all." Brandon replied as he returned to his car. " I'll catch you guys later." He said driving back to Erin's, leaving them 2 feet from the malls entrance.

A security camera had captured the entire conversation. A man in a black turtle net and pants walked up to a shadowy figure sitting drinking a cup of tea. " it's as you suspected master, every time the amulet breaks, the energy seeps out and forms a replica close by. Are you sure the energy is stable?" The figure used their left hand, giving a serious of hand gestures. " okay master, phase 2 will begin in 4 days.

Katie was had just started her shift when Sarah and Ashley waltzed in. Shoot! She thought. I need more time to prepare!

11121121212121112112211112.content:
Erin's text was accurate. She was stuck. Brandon stood in surprise, looking at Erin in between the door frames in her bedroom, her belly pinning her in there as she stood sideways.

"I thought that if I tried anything, it could hurt the baby," Erin blushed, phone in hand, luckily, so she could text someone to help her out. "I guess I still can't get used to being so...big."

"You're not that big," Brandon said, trying to think of a safe way to slide Erin out. It didn't help that she was wearing a thin grey t-shirt that covered about half of her belly and a pair of cute, frilly blue underwear with no pants. The shirt showed off her wide maternal curves. While Erin was "only" pregnant with one baby, she could have passed for twins easily, her belly an impressive 44 inches around, her popped-out belly button showing under the shirt too. "Compared to my mom and sister."

Erin gave a little laugh as Brandon cautiously put his hands around her belly, turning her gently until she was no longer stuck. "Thanks," Erin said quietly, her eyes welling up.

"Did I hurt you?" Brandon said, not sure how to console her.

"No, no you're great," Erin said, her voice wavering. "I just...I'm huge, I ache, and I'm going to have to take care of a baby when this is all over." Now the tears started to really stream and Erin put her arm over her eyes.

Brandon gulped, unsure what to say. He wanted to wrap his friend up in his arms, tell her he always had a crush on her and tell her how smart, fun, and amazing she is, plus how good she looked pregnant, but he knew that wouldn't make things better. "Erin, you...you're one of the smartest and coolest people I know and you're incredibly strong. If anyone can handle taking care of a child, it's you. And any kid you raise is probably going to...I dunno, grow up to be a superhero or something."

Erin let out a little laugh as she wrapped Brandon up in a big hug, her belly pressing against him, getting dangerously close to his growing erection. "Thanks, Brandon. You're always so nice to me."

Cautiously, Brandon wrapped his arms around Erin too. "H-hey, anytime. And besides, you won't exactly be alone with raising a new baby. I'm sure my mom or Sarah would give you help."

Erin squeezed the hug a little before leaning back, giving a sniffle but still smiling. "Good idea. At least I'm not pregnant with quintuplets, huh?"

"Y-yeah," Brandon laughed, imagining his crush with a belly the size of his mother's and turning even redder. Erin's shirt was covered in tear strains that matched the contours of her swelling breasts. "So, still want to go to the mall and pick out some maternity clothes?"

Erin nodded and put her hands on her hips. "Yeah, definitely. As you can see, I don't really have anything that fits." Brandon looked over her half-naked pregnant body at her direction until she crossed her arms over her belly and crossed her legs. "Well geez, don't look too much to confirm."

"Sorry!" Brandon blushed, looking up squarely at Erin's face, which was clearly smiling mischievously.

"I'm just teasing you, although you should step out while I change into my clothes for walking around outside," Erin said, gesturing to the door.

"No problem. I guess this is what I deserve for catching you in your pajamas," Brandon said, walking into the hallway.

"Oh no, I just wore these to stay covered up while I waited for you. With this big belly and how hot it makes me sometimes, I just sleep naked now," she said, just as she closed the bedroom door, leaving Brandon with a very vivid image in his head.

----

At the maternity clothing store, Katie was looking at the amulet in her hands, tracing its design with her fingers. Unlike Brandon, she'd read over the instructions pretty carefully and committed as much as she could to memory. The possibilities of letting women trade or accumulate pregnancies at Katie's discretion was a very appealing ability, considering Katie's own healthy interest in pregnant women.

But how to use it? There was a limit to how many times Katie could just "make" a woman pregnant. Eventually, she would need to start "borrowing" from other pregnant women, although working at a maternity clothing store, that wouldn't be too hard. Katie also didn't want to make herself pregnant, at least not yet. It would be more fun to give herself some pregnant "eye candy:" women of all different ages, races, looks waddling around her store with four, five, six full-term babies in their wombs.

"Katie!" the manager, Laura Moore, barked, making Katie stand on-end. "Stop daydreaming at work. You do that all the time." Laura was, appropriately, a full-term pregnant woman, actually carrying twins. Normally, Katie would be gawking at her all the time, but Laura was a mean, grouchy boss who yelled at employees constantly. Well, she'd been tolerable before, but as her pregnancy progressed, Laura got grumpier and grumpier. This turned Katie off, making her prefer to stare and attend the nice, smiling pregnant customers the store had. Still, there were plenty of nights where Katie fantasized about a dominatrix Laura, belly and all, chastising Katie and making her work at Laura's beck and call to make up for it.

"S-sorry," Katie said, hiding the amulet back under her shirt, bumping against it accidentally. Laura's belly suddenly vanished as the amulet began to glow some.

"Hey, it's alright," Laura said calmly. "It's a slow day today after all. And when customers are in, you're always so helpful and personable with them."

"Thanks," Katie said, feeling like something changed but she couldn't quite put her finger on it. And why did she have this distinct image in her head of Laura with a big pregnant belly in a leather bikini and fishnet stockings?

She didn't have to search her mind for answers as her new favorite customer came waddling in: Ashley walked into the wide mall store, a big smile on her face, with Sarah following her closely, obviously and clearly less enthusiastic.

"Katie!" Ashley said, her arms open but not reaching beyond her massive belly. "Good to see you again. As you can see, the clothes we picked out before don't exactly...fit as well as we thought."

"Y-yes, I see," Katie said, stroking her chin nervously as she saw the mother and daughter bellies, both straining their designer maternity clothes. "To be honest, we don't have many clothes that could probably fit you too. Although the clothes we got you, Mrs. Page, might fit your daughter."

Ashley and Sarah both looked at one another. "That's true," Ashely said. "Weird, it's almost like I bought clothes exactly for a quadruplet pregnancy instead. May we duck into the changing room quickly to test that?"

"No problem," Katie said. "I'll be waiting right here for you."

"No, come with us so she doesn't make me run back and forth between the dressing room and the rest of the store to ask you what you think," Sarah said, Katie shuddered and followed the two into the changing room, moving one hand to her amulet.

As Ashley and Sarah undressed, both letting their bare bellies hang out as the rest of them was squeezed into maternity underwear that was starting to not fit either, Katie made her move, pressing the right parts of the Preg-Transferer. Right before her eyes, Laura's twins were transported into each of them, their bellies swelling gracefully, as did the rest of them.

Sarah pulled her mother's top over her head, looking down at the strained fabric that she tried to pull all the way over her belly, unsuccessfully. "Just as I thought. Too small for a quintuplet pregnancy."

"Then you definitely won't have anything for a six-baby belly," Ashley sighed with a smile, rubbing her hugeness. "Do you, Katie?"

Katie didn't respond, still shocked that the amulet really worked. The damage to the Preg-Transferer was starting to show and memory was no longer being rewritten for Katie quite the same was as it used to be. In that moment, she could definitely tell that their bellies had grown and it was thanks to her.

"Maybe I'll just own it," Ashley said with pride. "I'll wear clothes that show off the belly. But I still want to try and buy from you. Show me your cutest clothes for a woman with a more typical pregnancy, please."

"Mmhmm," Katie said dumbly, the possibilities the amulet could allow her piling up in her mind.

----

Driving Erin's car, Brandon looked over as he saw his friend clutch her belly, rubbing it slowly. "Something wrong?"

"I'm not sure," Erin said, looking off toward the mall, which was just a block away at this point. "It feels like something...changed. I can't put my finger on it."

"Weird," Brandon said, unaware of just how weird the changes in his life were about to be.

111211212121211121122111122.content:
Katie’s mind was still spinning with the possibilities that she could do with the amulet, she could just keep taking babies and putting them into the Page women, there was something about the them it was the way the two women had completely different reactions to their extremely gravid situation; Ashley was sunny excited even though she was currently pregnant with more children than most women have in their lifetimes, whilst Sarah was bitter and sullen with the brood she was carrying. She could give all of the babies from one of them to the other, Katie wasn’t sure how many they were each carrying but she was sure together it was double digits, or she could store them up in amulet and give them all at once to a woman free of child and watch her burst out of her clothes. Whatever she decided to do she needed to keep taking the pregnancies of the other women who came into the shop and preferably keep both the Page women around. Katie was unsure how easy it would be to keep Ashely and Sarah in the shop, Ashley seemed like she would stay until natured called or she was hungry, whilst Sarah looked as though she didn’t want to leave her room little lone the house.

Katie came back from the store room (despite Ashley’s wishes that she didn’t rush back and forward) and gave some boxes to Ashley, “These are some maternity shirts from… a typical pregnancy they should cover up the important bits,” Ashley gleefully took the boxes and went to try on the contents. “We don’t seem to carry stock to cover a women as…advanced as you and your mother,” continued Katie picking her words carefully, “but if you are looking for something to cover you up we do have a variety of dresses.” Katie couldn’t tell which negative emotion flashed across Sarah’s face; anger, sadness, embarrassment or all of them, at the news that her belly was so big that she had to start using dresses as shirts, but she nodded none the less. Katie stalled as long as she dared, without arousing Sarah’s suspicion, watching Ashley get changed before going to collect the clothes for Sarah.


Brandon and Erin pulled into the mall’s car park, whatever seemed to have unnerved Erin had past, for now. Erin sat in the seat that had been vacated by Sarah, whilst Erin was running a bit big for a women with one, looking like she was expecting twins, her size in relation to his sister became apparent when Erin sat down in the seat, at the start of the journey, with over a foot distance between her belly and the dashboard. “I take it your mom was the last person in this seat?” said Erin.
“Actually my sister,” said Brandon sheepishly.
“I expect you must get tired of them complaining about their size, and must be really annoyed at me complaining about my size when I am so small in comparison to them.”
Brandon instant when into condolence mode, “No you’re not small you’re…” he stopped as he realised what he was saying, “…I mean I’m not annoyed at you.”
Erin gave a laugh, “I know I’m huge, but I should happy that I’m not having as many as you mother or sister, it’s going to be hard enough raising this one without a father.” Brandon started getting the grating jealously feeling again at the fact someone was the father.
Then it faded as he realised that Erin pregnancy was probably caused by the amulet, ‘it would explain why no one, not even Erin herself, knew who the father was,’ he thought to himself. ‘If only I had the amulet and manual I could make her think I was the father and then we could…’ but both the amulet and manual were missing. Brandon knew he saw the amulet or one very similar somewhere else but he couldn’t think where unaware that Erin was wearing one right next to him.


“There you go, they’re mostly pale neutral colours,” said Katie returning from the store room with the dresses for Sarah, it was at that point Ashley turned around. Katie was right in that the shirt covered the important bits, and it was also was what Ashley had asked for in the form of being something cute that showed her belly off. The shirt was a light pink and tautly covered her breast, that had begun to get ready for breast feeding, then the shirt in contrast got scrunched up between her breasts and belly, on the shirt was writing in garish fluro pink letters that clashed with shirt’s main colour suggesting that it was meant for someone much younger then Ashley, this was further supported by the word ‘princess’ which was the only word visible. It was probably meant to be a midriff bearing shirt for someone still relatively early in their pregnancy and it still was midriff bearing, it was just Ashley had a lot more midriff than a full term women. Her belly stuck out proudly as large and as round as a beach ball including her popped navel as the nozzle, still devoid of stretch marks. Katie had to stop herself from reaching out and touching it, it was pretty likely though that Ashley would be ok with it, she seemed to like attention to her current gravid shape.
“What do you think?” said Ashley cradling her stomach as best she could and checking herself out in the mirror.
“Mom I think you look ridiculous,” said Sarah.
“What do you think Katie?” asked Ashley pointedly ignoring her daughter’s comment.
“I-I think you look very…nice,” said Katie nervously, “very youthful,” she said with more confidence.
This seemed to hit the right note with Ashley who beamed and said, “You really think so?” so happily it was almost gleeful.
“Yes.”
“Great, in that case I’ll take the lot, how about you Sarah found anything you like?”
Katie was shocked, ‘they can’t leave yet’, “don’t you want to try the rest on first?”
“Aren’t they the same size?” asked Ashley.
“Yes but don’t you want to see if they’ll look as good on you.”
“I trust your judgement.”
“What about shorts, dress and other clothes?” said Katie desperately.
“Hmm I suppose you’re right not point only half of me looking new and refreshed. Besides it’s not like we can go until Brandon comes back, I can’t believe dumped us here and went off to spend time with Joel?” said Ashely a cloud crossing her otherwise sunny personality.
“I think he actually went to spend time with Erin,” said Sarah.
“I thought I told him not see her or any member of that family,” said Ashley, the clouds darking, “do you know that it was helping them fix the plumbing to their pool that he hit his head, why couldn’t that woman fix it herself? And why does he spend so much time with their daughter?”
“Probably because she’s pregnant,” said Sarah but Ashely wasn’t listening too caught up in her own dislike of the Parkers. Katie heard it though and made a mental note of Ashley’s dislike of the Parkers who had a pregnant daughter and that Brandon apparently had a liking for pregnant women.

It was at that point that…
111211212121211121122111122.title: Reader's Choice

choices: Ashley went over to/was approached by someone
Reader's Choice
1112112121212111211221111221.content:
Brandon and Erin saw Ashley and Sarah before they were seen in return, mostly as it is hard not to miss a couple women expecting eleven babies between them, 'oh god', thought Brandon, 'they're both bigger'.
It was Katie that saw them first and, despite the gravitational pull of the bellies’ of the Page women, her eyes were drawn to Erin’s belly. ‘excellent another set of twins, saves me wondering whether to give them the Ashley or Sarah’ she thought to herself and pressed the amulet.
…
Nothing happened, there was no Ping.
Katie looked at the amulet and tried again, but still Erin’s belly remain swollen with child, she thought about shaking the amulet or giving it a tap to get it working again before remembering how bad an idea that was according to the manual. ‘Was the amulet broken or was it something about Erin that prevented it from affecting her. Katie needed to see if the amulet could affect someone else, unfortunately for her the only other pregnant women in sight were Ashley and Sarah. Katie decided, against her wishes, to see if the amulet could reduce Sarah’s pregnancy by one. Again the amulet failed to work, there was no sparking or flashing lights that gave any indication that it was broken or anything and it didn’t have a sound that normally heralded its use. “uh…Why don’t I get those things to the check out for you,” she said before hurriedly grabbing the clothes’ boxes and dumping them on the counter before continuing on to the back room where she kept the manual in her bag.
As Katie headed off Ashley turned around to see what she had been looking at and saw her son and Erin which caused her eyes to narrow in anger.
“Brandon can I talk to you for a second,” said Ashley in icy tones, again pronouncing a question as a statement.
Brandon not wanting to causing a scene…well any more of a scene than his mother and sister pregnant with nearly a dozen babies between them getting changed caused, walked over to Ashley who turned herself slightly putting her belly between Erin and the rest of her so she could talk to her children (who weren’t currently occupying her) without Erin hearing.
“I told you not to hang around members of that family,” said Ashley crossly.
“But mom, she’s pregnant and needs my help,” protested Brandon.
“I’m expecting at least three times as many children as she is, and your sister isn’t far behind, and ‘we’ need your help, she’s got her own family to look after her.”
“But Mom…”
“No buts, now take her home before coming back here to pick your sister and me up.”
Brandon was furious, ‘he wasn’t a taxi’ but he didn’t say anything as his mother looked like she would explode (more so than usual) if he answered back, he nodded before heading off.
“I’m all done now mom, I’ll pay for my clothes and go with Brandon,” said Sarah.
“No no I’ll pay for them when I purchase mine,” said Ashley, she turned to Katie, who just came back with some clothes in her arms and the manual in her pocket, and asked, “that’s ok isn’t it?”
“Sure,” said Katie, it wasn’t but as along as the money was paid before Laura found out Katie saw no harm.
“Wait up,” said Sarah waddling after Brandon and Erin.
“I sure hope these little ones are better at doing what their told,” crooned Ashley rubbing her belly, she turned around to Katie still carrying some pieces of clothing, “What do you have for me?”
“Jeans,” replied Katie passing them over, where upon Ashley set about trying them on.
After a few minutes of struggling with the denim Ashley said, “Are they meant to be so tight?”
Katie, who was too busy paying attention to Ashley’s body to notice what she was saying, took a second before she realised what Ashley had said “…what?…oh yes tight fit jeans are all the rage.”
Tight jeans were all the rage, it was just that the jeans that Katie had given to Ashley to try on weren’t tight fit jeans except that they were. They were labelled as loose fit and this was still apparent by the cuff at the bottom, but Ashley’s upper thighs and particularly her backside had stretch the fabric of the upper jeans taut and made it extremely difficult to do up even under her belly. “How do I look?” said Ashley giving her rump a slap and trying the best she could to look at herself from behind in the mirror.
“Very nice…very youthful,” said Katie. It was true, whilst the clothes still looked too young for Ashley they did take at least a decade off her appearance.
Ashley beamed at Katie’s words, “fantastic I take two pairs, then I’ll go grab a bite to eat.”
Katie would have tried and stopped her from leaving before but she needed time to sort out what was going on with the amulet, so she packed up all purchases which came to a pretty hefty price and not for the first time Katie wondered how Ashley was able to afford all these clothes.

Sarah was back in the front passenger’s seat much to Brandon’s dismay as this meant he was unable to see Erin as she was sitting behind him, because Sarah’s seat was pushed so far back that she was closer of being level to Erin in the rear seats. It was a quite trip but Brandon did say after they left the mall’s car park, “I’ll drop you back off home first Sarah?” he said to her or more accurately the part of her belly that was next to him. Sarah gave a committal noise, had it been Ashley she would of made sure Erin was dropped off first but Sarah wanted to get home the sooner the better even if it was just a minute.
They pulled up outside the Page’s house a few minutes later and Sarah, despite her size, was able to get out of the car and was on her way to the front door before Brandon was able to get around to the other side of the car and open the door for her. He instead put himself to opening the door for Erin, and leading her around to the seat vacated by Sarah.
“Oh no, I can walk home from here,” started Erin.
“We could hang out for a bit before you go home can’t we?” asked Brandon.

Ashley finished off her lunch, she had gone for a large burger meal again, several large burger meals, Ashley wasn’t sure how many but their packets now littered the table and surrounding floor, needless to say her ‘bite to eat’ cost quite a bit of money, currently her wallet seemed to be shrinking almost as fast as she was growing. She had attracted quite a lot of stares from people around her, obviously a woman of her age, pregnant with half a dozen eating the same amount of food in one sitting that some families eat in one day is bound to attract stares, but to Ashley’s delight she could see that some of the stares had something more than disgust or shock in them.
“Excuse me Mrs could I ask you something?” Ashley turned her head to see a man in his thirties standing next to her, and to Ashley’s delight a vague hunger in his eyes.
Ashley put on her most sultry voice and was surprised about how easy it came. “That depends, on what you have in mind?”
“I’m Rodney Franklen, reporter for The Local Globe, the city’s best newspaper, (he said with the conviction that only a dedicated employee could) and I was wondering if I could take a picture of you and ask you a few quick questions for an article?”
Ashley’s heart sank, along with her hormone levels as she realised what the hunger in the man’s eye was really about, but she quickly recovered.
“Of course,” she said turning around in her chair and sticking out her belly the best she could from a sitting position, which was quite a lot given her size.

Katie Flick through the pages of the manual to the amulet, 'why didn’t it work before?' it was able to take Laura’s unborn children and give them to Ashley and Sarah moments before hand why wasn’t it able to take the babies off Sarah or that Erin girl. The best she idea she could come up with was that Laura’s pregnancy was natural and the other were created by the amulet. It didn’t explain why Ashley babies had been shifted around before but it was a theory and one that she could test out.
It was that point two women entered the shop bellies clearly laden with child and wearing pit stained lycra and sweats suggesting that they just finished some sort of work out. Both of these women had attended Mamaste: Prenatal Exercise for Mother and Child, in fact one was Janice the class instructor.
“I don’t really think getting new clothes are going to help Sasha,” said Janice as she and her friend waddled between the racks.
“It will really help bring you out more.”
Katie took aim and pressed the amulet.

PING!

Sasha’s belly deflated just as Janice's ballooned, her lyrca tank top retreating over the surface of her belly leaving the bulging pink orb visible to the world.
“I don’t need to be brought out more,” snapped Janice, the extra occupant not helping her demeanour, “I’m already very out, I just want that jerk to accept his response abilities.”
“Don’t take it out on me,” said Sasha slightly disgruntled herself.
Katie then tried to use the amulet to remove Janice’s unborn pair, but there was no ping and Janice remained swollen with twins. Well she did waste a pair of babies to give the Page women but she now knew something more about the amulet, now to see to the customer.

“Truly Amazing,” said Rodney scribbling down in his note book, “Someone at your age taking a pregnancy with so many so well. It’s a shame your daughter wasn’t here to be in the picture as well.”
“I don’t think she would of like that,” said Ashley, “she would probably do the best she could to hide herself in the picture.”
“But what could a women with quintuplets use to hide?”
“This,” said Ashley giving her own prodigious belly a light slap.
“True,” said Rodney, “Well Mrs. Page...”
“Please call me Ashley.”
“Well Ashley just keep an eye out for this article in the local globe,” and with that he left.
Ashley was vaguely disheartened she really felt that she had something going with that reporter but he left without so much of a goodbye. Though it did seem easy, to flirt, to bat her eyelids and to put the right harmonics in her voice.

It was at that point...
1112112121212111211221111221.title: Brandon and Erin enter the shop

choices: Hoo boy where is this going to go?
Follow Ashley around the mall
11121121212121112112211112211.content:
"You're becoming a bit of a celebrity with that belly, aren't you?" Ashley turned around at her table and saw a tall, red-headed man smiling at her. It was Joel, one of Brandon's few friends, but Ashley didn't recognize him.

"I suppose so," Ashley smiled, rubbing her belly with one hand. She was curious about this stranger who would go up and start talking with a massively pregnant woman. "Do you think I should start letting people take pictures with me, like Mickey Mouse at DisneyWorld?"

"Only if you'd want that," Joel smiled, sitting down next to her. "But I'm sure you'd be a popular attraction if that was the case. Not many women carry pregnancy quite the way you do."

Ashley laughed softly, raising one eyebrow curiously. This was turning into a very interesting conversation. "Well thank you, young man. I assume you want a photo with the belly now too?"

Joel shrugged. "If we just talk more, I won't need a photograph."

Ashley blushed softly as she began to feel some movement in her womb, pressing against her ribs and pelvis. With six babies, there wasn't many places left for them to go that were totally comfortable. "Mmm, they're getting anxious," Ashley said, moving both hands to her belly, looking up at Joel. She made eye contact as she rubbed small circles around both sides of her pronounced bump. "Want to feel?"

"Of course," Joel smiled, placing his hand on her belly. While Ashley was starting to enjoy his flirting and Joel maintained his confident persona, inside his head he was jumping for joy and crying out loud. Oh my god, I can't believe she's letting me feel her belly! She's the biggest pregnant woman I've seen in my entire life! And she's not like a lot of big pregnant women and is a butterface! She's so hot! What do I do next what do I do next what do I do next?

"Maybe you could calm them down more if you felt them directly," Ashley said, rolling up her shirt with both hands. Plenty of her belly skin was already showing with her limited selection of clothing for her constantly swelling belly, but now her whole bare belly was on display for Joel as he moved his hand to her smooth, taut skin. After her own husband, Tanner, had no interest in her pregnant body, Ashley knew she had to find sexual satisfaction somewhere else and right now Joel was looking like a promising candidate. And besides, she was probably going to have these babies pretty soon, so it would just be a short affair. No harm, no foul, she thought.

"Feels nice," Joel said softly, looking from the belly's soft, glowing form to Ashley's eyes, fixating on them when suddenly-

"You bastard!" a loud voice said. Joel turned around and saw Janice, still in her tight yoga outfit, which showed off her belly prominently, waddled up. "You get me knocked up and then you spend your time flirting with another pregnant woman? Don't tell me you got this one pregnant too!"

"I-I'd better go," Joel said, standing up. "It was nice talking to you." Joel hurried away, his frame letting him move far more quickly than Janice could, thanks to her belly. Although she was dwarfed by Ashley's occupied womb, it was still a constraint.

"And you'd better stay away from him if you know what's good for you," Janice said, rubbing her belly before turning away in a huff. Sasha was standing nearby, looking away uncomfortably. "I can't believe that."

"S-sorry, Janice," Sasha said, trying to calm her friend. She used to be a calm, serene yoga practitioner. So why was she getting so angry lately?

"It's fine," Janice sighed, taking her phone out of her exercise bag to send a quick text to some of her other friends to complain. As she put the phone back in her bag, her hands touched some metal. Curious, she reached in and pulled out some sort of bizarre amulet. "Huh I...guess I forgot I had this." She slipped it over her neck, feeling a slight shudder that traveled all the way to her belly, making her twins (previously just one, but thanks to Katie, that was different now) kick and squirm inside her.

------

Katie was back behind the desk at the maternity clothing store, taping her fingers on the desk, totally bored. There hadn't been any other customers coming in and if there weren't any more pregnant women inside, she couldn't experiment with her amulet. Looking at it in her hand, Katie thought she might have gotten the short end of the stick and gotten it when it had been "used up" by its previous owners: the Page family. The fact that the Page family had it at all was something she was also curious about. They must have used it a lot to get the mother and daughter that...big.

"Guess I'm not the only one who likes pregnant women," Katie remarked to herself with a chuckle.

"What did you say, Katie?" Laura, Katie's boss, said, poking her head from out of her office.

"Nothing," Katie said, rolling her eyes. Laura may have become a lot nicer since Katie took her pregnancy and gave it to Ashley and Sarah, but she still resented her deep down. Katie might have only taken this job to gawk at pregnant beauties, but as she'd worked here, she saw that she could run this store far better than Laura. She could turn this place into an enterprising business. The thought of bringing in all that money made Katie feel...strange. A twinge went through her that she couldn't explain, but she liked it.

"Excuse me?" a woman said in front of the counter. Katie let out a yelp and dropped the amulet, startled by the customer. She had to do a better job not daydreaming!

PING!

"I was shopping for a friend of mine who's having a baby," the woman said. Katie nodded along, hand slowly moving to her own firm pregnant belly. "Do you sell any baby supplies, like cribs or mobiles?"

"Yes, here on the left," Katie smiled professionally, waddling a few steps to motion to a small display of equipment for a baby or toddler. "And all of those come with shipping, so talk to me about what options you might want."

"Thank you," the woman smiled back, walking over. Before she came in the door, she was expecting twins, but now those twins were growing inside Katie, thanks to her mishandling of the amulet. But as the amulet dropped, it became damaged and sparked a bit, as it had so many times already. Reality should have been rewritten and Katie was questioning whether she had always been pregnant or if it had suddenly appeared.

"Katie, can you sort the new shipment of belly bras?" Laura said from her office. Katie scoffed again and instead went over to help the customer. Why are you still running this place? If it wasn't for me, this store would be bankrupt. If I ran it, we'd have money flowing in. Besides, I'm the pregnant one. A maternity store should be run by a pregnant woman. Katie's thoughts were swirling around in her head, amplified by the evil dwelling inside the amulet that all our characters are just beginning to realize.

The customer smiled when Katie struggled over, her work shirt barely managing to contain her belly. "Goodness, I didn't realize how far along you were behind the counter. How many weeks?"

As Katie searched for the answer, the amulet sparked some more. The reality rewrite didn't work! "Oh...I feel like I've still got a long way to go," Katie smiled, patting her belly, thinking about getting a belly as big as Ashley's and winning her heart. "A long way to go."

----

Sarah tore off her clothes and sat in front of her computer in a huff, groaning as her swollen belly bumped against her desk. "Why does it always seem like this room was set up for someone with a smaller belly?" Sarah complained, rubbing her naked belly as she opened her email.

"Sarah: we got some more investments," Neera, one of her partners in some technology ventures, said to her in an email marked with top priority. "Some scientist from Europe likes the P-Tech idea and is exploring it with me right now. I'll send you details when they come."

Sarah leaned back, only in her bra and underwear, and those were probably going to come off soon too. "P-Tech?" Sarah pondered. She didn't always know what she was working on for Neera or her other partners since she was in her home office and lately was constrained by her over-occupied womb. Brandon mentioned something about "Preg Tech" but..."naw, just a coincidence," Sarah said, heaving herself up and waddling to the shower, snapping off her bra and slowly slipping off her underwear, both clinging tightly to her swollen breasts and rear. She rubbed under her belly and turned on the water, groaning. Waddling around with five full-grown fetuses made her sweaty.

----

Brandon sat with Erin on her bed, the two not really looking at one another as Erin ran her hand over her belly. Finally, she was the one to break the silence.

"T-thanks for always being so nice to me, especially since 'this,'" Erin said, patting her belly to show what "this" was. "You're reacting a lot better than my parents."

"Well we have different priorities," Brandon blushed, looking intently at Erin's belly. It was nice to have a belly to look at that wasn't attached to one of his relatives. "And I'll always help you out. That's what friends are for."

Erin giggled and turned to Brandon, her eyes looking over his face. "Well, then what can I help you with?"
11121121212121112112211112211.title: Ashley went over to/was approached by someone

choices: Ashley was making her way home
Janice and Katie start talking working out
111211212121211121122111122111.content:
Brandon looked back at Erin, her red flowing hair, those deep blue eyes, that cute little nose and big luscious lips. Erin looked back Brandon. Sure, he was a fool here and there, but man he was something... " I, um" Brandon barely got out, tension rising " I have to go to the bathroom." Like the fasted mouse in Mexico he bee lined for the bathroom, hiding his erection. Erin was left dazed and confused. "Damn it Brandon" he said to himself infront of the mirror. "You may be a page, but right now you are more like an awkward paragraph." Erin and Brandon had been friends for a while, and she knew how his mind worked. She got up with little struggle and waddled over to the cabinet. Grabbing her iPad she put on some smooth jazz, then placing it back down she opened up her draw of lingerie.

-----------------------------------------

The hot, relaxing water streamed down on Sarah's face as she soaped herself up. she couldn't help but think about the past few days. Going to the mall, Brandon rubbing her belly, getting changed at the store, Brandon's muscles as he rubbed her cl- Sarah shocked herself out of it. She was mere inches away from pleasuring herself in the shower. Shaking her head she tried getting her head out of that zone, she had to get ready for an interview, she didn't have time for all this other stuff.

As she carefully waddled out of the bathroom, using two towels to cover her body, she heard her phone buzzing. Picking up the phone she saw 3 new emails from the interviewers at Baxter Industries
< Dear Ms Page
Due to time constraints we will need to move forward your interview to 2pm. If there are any problems let us know.
Baxter Industries>
< Dear Ms
Because of your current "situation" we will come to your place. We are impressed that you are still up for this interview while in this state>
<Dear Ms Page
Nigel Baxter, founder of Baxter industries has seen the blue prints you have sent us, and will be overseeing the interview, see you in an hour>

Sarah looked up at the clock and noticed it was ten to one. "Oh god no!" She yelled looking for a clean suit to wear. Looking through her clothes pile she grabbed a relatively clean yet unironed shirt that she could only get the first 3 buttons done, but her belly was on complete display. Grabbing any pants she could find she struggled to pull them up, sadly these were for pants for someone pregnant with a single child, not 5. Struggling to get them up, she couldn't find a blazer. She waddled out of her room and down the hall. "Hmmm, maybe Brandon has something" she said to herself as she peered into her brothers bedroom.

Making her way in she saw a glint of gold from behind the bedside table. Quickly she made her way over. Picking it up by it's chain, she noticed it was a golden version of her amulet. "Wasn't that the thing Brandon was reading about the other night?" She thought as she grabbed her amulet from her bossom. They looked almost identical, except hers was silver with 5 red gems and his was gold with 7 green gems. She decided to tap the two amulets together.

PONG!

" meh, piece of junk" she said as she threw the gold amulet on the bed. The pants slacked a little, so she finally managed to pull them up to her quadruplet belly. Grabbing a blazer she left. What she didn't see was one of the green gems violently glowing as smoke escaped it. The smoke formed the number one, then dispersed. Hearing a car pull up, she did up another 2 buttons, pulled on a blazer she found and went to answer the door.

---------------------------------------------------------------------


Back at the mall a short, curvaceous Asian woman in business attire walked past the food court where Janice and Katie were eating, past Ashley who was just making her way out, over to the elevator. Eventually after a series of visually entertaining spy scenes she made it to the boss's office. Walking into the circular room she saw the artworks of pregnant women, artifacts, sculptures and rugs portraying the pregnant figure. Past the table was someone known simply as the man of the present. In the past he was known for many different names, but for this story, let's call him PETE.

"Rebecca Quo reporting for duty." The woman called out in command.

" Oh please, put yourself at ease, our latest station is a mall, not a Russian art museum. How was your trip?" PETE asked casually. " Um, okay. The trip was excellent, thank you for the first class tickets".
"It was nothing for the best agent in the business." PETE said scratching behind his ear. He handed Rebecca a file "so basically I want you to follow these 6 people, if you can get rid of number 5's boss and do something about number 1. I have studied his family members, they are on the list too, he may pose a problem and is in need of a distraction." After exchanging goodbyes Rebecca left the room. PETE went back to his desk, pulled out what appeared to be a remote and started tinkering with it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------

Katie had continued her adventures in spying. Rubbing her belly she brushed some of her short brunette hair out of her face as she watched Janice the blonde fit pregnant lady waddle back to the gym.

When Janice got back she decided to put in a couple of miles into the treadmill. Usually a woman who's as pregnant as her shouldn't be able to handle that, but Janice was filled with pure white hot rage. The father to her kids, with her yoga student?! It was driving the poor woman insane, almost literally. As Katie looked at her from the window of the gym, she couldn't help but watch her perfectly toned, fantastically shaped behind move in a hypnotic way.

"Maybe she could be helpful" she said as she waddled into the gym, unbeknownst to her the monster she was about to create.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------

Over the next half an hour, Sarah had made a presentation to the company that were interested in her invention. Sarah was sweating heavily. She was almost finished presenting to the three smartest heads in technology(as far asshe knew) and was awaiting their response. She had made several mistakes, her pants tore open when she bent down to pick up a pen. Sadly this meant presenting her not so fashionable " kiss me" panties. Nigel sat there disappointed, the same for his colleges.

"I-in summation, I present to you the Phwatch, b-b-basically it is a tablet strapped to your arm, it's a universal remote, c-can track things from your keys to your pre-" Sarah stammered, only for Nigel to stop her there.

"Look, Sarah, I am sure a lovely kind girl, you have presented some interesting things here too." He said delicately" but, we need someone more, business intelligence, more ready for a situation such as this. You just won't be taken seriously in the technology world. I am very sorry to say, we will not be accepting your invention into our company".

Another rejection. Another god damn bloody rejection! Sarah was on the verge on crying, this was the 6th failed interview this month and it was getting too much for her. Just because she has blonde hair and was heavily pregnant doesn't mean she is an idiot! It was one stupid mistake! Everyone else was doing fine, dad was working really well, the businesses in the mall were booming, yet she couldn't get anyone to fund her projects. The Baxter people thanked and left her whilst she was still in shock.

She waddled upstairs. Her shock changing into envy, changing into an urge to change. In her madness she went into her mothers bathroom, opened up the cabinet and saw her mothers dark brown hair dye number 4. "Think I'm a bimbo do they? Well when we will see what they say after this!" She madly laughed as she read the instructions. By the end of it all not only did she feel confident, but also felt like she could take anything on.


Meanwhile....
111211212121211121122111122111.title: Hoo boy where is this going to go?

choices: Mr. Greene and Catalina meet
Brandon and Erin pick up Ashley
1112112121212111211221111221112.content:
Katie looked around the gym, happy to see more pregnant women in there than just Janice. They were mostly walking at a leisurely pace on the treadmill or doing light weight work, but a few curvy moms-to-be were grunting with larger weights. I'd love some toned arms around me while I rub my belly against theirs, Katie thought greedily, stroking her exposed belly, but I've got to get Ashley first.

Janice had a strong sweat going, her breath coming out in quick, sharp pants as she ran, consumed with a wrathful energy over the scene between Ashley and Joel. Here she was, a sexy, strong woman in her 20s and the guy who gets her pregnant flirts with another woman! In her 40s! And even more pregnant to boot! Janice kept hearing a crunching noise and looked down to see that she was running faster than the treadmill and had broken off a little of its plastic. Groaning, she hit a button to start the cool down and wiped off her forehead and chest with a small towel. Lying next to it was the amulet she found in her gym bag, which she picked up too. Ashley's carrying sextuplets, Janice thought to herself as she slipped the amulet over her neck, accidentally touching its jewels as she did.

PING

Maybe if I was carrying three more babies, he wouldn't show other women attention, Janice thought, rubbing her now-triplet belly, totally exposed now as her athletic tank top just sort of rested on it. As she tried to calm down and drink some water, Katie waddled up in front of her. "What do you want?" Janice barked. "I'm trying to exercise. I don't need someone staring at me."

"It's alright, I want to talk to you personally," Katie said, not expecting Janice to be so angry. "I know you run the pregnant yoga classes here at the mall gym. I work...I run the maternity clothing store here in the mall and I want to expand our operation. I was thinking you and I could...team up."

"Team up, huh?" Janice thought, her anger calming down. "You think this would be a profitable venture?"

"Sure! Look at all the pregnant women in this mall," Katie smiled. "But it's about more than just profits. You and I," Katie said, getting closer, rubbing her belly, "are pregnant and we know that we pregnant women need someone taking care of us. And who better to do that than pregnant women?"

"Interesting," Janice said, stepping off the treadmill. Now it was clear just how much she outsized Katie, both in belly but also in height, muscle, and overall confidence. The personality change that accompanied Katie getting her amulet made her less shy and sheepish, but in the presence of a strong, angry, pregnant woman like Janice, Katie began to revert to her old self. Was he a demon freed from the shadows by unsuspecting peasants in the Middle Ages? Was he a pregnancy-obsessed human transformed into something else?

Whatever his origins, Yaral was a being of complex and mysterious power now, limited to giving out his tools every now and then and leaving them to the people they fall into. But the Preg-Transferer was perhaps one of his most clever devices, because when all seven of the amulets came together, incomparable power would be released and he would absorb more chaotic energy in a short time than any of his other tricks could provide.

Well, seven of eight amulets. Yaral’s first attempt at creating the Preg-Transferer created a “master amulet” that could ruin his plans. Yaral wasn’t strong enough to interfere with events too much now, but he could go and watch the owners of the amulets to see what they were up to.
