“Sorry I forgot, Mom,” Brandon said, trying not to sound too “out of breath.” “But you don’t need my anymore? Well, that’s lucky. Have fun at the mall.” He hung up, letting out a long sigh as he did. “That was a close call. I swear, she spends so much time at that mall, she’s more of a teen than I ever was.”

“She’s got the looks,” Erin said. “Seriously: your mom is like a model.”

“I guess I don’t see it,” Brandon blushed. Erin grinned and rolled over.

“Even with her big belly, you don’t feel anything?” Brandon looked away uncomfortably as Erin took his chin in her hand. “C’mon, I know you like pregnant bellies.”

“That’s not the only reason I like y-” Brandon protested, cut off as Erin put a finger to his lips.

“It’s okay, I know,” Erin smiled, looking down at herself. “I’ve…suspected for a long time. I should have acted on those feelings too. Then maybe I wouldn’t be knocked up with the babies of some guy I don’t even like who chickened out on me.”

Brandon wrapped his arms around Erin’s belly. “Hey, I’m here now. And you’re here for me. That’s all that’s important now.” Erin looked back up and kissed Brandon, their lips staying in place for a few moments before opening up to accept the other’s. After a few soft kisses, a loud gurgle went through the room.

“Oops,” Erin blushed, sticking her tongue out cutely. “Sounds like I need to fill the tank. You really took a lot out of me.” Erin heaved herself up, letting out a grunt as she held her belly, sitting on the edge of the bed. “Hand me my bra, will you? I think it’s on your side of the bed.”

Brandon reached over and handed Erin some of her underwear, turning to see Erin slipping a necklace over her head, settling it between her breasts. “Where did you get that? It looks like one I have but…a little different.”

Erin shrugged. “Just found it. I can’t totally remember where. Must be some cheap, mass produced stuff they make at souvenir stores. Looks pretty real, though,” she said, examining the jewels.

PING

“Well, let’s go to my kitchen. I’m starving. You must be too, huh?”

“I-I guess I could eat,” Brandon said, furrowing his brow as he looked at Erin. She looks fantastic: a huge belly, incredible breasts, a wide ass (none of which were bigger than his sister or mom’s – an observation that pained Brandon to make) and her red hair looked even silkier, falling across her mostly naked pregnant body. But…was she always that pregnant? Something in his head said otherwise.

He was bonded with the “master” amulet, so Yaral couldn’t take it back. “Ladies and gentlemen of…what city is this?” she whispered off stage. “Whatever. Welcome to the unveiling of the newest addition to this mall, quickly becoming the center for the most trendy clothes in the state, rivaling the fashion centers of New York City, Paris, Milan!” The audience didn’t seem too enthused so, with an eye roll, Catalina turned to walk across the stage, letting her rear stick out a little.

Would you all like to see it?”

The audience cheered as Catalina went off-stage, a mob of assistants and make-up artists quickly taking her simple (well, simple for Catalina) dress off and slipped her into a shimmering silver dress, tight-fitting and with a long décolleté to show off her heaving chest. Her baggy camo pants were very accommodating to her newfound size, on the other hand.

As she talked and smiled, Catalina couldn’t help but feel…not exactly déjà vu. Almost the opposite. Being pregnant feels weird and all but I should at least be able to remember being pregnant before now, she thought. It feels new but also…familiar. Must be pregnant brain.

Antonio chuckled to himself, arms crossed. He could see the confusion in her eyes from where he was. Removing the gem from her amulet reduced its power some, but it also sped up the “pregnancy transfer” process, wildly grabbing pregnancies and shifting them around. He’d fix it soon, sure, but now that it got Catalina pregnant, another domino was falling into place. He was still able to know when the amulet struck and wasn’t affected by the reality shift because of an interesting little paradox with the amulets: if you know how they work, they don’t work for you.

“Soon this new addition will be raking in more money than this whole building ever did,” Antonio smiled to himself. “And that will be another step to total market domination.” He walked to his private elevator, laughing as it went to his office. Even Yaral can’t stop me this time. He wants to make the world pregnant? So do I!

Yaral chuckled as well as he watched Antonio’s expression. “Be glad for now, my old friend, but know this: I do not like to be manipulated and I always have my revenge…”

Ashley exclaimed, her joy starting to go sour "Then there is my husband who let's face it, has been avoiding me for the past few days. Sigh, I'm sorry, I just met you, you don't need this" Ashley, starting to get upset, waddled over to the bathroom. " Man, her pregnancy has really given her some mood swings" Rebecca said to herself " this might come in handy." Getting up she made her way into the bathroom.

Tears trickled down Ashley's face, as she grabbed some towels to dry herself and prevent her make up from being ruined. " hey, it's alright." Rebecca said, making her way over to Ashley. " I used to be a psychologist, I like taking care of people. You don't have to worry about those idiots." Ashley wiped the tears and her ruined make up off her face. " hey, let's get that beautiful face of yours fixed up." She said, dipping her hand into her bad and pulling out her own mini kit. Fixing her up, Ashley looked like a million bucks again. "Thank you so much" Ashley compassionately said hugging her. "Hey, it's alright. You can trust me, you have nothing to fear..."

Outside the bathroom, Joel and Grant were relaxing with their drinks. Joel grabbed a napkin and started writing. Giving rough estimates, he would have Ashley has six babies, he remembered Brandon talking how his sister had four. Then there was the bride of satan, his ex Janice with triplets and that cutie at the pregnant store has, twins? Or Triplets? With all these pregnant women, he could play bingo he thought to himself. Stuffing the napkin in his wallet and punching Ashley's number in his phone, Joel thought it was time to go home. " okay Grant, I'll see you and Brandon at yours tomorrow night for DnD. Do you know if he has found a third adventurer for your campaign?"

"I'll call him tomorrow about it, maybe we will finally have another woman! Unlike the time you brought Kendra along" Grant answered with attitude.

"Look, my dear friend I had no'eth clue the difference between a brew of glutenation and a brew from freeglutenhime?" Joel said in a mystical sense

"She was alergic to gluten! We had to drive her to the emergency room!" Grant retorted loudly

"Ah now who isn't 'role playing'! See you tomorrow night" Joel said leaving the cafe

11121121212121112112211112211121121.content:
Antonio fingers brushed through his silvering hair. Looking through the glass elevator, he saw the beautiful Catalina on stage, and the amulet doing it's work. There about 15 pregnant ladies there, including several ladies with multiples showing support for the pregnant celebrity. The amulet was about to change that. In a matter of seconds female bellies started shrinking and growing. Clothes were tearing at the seams and dresses were being lifted by the sheer expanse of belly. No one seemed to care though. By the end of the show every woman in the audience had become pregnant from her amulet. Several women decided to travel down to '9 months and beyond', the rival store to the one that Katie works at.

Now that Catalina was on board he could start working on the plans second phase. "Jobson, Walker, I'm coming to the lab. Make sure you have that gem locked in securely" Antonio said into his headset, "yes sir" a feminine voice replied. Ending the call he noticed his hand, the tips of his fingers were different, almost a deep red. Heading up to his office, he grabbed his gloves, his tablet and his secretaries arse for good measure. Antonio and Zoe had a "special" relationship....

Still wearing the gloves he was wearing when he talked to Antonio, Bill Jobson stored the gem inside the glass safe. " Can you take that away? It's nauseating" Wendy Walker said, feeling sick. " Sorry, Wendy. I am still wondering why we needed this, I feel fine to be honest" he said, being affected to the gem's energy.

Antonio entered the giant underground lab. As large as a football field and nearly half the size of the mall, it was filled to the brim with technological goods. There was nearly a hundred people working on specific tasks. They were paid well to do their jobs and paid really well not to ask any questions. At the centre was his right hand man and left hand lady. " Are the mechanical corsets ready?" Antonio asked Wendy. " yes sir, I'm just about to put mine on. " you better, otherwise who knows how he gem has affected you are already. Putting his cyber gloves on, Antonio brought up a holo screen. 6 strange gadgets came up. A pair of goggles was the first thing to show, then a gun, a remote and so on until all of them were showing. "Now that we can harness this gems unlimited energy, we can finally start making sure these gadgets work properly. Walker, please get team delta to work on project RT65, Jobson, get team Trion to work on project PG18".

------------------------------------------------------------------

Sarah made it to the final stair and up to the closet. Grabbing a broom she waddled over to her room. Opening the door, an awful smell wafted and she saw the pig sty. Stained bras, packages of food and clothes were everywhere. " Better deal with this first" she mumbled sweeping up the food packets. Lowering her quadruplet belly down she picked them up and threw them into the guest room. Then with gravid belly, she somehow collected all the dirty clothes and threw them in the laundry basket. Unbuttoning the rest of her ruined shirt she sat down and pulled herself up to the computer.

< Dear Miss Page

I Doctor Schultz have taken a look over your emails, research and blue prints for your mentioned devices. I am interested to see what you mean by devices that help pregnant women. I am actually coming over from Germany to visit a medical conference in a city not too far from yours. If you would like, we can meet and discuss me funding your said projects.

I should also state that I would need to see all prototypes in action before I exchange any money of course. I should be over there in hopefully 5 days time, I hope you don't mind putting up with a rich old German for a night or two, just to see how I may help with your inventions.

I look forward to your reply

Doctor Schultz>

"Oh my god, oh my god, oh my GOD!" Sarah excitingly, her legs kicking in the air, well as far up as they can whilst sitting with a huge belly. Her stomach started growling. " oh I shoulda had something to eat before going to sleep" she said throwing her brunette hair back. Grabbing her mobile she dialled the pizza company. After ordering enough pizzas for a family she looked around for what could only be said to be a robotic spine. Switching to a tank top, She attached it to her back she walked out of her room like any regular woman, especially not someone with 4 babies in her.


Tanner parked a block away from the Page house, making out with the black haired bimbo she stuffed her number in his hand. "Call me" she said, exiting the car. He watched her ghetto booty as she walked to the double storey house. Driving over, he was starting to relax after a wild afternoon with one of the local ladies. Driving up to his house, Tanner sprayed himself over with deodorant then smoked a cigarette in the car to remove any wafting scents. Walking in he noticed a deserted house, then came the gentle steps from upstairs as Sarah walked up to the divide. " hey dad!" Sarah said, his overly pregnant daughter waved. Tanner was disappointed with Sarah for her getting pregnant, but was quite proud by how incredibly passionate she was, the brown hair was a nice change though. " your new hair du looks nice, how did the interview go?"

"Well you were right, they didn't want some blonde bimbo. So I decided it was time for a change. But I have some great news! But let's wait for the rest of the family to come in." Tanner and Sarah walked over to the kitchen where one of her projects worked. " so, here is the Phwatch, or armlet" says Sarah showing him the strange looking watch on the bench. " it works just fine, but I have a problem with the power, I'm better off trying to walk into mordor."

" Hold on, lemme see what you have here" Tanner said, opening up the prototype's contents. Detaching a few wires, he grabbed his toolbox located under the kitchen bench. Taking out one quarter of the contents he fitted the device with a much larger battery from an old tablet. " there, that'll give you some extra hours of power." Turning it on, it started up pretty well, then after a spark or two the batter launched itself across the room.




That night...

111211212121211121122111122111211211.content:
Back at their seats, Ashley was rubbing her belly slowly as she sighed, sorry to see that Joel had left the coffee shop since she went to the bathroom to vent. But in his absence, Ashley moved her eyes around the store, getting a tingling sensation at nearly every other face she saw. Since when was this town full of so many handsome men? Ashley thought with a grin. She reached into her purse to see if she had anything to improve her appearance some and, instead of any makeup, found an amulet instead.

"This looks familiar somehow," she said to herself, tying it around her neck, hoping it would bring attention to her cleavage. As she adjusted her chest, Rebecca scooted into the seat across from her. "Sorry about that," Ashley chuckled, passing Rebecca her drink.

"Thanks. I'll make sure to pay you back using my discount," Rebecca said, groaning as she reached over for the tall paper cup.

"You work for this coffee chain?" Ashley asked, drinking her smoothie, making sure to lick her lips obviously.

"No, I-" Rebecca began, deciding not to reveal that all of the property surrounding the mall was owned by one man, "I work for a lot of different businesses. I'm a...lawyer."

"It must be nice to get benefits for work, especially in our condition. I remember when I had my first baby, I was grateful for any help I could get. Is this your first pregnancy?"

Rebecca nodded. "Yep. How about you?"

"Number two, but it's quite a bit different than last time," Ashley laughed, running her hand all around her enormous belly. "It really is nice to have another pregnant woman to talk with about these sorts of things. My daughter's pregnant too but she...doesn't like to spend much time with me." Ashley threw her hair back to get it out of her eyes, taking another drink to hide her sad sighing.

"Well, the mall is starting some more programs for pregnant women," Rebecca said, leaning forward a bit. "Maybe you should stop by more often."

"That would be nice," Ashley smiled, "although I think I'd stand out even among other pregnant ladies."

Rebecca chuckled, familiar with the plans Antonio had in store for the mall. "Somehow, I think you would be surprised how many women close to your...size you could meet." Rebecca reached into her purse to see the list of assignments she'd written down, but as she wrapped her fingers around her amulet instead, she felt increasingly lazy. "You can look up details on the mall website."

"O-oh," Ashely said with a raised eyebrow. "You don't have a schedule with you now?"

Rebecca shrugged and groaned a little. "It would take too long to look up now. In fact, I'd better be going."

The two women got up, Ashley having to struggle far more than her new friend. Ashley might have given a lot of care to her appearance, but it was nothing like the physical athletic training Rebecca had undergone over her life and career. As Ashley tried to settle herself, she gave Rebecca a wobbly goodbye hug, their amulets touching.

PING

"Well, hopefully I'll get to see you again soon," Ashley smiled, rubbing her belly, which was now totally exposed. "I've got to get these seven home before they kick so hard my water breaks!"

"I know that feeling," Rebecca chuckled, patting her own belly. "I just want to lie on the couch and quiet my twins down while I watch TV."

---

Brandon sat nervously at Erin's kitchen table as she finished off her third helping of her family's leftovers. "I should probably be getting back home soon. They're going to be sitting down to dinner soon and if I'm not there, they'll start snooping around."

"Dinner? You're not full yet?" Erin asked, mouth full of microwaved pasta.

"N-no, I haven't really been eating," Brandon blushed. "Just you. Aren't you full yet?"

"Pregnant, remember?" Erin said, leaning back and patting her bare belly. "I'm eating for four now and we each need a lot."

"I guess so," Brandon said, looking around the house. "Still, I should get out of here before your parents get back."

Erin rolled her eyes. "You think they'll get mad at you? Their daughter is pregnant with triplets. Believe me: you're the least of their concerns." She got out of her seat and waddled with a catlike gait over to Brandon, sitting down in his lap. "Still, it's cute that you're worried." Erin handed her possible boyfriend the Tupperware container and wrapped one arm around his neck. "Feed me."

"Does this turn you on?" Brandon asked with a little smile, scooping up some noodles to slide into Erin's mouth.

"Mmm, a little. Also, my fork-holding arm is getting tired," she said, gulping down the food before giving Brandon a kiss on the cheek. "But we can pick up any time. Maybe you should get back home soon. I'd hate for this-" she gave him another peck "-to be stopped by either of our families."

"Neither do I," Brandon said, putting the food down and wrapping his arms around Erin's belly. "If you knew how long I've wanted to be with you..."

Erin shushed him quietly as she bent down for a kiss. "You don't need to say anymore. Just get dressed and I'll see you...soon."

Brandon nodded and the two balanced Erin's belly to get her off of Brandon's lap as he went back to Erin's room to get his clothes. Inside his pants' pocket, Brandon pulled out his phone and saw that his mother had sent him another text.

<got a ride with someone else. you don't have to pick me up>

"That's good," Brandon sighed. "Now I just have to beat her home before she suspects anything between me and...Erin." Little did Brandon know that his father was thinking the same thing when he made it home with his new "plaything."

---

"I'll draw up some paperwork for you to sign tomorrow," Katie said in the locker room, a grin permanently affixed to her face as Janice, in all her pregnant glory, undressed and redressed in front of her.

"Sounds good," Janice nodded, pulling her top down tightly, struggling to get it over her belly. Her veins popped out of her neck as she gave her clothes one strong pull, tearing it so her belly was exposed anyway. "And by the way...you might want to try out some of the other training the gym offers. You're a little...scrawny."

"Scrawny," Katie repeated back, looking at herself. Her triplet-filled belly, plus the new ample chest her pregnant gave her, made her look anything but scrawny. But before her pregnancy, Katie had been an exceptionally small, mousey woman. "I see what you mean."

"If you want to be a businesswoman, you need to show some strength," Janice said, flexing her arm. "Believe me, the guy who runs this mall? He shows off all the time when we have to negotiate our contracts with him each year. And he can be a real bastard." Janice threw a punch at her nearby locker, leaving a clear fist-shaped dent. Katie gulped and nodded.

"I-I'll look into some fitness programs," she said, giving Janice a reassuring smile. Janice smiled back and nodded, waddling away, hand on her belly. Katie finished changing and headed out of the mall. Janice has a lot of benefits if I'm starting a pregnancy-centric business, but she's a little risky with these bursts of rage, Katie thought, looking at the stage in the middle of the mall, currently surrounded by cheering people, many of whom were pregnant. On stage was Catalina, still parading around in her "pregnant commando" outfit.

Now someone like Catalina Corazon would be a much better face for this project, Katie grinned, looking Catalina over. The three of us together...we could take over this entire mall.

Dollar signs flooded her head as Katie cackled to herself, the amulet's energy pulsing through her. But as she made it to the malls' entrance, she saw something that blew away all of her other thoughts. "A-Ashley?"

Ashley turned around, her belly swinging and jiggling around. "Katie! Long time no see," she laughed, waddling slowly over to Katie. "Oof, you might need to come over here. Moving around is tough with seven babies, you know."

"Of course," Katie said, hugging Ashley tightly, her face smushed against Ashley's full bosom. Something's not right...I only brought her up to six. Maybe...I don't have the only amulet. "What are you still doing here?"

"I chatted with a friend, but now I don't have a ride," Ashley chuckled.

"I can give you a ride!" Katie blurted out, face turning bright red. "I-I mean...it's the least I can do after you had me over for dinner."

Ashley beamed. "That would be great, Katie."

She knows my name. Every time she says my name, it's like a feather slides down my spine, Katie thought, trying not to ooze too much love. "Well, then follow me. I think you'll be able to fit."

As Katie walked through the parking lot with Ashley, everyone staring and gasping at Ashley's nearly-naked enormity, she realized that she'd never driven pregnant before. She only used her amulet at work today. Looking down at her amulet, Katie saw the big button in the center that the manual said let her "undo" her pregnancy. Should I?

"Katie?" Ashley said, looking at her salesclerk curiously. "Aren't you going to get in?"

"Right, right," Katie thought, nervously hitting the big X on her amulet. In a flash, her belly went back to its same, flat appearance. One look at her car and Katie had to sadly realize that Ashley wouldn't easily fit either. I can make her smaller for now and then bring her back to her...oh god...septuplet belly later. Katie tapped her amulet a few times but...nothing. Ashley stayed wonderfully, enormously pregnant. "W-well, let me adjust your seat and we can get going."

1112112121212111211221111221112112111.content:
Opening a window, Erin moved to the couch, her bare belly alone testing the strength of the furniture. She popped open a bag of crisps with her legs then started chowing down. Pulling up his pants, Brandon walked out to see the sexy sight before him. " Well, it seems you have things wrapped up here, I think I'll head home. " Brandon said, scratching his head. " alright fine, if it matters so much to you, head on home, but here's something for next time." Getting up easily, she seductively walked over to the timid and skinny lad, touching his chest gently she moved her hands up and placed her arms on his shoulders.

Leaning in she sensually made out with him, her hands gliding through his hair. Brandon's legs became weak. Slowly he collapsed onto the reclining chair behind him. Rachel took off her shirt and threw her bra behind the couch. Getting on the chair she pulled the recline lever. Brandon flew back, his erection showing through his pants, Erin started grinding her massive belly up against Brandon's body. Reaching up, Brandon's hands moved along the fantastic, pale belly, that huge fleshly orb. Moving up Erin grabbed them and brought them up to her lactating chest. Plunging into her cleavage Brandon was on the verge of pure nirvana until-

"ERIN? We're home!" Mr Parker called from the lower level " fuck!" Brandon said removing his hands from her bossom, Erin threw on the shirt, she already had her short shorts on. As her parents started walking up stairs Brandon decided to take the express way out. Grabbing his shirt He jumped out the first story window and dived straight into the family's pool toy collection. Getting up, he snuck around the front and got in his car across the street. " hey mum and dad! " Erin said, doing her most innocent impression of running up and hugging them both. She quickly headed to the bathroom to change out of her milk stained shirt. Doing his best, Brandon quietly drove down to his house.


A few blocks away Katie was driving Ashley home. Katie kept switching between looking at the road, and looking at Ashley as she was seductively, massaging that fantastically large belly of hers. " So Katie, now that the weekend's over what have you got planned for the up coming week?" Ashley casually asked. It was becoming harder and harder for Katie to turn her eyes away from her. " I, uh, have work, I only have one week of holidays left before I go back to uni, so I'm sure I'll get some beach time in there too. How about you?".

"Well, I don't know. I guess I could go back and see how things are doing at St. John's high, but the question that really lies is, how do I get there with this?" She said pointing at her large midsection. The rest of the trip was filled with a somewhat awkward pause, every now and then they would try to talk, but to no avail.

Pulling up, Brandon managed to get back inside, just as Katie pulled up. Katie ran around the car to help Ashley out of her seat. With a heave and a pull, Katie slipped and fell on Ashley's wide expanse with an almost BOING effect. "OOFF" Ashley winced as Katie made her impact. "I'm, I'm, I'm so sorry, are you okay?" Katie panicked. " I am fine, it's just, no one has ever gotten this close to me lately," Ashley answered, putting her hand on Katie's arm. " if you aren't too busy tomorrow, maybe you would like to come over."
"That sounds great" Katie happily said, as she climbed off of her. With a more stabilised pull Ashley was out and started walking to the door. Katie got in the car and squealing, drove off.

The pizzas arrived ten minutes after Ashley made it through the door, if it weren't for left overs their hunger wouldn't have been satisfied. After dinner Brandon and Sarah watched the latest season of Deserted, a drama about a desert chef in the Middle East. Ashley had gone to bed and read whilst Tanner finished typing up reports for work. Closing his laptop he went upstairs. Sighing he opened the door to see the very pregnant partner of his. Sure she looked younger, you could say early thirties, but there was just that gargantuan belly connected to her. Tanner was a catholic man and believed that there were babies growing inside, not fetuses.

She rubbed her massive middle whilst reading that great sexual sci if hit 'Fifty Shades of Green'. Putting down the book she looked back up at the man who denied her pleasure. Why did he keep getting hotter and hotter? This was confusing. But she needed to get something off her chest. It was time they brought up Brandon's secret. " Tanner we need to talk about Brandon." Ashley said putting the book down.
"Seriously? You know what I said to Carl". Tanner replied knowing exactly what she was talking about. He pulled out his pyjamas out of the cabinet. " I mean come on, Carl and Sally were our favourite friends, and their will did say we shouldn't 't tell him. End of story".

Sighing, Ashley shifted the pillows from behind her back and collapsed over the bed, her limbs taking up as much space as she could. "Are you sure you don't want to come to bed?" Ashley said, trying to do her best sexually alluring voice. Tanner tried his best to look at her sexually, but with that incredibly large midsection it wasn't helping. Even with the image of his girlfriend, he couldn't bring himself to saying no. " I'm afraid so, I'm starting fairly early in the morning, I'll go in the guest room again. Exiting the room Ashley sighed going to her "special" bedside drawer.

Walking down the dark hall, Tanner forgot to switch the light on as he entered the room. CRASH! Burrito wrappers and ice cream containers went flying as Tanner fell upon the trash pile that Sarah had shifted into the room. "SARAH!" Tanner screamed down to the kids downstairs. " oh crap" Sarah panicked as she tried to hide in the cupboard. " Brandon, cover for me, I'm hiding out here tonight!"

After some cleaning up and stern talking, everyone was in their own separate beds and asleep.

That night in the Page household was filled to the brim with complete and utter silence. Everyone was sleeping like a log, mainly because logs don't make noise, but they don't sleep either, go figure. Ashley was scratching her belly, sleeping on her side. In her dreams she saw curtains. Over to her left she could see several pregnant women in lacy, heart throbbing costumes. She tapped a head set, " Joel, I hope the dancing ladies are finishing up, we may be partners, but I run 'the Pink Pearl'. A pregnant Laura, that woman who used to own the maternity store in the mall came over handing her some large feathers. She took the headset off of you and that's when you looked down. Minus some pasties you were practically nude! Suddenly everyone ran away from you and the curtains opened to a huge hall. She swore it looked like a brothel. Covering her figure with the giant feathers, she started seductively showing parts of her sexy body. As she danced people were hooting and hollering. As she approached the end of her dance something came flying from outside the window. BANG! She woke with sweat dripping from her, that's when she felt it. "Damn it, can I have one bathroom less night?" She grunted as she slowly got up and waddled to the onsuite.

Sarah managed to wrap her blanket around her. With a slight snore and a smile on her face she had a very different dream. "Mmmm, faster...." She murmured.

Early that morning.

11121121212121112112211112211121121111.content:
Brandon opened his eyes slowly as the sunlight came through the blinds. Today was one of his days to work during the week so he needed to wake up his body quickly. Putting on his shorts and white t-shirt, Brandon went for a run around the neighborhood while it was still early. He had to get up early because, with a hugely pregnant mother and sister, if he saw them, his erection would be obvious under his thin shorts. Brandon tied his necklace close to his body so it wouldn't bounce around too much. Strangely, he couldn't bring himself to go without it anymore.

As Brandon was making his way out the door, he could see his father on his cellphone sitting on the couch in the living room, talking quietly. "Of course I want to see you again today," he said. "Another pair of heels?...sure, I can bring that. And some jewelry too? As long as you bring your sexy ass, I'll get you anything." Brandon frowned slightly, long suspecting that Tanner and Ashley weren't getting along since the pregnancy.

Brandon ran up and down the sidewalks, only a few people out and about. Every now and then, Brandon's amulet would bounce against his chest a little too hard and a woman he'd pass by would grow a prominent belly. As Brandon ran, he passed by Erin's fancy house, which only made him smile. Inside, Erin was slowly waking up, stretching her arms and legs out before curling them back to caress her belly. Erin rolled over slowly, feeling her triplets kick with complaints as she moved, rubbing the space on the bed next to her sadly. Being hugely pregnant and alone was bad enough, but...she'd never realized how hard it was until Brandon came into her life and then left. Gripping the sheets, she knew she wanted to wake up and see Brandon holding her belly lovingly.

Her belly growled and Erin knew the other thing she wanted was breakfast. A big breakfast. Changing into a loose tank top and shorts, Erin tucked her amulet between her breasts and made it downstairs. To her surprise, her mother and father were already up and dressed. Her father, Douglas, was at the table, reading the newspaper, drinking coffee. Erin's mother, Susan, was cooking, filling the room with a scent that drove Erin wild. "You're both up early," Erin said, looking at the stove.

"Don't you remember? It's the annual golf exhibition at the country club today," Douglas said. "But you'll be staying here."

"Staying here? Why?" Erin protested, putting her hands on her hips. The golf exhibition always had the best catered, free food: something Erin never cared about until she got her amulet. As she turned back to her mother, her amulet slapped against her breasts and Susan's belly grew out considerably.

"Because having a daughter, unmarried, in your condition is...harmful to our reputation," Douglas said in a low growl.

"Then again," Susan sighed, putting one hand on her belly, covered by her apron, "if I'm pregnant, it's silly to keep Erin from going too. It's up to you, dear."

"Can I bring a friend?" Erin asked.

"No," Susan and Douglas said in unison. Erin sighed and shrugged, deciding to go along with it. "Now go upstairs and change. Preferably something that covers your entire belly, young lady."

Brandon made it back to his house, wiping the sweat off of his face with his t-shirt as he opened the door. When he brought his shirt down, he saw Sarah and Ashley both sitting in the living room, looking at him. Ashley had a kindly smile on her face while Sarah was trying to hide her blushing. Brandon blushed too, trying to move quickly so his shorts wouldn't give him away, as he feared. "H-hi Mom, hi Sarah."

"Hi sweetie," Ashley smiled as Brandon got some water. "Looking at you work out makes me feel so fat and bloated." Brandon opened his mouth to protest but Ashley cut him off. "I know, I know. I'm not bloated. Your sister and I are just big pregnant ladies." Ashley patted her belly. "Who would have expected my second pregnancy would be octuplets?"

"Octuplets?" Brandon said. He could have sworn it was sextuplets the last time she talked about her pregnancy. Something strange was definitely going on. "Wait a minute...second pregnancy?"

"Third, sorry," Ashley blushed. "Pregnant brain. What are you up to today, Brandon?"

"Internship stuff," Brandon said, drinking from his water bottle. "It'll be nice to get out of the house and mall for the day. W-what about you two?"

"I've got a big invention to work on," Sarah said with a hint of excitement as she slowly stood up, running her hands over her belly. She glared at her mother, upset she didn't say anything about her dyed hair. Why does she still get all the attention? I'm...I'm just as beautiful as she is. She turned her eyes to Brandon. He pays more attention to her too... "Excuse me." Sarah headed up to her room, gripping the stairs' railing tightly as she struggled with her belly.

"And I'm going to have a day of relaxation," Ashley smiled brightly.

"H-haven't you always been doing that, since you hit the eight-month mark?" Brandon gulped.

"Oh, they wouldn't let me teach at the high school when my belly was much smaller than this," Ashley said sadly, stroking her enormous orb of lovely tight skin. "But today, I'm going to travel around with a friend, try and find some adventure. I love sitting around and rubbing cocoa butter on my belly, but it can get a little boring sometimes."

I don't think I'd get bored Brandon thought, gulping nervously again and heading upstairs to shower off. When he got into the shower, Sarah was in there, shirt off, attaching a device to her back. "S-S-Sarah! I'm so sorry!" Brandon flustered, but not moving as his eyes were fixed on his sister's body.

Sarah rolled her eyes. "It's fine. Not like I'm naked." She looked down and ran her hands over her belly slowly. "But check it out: this is an invention I'm trying out to make it easier for pregnant women to walk around." Sarah took some steps forward and back, twirling around. Brandon had enough of a gap in his gawking to appreciate that she was far more nimble than before.

"That's impressive, sis," he nodded. "I guess you're working on p-p-pregnancy inventions now?"

"That's right. Who better to know the needs of modern pregnant women than someone carrying four little brats?" Sarah turned and gave Brandon an odd look. "And does saying 'pregnant' still make you nervous? You're so weird."

"Y-yeah, I guess so," Brandon gulped. "And why did you...change your hair?"

"You noticed?" Sarah said with a smile, turning back quickly. "I mean...no reason. I just wanted to look different. Why?"

She'd try to appreciate the belly she had now, and later, she'd go for higher stakes.

A piece of hot grissle from the frying pan jumped up and burned Katie, causing her to drop her amulet on the floor. "Damn, damn, damn," Katie cursed, picking it up and inspecting it. "Does this thing still work?" Katie didn't want to test it on herself, so she opened the door cautiously to see one of her neighbors, Kim: a seedy, gossipy girl who, despite all of this character flaws, was unbelievably sexy. She also happened to be Tanner's current "fling."

The amulet sparked a little and Kim's friend's belly blew up until she was full-term with one baby. "Sandra, hurry up!" Kim said. "Don't let that fat kid in your stomach keep you from going shopping."

"Hey, as long as your man is paying, I wouldn't stop if I was in friggin' labor," Sandra said, clumsily hurrying after her friend.

"Excellent," Katie cackled, going back into her apartment, not noticing that one of the gems on the amulet was badly damaged.

Real, honest-to-goodness sex with another human being. And almost as much as that, she wanted to be appreciated, even if she looked and felt like a beached whale.

Back in her room, Sarah had managed to detect the energy coming from the amulet. It was...peculiar, to say the least. Sarah couldn't even put her finger on it. It was biochemical, but it also wasn't. It had some similarities to body heat, but in other ways, it differed wildly.

"Well this is worth some investigation on its own," Sarah said, putting one hand on her expanded hips as she looked her device over. One of its measuring tongs slipped off and landed on Sarah's belly and the readings grew. "Now that's strange," Sarah nodded, looking between her belly and the device. "It's almost like this energy signature is specific to...pregnancy."

Whipping something up, Sarah built a slightly fancier version of her meter, putting the amulet in the center. "Now I should be able to measure the readings...like this," Sarah said, turning a knob to adjust the waves of the strange energy. As she did, Sarah felt her belly get tighter as it swelled out until...

PING!

Dropping her device, Sarah put both hands on her belly, looking at it in disbelief.

"Oh my God!" Sarah said in a screamed whisper. "I'm even bigger! It feels like...there's another one in there!" Sarah looked down at the amulet, thinking about how Ashley had one too. "This...this amulet is somehow holding onto some sort of primordial 'pregnancy' energy." The door downstairs swung shut and Sarah let out a little yelp as she snuck out to the staircase to look down.

Katie had just entered the house and was giving Ashley a very eager hug. "I'm so happy you made it," Ashley smiled, loving the touch of someone on her pregnant body.

"O-of course," Katie grinned. "We've become such good friends so quickly, d-don't you agree?"

"I do," Ashley smiled, breaking the hug to look Katie over. "Well, why don't we start our little adventure together?"

Katie's heart nearly leaped out of her chest as Sarah watched the scene from above.

My mother would rather spend time with this little mousey woman instead of her own daughter? Sarah steamed. Why does she get these things? Why does my mother get all of the attention? Sarah's eyes narrowed on Katie's amulet and Sarah got curious. Aiming her device at Katie, she turned her knob violently.

PING!

Katie stopped in her tracks, looking down at her belly. Once again, she was pregnant, this time full-term with triplets. She didn't remember using her amulet, but what else could it be? She turned back to face Ashley, still smiling like nothing had changed.

"Is something wrong?" Ashley asked.

"N-no, it's fine," Katie said, rubbing her belly slowly. "I just wondered if...you'd had breakfast yet."

"A little bit, but it takes a lot to feed this momma-to-be nowadays," Ashley laughed, stroking her hugeness. "Let's get brunch."

"G-good," Katie said, waddling back out to her car, happily helping Ashley inside. Sarah hurried back to her room, jaw agape, wondering what she could do with her new, amazing invention.

Ashley and Katie got plenty of looks as they ate. Well, Ashley did most of the eating, although Katie's own triplet-pregnancy cravings made her a honorable contender. Maybe I should open up a restaurant catering specifically to pregnant women, Katie thought, her greedy mind peeking through the haze of affection she had for Ashley. I'd make a ton.

Two obnoxious but gorgeous women were in the booth next to theirs, laughing and talking loudly. As Ashley's meal slowed down, she started to hear what they were saying.

"He buys me whatever I want. It's great," Kim smiled as her newly-pregnant friend Sandra ate with gusto. "And the sex isn't too terrible."

"You're lucky you found such a great sugar daddy," Sandra grinned. "All of our friends have such creepy guys. But this guy's married with kids so he has to be careful."

"Yeah, he only has time for sex. No talking, no cuddling, just money," Kim laughed out loud. "He said it's because his wife's a big fat preggo. Like, way huger than you, Sandra."

"How big?"

"Octuplets," Kim cackled. "And those babies aren't going to have a lot of money left. All of my clothing for the last nine months has been paid for by Mr. Tanner Page."

Ashley gripped her table angrily before taking a deep breath and heaving herself out of her booth, waddling up to Kim.

"Well, now I know why my husband doesn't just masturbate in the house instead of fuck me," Ashley purred, running one hand over her belly. "He's got you to play with."

"Oh my God," Sandra said, looking Ashley over. "You were right, Kim."

Kim didn't say anything, her face frozen in shock. Ashley scoffed and bent down, belly and breasts hanging down as she gave a cruel smile.

"Better make sure he wears a condom. You can see how big he makes 'em," Ashley said, slapping her belly. "And a young, fertile girl like you...shit, he could get you knocked up with 12 of his bastards." Ashley turned around and walked back to her booth, ass swaying back and forth on purpose. Kim and Sandra paid their bill quickly and hurried out.

As soon as they left, Ashley's tough exterior fell away and tears welled up in her eyes. "I can't believe it...no, I can believe it. What a scumbag," she began to growl.

"Ashley, I'm so..." Katie reached out a hand and took Ashley's. The hairs of the back of her neck stood on end when she felt how soft Ashley's palms were. "I'm so sorry."

"Thanks, Katie," Ashley sniffed, wiping one tear from the corner of her eye. "You're a good friend."

"And I'm always here for you," Katie said, gripping Ashley's hand. "For anything."

Ashley raised one eyebrow. "Anything?"

Katie felt her face flush. "Y-yes...anything."

Catalina walked down the street of restaurants, after passing some delectable restaurants she came to 'Aquarius' . Walking into the empty restaurant she saw Antonio and a pregnant Asian woman sitting at a table near the bar. Antonio sipped his scotch with his very red fingers holding the glass. He placed down his glass to look up at the very beautiful Spanish actress. "Ah Catalina, a pleasure it is that you were able to come, I would like you to meet-"

"Renee, lovely go meet you" Rebecca said yawning as she shook Catalina's hand. Why did she have to be here? she just wanted to be at home eating marshmallows and watching CSI. "So, I am sure you 2 are wondering why I brought you 2 lovely pregnant ladies to this fine establishment. Well this restaurant is owned by me, so lunch is on me. 4 French waiters came out with rolling tables. There was a large variety of foods, stacked 2 feet high. The first plates went down and Rebecca chowwed right in. Catalina was shocked, " Antonio, you don't expect me to work with this woman do you?" She whispered to the tall older fellow, " I'm supposed to be back on set tomorrow morning, where will this, woman come into the mix of things?"

" you know, you shouldn't talk in front of someone who reads lips." Rebecca said, putting her knife and fork down. " well you should learn to breathe between bites!" Catalina retorted back."

"Hey! I'm eating for 3 here, I don't see you feeding your only child." Rebecca called back wiping sauce off her face.

"BOTH OF YOU STOP IT" Antonio demandingly called, his sheer voice bringing them to complete and utter silence. "you two are adults not children, I will not deal with petty arguments. Now to talk about why you two are here. " one of Antonio's assistants Wendy came out with a map of Smallton. Thanking the lady scientist he pulled the map out on he table. " Now as you may know I now own the mall at the centre of the city, plus most of the businesses around it. Now if we, we, Wendy, are you ok?" Antonio turned, annoyed by the clicking he was hearing. It was Wendy, she couldn't stop adjusting her bra.

" yeah, ugh I'm so sorry, this fit me yesterday, but after my stomach bug nothing fits." Wendy grunted fidgeting some more. "Can I go?" Antonio nodded and let her leave. "Okay, if there are no more distractions, let's continue. Directly north is where we are in the restaurant district. Down south are the schools and town hall plus all those government buildings like the court house, police station, blah blah blah. South East is where all the sporting stuff is located, swimming pools, the running and race tracks plus the fitness centre. And East is entertainment district, with your cinemas, bowling alleys, bars and clubs. So, why am I showing you this? I'll tell you soon. Now I understand you two want nothing more than power and cash, trust me I want that too. We could always try the suburbs, but I'm not looking to invade peoples lives, all I want to provide them with the best energy source known to man. Life."

"What on earth are you talking about?" Catalina said, confused with his pontificating.

" I'll tell you. Do you two know what 'entropy' is?" Antonio asked them.

" it's a lack of order or predictability, the gradual decline into disorder" Rebecca said, nibbling on a chicken wing.

"Correct Renee, now, let's take the origami favourite the crane for example. Now that is work energy, put into something to make it look beautiful." Antonio said, walking around the table. "Now let's say someone puts it under a flame. In seconds the energy spent on that crane is gone. No more. But, if we apply the right materials to it, that crane can live for a long time."

"Okay so, we have a paper bird and something about energy, but where are you going with this?" Catalina said, neither intrigued nor annoyed.

"Now life is an amazing thing, but technically we are always dieing. I myself am on the verge of passing my prime, in twenty years I'll need a cane to walk and will need new teeth. A sad problem about life is that we don't die after we peak, but what if we could retain the energy we once had? No wrinkles, no flame to our crane, just an evolutionary second win and all it will cost, is your loyalty." Antonio walked to the bar to grab a jug and poured himself a glass. " lemme ask you about your pregnancies, what are some of the problems you have?"

"I'm always tired, hungry, my feet hurt so much and I never get a good nights sleep" Rebecca said whining as she rubbed her belly.

" I can't help but go after my cravings, my back hurts so much, I miss having wine, cocktails and I pee so much it's like I'm a freaking fountain" Catalina said shamefully in defeat.

"Alright, firstly I'm so sorry women have to go through this, I wish there was something I could do. Secondly there IS something I can do. Now I understand you two are in very demanding jobs, babies would absolutely ruin your lives, am I right?" Antonio asked, as delicately as he could.

" well yes, but this is a human life growing inside of us, there is nothing more special than that!" Catalina stated.

" ah yes, but hasn't your celebrity status become larger since become pregnant?" Antonio said, taking a drink from his glass. " imagine, if you remained pregnant, how much of a role model you would be to pregnant women everywhere. Your face would be on bill boards, adverts for everything, get the Catalina maternity lingerie, the Catalina breakfast cereal, the Catalina chain saw! Well maybe not the chain saw"

Catalina thought about it, this was her opportunity to become larger than life, all she needed to do was say yes. " two questions, what will happen to my belly and the baby growing inside? And secondly is whatever you are providing to do reversible?"

" well for the former i have to say that the fetus would become pure energy, you would still retain the pregnant firgure, but you could do anything you wanted to do when you weren't pregnant. Anything that changes the pregnancy will either give you more or less energy. Secondly I have the best scientists in the country, if you want a baby, I'm sure we will help you have one" Antonio said in a very convincing matter. "Look, cards on the table, my plan is to create immortality from foetuses. The only problem is, artificial foetuses or test tube babies don't hold the key, pregnant mothers however do hold the key. The energy they produce in their nine months in unbelievable, imagine what we could do with that energy!"

" okay, what do you need me to do?" Catalina said in great confidence

"Ma'am?" the cashier repeated. "Ma'am?" Katie was still staring out the door of the Mr. Tucker's Chicken, having just watched Ashley, the gorgeous, fun pregnant woman who just started to warm up to Katie, walk out the door with the first moderately handsome guy she saw. Or maybe he was actually attractive for a guy? Katie could never figure out what made a man good looking. Women were always her thing, and specifically, pregnant women.

"Hey lady! I'm on a lunch rush!" a construction worker behind Katie yelled. A sizable line had formed behind her. Katie slowly turned back around to the bored cashier who gave Katie an expectant look. Katie was heart-broken, but not enough to undo her hunger. The gears inside her mind started to turn as she formed her order and the new "greed" part of her brain snapped into action. In business terms, Ashley was a resource that would yield very, very "profitable" returns and if she was being lured away by another interested party, what Katie needed was to start a hostile takeover.

"I'll take two to-go orders," Katie said, an angry grin spreading across her chipmunk cheeks as she rubbed her belly pensively.

Down the street, Ashley was waddling slowly alongside Joel, smiling wide. Joel had a more composed smile, trying to act cool, despite his inner voice jumping for joy and screaming wildly. "It's lucky that I ran into you so soon," Joel said casually, his gaze darting from Ashley's big eyes to her even bigger belly in a split second. Ohmygod she looks even bigger than she did yesterday! "I was actually planning on seeing Brandon later tonight and I didn't think I'd get a chance to talk to you then."

"Right, Brandon," Ashley said, rubbing her belly slowly, her palms filling with plenty of bare skin. "I have to admit, that makes things...complicated between us."

"So there's an 'us?'" Joel said, grinning as he raised an eyebrow. Ashley giggled and looked down, which meant looking down at her cleavage and belly.

"I'm also glad we met up now," Ashley continued, ignoring Joel's fishing. "I just found out that...my husband's been cheating on me."

"Oh, I'm so sorry," Joel said in his silky smooth voice. Oh, thank God! I just keep getting luckier and luckier! his less delicate inner voice said.

"And it's with a money-grubbing skank. I guess no one's beneath his standards except for his fucking life. Never mind that I gave him a child and I'm carrying eight more of them for him," Ashley pouted.

E-eight? Joel thought, getting weak-kneed just at the number. "He must be crazy," Joel said, trying to regain his persona. "You're beautiful. One of the most beautiful women I've ever seen."

Ashley blushed and smiled softly, the lust emanating from her amulet preparing to flair up again. The more fetuses inside the amulet-holder's womb, the stronger the amulet's affects were, and as an octo-mom, Ashley was on the receiving end of a monumental amount of "lust energy."

Katie had been cautiously following the two on their walk, not yet discovered. She didn't stop to think about why she hadn't been seen, but the truth was a few feet above her. Yaral's disembodied spirit was following Ashley as well, keenly aware that she was currently the "most pregnant" person affect by his amulet. And as the mother to the owner of the "master amulet," he could benefit from checking up on her. Unfortunately, his ability to affect the real world was weakening as the amulets were bonding to their owners. But he saw an opportunity coming up.

Katie looked at her amulet and back at Ashley and Joel. She needed to do something to make Joel less...appealing to Ashley. Remembering the amulet's manual, it was clear that the amulet didn't only affect women. It could make men pregnant too. "Alright Ashley, how about I make the weight on your back a little lighter while your new friend gains a few pounds?" Katie cackled to herself, pointing her amulet at the pair and activating it.

Nothing happened. Katie tried again and again, but no luck. "I guess I can't reduce anyone's pregnancy if they already have an amulet," Katie said. "I need to double-check that manual. I don't even remember seeing anything in there about there being more than one amulet...and I need to find a way to fix this flickering." One of the jewels on the amulet was sparking slightly ever since Katie dropped it at her own apartment.

As Katie fiddled, Ashley and Joel stopped on the sidewalk to face one another. "I've felt so...alone ever since I got pregnant," Ashley said, rubbing both sides of her belly rhythmically. "I love the feeling of my children kicking and moving inside me and getting bigger every day but I'm not just a mother...I'm also a woman."

She took a few steps forward, her belly beginning to press against Joel. "I can tell," Joel said, moving one hand to one of the few parts of Ashley's belly that were covered by her shirt. "Even if your husband can't tell what you need...I think I do."

Katie's amulet sparked violently and Ashley's belly swelled suddenly as another baby was added to the mix. Her new size, combined with her proximity to Joel, knocked the tall schmoozer over, his head hitting against the cement with a loud thud. Ashley couldn't see what was going on too well, thanks to her size, but she could tell he was not doing too well.

"Joel?" Ashley said, worried, waddling around to try and look down at Joel, never getting a good vantage point. Joel's injury gave him a light concussion and caused him to lose consciousness for a few seconds. And that was just enough time for Yaral to take control of Joel's body.

"I'm alright," Joel said in a sinister voice, slowly standing up as Yaral got adjusted to controlling a mortal body. The last time he'd managed to control a human body, he went into a comatose man in the Smallton hospital. The man's illness rendered him pretty gaunt and ghoulish-looking, so Yaral blended in with the occult garage sale quite well and no one questioned who he was or why he was there.

"Do you need to lie down?" Ashley said, getting closer to Joel/Yaral, rubbing her belly and breasts against his side. "Maybe we should go back to your place and rest in bed." She wanted to add "and cuddle a little" but bit her lip instead, waiting to see how Joel felt.

"I feel fine," Joel smiled, Yaral's supply of arcane magic fixing up any serious damage to Joel's skull and brain. "But I think I should go home and prepare myself. Good day." He bowed slowly before walking away, right through the street, not even flinching as cars abruptly stopped in front of him and honked their horns.

"Great, just great," Ashley sighed, crossing her arms under her now H-cup breasts. "Maybe Tanner isn't the crazy one. Who'd ever want to have sex with a big lady pregnant with nine babies?"

"Ashley?" Katie said, smiling innocently while her crafty businesswoman persona laughed triumphantly inside her head. "You left before we could eat. I figured, from one pregnant woman to another, that you were still hungry so I brought you something to eat." Katie held out a paper bag filled with Mr. Tucker's Chicken brand chicken sandwiches.

In an instant, Katie was smothered by breasts and belly as Ashley hugged her tightly. "You're such a good friend," Ashley said, her voice choking up as she was on the verge of tears. "And you're right. You know exactly what a pregnant woman like me needs."

"I do," Katie managed to muffle out, looking up at Ashley, her "hostile takeover" eyes still glaring. "And I know exactly what it takes to please a pregnant woman...all the ways to please a pregnant woman."

On the other side of the street, Joel was walking directly toward his apartment, Yaral able to pull some hints of memory from Joel's brain. "He said he was going to see the owner of the master amulet tonight," Joel said out-loud, not paying attention to the people staring at him as he climbed over bushes and fences to walk in a straight line to his apartment. "Hopefully he wrote down some notes in his home to make it easier for me to send him there."

Even his office had several sub-offices in it for assistants, conference rooms, and the like. "And you don't even own that shirt you're wearing now. It looks like a boy's shirt...I know that look." Clara heaved herself out of the chair, holding the underside of her belly as she approached her daughter. "You had sex, didn't you?"

"Jealous I found a guy who likes the belly?" Kristina giggled. The mother and daughter had a very complicated relationship. Kristina knew that Clara only married her husband for his money. The baby she was carrying now wasn't even his. She couldn't bare to have sex with him. But Clara found that finding flings on the side while pregnant was not too easy.

"Who was it? Tell me now, young lady," Clara said in an angry whisper. "I can make things very unpleasant for you."

"Honestly, it's not all that bad," Louisa said, stroking her belly near the country club's veranda as the other wives chuckled, sitting around, working their way through the club's supply of gin. "Strangely, I haven't felt any of the sickness I felt with Erin or Brody and I feel far less sore."

"But it must be difficult to be pregnant at the same time as your daughter," said Joyce, the leader of the country club's "book club" and probably the closest out of all the women to Louisa's friend. The book club was a complete front for the women of the country club to make it seem like they were doing something productive while their husbands played golf or otherwise got together in ridiculous macho ceremonies that they set aside as "men only." The "book club" usually consisted of drinking, gossiping, and the occasional flirting with one of the club's more attractive young male employees.

Louisa flashed back a calculated smile, spreading her hand more openly on her belly. "Not at all. We all look forward to having grandchildren and it's wonderful to be able to share the experience of pregnancy with Erin."

"We don't all look forward to grandchildren," Barbara scoffed, finishing off her martini. Barbara was the youngest of the "book club": a 38-year-old ex-model who could still pass for a woman in her mid-20s. She had platinum blond hair tied up with a pink scrunchy to make a ponytail that went down to her wide hips. She had on a spotless white polo with the top buttons opened to give her chest just enough room to poke out while not causing a scene, with a pink sweater tied and slung over her shoulders.

"Worried it might give the game away?" Joyce smiled evilly at Barbara. Barbara married a wildly wealthy real estate tycoon so she'd never have to work again. But somewhere in that sham marriage, Barbara also had a baby, which was far from her plans. "When your little girl has her first little girl, people might start doing some rudimentary math and figure out your real age."

Barbara scowled and walked away, refreshing her drink, which meant Joyce could refocus her shade-throwing on Louisa. Louisa knew she had to run interference quickly. "Sure, I could have been like some other women and passed off my daughter's children as my own, but I'm a bit classier than that."

Now Joyce's eyes, and the eyes of most of the "book club" moved to Debra, a severely conservative and externally dull woman in her late 40s, with short, straight brown hair and an unimaginative beige dress. "I don't know what you're talking about," Debra said before bringing her glass back to her lips.

"But it could be much worse," Louisa grinned. "Imagine being like that woman in town and being our age, pregnant with nonuplets. Full term, no less."

"And her daughter too, from what I've seen," Barbara said, shaking her head. "They're hard to miss, even though I don't exactly try and patron the same...businesses that people like they do."

"Wasn't your daughter friends with that blimp's son?" Debra asked.

"They rarely see one another anymore," Louisa chuckled. "That woman has some sort of problem with my family. Imagine that."

Downstairs, Erin was making a third pass through the buffet, the gluttonous energy of her amulet working on overdrive. Erin was oblivious to just how much she was eating, thanks to the amulet's influence, so she couldn't pick up on the perplexed looks the rest of the club's guests were giving her as she she made her way back to her table.

"Quite the appetite you have there," a voice said. Erin turned to see a man in his early 30s sit down beside her, moving his sunglasses off as he looked at her. "I like that."

"So do I," Erin laughed sarcastically, resuming her meal. But the man persisted.

“I think I’ve seen you here before, but you weren’t…expectant then,” he said. “You carry it very well.”

“That’s what they tell me,” Erin said, her voice muffled with rice and rolls. “Especially my boyfriend.”

The man didn’t let up. “Well whoever he is, I’ll bet he doesn’t have the resources to give that child…those children the proper life. Coming here, I’ll bet you’re used to a certain kind of lifestyle,” he said, slowly moving his hand across Erin’s arm.

Erin groaned, getting really annoyed with this guy’s constant hitting on her. “Look, you see this necklace?” Erin said, gripping her amulet.

PING

“My boyfriend and…the father of these babies gave this to me. It’s made of rubies, pressed-gold, diamonds, pearls, and all that good shit. He’s got more money than you’ve ever seen in your life. Now leave me alone. I’m starving.”

The man stood up, adjusted his collar, and marched away. Erin sighed with relief and went back to eating, not noticing the man talking with some of the country club’s staff. As she stood up to return to the buffet line, a few waiters approached her.

“I’m sorry ma’am, but the buffet at the golf invitational is only good for three go-throughs,” one waiter said.

“But my family are members here,” Erin said, her desire to eat more forcing her to turn to giving the waiter puppy-dog eyes.

“Then just give us your club card and you can continue,” the waiter said. Erin bit her lip, watching as the rest of the club’s patrons went through the buffet.

“Fine, fine,” Erin said, waddling toward the stairs to the “book club.”

“And you’re not exactly in club dress code,” the waiter said, motioning to Erin’s exposed belly, courtesy of her amulet’s latest surge. Erin turned back around, looking at the waiter with a skeptical eyebrow. “B-but I suppose in your condition…we can make an exception.”

As Erin heaved herself up the stairs, not remembering getting up the stairs in her house being this tough before, she could hear the rest of the women in the “book club” hush one another and try to stifle laugher as she waddled in. “Mom?” Erin said.

“Oh Erin,” Louisa fussed, trying to pull the rest of her daughter’s top down to cover her wide, round belly. “You always have to make a scene and go against dress code.”

“I try my best, mother,” Erin protested, feeling her cheeks turn red with embarrassment. “When you’re pregnant with more than just one baby, you can dictate how I dress.”

“That’s something I’d like to see,” Joyce chuckled, taking a slow sip of her manhattan. “Oh, I’m sorry, is this hard for both of you to watch us drink?”

“Not at all,” Louisa laughed with an obviously fake cheerfulness. “Erin Burke Turner,” she said to Erin, her voice turning to a hiss. “I let you come here because I didn’t think it would be fair to ban one pregnant woman in our family while the other went but…do you have to be so rude?”

“Maybe I only come off as rude because I hate this stuffy life!” Erin yelled back. “I hate having to act prim and proper while creepy guys hit on me. I hate having to be ashamed of being pregnant around these women you don’t even like. And I hate that we’re so snooty that…that Brandon’s mom won’t let us hang out together!”

“Dear,” Louisa said, trying to make her voice sound more composed. “Just calm down now. What’s all this about? And where did you get that amulet? I certainly didn’t buy it for you and I know your father wouldn’t have.”

“This?” Erin said, feeling herself shaking with frustration as she gripped her amulet. “Brandon gave it to me because…because he loves me and I love him!” Erin gave her amulet one last aggressive squeeze before turning around and heading back downstairs in a huff.

PIIIIING

“Losing control of your daughter, Louisa?” Joyce asked, her grin never fading.

“I’m sure it’s just hormones,” Louisa sighed, rubbing her twin-filled belly. “I’m sure we all know what that feels like.”

The rest of the “book club” chuckled and nodded in agreement, each stroking their own pregnant bellies.

Erin stormed back through the main part of the club, trying to find a secluded section where she cold fume or maybe text Brandon. She also continued to have a gnawing hunger, thanks to her gluttonous amulet. As she searched with no luck, Erin did come across the promotional sign for the golf invitational.

“Amateurs: top prizes include leather signed golf bag. Other prizes include pro shop credit, spa tickets, club meal credits, and more.”

Erin felt herself start to drool already. Waddling out to the field, she caught up with her father as he was waiting his turn at Hole #4.

“Out stretching your legs, honey?” Douglas asked gruffly, hoping she’d leave soon.

“Something like that. Any one of these clubs old or useless?” Erin asked, looking through his bag.

“The seven-iron is from my college years. I don’t know why I even keep it around,” he said, watching the drive in front of him and wincing as one of his business rivals made it onto the green. “Why?”

“I figure you won’t miss it,” Erin said, taking the club and making it back to Hole #1. Douglas was about to protest before the club games-keeper called his name.

“Erin Turner, amateur section,” Erin said to the scorekeeper at Hole #1, taking a scorecard and a ball. “My father’s a member.”

“Are you…sure you want to do this?” the scorekeeper said anxiously.

“Of course. Nothing to lose, everything to gain,” Erin smiled, shifting her hips and taking a big whack. The ball arced perfectly before landing on the green. “Besides,” she said, patting her belly. “Low center of gravity. I’m the perfect player.”

With his back competing against the weight of the bags he bee lined for Tyler's office.

" hey boss, here's your stuff. I was wondering, seeing as how my last week is next week, can we get our review done? I can give you a chance for me to tell you about the women I have sleeping with" Brandon said, as he grabbed the bottles and went to place them in the cabinet. Clara left Kristina while she scratched her belly and walked to her husbands office. " so there is this blonde gal, her name was Alexandra. She had the tightest body you ever seen, oh and her boobs? Done up like the best flotation device, you could use her as a life raft." Brandon said to his boss. Sometimes Brandon had a way with words. That's what I'm talking about, you have to introduce me to these girls, It could get you some cash when you are back at uni." Clara gave the both of them a slightly disgusted look, sighing she politely asked" yes fine darling, Brandon, might I have a word with you?"

Tyler commented, trying his utter best to get her out of the room. It looked like Brandon was in the clear. "Go home, and put your feet up." He got up and gently moved her out of her room. After making some adjustments and tweaks Sarah decided to take her 'amulet gun' and 'armulet' out on the town. Maybe she could do some good with this device. She walked past an older upset couple outside a maternity store, on closer inspection she found out she couldn't have children. Pulling out the gun, she was ready, aimed...

PING!

The 40 something woman's belly expanded. Their tears disappeared and they walked in like nothing was the matter. "Hmm, interesting" Sarah said as she walked into a shoe store.

Looking over, she saw five twenty something bitchy sluts. With plantnium blonde hair, enogpugh show able cleavage to make any man sweat and enough fake tan to make them look like Oompa Loompas, they were talking about how stylish their high heels were. Sarah could see they were wearing the latest clothes from the high priced level in the mall, not to mention the shortest of mini skirts, as one spun around, Sarah got a glimpse of her derrière in a lacy deep red. Sarah sighed as she gazed upon the group of girls having fun in their outfits. Living in upper middle class in an upper class city Sarah didn't have many friends, most of hem had moved away for college or didn't remain in touch.

The tallest of the bimbos whispered something to one of her friends whilst pointing at Sarah. A look of shame fell upon her as the five ladies laughed at her. " well, I guess it doesn't always have to be 'good'." Sarah said pulling out the gun as they started to turn away, turning the energy dial up, she fired like a trigger happy cowboy.

PING!

The women's bellies surged out, getting larger and larger till the point where they were all looked 1 month over due with triplets. Their high heels broke under the sheer pressure. Opening up the screen to the radar, she could see there were two 'magical' energy signatures a couple of streets away. She went to find out, she was just hoping she didn't bump into her mother and that Katie woman.

" all I need is for you to come with me." Antonio said, guiding Catalina away from the empty restaurant, past the busy kitchen into something from a
Steam punk/ Lovecraftian story. Rebecca slowly made her way to the large machine in the centre. Placing her amulet in a slot provided the sloth like feeling drifted away from her. Catalina put in her amulet in the slot next to her.

Antonio directed Catalina over to the chair directly under the energy source. " I don't know, this seems unsafe, have you tested this before?" Catalina said, looking at the cannon with great concern. " darling, why do you fret?" Antonio said reassuring her. Something buzzed in Rebecca's ear piece and she left the room quickly. " hmm, she must have noticed something. " of course I tested it, only an idiot wouldn't test something like this." He said, comfortably resting his hand on her shoulder.

Sarah waddled quicker and quicker to where the device was Bwooming. Bwoom, Bwoom it
went, leading her to a closed restaurant. Pressing her face against the glass she accidently pushed it open. Stumbling face first into the place a feminine hand grabbed her. Looking up she saw an Asian agent. Without a word to be said she was taken to Antonio.

Catalina was just about to sit down when Rebecca came barging in with a largely pregnant woman(Sarah). "Who are you? What are you doing here?" Antonio interrogated to the twenty something woman. In shock, Sarah was speechless, words literally couldn't come out of her mouth. This didn't help her situation. " You know what? Never mind, Catalina, I'll show you how this works, Renee, strap her to the chair." Rebecca did as she was told, without her amulet she was back in the game, not that anyone knew that. In a matter of seconds, Sarah was shoved down into the seat, strapped in and Antonio FIRED THE CANNON. A beam of light struck Sarah straight in her belly.
