1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
"Well?" Rebecca asked, looking between Antonio and the now-passed out Sarah. "Did anything happen?"
Antonio nodded slowly, grinning, as he put his hand on Sarah's bare belly. "There's a little jolt when I touch her now. It makes sense: she's got a power station in there. But now, it's time for the real test." Antonio snapped his fingers and Wendy walked in from the corner of the room, a long transparent cable in her hand. With one end, she secured a suction cup to Sarah's belly, right above her popped-out navel, and attached the other end to Antonio's arm. Almost instantly, Antonio's withered hand began to fill out until it looked completely healthy. Antonio took in a deep breath, feeling energy flow through his body as his muscles began to swell slightly and any traces of grey hair on his body turned the same illustrious dark brown shade he had in his youth.

"Incredible," Wendy breathed, holding a small monitor over Antonio's chest. "There's no sign of the genetic disease in you at all."
"Not for long," Antonio said, removing the wire from his arm. He looked at his now-healthy hand as he clenched and unclenched it. "It's already starting to get stiff again. The device is incomplete. Even for our guest, her energy levels are only temporary. Inside her womb, it will revert back to her fetuses soon."
"But that's your plan?" Catalina said slowly. "You can make that a permanent state? We can generate energy, remain healthy and youthful, and won't feel any typical pregnancy discomfort and be able to drink and do other things regular women can do?"
"Exactly," Antonio said. "But to make this plan work, I'll need...capital. That's why I need you to help make the mall even more popular." Antonio moved close to Catalina, with her belly the only thing between them. He placed his degenerating hand on her shoulder, while holding her amulet in the other. "Take your place as the superstar you were born to be."
Catalina put the amulet back around her neck, its prideful influence flowing through her once again. "Of course. I can't pass up a gig like this. And you'll go ahead with my latest request too, won't you? I've got a lot of movies coming out."
"Absolutely. The new movie theatre in the mall will only show Catalina Corazon movies," Antonio smiled. "I'm impressed you were able to have so many made so quickly."
"The studio wanted to capitalize on the bump while I had it," Catalina said, rolling her eyes and patting her belly. "Pregnant commando, pregnant spy, pregnant ninja, pregnant undercover cop, pregnant superhero. I guess there's a market for it." Catalina's eyes moved to Sarah, who was still moaning in her sleep. "What do we do about her?"
"She'll need to go," Antonio said, motioning to Wendy. "And so do you. There's a lot of work to be done." Catalina nodded and waddled out of the restaurant, followed later by Wendy, wheeling Sarah out in a wheelchair.

"You're not going to tell us your true plans?" Rebecca said, taking her amulet back from the machine. Antonio grinned evilly as he turned back to face his top agent.
"Just do your job, Ms. Quo, and you won't need to worry," Antonio said. "But I would like to know how that woman found us and why she was snooping around. She's one of the Page women that I've been gathering intelligence on. Look into it.'
"You've got it," Rebecca said, putting her amulet back on. Immediately, the sloth energy began to flow back into her body and her eyelids drooped. "I'll get started...eventually."
Antonio turned his back on Rebecca as she left, taking her time, and gazed at his device. He sighed deeply and looked back at his hand, back to its original state. He knew he needed all seven amulets to make the machine work at its full potential, but now that they'd all bonded to their "hosts," he couldn't take them. They had to be given voluntarily. Unless other conditions were met. After one last pass over his device, Antonio headed back to the restaurant and ordered a driver to take him to his mansion to further plan out his ideas for the mall.

Kim was walking down the street, swaying her wide hips around gleefully, her dress hugging her body tightly. Kim had just dropped Sandra back at her apartment so she could prepare for lamaze later in the day. Kim didn't envy her friend. She had no intention of having children or ever being a mother. Some of her other friends had told her to get pregnant so a sugar daddy will marry her and keep her well financed, but Kim knew she could find the right guy to keep her bank account happy and she found just the man in Tanner Page. Money and gifts in exchange for sex every now and then, and best of all, Tanner was as opposed to Kim getting pregnant as she was.
"No wonder," Kim chuckled to herself, thinking about Ashley and how grotesquely huge she looked at the diner. How can anyone have a belly that big?
Checking her phone, Kim huffed and put her hands on her hips. Tanner was late. To pass the time, she looked through her phone to see what other appointments with wealthy, horny older men she had scheduled. Tanner was definitely a big catch but he wasn't her only source of party funds.
His car pulled up on the sidewalk and Tanner opened the passenger door. "Kim! Sorry, get in."
Kim smiled sweetly, hiding her irritation, as she backed into the car, ass first of course. Just as she was about to give Tanner a peck on the cheek, she saw his other passenger in the back seat. "Oh my god!"
"Don't be too loud," Tanner said. "That's my daughter, Sarah. I found her asleep on a bench in the middle of the city driving from work. A police officer was there and I got her away without any report being written. I'm not sure what happened to her."
"Being pregnant can be exhausting, I guess," Kim said, looking at Sarah's enormous belly. It really does run in his family, she shuddered.

"That's why pregnant women should stay in the house," Tanner grumbled. "People call me 'traditional,' but those are traditional beliefs for a reason. They work."
"Well I know one pregnant woman who didn't stay in the house today," Kim said, leaning close to Tanner. "Your wife. I met her today at lunch."
Tanner looked back at Kim in horror. "You mean...you told her?"
"She figured it out," Kim said. "So what? We're not going to see each other anymore? You're going to go back to the big belly?"
"Don't be obscene. It's wrong to have sex with a pregnant woman," Tanner said, glaring at Kim.
"But it's not wrong to cheat on your wife?" Kim giggled.
"That's different," he said, reaching one hand to Kim's lap, rubbing her thigh while he drove with the other. "Men have needs. It's natural."
"I don't mind," Kim smiled, kissing Tanner. The kiss startled him and he hit a speed bump particularly hard, jolting the car and shaking Sarah awake. She didn't quite know where she was, but listened quietly to the conversation going on around her. "But now that I've seen your wife, I think we need to be more careful with keeping me baby-free. I'd like to be able to fit into my apartment, let alone my clothes."
"We're plenty careful," Tanner grinned. "You can't make a baby the way we like to have sex." Kim chuckled in response. "But it's not like Ashley always gets that...big when she's pregnant. When she was pregnant with Sarah, it was a textbook pregnancy. One baby, no complications."
"What about with your son?" Kim asked.
Tanner paused. "Brandon's not our biological son. A few friends of ours got into a bad accident and they had a baby son back at home. It was in their will that if anything happened, we'd take care of him. We've never told him about it, though. Or Sarah."

Sarah squinted a few times, the rest of her body waking up. Did she hear her father correctly? Brandon's not her biological brother? Then those feelings she had when he rubbed her belly, the ways she thought about him...weren't too unnatural?
"Anyway, that's why I told you to come see me," Kim said. "I thought you should know. You can just drop me off at the mall."
Sarah felt the car slowing down but still had questions. Taking one of the gems off of her amulet, she dropped it into Kim's purse, sitting just out of their cone of vision. It registered faintly on Sarah's radar, so she could find her dad's mistress later on.
When Kim stepped out of the car, Sarah decided to make herself known. "Mpf, dad? Why am I in your car?"
"Good, you're awake," Tanner said. "I found you asleep on a bench out in the middle of the city. What on Earth happened to you?"
Sarah remembered tracking her radar, but not much else. "I'm not sure...can you take me home?"
"That's where we're going," Tanner grumbled. "Text your mother to see if she's home too."
"Why?"
"...no reason."

In the parking lot, Joel, still possessed by Yaral, was walking toward the mall. Controlling a body took a lot of energy and Yaral needed to meet Brandon at his appointment with Joel tonight. That meant absorbing some chaotic energy to stay strong. As Joel walked into the mall, he was grabbed by the collar and pulled into a service alley by Janice.
"You bastard! You finally decided to show your face here again?" Janice smirked, tightening her grip on his collar.
"You're angry...good," Joel said, breathing in her wrath. "There's enough chaos here. I can use my limbs much better now."
"Hold on a damn minute," Janice said as Joel tried to move away. "Nothing about your children? About you hitting on one of my students?"
"I'm bored with this," Joel sighed, looking at one of his hands. "I wonder what powers I maintain in his form?"
"Bored? Look pal, if I see you with another woman again-"
Joel moved out of the way, part of his shirt ripped off in Janice's hand. He turned to her and tapped her on the belly. Immediately, she started to swell up, her spandex yoga clothes rolling all the way up until her belly was totally exposed. She was now pregnant with sextuplets.
"That took too much energy," Joel panted. "I'll try not to do that again."

PING!

10 minutes a gorgeous paramedic came to help her out the door and to the vehicle. Sarah started breathing heavily as they raced to the hospital. That helped so much" Sarah said looking at the rugged man. "I'm Sarah, What's your name?" She asked looking up at him.

It was around 3 when Grant left the local pool. On the way out he grabbed a large pretzel. Munching down on the pretzel he noticed two women walking by holding their bellies and talking. "Huh, I guess there are a few pregnant women here. But where are the normal women?" Grant questioned himself. Taking a bite out of the delicious food he saw in the packed car park a bunch uni students, pregnant uni students... Walking down the street to his car he saw two very large pregnant women making out.

This was getting too weird. Shaking his wet hair he drove off stopping at a red light. A tourist guide was guiding a series of touristy expecting couples walk to the museum. A twitch was starting to form in his eye. What, was he the only single guy there? He sped down the road only to hear sirens. Pulling over he was going insane, he had to see a flat belly somewhere! Looking around he saw women pregnant in their fifties and other preggers in their early twenties. They were in all races, it looked like every woman was going to give birth until he saw 4 incredibly sex geeky girls walk into The dragons den, the local board games store. Breathing out he said "finally-"

" do you know how fast you were driving?" The cop said outside his car. Looking around he was impacted with a large blue sphere. "God damn it!" He said going into full panic attack!

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Brandon gulped, not expecting his boss's perversion to go this far. He made up stories about having sex with attractive young women to keep Tyler bemused but now he was asking Brandon to find him university students to fuck? That's a big leap.
"C'mon, what do you say?" Tyler said, smiling expectantly at Brandon. "It sounds like you get enough to spare. Maybe getting some tail off of your hands will make it easier for you to hold onto your paycheck." Tyler winked at Brandon knowingly.
"But this is an internship. You can't just give me a raise," Brandon said, his mind racing trying to think of a way out of things.
"I can move things around so the bean counters don't notice," Tyler said. "Just text me a name and a phone number sometime today." His boss stood up and straightened out his shirt and pants, which were tucked into his pants sloppily. "If you can, that is. I hate men who are greedy with sluts, but I hate empty boasts even more."
"N-no worries!" Brandon said, backing toward the door. "Next time I'm inside one of the girls, I'll try to remember to get her name."

Brandon closed the door behind him, cutting off Tyler's laughter. Brandon felt like he needed a shower. How the hell was he going to find a sexy woman who'd be willing to have sex with his boss? As Brandon got his things off of his desk and made his way to the exit, he was flanked by a big belly. Looking up, he saw the belly's owner: Clara, Tyler's wife, who was giving him an intrigued smile.
"Hello...Brandon, isn't it?"
"Yes, hi," Brandon gulped. She wasn't anywhere near as big as Erin, Katie, Sarah, Ashley, or really any of the pregnant women now in Brandon's life, but she was still superbly gorgeous. And he'd had sex with her pregnant daughter less than an hour ago. "How are you?"
Clara chuckled and wrapped an arm around Brandon's shoulders as soon as they left the building. "Let's not be cute. I know you had sex with Kristina and I already downloaded the security footage from the elevator."
Brandon felt sweat pour down the back of his neck. "M-m-ma'am, I can explain. She-"
"She is like me: pregnant, horny, and exhausted," Clara said. "That's why you're going to pleasure me every night until I can find someone better than you. Or I'll show my husband the video." She chuckled. "I wonder what he'll be more upset by: that you fucked his pregnant daughter or that you're so much worse at sex in real life than you are in your little stories."
Brandon gulped. "S-so, should we go to your house?"
"I'm a little older, dear," Clara said, resting her hand on Brandon's chest while her belly pressed against him. "I need some romance too. So you're going to take me out to a nice mid-afternoon lunch, then we're going to fuck. Now, you have a car?"
"Y-yes," Brandon blushed brightly.
"Perfect. I know a discrete place," Clara said. "And don't worry. I've only got a few weeks of this left." She rubbed her belly slowly and sensually. "After that, I can go back to my usual young friends."


At the hospital, Sarah laid back on the examination table while her doctor ran the ultrasound wand over her belly a 3rd time. "Very strange," he repeated.
Sarah sighed. "Look, can you just tell me what you're seeing? I can handle it."
"Well, it looks like all five of your fetuses formed in the past few minutes and are still reforming," the doctor said. "And there's some strange fluid inside your uterus that it appears to be forming from."
"Let me take a look," Sarah said, grunting as she tried to reach over her belly for the ultrasound controls. The doctor pulled them away from her cautiously, which only made Sarah roll her eyes. "Trust me, I know more about how this machine works than you ever will. Gimmie."
The doctor let Sarah use the ultrasound, shaking his head as he left the room. "A patient with quintuplets calls an ambulance and when I show up, she shoos me away. What a day."
Sarah struggled to move the machine over, her belly weighing her down in this position. It was huge and round and now that it was no longer a source of pure energy, Sarah didn't have the strength to maneuver it easily. Looking at the display, Sarah moved the wand around while measuring herself with her own homemade pregnancy devices.

"He was right about one thing: it looks like my fetuses were transformed into something and they're gradually reforming. That laser probably did this," Sarah said, shuddering as she remembered the orgasm the laser made her feel. "But, looks like whatever it did was temporary. What was the point of it, then?"
As Sarah scanned with her own "pregnant energy" scanner, she analyzed the material her fetuses transformed into. "Wait a minute...this is like the energy I found coming from my amulet...the same energy I used to make all those women pregnant with my ray gun but it's off the scales." Sarah hit a few more buttons, further dissecting the readings. "If one pregnant woman had her baby transformed in the womb, she could power a city with this level of energy. Imagine if Mom..."
Sarah trailed off, her envy boiling back up. "Mom...well if I can figure out how the tap into the energy potential in here, I'll be able to do things she could never dream of." Sarah looked at her machines, smiling wickedly. "And if I wanted, I could use these to become as big as her and generate even more energy...and stay pregnant forever."
Now Sarah had a conundrum. The only way for her to generate this power was to continue to be pregnant permanently. "Well, I was starting to like this look anyway," Sarah said, heaving herself off of the examination table. "And I'll always have Brandon around to give me belly massages when I get uncomfortable."

Now Sarah began to blush. Was she really thinking about Brandon so familiarly now? Was it because she learned they weren't blood siblings or were those feelings always there? Or did they start when he was the only one nice to her when she got pregnant, even when she was mean to him? Sarah waddled out of the hospital, pushing past her doctor.
"Hey, we're not done testing you!" the doctor called out.
"I'm fine," Sarah said. "I've got insurance and I'm free to go if I want to!" Sarah grit her teeth angrily, looking around the hospital. They're all morons when it comes to pregnancy but they get all the funding. If I got the attention and the research money that they did, I could do even more amazing things! Why do they have to get all the good things... Sarah texted Brandon to pick her up as she left, her excited amulet stealing some pregnancies from nearby patients, storing them inside its gems for later use.


"I-it's been a while," Ashley said, taking a few slow steps away from the bench, fingers to her lips. "I know I need someone else in my life, but I didn't think it would be another woman, let alone another pregnant woman."
"You deserve it," Katie cooed, pressing her belly against Ashley's back, reaching her hands around Ashley's nine-fetus belly, rubbing the sides slowly. Gradually, Katie moved her hands down the wide slope, inside Ashley's loose jeans, letting her hands trace the lace underwear it found. "We both want it, don't we?"
Ashley nearly cried out, moaning and biting her lip. "I-I do. I feel like I'm going to explode."
"You look like it too," Katie giggled, wondering if she should make Ashley's belly any bigger. "But there's a cop right over there. A pregnant cop too, but a cop none-the-less. We should go somewhere...more private."
Ashley nodded, the lust from her amulet welling up inside her. "My place," she squeaked out.
"Are you sure that's a good idea?" Katie asked, raising an eyebrow.
Ashley nodded. "He cheated on me, so I'll get back at him by going one step further." Ashley turned around, holding onto Katie's now very-moist hands and holding them against her huge belly. "I'll have sex with another person in our own bed."
Katie felt her cheeks flush. "Then...we're really doing this?"
"I've never had sex while pregnant," Ashley said, running her hands over her towering womb, "but the night I spent with Brandon's mother...she was actually pregnant with him at the time." She moved her hand to Katie's own impressive belly. "It was amazing."
"I'll bet," Katie smiled, waddling back to her car with Ashley, wondering if she needed one more compliment to seal the deal. "B-but Ashley...I'd want to spend the night with you even if you weren't pregnant."
Ashley bend down - which took a few long seconds - to kiss Katie on the cheek. "Be grateful I am."


Across the street, the pregnant Officer McCulley drove back to the station, her bladder killing her. Unfortunately for her, after she finished off a thermos of coffee, Catalina Corazon walked by her parked squad car. Antonio's fiddling with Catalina's amulet made it a highly volatile piece of mystical equipment and pregnancies were being shuffled around wildly. No one noticed as reality was scrambled along with it. But Catalina's belly was holding steady at a full-term-with-twins size, sticking out of her like a cinnamon watermelon, as she huffed and puffed, hands on her wide hips.
"He creates this fantastic invention and he expects me to sell mall stores? I'm Catalina Corazon! I should be the face of this whole pregnancy technology enterprise he's creating!" Catalina complained. "Look at me: I'm walking down the street, pregnant belly and tits spilling out of my tanktop and hardly anyone is taking pictures! I should be reaching a much higher level of fame."
It went against everything she knew about Antonio, but Catalina made up her mind then. "I need to find another business venture in down...one that can even out-do Antonio. I will become the star I know I can be." Catalina bumped into another pregnant woman on the sidewalk, her amulet absorbing her pregnancy, giving her a huge triplet belly. "The star that I know I am!"

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
"Here," Clara said, pointing to the exit to get to the mall. "There's an amazing restaurant just on the outside of the mall. I'm sure you've never been."

"No," Brandon said, shaking his head as he pulled toward the massive parking lot around the Smallton mall.

"No, I wouldn't think so. It's a high-class establishment. VIPs and all that," Clara chuckled, leaning over to Brandon as he parked. "You're just...well, you. A very plain young man." She moved her hand to his bangs and ran her hands through his matted black hair. "But, you're willing to have sex with pregnant women, so you'll do just fine for now."

"Y-you know, I think you can find other people in town who'll have sex with pregnant women," Brandon said, flustered. "I m-mean, you're so good looking, it should be easy for you."

"You're trying to be cute to get out of this," Clara chuckled, stroking his cheek. "But no. I've got too much of a leg-up on you with that video. You'll be willing to do anything and I like that." She moved his hand to her belly. "But tell me again about how I'm good looking."

Brandon looked away, his whole face bright red. "Your big belly is really sexy. And you...well, it's clear why Tyler married you. He likes busty, sexy women and you haven't lost any of that with age."

"You know, you didn't have to say all of that. It's not getting you out of this," Clara said, leaning closer, belly pressed against Brandon's erection.

"J-just being honest," Brandon said, as Clara moved her hand around his chin and gave him a soft kiss.

"Ready for some tongue next?" she grinned as her phone buzzed. Clara groaned and reached into her purse, seeing a call from Kristina. "Ugh, hold on."

"I know what you're trying to do, Mom," Kristina hissed on the other end. "And it's a little desperate, don't you think?"

"Desperate times call for desperate measures," Clara said, looking Brandon over. "Very, very desperate measures."

"Well I thought you should know that I've parked your Mercedes in a fire lane. If you get over here in, oh, 15 minutes, you can probably avoid getting it towed."

"You little-"

"And take a taxi. Daddy's here too and if he sees you with Brandon, well...anyway, see you soon." Kristina clicked off her cellphone, leaving Clara to scream from behind clenched teeth.

"Looks like you get today off, dear," Clara said, patting Brandon on the cheek as she packed up her purse. "But tomorrow, I'll get my tongue." She kissed Brandon the ear before whispering. "And I don't just mean a french kiss."

Brandon let Clara out to call a taxi as he sped off, his own phone buzzing with a text from Sarah

-----

"Thanks for picking me up," Sarah said, still wiping ultrasound gel off of her belly. She was pretty huge, so there was a lot of surface area for her to cover. "I'm surprised you got here so quick. I thought your internship was like 30 miles from here."

"I was, um, stopping by an electronics store," Brandon lied. "I needed some new earbuds. Mine died."

"Should have told me about it," Sarah said. "I could fix them."

"You'd do that for me?" Brandon said, surprised.

Sarah blushed, looking down at her bare belly. "Y-yeah, of course." Brandon was trying not to eye her belly, knowing if he did, he wouldn't be able to put his eyes back on the road again for quite some time.

An uncomfortable silence whistled through the car. "S-so, how are your inventions coming?" Brandon asked.

"Good," Sarah said happily, slowly sitting up as she rolled her shirt down as far as it could go. "I'm meeting with a guy named Dr. Schultz tomorrow and hopefully he'll be interested enough to invest. I've got quite a few neat things planned."

"Great," Brandon smiled, looking over at his sister. He'd like her old hair, but her new brown locks and a look of confidence made Brandon's heart twinge. He had to keep reminding himself "She's your sister. You're blood relatives. This is crazy."

"But what I really need is someone with great business skills to help make this steadier," Sarah said. "I think I can build a whole industry around what I'm working on." Sarah paused, running her hands over her belly. "Hey, you said you had a dream a few nights ago and you said there was a business name in that...PregTech?"

Brandon's foot slammed on the gas and he scrambled to get the car back to its regular course and speed. That was the most vivid dream he'd ever had, filled with huge, friendly pregnant women everywhere. "Y-yeah, I think so."

"That's not a bad name," Sarah said quietly. "And besides a business expert, I'll need a face for PregTech. Someone to really sell it. Like a celebrity or something."

"W-well, I'm sure it'll work out great for you," Brandon smiled. "You were always so smart."

"Thank you," Sarah said quietly, feeling her cheeks get slightly red. "Hey, let's swing by the mall. I need to walk around some."

"Back to the mall," Brandon sighed, moving over into another lane to take the right exit.

"Well excuse me!" Sarah pouted, crossing her arms and resting them between her belly and breasts. "And what do you mean 'back' to the mall?"

"Nothing," Brandon gulped, heart pounding. "Nothing at all."

-----

Once at the mall, the two Page siblings walked around the perimeter, where there were impressive fountains, dozens of little shops and restaurants, and other things to draw attention. As they walked, Sarah grabbed Brandon's arm when she saw a familiar face. "Oh my God, it's her."

"Who?" Brandon said, straightening up as Sarah's belly and breasts pressed against his side.

"That woman...Dad's having an affair with her."

"Really?!" Brandon blurted out, covering his mouth as people turned their heads to the commotion. Luckily, Kim hadn't noticed and she was still looking at the mall's huge directory for clothing and jewelry stores she hadn't been to yet.

"Yeah, I was in the car with them and overheard. I don't think Dad knows I know," Sarah said.

"Poor Mom," Brandon sighed, which only inflamed Sarah's envy.

"Yeah well, maybe being a gigantic pregnant whale doesn't turn guys on," Sarah blushed. "Though, this woman isn't much better. She said she's basically only banging Dad for money."

"Yeah?" Brandon said, an idea forming in his head.

"Yeah, I doubt she even finds Dad attractive. She'll probably have sex with anyone if they spoil her...I don't want to look at her anymore. Let's go," Sarah scoffed, waddling past Kim. Brandon followed, stopping when Kim bent over to check the directions, her huge ass sticking up in the air. Brandon snapped a quick picture with his phone and sent it to his boss.

<Good?> Brandon asked. He got a response within seconds.

<PERFECT>

"Excuse me," Brandon said, taping Kim on the shoulder, trying to emulate the bad guys in rom-coms.

Kim turned around and looked at Brandon. "What." It wasn't even a question like she was curious. She said it to tell Brandon clearly that he was out of her league and she didn't want to continue this conversation.

"I just saw you were interested in jewelry and can appreciate good things," Brandon schmoozed, motioning to his own amulet. The jewels and gems gleaned in the light.

"Oh yeah?" Kim said, crossing her arms and looking at Brandon speculatively. "And what, if I go out with you, you'll buy me some tacky rubies?"

"No, but the man I work for can," Brandon said. "He's a very wealthy man, but he's getting older and has a pregnant wife and-"

"I know the type," Kim giggled, which made Brandon a little angry. "Having his little scrubby valet find him girls is kinda weird, but okay. Where is he?"

"Just give me your number and-" Brandon stopped, seeing Kim's obvious skeptical look. "How about I give you his number and you can both work something out?"

"Now you're talking," Kim said, getting out her phone as Brandon gave her Tyler's number.

< hi there :) > Kim sent.

A few seconds later. <you the girl with the big ass?>

< yep ;) >

<Let's talk. I'll send a driver>

As Kim and Tyler straightened things out, Sarah was dragging Brandon along. "That was so embarrassing," Sarah said, face bright red. "How could you talk to that woman?"

"It was for work," Brandon protested. "And when did you get so strong?"

"Must be some residual energy," Sarah said, cutting Brandon off before he could inquire further. "I'll explain later...or maybe never."

As the Page siblings went away, Kim strutted toward the mall herself, unknowingly making a beeline for the parts of the mall Yaral was drumming up the most trouble.

The afternoon sun shone above the country club as Erin drove her golf kart to the 16th tee off. With mainly pars, an eagle and a couple of bogies, she was doing fairly well. Grabbing her iron, she bent down, trying to make sure her belly wasn't getting in the way of her swing, she looked past the sand patch, over to the green. Her breathing slowed down and she concentrated as hard as she could.

WHACK!

The white ball flew high into the air, it soared through the sky, past the sand bar, narrowly missing the trees and landing straight on the green, she could see the ball roll closer and closer to the flag.

Plop!

"A hole in one!" Erin screamed jumping up and down for joy. A crowd had formed and applauded at her fantastic strike. Driving over she asked someone to pick up her ball. There was no way she was able to reach down and grab it. Making her way over to number 17 Douglas and his buddies were just finishing their game. " hey, Douglas, isn't that your daughter with the crowd? " said of Douglas's polo buddies asked him.

Douglas looked over to see Erin going up to the next tee off. " oh god" Douglas said. " come on,first the games keeper, now this? Jeff, Sam, let's go."

" no no no" Jeff said, " let's see if your pregnant daughter beats your ass" the group laughed and Douglas annoyingly chucked as they drove over to Erin and her crowd. Brody was Erin's own cheering squad waving a toy around like a flag. Erin had managed to borrow several different clubs, irons and putters from various people. Going up to the ball, a large sound similar to a something from a horror movie came from her belly. Brody knew his sister too well and in a flash was running to the buffet table half a kilometre away." ooooohhhhh, does anyone have food? I'm starving..." She winced as she felt a kick in her belly. She hadn't eaten since they barred her from the buffet. An old woman came over to the pregnant sports lady and gave her a packet of pretzels. She downed all of it, but it did very little. " damn it, why did they bar me?" She said.

People heard what she had mentioned. " they let a pregnant woman starve?" Someone near the front said. " dear god, what's wrong with the head of this club?" As everyone started talking, the same man who barred her before was starting to sweat. If he wouldn't do something now, he surely would be fired. Walking over to the hugely pregnant woman he said with great concern " oh god, hello Erin, it's me, Ron, from the buffet. I just wanted to apologise for everything I did. I didn't know you were going to go all this way to get food." Erin almost started swearing at him till she saw someone coming over.

With a trail of smoke Brody came back with two baskets with a variety of foods. " " Erin, I could tell you, you, you were hungry. So I ran and I ran to the buff, buff, the food place! I got you Icecream, and ham and muffins and shrimp and and pickles, and some cheese, and an orange and a bananana and some chicken legs!" Brody said between puffs.

"Thanks, Brody" Erin said thankfully as she was handed the first basket. In front of everyone Erin started eating the food. By the end of the second basket she wasn't feeling hungry anymore and resumed playing. " for the wait, this better be good" one of the more impatient members said as she grabbed the club.

"Oh god, this is it, she is going to kick my ass in the scores, the guys will have a field day" Douglas thought to himself as she was about to take her swing. " hi honey!" Douglas called to his daughter. In mid swing Ashley was thrown off her game. Swinging the club the ball went flying, her last second interference was setting it's trajectory off course. The people gasped as it flew over water but were upset when the ball made a crash landing in the sand dune near the green.

"Daadddd" Erin called as she waddled over to her father. " do you know how much that is going to cost me?" Douglas looked around the rich unpleasant mob. Thinking on his toes he said "Oh honey, I'm sorry. I was just trying to support you, that's all". The annoyed faces suddenly changed and let out a collective "aawwww".

" well, father, your oh so great timing just cost me a good shot." Erin answered waddling over to the golf kart. Her belly was barely touching the steering wheel as she drove to the sand pit. Getting out of the vehicle she grabbed her borrowed open club sand wedge. As she lined herself to the ball she saw a film crew set up. " oh geez, I better get this finished before I have any more distractions. The crowd around the green watched eagerly as she brought her golf club back.

WHACK! Ppffffff

She hit the ball and it went soaring over 5 inches and landed on another part of the sand pit. She was getting furious now as sweat started forming on her brow from the afternoon sun. She went to the ball, lined up aaand...

Ppff WHACK!

The second time was much better, it made it onto the green with mild applause. With two putts she just got par and her score as unchanged. Brody ran over, gave Erin her ball, a great big hug, and then everyone went to the last play. The report had started doing her news segment. " hi, I'm Sasha Brown here to talk about an amazing woman. 25 and already pregnant with quadruplets Erin Turner has shown the high class community that even whilst pregnant you can still swing the shots."

Making her way to number 18 Erin was feeling confident, the app made by the country club said she was coming third, but if she aimed and hit correctly, she could come first! Making it over to the 18th tee, she was ready to win.

Bending over the audience was either viewing a fantastic sight of her derrière, or her generous cleavage. Slowing her heart rate right down she breathed in heavily, looking down at her golf ball she could see how dirty it become. A smidgen of dirt on one side, a blade of grass peeled off the ball and dropped to the ground.

That golf ball wasn't perfect, like her. Sure she wasn't the worse child out there but she was much better then the other country club kids, getting high, doing cocaine and crystal meth. But she had to try harder than everyone else because she was pregnant. Time slowed down as everyone waited eagerly to see her swing. She brought her club back, looked at exactly where she wanted to hit it aaaannddd

nothing.

She dropped her club. People started to question what she was doing. " dad, can you come here?" She said, a concerned look on her face. Douglas walked over to her daughter. " what's wrong? Are you in labor?"

With a look of upset and frustration on her head she shook her head. " why do I have to do this?" She whispered, starting to get upset. " why do I have to play to their rules, I shouldn't have to fight for my food, I'm eight and a half months pregnant with quadruplets, why can't I feed my future children?" Erin started crying. Douglas looked at his daughter with pity, remorse and a tempered fire.

" look, honey, I am sorry, I had no idea. Leave it to me, daddy's going to fix what the stupid troglodytes did here today. Just enjoy playing the rest of the game. I am sorry I can't watch your final shot, I need to take care of your mother, she called me saying something was wrong." Erin hugged her father as a couple of tears rolled down her face. " just be strong for daddy, remember we will always love you" Douglas said as they finished hugging. Douglas walked over to his kart and drove to the country club, a look of complete rage on his face.

-----------------

"So where's Clara?" Louisa said, sipping her virgin grasshopper. Little did she know that Clara was just trying to get into her daughter's boyfriend's pants a while ago. " she told me she was at work, I'm sure it was something about making sure her husbands business is making money" said Joyce taking a bite from her desert.

" are you sure? I know Tyler is making a lot of money, especially with that business he has made on constructing something on the mountain line on the southwest side of town." Debra brought up, pointing over to the mountains on the horizon. " I also hear he has been cheating on Clara with three different women!"

" don't be daft" Belinda chimed in. Belinda was one of the more creative people in the book club. Her entire family were fantastic at playing classical music. Crossing her long slightly tanned legs and running her fingers through her long flowing black hair she turned to Barbara. "What do you think?"

Barbara laughed a little. " you know how Tyler is around pregnant women, he's worse than the guy who runs this place. With so many pregnant women in town, how can he find someone to have sex with, trust me, I know his type!"

" what's that supposed to mean?" Louisa questioned her busty tanned friend.

" well, let's just say this baby isn't Ron's" Barbara said with a wink. The entire group fell silent. For a good minute no one was gossiping. Douglas came up the stairs and reclaiming his gentleman type physique he walked over to his wife.

Giving her a kiss Douglas asked her " honey, have seen Duncan?"

"oh, yeah I'm sure he is getting ready for the award ceremony, try his office" Louisa said, taking a bite from a celery stick. Thanking his wife, Douglas headed upstairs to Duncan's office.

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Duncan stood there, adjusting his hair piece and reciting his speech in his large office. Photos hung off the wall from when he met world leaders, celebrities and wildlife he has killed. A modified sniper rifle was mounted behind his desk and surrounding it were the heads 4 of the most deadly and endangered game he has killed. Along the windowsill was his medals for polo, rowing and sailing. A glass cabin are held all his trophies and at the door was an angry Douglas, almost hungry for blood.

" ah Douglas, my good man, what's wrong?" Duncan said a concerned look on his face.

" I'll tell you what's the matter you egotistical prick, I just found out my daughter, has had to run through rings in her pregnant body, in order to feed herself." Douglas angrily yelled, his rage rising. "Now as one of this country clubs biggest endorsers, whom has had to put in a great deal of money into making this one of the best country clubs in America, I want to know why your people are putting my daughter through hell!"

" Firstly Douglas, I want to say I am very sorry that this has happened to you and your daughter, however there is a reason why this has happened, come look at the hall of families." Duncan said as they left his office. Walking down the hall they saw photos of families doing a large variety of high class activities. " look at these families Douglas. As you can see they are all well known for what they do. The Lovecraft's are the best sailers, in this photo you can see the Roberts in their rendition of Macbeth and over here are the Woods in, what would say isn't the most flattering picture, their synchronised swimming clothes."

Douglas looked around and he noticed a couple of things " quick question Duncan. Where is Ron's family and why aren't there any photos of the country club here?" He questioned, looking at all the pretentious families in their ridiculous activities.

" good question. See every family here has a life pass to the country club once they achieve a status in something that is worthy of being recognised by our committee here. Us being good friends i wanted to make sure that your family would receive a life time pass, but sadly there was nothing to be considered recognisable. So, I had to make incentive for your daughter to start playing golf with you. It would appear your daughter is exceptional at golf, if you two were to team up, I could count that as a family activity and finally have you amongst the hall of families."

" okay, fair enough, but what about Ron?" Douglas asked his angry cooling. " he is your second in command"

" well my friend, the answer to that is simple, he doesn't have a family yet!" Duncan said chuckling. They walked over to the window to see Erin on the green.

Erin was sweating, she had made it past the sand dunes, the ponds and their snapping turtles, it was now her time to win the game. It looked like an impossible shot. She was on the edge of the green and the hole was toward the other side. Looking at the ground she could see a slope on the left side to her. Breathing in she aimed and as she tapped it with the slightest bit of effort the ball rolled towards the slope, made it down the slope with some extra speed, got closer and closer to the hole until.....


Plop!

The ball went in giving her the low enough score to win the game! The audience roared with a thunderous applause, Erin jumped for joy knowing she had won. The book club came down to celebrate with Erin and the crowd after winning the game.

The rest of the afternoon was filled with post game celebrations. Duncan got up on the stage with a series of trophies and medals. He and his wife started congratulating everyone in their age group whom had the best score, then it came down to his final two trophies.

" Well ladies and gentlemen, it would appear we are down to our final 2, but they both go to the highest scoring person today, so don't worry Charles, you will be able to go back to the bar quicker" the audience laughed at Duncan's comments. " The trophy for best score in the 21-40 age group and the best score in all of today goes to, ERIN TURNER!" Erin excitingly waddled up on stage. Accepting the two trophies, she also received a golf bag and some green plastic thing. " we are changing from tickets to a more electronic format. This is your first part of the emerald card, gain the last 3 and you will be welcome to anything in our club, from the spare bed rooms, if you wish to have a party here, you will be welcome to free unlimited food, room service and use of our spa. LETS HEAR IT FOR ERIN!"

The crowd applauded as the day drawed to a close. The family headed to the car, Brody was dirty holding on of the trophies, singing "trophy trophy trophy!" Erin was tired and thankful as the waiters that barred her earlier were now carrying her winnings. Joyce and Louisa were joking about as they walked to the Valet, when Joyce whispered something in Louisa's ear, " no way!" Louisa said, " you guys go first, I'll join you, Douglas? Honey! I'm staying the night, just make sure Brody gets tucked in and let Erin do anything she wants, especially with her quads on the way she deserves this win!"

Tipping the valet Douglas, Erin and Brody got in the car and drove off. The only thing on Erin's mind was how was she going to get to Brandon's place down the street?

The taxi pulled up just outside the Page's place. Katie and Ashley quickly struggled to get out of the car. Ashley paying for the can as fast as possible. Waddling to the front door Kate gave Ashley a massive slap on the butt. Ashley responded by tackling her onto her front lawn, passionately making out with her doing so. 1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Brandon's neck was beginning to get sore from craning so much. Everywhere he turned, there were pregnant women for him to gaze at. Malls were always magnets for spotting big bellies. They were big places where lots of families gathered, which meant there were statistically good chances tp see mothers-to-be waddling up and down the corridors. But the Smallton Mall had been even more of a congregating spot for expectant women, thanks to its large maternity clothing store, its pregnant yoga classes, and the other events and specials it offered pregnant women.

But it was never like this. Quite nearly every woman Brandon saw was pregnant and it was rare to see anyone with a belly smaller than "full term with twins." Brandon had an excellent belly right beside him with Sarah's large brood, and even before she was pregnant, Sarah was always gorgeous. And while no one Brandon saw at the mall had a belly as superb as hers yet, it was much easier on Brandon's mind to see pregnant women who weren't his sister.

"It's a little...crowded here," Brandon said, trying to sound nonchalant as he attempted to squeeze past two very fertile and, by the looks of them, overdue women, laughing and chatting without care for their size. Sarah snorted a little laugh and nodded.

"Yeah, whenever Mom would drag me here for pregnant yoga or maternity clothing shopping, I always felt like I stuck out like a sore, swollen thumb. Now I blend in a little more," Sarah said, looking down at her huge belly and blushing, running one hand over her womb. "I guess I still stand out by a lot."

Sarah was beginning to have mixed feelings about her pregnant and belly size. For one thing, she now knew that she wasn't really pregnant. Somehow, this amulet of hers contained a mysterious "pregnancy" energy that had given her the amazing bump she was sporting. Or maybe she was already pregnant and the amulet just exacerbated things. She couldn't quite remember. Sarah's memory was foggy if she went back too far, thanks to the "reality shifting" powers the amulet had. But Sarah also knew she could control this energy, thanks to her inventions, and could make her belly bigger, smaller, or possibly nonexistent.

And yet...while for nine months she'd hated being pregnant and carrying around such a large, uncomfortable load, she now couldn't imagine making her belly any smaller. She even had the occasional urge to get even bigger. Every time she thought about how big Ashley's belly was, Sarah burned with envy and wanted to match her mother's size, if not bigger. Also, she long suspected that Brandon liked big pregnant bellies and she felt like that was something she should keep around.

"Out of my way," a woman growled, pushing some other pregnant patrons out of the way. Brandon and Sarah turned to see Janice, moving through the mall, her gigantic belly pushing the crowd away easily.

"Wow, she's as big as you," Brandon said, immediately biting his tongue. "I-I mean...uh..."

"No, you're right. I'm surprised too," Sarah said slowly. "She looks a little familiar too. Brandon, I'm going to visit with her for a bit. You go do...whatever it is you do." Brandon gulped in protest, but to no avail. Sarah was already waddling over to Janice. "Hi there...Janice, right? You taught pregnant yoga here at the mall."

"I still teach it. They haven't fired me yet," Janice sneered at Sarah. "You...you're always with Ashley. Her daughter?"

"That's me," Sarah beamed.

"You look like her," Janice said, panting as she moved her hands under her belly for support. "Your hair isn't as natural a shade of brown as hers, though. And your eyes don't have her gleam. And your belly isn't as-"

"Alright, alright, I get it," Sarah said, cheeks burning as she felt another wave of jealousy. "When I went to yoga, you weren't this..."

"Big?" Janice scoffed, slowly lowering herself onto one of the mall's benches. Sarah took her arm to help the furious woman sit down. "I feel twice as many kicks inside me now. I've got sextuplets."

"Did you not always?" Sarah said, worrying her new pregnancy inventions might have accidentally affected Janice.

"No, I was pregnant with triplets until he did this to me," Janice said, patting her belly, then groaning when a new wave of kicks came in response. "I mean, he already did this to me when he got me pregnant, but then he put his hand on my belly and boom! Six babies."

"Who?"

"Joel. It doesn't matter who," Janice said. "I've given up any chance of him stepping up to raise his children anyhow." Janice leaned back and rubbed big, slow circles on the front of her belly. "But Jesus, I can't do my job now with all this extra weight. I was just getting used to carrying triplets full term. Now these?"

"I might have a solution," Sarah said, standing up and reaching under her shirt. Detaching her spinal support, Sarah groaned as she bent to put it on Janice's back. Without the support, the full weight of Sarah's pregnancy was now being felt. The energy she had from Antonio's "experiment" had long since worn off. "Try this."

Janice stood up, surprised at how easy it was. "This is...this is amazing!" Janice grinned, throwing a few quick punches in the air, followed by a flurry of kicks. "I feel like all the pregnancy weight is gone! I can move just like before!" Janice turned to Sarah, who was now as tired and uncomfortable on the bench as Janice had been. "Where did you get this?"

"I made it," Sarah smiled, rubbing her belly the same way Janice had been. "I'm an inventor and I've been working on a number of inventions for pregnant women...some more impressive than others."

"Oh yeah?" Janice said. "Well if you have any more, I could sell them easily at my yoga classes." Janice rubbed her belly in thought as she walked around. "Actually...if you really have more inventions, I might have an even better proposition. A woman...well, she looked more like a girl to me, wanted to partner with me to create a pregnancy product empire. And she seemed to have pretty savvy business experience too."

"That might be just the thing I need," Sarah said. "I've been toying around with a business idea. How does 'PregTech' sound to you?"

"Sounds promising," Janice smiled, calling Katie up on her phone. Janice stood there as the phone buzzed and buzzed. "Urgh, why is she not picking up?" Janice yelled, her wrathful anger coming back. "What could be so important that she's not answering her cellphone?" If only Sarah knew the answer.

In the rest of the mall, Joel, controlled by Yaral, continued to prowl around, breathing in the chaotic energy his pregnancy magic was creating. Throwing wrenches into people's lives were the sustaining force in Yaral's life and nothing was a bigger depth charge in someone's life than a sudden pregnancy. While he drew on the chaos created by the amulets, to stay in Joel's body until he had his "meeting" with Brandon later that day, he'd need to drum up a lot of chaos.

And so he had. Nearly every woman in the mall that was currently pregnant was made that way thanks to Yaral in Joel's body. All he had to do was touch them and PING! A big belly sprouted out of them. And for women who were already pregnant, he added on to their brood. Still, now that he was at the mall in a corporeal form, Yaral was annoyed that there was one person missing at the mall. Antonio.

Yaral had existed for thousands of years and drummed up chaos and pregnant turmoil without a care in the world. But along the way, a few mortals managed to get in his way. Jack Dale Jr. Diana Larsen. Nicole Zavaleta. And perhaps his most irritating: Antonio Greene. He was the one who had the audacity to use Yaral's creations for personal, monetary gain. And no one gets to gain from Yaral's magic but Yaral.

As Yaral clomped around, not used to using a human body for a long time, he bumped into a woman in a tight, purple dress: Kim. "Hey, watch where you're going!"

Yaral paid no attention as he kept walking, but was bemused when Kim grabbed Joel's shoulder and turned him around.

"Look, I don't know who you are or who you think you are and I don't care. When I look at you, I see a lanky loser with no class, no taste, no skill, and no love life. You think because I'm a hot piece of ass, I'm just some tramp you can run into and brush off? Well I've got news for you: I'm more than just a hot piece of ass. I'm the hottest fucking bitch you'll ever see and you'd better have a good mental memory because this is the closest you'll ever get to me. I'm rich, I'm sexy, and I'm out of your league. Are you still gawking at me? You've got beady, dead little eyes and you're disgusting. I'm stuck between wanting you to leave so I never have to see you again and telling you off more, because you are such a fucking loser that it's fun to find new things to cut you apart with. I just wish one of my sugar daddies was here so he could punch you right in your dumb face too. And FYI, even if by some miracle you're loaded, I'd never sleep with you. I wouldn't even give you a sarcastic kiss on your scruffy cheeks. Are you still staring at me? Don't you have a life?"

Yaral held his temple, unable to understand why this insignificant woman was still pestering him. Luckily, he had a way to get chaotic energy from her and make her go away. He took a few steps toward her and gave her a light pat on the stomach.

"Oh my God! Did you just touch me? I'll call security on yoooh!" Kim cried out, putting her hands on her dress, which was quickly getting tighter as her belly expanded more and more, ripping through the fabric. Kim staggered to get a seat as her heels started to give out as she got bigger and bigger, reaching octuplet sizes.

Yaral took a deep breath and kept walking around. "Refreshing."

Rebecca scrolled through her phone with one hand, smiling occasionally at a funny tweet. Her other hand gradually rested on her belly, rubbing softly and feeling its firm but round shape. I should go to the gym sometime soon Rebecca thought to herself. Feels like I'm getting out of shape. Rebecca looked down at herself and moved her hand up and down her belly's slope. Oh, right. I'm pregnant, not fat she thought to herself, shaking her head. I've been so forgetful lately.

"I don't trust her," Wendy said, hands behind her back as Antonio looked over the paperwork at his desk. Rebecca looked up from her phone to the meeting she was in with Antonio and Wendy.

Forgot about this too Rebecca said, pausing before returning to Twitter. The "sloth" in her amulet was working just fine since getting it back from Antonio's latest invention.

"Don't worry. Catalina is on our side," Antonio smiled. "I've got significant leverage on her, and if Ms. Corazon wants to continue her legitimate movie career, she'll stay on my good side. I've destroyed all evidence of her seedy past, save for a few DVDs that Rebecca put in our most secure vault just today."

Rebecca winced a little. I knew there was something else I forgot about today, she thought to herself. Rebecca left Catalina's only existing porn films in the mall stock room, where they ended up in the Smallton mall's own video store. Any concern over the issue went from Rebecca's mind pretty quickly, but she still made sure to text herself a reminder. Antonio's anger was something she'd seen before and she didn't need to experience it first-hand.

"Then the last report for the day will be this," Wendy said, handing Antonio a chart. "Revenue today was...hectic."

"Hectic?" Antonio said, looking over the data. "I don't understand."

"Well, as per your plan, our pregnancy-centric business have been doing extremely well, but the customer base grew much faster than we anticipated today. We weren't prepared and stores became so congested that we might have actually lost some money in a few areas," Wendy said. As she handed Antonio security camera footage of the mobs of bare-bellied pregnant women, she couldn't help thinking about her own budding pregnancy. Wendy was still unsure of when she should bring up her status as a mother-to-be to her employer. Somewhat ironic, given that Wendy was one of the few women in the city of Smallton who was naturally pregnant at this point.

"Yaral," Antonio cursed under his breath as he handed Wendy back the charts and photographs. "We have to work quickly then. Redouble our investments in pregnancy businesses in and around the mall."

"You know," Rebecca sighed, looking up after she'd caught up with her timeline and sent all the jokes and observations she could think of, "if any of the pregnancy-related businesses, like, partner-up or something now, they could probably bankrupt you."

"You sound very relaxed," Antonio bristled, lowering his eyebrows. Quietly, he cursed Yaral again for somehow giving Rebecca the "sloth" amulet. "But I highly doubt that will happen. It would take quite the mixture of business acumen, connections, innovation, and PR to create a competing pregnancy business empire in this mall. It can't happen."

"O-kay," Rebecca said, rolling her eyes as she went back to her phone, opening up 1024 and forgetting what else she thought she should say.

----

She's Catalina Corazon, the hottest up-and-coming actress in the world! Just look around: people were staring at her and the paparazzi were...well, there wasn't any paparazzi, unless you count the occasional teenager snapping a picture of her on their phones as they laughed.

Why aren't there any paparazzi? Catalina thought angrily, her mind shifting from Antonio to TMZ. If a Kardashian walks anywhere with a fully covered baby bump, they fall over themselves, and they aren't even in movies! Here I am, a star, my belly totally exposed in this non-maternity tank top. It was true: Catalina was using her tank top as a bra, keeping her heaving chest held in place, her big mocha belly, filled with an ever-growing number of children thanks to Antonio fiddling around with her amulet, hanging out for all to see. Catalina believed that if her history in porn was ever exposed now that she was a major celebrity (in her own mind, of course. Her popularity was growing, but her pride amulet was changing her perspective greatly), all that fame would turn to ridicule and her movie contracts would dry up.

Still, I hate working for Antonio. I mean, a mall? My star's burning much hotter than that. I just need to find another, bigger opportunity that needs someone for promotions. Then I can get leverage over Antonio and get those last few DVDs back and live the life of a silver screen queen! Catalina cackled to herself as she ran her hands over her belly, passing by some pregnant strangers and sucking up their pregnancies. Jennifer Aniston: no baby. Halle Berry: only one baby. Even Angelina Jolie only had twins. So with sextuplets, I should be at least three times as famous as Angelina Jolie.

"Hi," Sarah said slowly. "Did you just-"

The door slammed shut again. "H-hi Dad," Brandon said from downstairs.

"Tell me in here," Sarah said, putting her hand on Katie's naked back and ushering her into Sarah's bedroom/workplace. She shut the door behind her and crossed her arms, glaring at Katie. "Did you and my mom just...have sex?"

"We did," Katie sighed, trying and failing to squeeze into her clothes. She'd gotten a lot bigger since she last wore these. "But your father was the first one to-"

"You're an inventor, huh?" she said, trying to heave herself closer. When it was clear that Katie needed help, Sarah handed her the designs herself. "All pregnancy related...you know, I'm trying to start some pregnancy-centric business ventures."

"Are you the one Janice at the mall is working with?" Sarah said, raising an eyebrow.

"I guess I am," Katie grinned. "It looks like you have some pretty interesting things here. With this, we could be making more money than even the mall's owner."

"The mall's owner?" Sarah said.

"Some guy who's been trying to make money off of pregnancy there for years," Katie said. "I dug up lots of financial data the other night."

Sarah's envy burned inside her amulet. "Why should some guy who doesn't have to carry a heavy load in his belly make money off of us pregnant women? Let's blow him out of the water."
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: Forming alliances

Follow some other characters!
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Tanner and Brandon unpacked groceries quietly, Tanner's face clearly sullen and tired. "So you'll be downstairs with your friends most of the night?" Tanner asked.

"Yeah," Brandon nodded. "We'll have our dinner down there too." He paused before adding, "Erin will be with us too. I know Mom doesn't like her, but as far as I know, you don't feel the same way."

"It's fine if you spend time with Erin," Tanner replied, his voice still stuck in a monotone. "And it's probably better if you spend the night down there. Your mother and I are...having an argument."

An argument? Brandon thought. You cheated on her and it sounds like she found out. How could anyone cheat on Mom? She's so nice and caring and...and she's pregnant! Wonderfully, hugely pregnant. Brandon felt his face flush and he grabbed a few cases of beer, hurrying down to the basement. He hoped the work would get his mind off of Ashley's pregnant belly and make him forget that he getting an erection thinking about her. He was still under the impression that Ashley was his biological mother.

As Brandon went downstairs, Tanner sighed and walked up to his bedroom, opening the door slowly. "Ashley?" he said before he got a good look at his wife. Ashley was naked on the bed, her enormous, round belly towering above her. Her lap was wet, her face was bright red, and she was still convulsing slightly with pleasure.

"Hello Tanner," Ashley cooed.

"You...had sex," Tanner said, his eyes wide with shock.

"That makes two of us."

Tanner grit his teeth and fists. "Where is he?"

*He* Ashley chuckled. "He's gone, you don't need to worry about that. I'd worry a lot more about you right now."

"Look, Ashley, I'm a man and I have needs."

"I have needs too. Not that you cared," Ashley said, turning her head away from her husband. "I think you should sleep on the couch for the next few days."

With an impotent groan, Tanner stormed out of the room, slamming the door behind him. Ashley let out a gasp when he left, putting her hands to her face and crying gently. He didn't even try to deny it. That's how little he thought of cheating on me. I'm carrying 10 damn babies for him and he sleeps with some young thing like it's nothing. Ashley's sobbing stopped as she had one last, horrified realization. And despite it all...I still wanted him to have sex with me. I almost asked him again. What is wrong with me?

---

Dinner was chillingly quiet as Sarah pushed herself away from the table. The only words between them were Tanner asking if her investor meeting was tomorrow morning or afternoon. Sarah piled dinner onto two plates and picked them up. As she turned around, Tanner spoke up again. "Why do you need two plates?"

Sarah froze. "Well, I need to bring Mom her dinner and...you know how bad hunger can be for pregnant women. I know how hungry I am now so I can't imagine how Mom is, eating for 10."

"11," Tanner said. "She's pregnant with 10 so she's eating for 11."

"Right, 11," Sarah nodded, hurrying up the stairs; an easy task now thanks to her pregnancy-spine. 10? I guess that reality warp doesn't affect me anymore since I started tinkering with the amulet for my inventions. Sarah opened the door to Ashley's room slowly, smiling at her expectant mother. "Here's dinner, Mom."

"Thank you sweetie," Ashley smiled, the lamp on by her side. She was sitting up now and managed to adjust one of her maternity bras to fit her breasts, now all the way up to K-cups. "Just put it here," she said, patting her belly. Even with her breasts resting on her belly, there was plenty of room for her swollen womb to act as a table.

Sarah put the plate down and sighed, looking at her mother. "I always knew Dad was an ass, but I never thought he would seriously..."

"Hey, don't worry about your Dad and me," Ashley smiled, reaching over to hold her daughter's hand but only managing to rub the side of Sarah's belly instead. "I'm going to be fine. And don't get too mad at him. He's still your father, after all."

But not Brandon's Sarah thought. But you don't know I know that yet. "Okay, Mom. Just...let me know if I can do anything for you, okay? With my new pregnancy inventions, I'll bet I can-"

"I'm fine, thank you Sarah," Ashley smiled, patting Sarah's tummy before focusing her attention on her plate. Sarah looked down at her mother, still burning with jealousy at how well Ashley was taking things while still looking gorgeous in the process. She envied her energy.

Back in Sarah's own room, Katie had papers all over the room, making calculations and notes. "I don't know how much you'll get from this investor of yours, but I think I can get the materials to make 1000 of those spines with very little overhead."

"Great," Sarah said, putting a plate beside Katie, who was still totally naked with a belly as big as Ashley's — maybe even bigger, since Katie was shorter. As Sarah eased herself into her own desk, she saw a few sheets of paper there with her name written out several times. "What's this?"

"Incorporation," Katie said. "We'll need it if we're going to create the kind of pregnancy-business empire we're thinking of. Got any ideas for a company name?"

"PregTech," Sarah said without any hesitation.

"Sounds good. We're lucky this boom in pregnancies are happening when the mall's owner was so unprepared," Katie said, pausing to look down at her amulet. "Hope it wasn't my fault."

"You know about these too?" Sarah said, holding up her own amulet. Then, Sarah connected the dots. Katie having an amulet. Katie working at a maternity store. Katie fucking Ashley. "Wait a minute, are you the one who got my Mom and me pregnant?"

"No, no, no!" Katie said, holding up her hands in self-defense. "I may have made you both a little bigger, but you were both huge when I first saw you. I even found my amulet at your house!"

Sarah narrowed her eyes. Katie seemed to be telling the truth. Besides, it was a secret they shared now, as far as they knew. "I actually experimented with my amulet some and it's led to some other inventions. They're...big."

"Bigger than full pregnant mobility?" Katie said, holding up the patent for Sarah's spine. Sarah nodded and gave Katie another stack of papers.

"Spontaneous pregnancy, changing pregnancy size, permanent pregnancy, turning pregnancies into a source of renewable energy," Sarah said. "And that's just a start."

"This...this is big," Katie said, starting to drool as she thought about the possibilities. "We could make billions off of this...can you do all of it?"

"Most of it, but I'm constantly learning and understanding more," Sarah said. She looked over Katie, the only person to sleep with her pregnant mother, as big and fertile as her. Sarah sat beside her and slowly placed a hand on Katie's belly, rubbing gently.

Katie turned and put down her papers, which were the last things concealing her breasts. Normally, Katie would be all over Sarah now, but after already having pregnant sex and the greed in her amulet now multiplied by 10, she was more focused on her work. "You know, I've got a manual that explains how to use the amulet in my purse. If I could get it, I'll bet you could make your inventions even better."

"O-oh," Sarah said, removing her hand as Katie went back to her charts and contracts. "Right. Good idea." Sarah's cheeks burned. She didn't know why she tried to woo Katie, but deep down, the answer was clear: jealousy. Why could Ashley get this pretty young tycoon but not Sarah? She looked down at her belly, barely concealed, and rubbed gently. Brandon wouldn't ignore me...

---

Downstairs, Brandon opened the door and smiled to let Grant in. "Great to see you here!"

"Of course; wouldn't miss it," Grant grinned, moving inside. Behind him walked a woman about the same age as him with straight brown hair and big, thick-framed glasses. "This is Mara, a friend of mine. She's a HUGE D&D nerd."

"It's true," Mara sighed. "I brought my own character sheet and guides. Hope that's okay."

"No problem," Brandon said, leading them to the basement door. As Mara walked down, Grant took Brandon aside and showed him a plastic shopping bag.

"Dude, look what I found at the mall's video store," he whispered, taking out a few DVDs. "It's porn with that famous actress around town! Catalina Corazon!"

"You seem excited," Brandon laughed.

"Are you kidding? Aside from Mara, the Catalina in this movies is the only non-pregnant woman in town. I need this."

"You're exagerating," Brandon said, rolling his eyes as there was another knock at the door.

"I don't think so," Grant sighed, going downstairs. Brandon could hear Joel's weird greeting echo up the steps as he opened the door to see Erin's smiling face.

"Hi," Erin blushed. "Can I come in? Is your Mom around?"

"She's upstairs and doesn't know," Brandon said. "She and my Dad are having a spat. I'll explain later." He leaned in to kiss her but Erin was faster, giving Brandon a big, wet kiss with plenty of tongue.

"You taste nice," Erin murmured as she waddled downstairs.

"Ah, now we are complete!" Joel said with a booming voice, Yaral still inside him. A lack of chaos energy was rendering him weak and his mind was straying. "Now, shall we start our glorious quest?"

"Guess so," Brandon smiled, popping the cap off of his beer. "Let the games begin."
