1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
The table was set, starting from the entrance to upstairs going clockwise was Brandon pulling out his old and Erin's new character sheets, Erin was sitting close to Brandon, rubbing his leg with her delicate fingers with her right hand as the left hand invaded the pretzel bowl. Next was mara who was becoming aquatinted win everyone. Grant was next to her, pulling up his gm board, dice and figurines and inbetween the guys was Joel, observing the cabanossi. "These tiny meat disks are delicious" Joel said grabbing more.

" okay that's it" Brandon said pulling out a six pack. " if you're going to talk like that all night, you are gunna have to drink" pulling off the top he slid the beverage to his mate. Joel looked at it funny, then took a sip. Somewhat satisfied with the taste he continued drinking.

" an interesting brew, so, what are we doing? Fighting monsters? Climbing ladders? Or should we talk about jewellery?" Joel said, looking at Brandon and Erin with their matching amulets. They shined, almost unearthly, atleast to Yaral it did. A faint blue light came from Brandon's. Something about it, looked familiar. Yaral ran Joel's hands through his thick red hair, trying to figure out where he saw that before.

"We pick up where we left off" Grant said, readjusting his glasses. " you guys are at a babbling brook, the sun rises over your pit of bloodied dismantled enemies corpses. Gharn the Red stands off to the side wiping blood off his staff as you 2 awake from your slumber"


" wait, what about Mara and me?" Erin asked quizzically as she rubbed her large midsection

" don't worry, he will introduce us later" Mara answered as they continued listening to Grant continue his spellbinding ham-like rendition of what was going on.

" you see giant bears roam the valley to East and to the south is Chandleberk where you guys were heading. What would you like to do?" Grant finished, setting up their scene.


" standing up I greet Gharn and say to him 'we should head down to Chandleberk, we find Batta who can guide us on our quest for the staff of life!'" Brandon told Grant.
Yaral looked down at his character sheet, seeing paladin as his class. " great" he groaned.

" ah my good man, what a fantastic idea. Let us travel forth, to the Chandleberk. But before we go,let me heal thy wounds." Gharn said healing his fellow fighters. As they walked down the mountainous landscape they could see the ocean up ahead, off to the distance they could see a whale jump out of water. Making their way into town they could see a large variety of different races make their way around town, the black smith was packed as a strong feminine woman left it's business. With the figure of Christina Heindricks and clothed like xena was Katherine! Barbarian of the south!



" is that me?" Erin asked, swallowing her mouth full of Icecream.

" yes, what would you like to do?" Grant asked her as he swigged some beer.

Katherine saw the heroic adventurers arrive into town, seven feet tall, the amazon bounded to them, screeching at their feet. Bending down she said " hi there! My isn't it great to see some extra heroic people in this town. Tell me, whom might you all be?"


Grant cleared his throat, getting in character. " hello my fair maiden, my name is Gharn the Red, to my left is our paladin Flynn and to the right, our ranger *sigh* Luke Solo"


"What? I'm bad at making up names" Brandon said, putting his hand comfortably on Erin's leg.

" anyway, we seek Batta the resident fortune teller, to aid us on our quest." Gharn said, stroking his black beard.

" Ohh a quest! Well, I have no clue about Batta, but I can help, let's go to the local tavern." Katherine exclaimed as they head off into town. It was a packed morning, people were bringing in freshly grown food, the baker rang his bell opening for business that day and over at the tavern the drunks were asleep, their livers trying to re-cooperate from last nights alcoholic expenditures.

Opening the doors to the facilities a wofty smell of beer, whiskey and swear pours onto them


" dear god, can I kill one of the drunks?" Joel asked, bored with what is going on around him.

" Joel. You know it's against a paladins rights to kill innocent people. You can't make any
chaos what's so ever." Brandon told him.

" listen here friend, chaos is a necessity, without chaos the world would shrivel up and die." Joel said his eyes slightly glowing red. Sighing he realised what he was doing. " look, I'm sorry, let's just continue and I'll try to be a good two shoes."

" okay..." Grant said weirded out, " as I was saying...

The four protagonists walk over to the bar where the bartender was cleaning his stacks of dirty mugs and glasses. " good morning my good man, how art thou?" Luke asked the tall moustached fellow.

"I'm fine, n' you?" The bartender replied spitting tobacco into his bucket. He wiped his mahogany bar as he talked with the new entrants. After a good ten minutes of discussion Flynn snapped. " okay, I have been polite for long enough, could you tell us the wear abouts to any fortune tellers, magic sages or anyone called Batta. "

The moustached giants face soured, turning to one of anger. Grabbing the paladin he threw him outside, the others didn't need any warning, they left immediately. Wiping the crap from his face he looked around. Off to the distance was a large dark green clothed tipi, that had a particular shadowy aura about it. " you know, I have heard of my fair share of mystical adventures, I say we go there" Luke said as they walked over.

Walking inside they saw an old gnome on top of a giant cloud filled orb.



"There must be a lot of condensation in that" Erin said

" Erin the point of this, is to be in character, think, what would a barbarian do?" Mara said to her heavily pregnant friend.

" who enters my- oh Gharn! How good it is to see you" Batta exclaimed brushing away her grey hairs as she floated towards the fat wizard. Giving each other a big hug, Batta returned to her orb. "What bring you here old friend?"

" well, we seek the staff of life, we were wondering if you could point us in the right direction. Last time we heard it was in the valley of ice." Gharn said, pulling out his flask. Batta talked for hours about the staffs history, boring Flynn to the point of exhaustion.



"Is it okay if we take a break?" Joel said, his head in his arms.

" well I guess we can, I need to visit the thinking room" grant said heading up to the bathroom.

After an awkward silence Mara piped up. " so Erin, I have heard there are many people here pregnant with multiples, I'm guessing that's not just one" mara joked as she grabbed some pretzels. With the mention of the P word Joel was back up right listening to the

" you're not wrong" Erin laughed. " I'm 8 months with 5. My due date is in a few weeks. I have to say it's refreshing to see someone not pregnant here." Joel noticed that too, why wasn't she pregnant? Morphing some magic in his hands he shot a ball of pregnant chaos magic at Mara. The magic was invisible to everyone but him as it went to Mara.

BOING!

It bounced off her! Why would it do that? The ball shot straight over to Erin.

PING!

Erin's belly filled up with another occupant." Woah" Erin said as the extra weight was added. " I um, I don't know what just happened" she said with shock. " I, I think I should see a doctor."

Brandon saw her belly grow too, remembering what happened at the mall he said " wait Erin, stop". Grabbing his amulet he placed it on Erin's belly. A blue light emanated from the amulet for a second as time slowed down. Erin stood still, with a strange look on her face until BUURRP! " oh my god, I am so sorry! acid reflux." She said rubbing her large midsection " these six have a mind of their own" she chuckled. As the two sat back down and Yarals anger grew. If he couldn't use his pregnancy magic to cause chaos, maybe there was another way... Looking down he noticed something different in the large gem of Brandon's amulet. It was completely blue now. But that wasn't all, a sliohette of a head was starting to appear.


Meanwhile at Brandon's workplace.

Tyler typed away at his computer. Everyone else had left the building, a single neon light shone above his head as he balanced budgets. Unlike past judgements, he knew a lot about keeping accounts and maintains a steady business. Sadly He knew his business wasn't going to survive if he had to support a gold digger. Not only that but no many people have been able to fund his projects, especially since "the Baby Boom" as it was being said in the news. Looking at his accounts he realised to survive the next two months he would have to cut spending on "the company car", trucks and eliminate the paid intern program. Meaning Brandon would sadly be fired. A buzz came from his cell.

she sent an image of her now incredible rack, but he had no idea about the large orb that came with it. Grabbing his keys and phone he dashed to the elevator.

Driving the company car out of the car park he sped wildly like a coyote after some kind of road bird. Taking a short cut past a children's ball park he saw the slutty hottie sitting on a bench facing the street up ahead. As he swerved around the corner he could see her in her sexy, curvaceously PREGNANT BODY!? He couldn't take his eyes off that fleshy orb, it was filling him with white hot rage! He pressed down on the gas, furious at what Brandon told him. All that sexual frustration over the past few months and for what, nothing?! Sadly for him, this wasn't going to be the last major thing to hit him tonight.

CRASH!

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Antonio threw his jacket off and slumped in front of his desk, bringing an oxygen mask to his mouth and taking in a few, deep breaths. His body relaxed in his chair as he secured the mask and turned on his computer. The genetic disease Antonio suffered from wasn't just making his arm deformed. It was taking away his stamina and strength as well. Fresh oxygen was easier for him to breathe, but he didn't dare show anyone he needed it. The only time Antonio could feel his healthiest was in the solace of his penthouse office.

Antonio tapped a panel on his desk and a low phone ring rattled throughout the room, again and again, until it stopped. He groaned and hit the same panel again and, after a few more buzzes, Rebecca's voice came through. "What's up?"

"What's up?" Antonio repeated back. "I wanted your reports on our plan to maintain the mall's financial future this evening. Do you have them?"

"Ah, right, right," Rebecca said. She was reclined on her couch in her own home, Playstation controller resting against her large belly. All around her was loose paper and other garbage she didn't bother to clean up. "I'll...get it to you soon."

"You've been very derelict in your duties lately, Ms. Quo," Antonio said. He knew Rebecca had gotten the "sloth" amulet, but he was still expecting more out of her. Unfortunately, it had already bonded to her, so there was no chance getting his top operative back until his plan came to its completion. "What about our plan to finish the energy conversion beam? Our test run earlier today went well."

"About that," Rebecca said, running a hand up and down her pale dome of maternal flesh, "I never got the details from you on what exactly you need for this plan. It looked like these necklaces have something to do with it, but...you know...what are they?"

Antonio gritted his teeth, his nostrils flaring. "That's not what I pay you to know about. Just do what I tell you or you'll be giving birth to your babies on the street."

"Whatever," Rebecca said, taking her headset off when Antonio hung up, returning to her game. She'd been curious about the finer points of Antonio's plan for a while and even thought it was a weird coincidence that both she and Catalina were pregnant while Antonio was trying to capitalize on the mall's pregnant customer base. But the thoughts quickly left her mind as she continued with her game, reaching a hand to the pizza box she had on her coffee table.

Antonio rested his head in his hands, stopping to look at his mangled hand in anger. There was a buzz at the door and Antonio took his oxygen mask off, slipping a glove back onto his deformed hand. "Come in."

Wendy walked in slowly, tablet in her hand. "Sir, we've checked flight logs and it looks like...Dr. Schultz is coming to Smallton."

"Dr. Schultz?" Antonio said, reading over her notes and observations. "I doubt he's coming to help with my efforts. He's the only other person who knows any detail about these amulets. Probably even more than I do."

"We're not sure why he's coming now, but I thought you'd want to be aware," Wendy said, her voice getting quieter and quieter.

"I'll have Rebecca on it," Antonio said, typing out a message for his lazy commando. "Anything else for me?"

"J-just one more thing," Wendy said, biting her lip. "I'm...pregnant."

----

Kim sat on a bench while police and firefighters talked to her, trying to understand what happened. "He just swerved at hit the light pole?"

"He wasn't paying attention and hit the curb, yeah," Kim sighed, looking away from the officers. She knew that, even now, they were checking out her breasts and enormous belly and, while flattered, she didn't exactly feel like being ogled today. When Grace touched Brandon's amulet, reality was rewritten in the mall and all of the pregnancies Yaral created while possessing Joel changed, so it was like no one was aware they hadn't been pregnant moments earlier.

Kim, however, was already leaving the mall and things didn't change for her. She was perfectly aware that one second, she was a flat-bellied knockout, and the next, she was a swollen, waddling octomom-to-be. Kim still hoped her looks were enough for whoever the rich guy Brandon set her up with, but evidently not.

"Is there any reason you're not...covering your pregnant stomach?" a medic asked, a hint of a sneer on his lips. "I mean...that's pretty distracting. It could have been why-"

"Look, is he going to be alright?" Kim pouted, flashing the senior detective a piercing look. "I've given you all the information I have and I'd like to go home."

"He'll live," another medic said. "Concussion, broken bones. He'll spend a few days in the hospital but that's all. We've contacted his family."

"Good," Kim said, heaving herself up and waddling away.

"E-excuse me," the detective said, chasing after her. "But did you want someone to maybe walk you home?"

Kim grinned. She knew his look. Even with the big belly, she still had the charm. "No, I'll be fine," she purred, stroking his cheek. "I've got lots of friends I can stay with."

-----

"I...attack, I guess," Erin said, shrugging. The table let out a small groan.

"C'mon, try and have fun," Brandon said with a smile, giving Erin a small nudge with his elbow.

"Hey, don't make me go into labor on you," Erin smiled back. "Okay, um, Katherine swings her broadaxe at the cave troll."

Grant rolled the die. "You miss."

"How can I just miss completely?" Erin protested, mouth full of chips and dip as her other hand rubbed her belly quickly. Brandon watched her hand with an eager glance, his face turning red. From where they were sitting around the table, only Mara and Brandon could see her full, bare belly and Mara was too focused on her own turn.

"It's okay. Just how it happens sometimes," Mara smiled. "I fire two +5 medium fire arrows at the troll's head."

Grant rolled again. "Both hits. The cave troll is defeated." He let out a little smile and turned to Mara. "G-good job."

"Thanks," Mara smiled back, her dimples showing. "But isn't the game master supposed to sound a little more impartial?"

"I say we continue on," Joel said, crossing his arms. When the rest were playing, they were distracted enough for him to try and impregnate Mara again. After nearly half a day of possessing another person, as well as the beer he'd foolishly drank, Yaral was losing control over Joel's body. He needed some more chaos in his vicinity, and quickly, or he'd have no choice but to leave before he can get more information about Brandon and his amulet.

"You press on and come to a fork," Grant said. "Two passages. What do you do?"

As the rest looked at the game map, Yaral sent another surge of energy at Mara. Again, nothing happened to her while Erin's belly surged with its seventh occupant. "W-what the?" Erin said, wrapping both hands around as much of her belly as she could. It was beginning to tilt the table. Brandon was looking at his texts when the surge happened, and in a frenzy, he put the phone down on the table and touched his amulet to her belly. A blue glow filled the room again and Erin's look of surprise turned to calm. "Sorry, lot of kicking again I guess."

"I've never felt a pregnant belly," Mara said, reaching a hand out. "M-may I?"

"Of course," Erin smile, turning to show Mara her enormous belly. "Don't let the size scare you." Mara let out a little laugh and felt Erin's belly, letting out a few quiet gasps. Erin liked having someone else feel her belly for once. With seven babies, she couldn't rub all of it, after all.

Brandon's phone buzzed on the table and Erin looked in time to see the text. <Tyler's in the hospital. We'll be seeing a lot more of each other in the next few days >

"Who is this?" Erin said, turning to Brandon with a worried expression.

"N-no one," Brandon said, gulping. Erin snatched the phone away and texted the same question. In a few seconds, a reply came back, with a picture of Clara's pregnant belly attached.

<It's not my daughter, in case you can't keep your bellies apart. Let's finish what we started tomorrow>

Erin's hands began to shake. "Brandon...I..."

"It's chaos, but not nearly enough," Joel complained, giving Mara one last shot of pregnant energy. And again, only Erin got bigger, now at octuplet proportions. "Ugh, this is vexing."

"H-here, let me..." Brandon said, trying to touch his amulet to Erin's belly, only to be slapped away by Erin. As she slapped it away, Yaral saw a blue flash again, but in addition to reality being rewritten, the silhouette he saw before leaped from Brandon's amulet and vanished, passing through the walls in an instant.

"So that's why," Joel nodded, a cackling grin on his lips. "Sister...you finally show up."

"All you care about is...is bellies!" Erin said, face bright red. "You only liked me...because I was pregnant. Any pregnant woman turns you on and you'll fuck whoever you can!"

"T-that's not true!" Brandon protested. "I love you, Erin! I always have!"

"Maybe we should go," Mara whispered to Grant. Unknown to anyone else in the room, Mara had ovarian cancer when she was young and, while she had a clean bill of health now, she was infertile. If the amulet was rewriting reality, it wouldn't have mattered, but Yaral was focused on causing sudden, non-rewritten pregnancies, so Mara was unaffected. And the energy when to the only womb available: Erin's.

"Maybe you're right," Grant said, slinking out slowly, with Joel not far behind them.

"Thank you for your hospitality!" he barked. "This has been very...illustrative!" He let out a demonic laugh as he slammed the door, leaving Brandon and Erin alone.
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: What happened to Antonio and Rebecca?

choices: Check up on Sarah and Katie's nights
Follow the women of the country club
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Catalina waddled around her apartment, one hand consoling the babies kicking inside her naked belly, the other scrolling through her phone, deleting contacts. "I can't believe I slept with you," she said after each one, scoffing. "I'm famous now. I deserve much, much better." She peered down at her round, coffee-colored belly, with her full, equally-naked breasts resting on top. "Well, it might be a while before I get any action with this big ball. The fans think it's cute but...I don't know if they really think it's sexy."

Before the amulet changed reality around, Catalina was a rising but still largely unknown celebrity and model. Now, as the first actress to star in movies while several massively pregnant, her cache skyrocketed and she was on the path toward real success. But Catalina knew she wasn't there yet and pressured her agent to get her into bigger and better projects before her belly — her cash cow — went away. Catalina was certain sticking around the Smallton mall wasn't going to land her any blockbusters.

Catalina's phone rang and she picked it up with glee, happy to see her agent calling her. "Hello Maurice," Catalina purred. "Any luck on getting me cast as Black Cat in the next Marvel movie?"

"N-no, the studio still doesn't want a pregnant superhero, as many times as I've asked," her agent coughed. "But I've got some other news you might find...interesting."

"Well, out with it," Catalina huffed, crossing her arms. Why hadn't she fired this little man yet?

"I don't know how but your movies from your, let's say, former career have been sold," Maurice said.

"What, Freddy vs. Jason 2? I don't care about tha-" Catalina said, stopping when she realized what career Maurice was referring to. "Are you sure?"

"Very," Maurice said. "I pulled a lot of strings to confirm this. I even got a security guard to show me the tape. Catalina, if this gets out-"

"No," Catalina said, pacing around. "No, this might be good. I knew Antonio had one copy on hold as blackmail. This might be my chance to get my hands on the last piece of my past in porn and destroy it. If he or she wanted to buy Catalina porn, then I should be able to...seduce them and persuade them to hand it over," she smiled, admiring herself in the mirror. "Send me everything you have on the person who bought them.

----

Janice was grunting and growling, swinging her barbells around with vigor. There were so many things she was mad about. For one, the device she hung from to do her vertical sit-ups was no longer supporting her weight. It was as if she wasn't pregnant with sextuplets yesterday! Janice was also angry as she thought about how the mall had screwed her pregnant yoga and fitness classes out of money. Since Sarah and Katie presented their ideas for improving their businesses, she'd thought more and more about the mysterious owner of the mall and his bullshit policies to funnel money into his pockets.

But most of all, Janice was mad about Joel. That little twerp...okay, that tall twerp had knocked her up with sextuplets and didn't say a peep to her. And when Janice ran into Joel at the mall today, he acted so strange and had the nerve to touch her belly! If he wants to act like these are his babies, he needs to go the full mile.

Dropping her weights with a loud thud, Janice let out a long sigh. She was a yoga teacher; she was supposed to be able to meditate and be calm. But she had a wrathful energy building up inside her she couldn't extinguish. So, instead of letting it go to waste, Janice waddled to her computer and started contacting every business in the mall that even remotely dealt with pregnancy. If Katie wanted a business alliance, Janice was going to give it to her.

---

"Do you see me as anything other than a big belly?" Erin said to Brandon, trying to cover her belly with her arms. "A big belly and maybe a nice pair of T&A?"

"Erin, please," Brandon begged. "I've loved you since before you were pregnant! I think you're funny, you're smart, you're cool. I like being around you."

Erin scoffed. "And you liked being around her too?" Erin said, pointing to Brandon's pocket where he put his phone back. "And her...her daughter, she said? Let me guess: she's pregnant too."

"No!" Brandon said. "I mean...yes, and yeah, I like pregnant women. You know that. But there's a difference between just lust and love. And since I've been with you, I don't lust after other women."

"I don't believe that," Erin said, shaking her head. "That's not what your text sounded like. How long have you been sleeping with her?"

"I didn't have sex with Clara!" Brandon said. "I did whatever I could to get out of it."

"Oh, you didn't have sex with Clara," Erin said, rolling her eyes. "Just Clara, then. Her daughter, though." Brandon paused and Erin's eyes went big. "Oh my god...you didn't actually...oh my god." Tears began to fall down her cheeks.

"I was cornered and...it was an accident!" Brandon said, holding his hands up.

"I don't believe this," Erin said, holding her hands to her mouth. "Do you know how many guys have hit on me? I didn't do anything because I thought we were...a couple."

"We are!" Brandon said, reaching his hand into his pocket. "Look, you can call them yourself and hear the truth." As Brandon pulled out his phone, Grace's phone number fell out. Erin gasped and bent down slowly, groaning with her pregnant weight, taking the number off the ground. Brandon was paralyzed with fear and shame and couldn't move.

"One of them?" Erin said, lips trembling.

"No, it's not," Brandon said.

"O-oh, it's just a third woman," Erin said, letting out a frustrated laugh. "Pregnant too?"

"Erin, please-"

"This is...this is worse than when I found out I was going to be pregnant and single," Erin said, hands rubbing her belly slowly. "Sorry to rub and turn you on, but they're kicking. They kick when I get worried. They weigh a ton, they press on my bladder, and they kick when I'm trying to sleep." Erin's tears started to flow again. "B-but you know what?...this is the first time I haven't wished you were the father. Goodbye, Brandon."

"Erin!" Brandon said, stepping forward only to get a slap in the face.

"I said goodbye," Erin said, turning around and waddling up the stairs. When the door was closed behind her, her tears really began to flow and she headed for her car as quickly as she could, heading for any drive-through fast food on the way home.

Brandon stood in dismay downstairs for a few minutes before lazily cleaning up the table and snacks. His heart was on the floor in absolute tatters. And worst of all: it wasn't just a misunderstanding. He'd faltered with Kristina because she was sexy and wanted him. Brandon wasn't exactly used to women "wanting him," and it was just his luck that they were all turning out to be pregnant.

Once the room was clean, Brandon trudged back upstairs, washing his face and brushing his teeth before walking to his room. The light was still on under Sarah's room but she'd also put up the "Working: Do Not Disturb" sign, so he couldn't go to her for consoling. Then, he heard a voice from down the hall. "Brandon?"

He crept into his mother's room, seeing Ashley still sitting up in bed, hand on her enormous bare pregnant belly. Brandon didn't remember it being this big, but at the moment, he didn't care. "Yeah, mom?"

Mom Ashley shuddered a little, knowing she wanted to tell Brandon the truth soon. But maybe midnight wasn't the best time. "Can't sleep, honey?"

"I dunno," Brandon sighed.

"C'mere," Ashley said, waving a hand. Brandon walked over and Ashley gave a little smile. "Well you're not going to sleep with your street clothes on. Put on your pajamas." Brandon gulped. He took of his jeans, jacket, and shoes, leaving just his t-shirt and underwear. Ashley gave another soft smile and patted the other side of the bed. Luckily she and Tanner bought a big enough bed so when she slept on her side, there was still room behind her back.

Cautiously, Brandon slipped in beside his mother, facing her back. Ashley, without looking, reached over and took Brandon's hand and held it against her belly, before taking the covers and bringing it over both of them.

"There, feel more comfortable?" Ashley whimpered.

"Mmhmm," Brandon choked out, his body pressed against the back of a hugely pregnant woman he knew as his mother. Of course, Ashley no longer saw him as just her adoptive son. She saw him as...Brandon.

"M-me too," Ashley said. "Now we can both sleep tight." Ashley closed her eyes, tracing her fingers against Brandon's, loving the feel of his touch against her motherly bulge. She didn't have any underwear she could fit into around her hips, but with the size of her belly and ass, she knew Brandon wouldn't be able to notice.

Neither of them were particularly calm, both of their hearts racing like crazy for slightly different reasons. Brandon let his hands rub and feel small stretches of Ashley's decaplet belly. He couldn't lie to himself: he loved his mother's belly and being close to her like this was...exhilarating. With every baby added to her belly, her beauty grew and grew. And she was gorgeous before the amulets even showed up. Taking in a deep breath of her hair and skin, Brandon let his eyelids settle, pressing against Ashley a little more as the two slept, wrapped in a pregnancy-centric embrace.

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
It was quiet in the Page house at 1 in the morning. Tanner slept comfortably in the guest room, Brandon and Ashley were in the same bed, sleeping heavily but in Sarah's room, Sarah was planning with Katie to take down Antonio and his mall.

"You know, I did come across this device in one of the restaurants, it could give us enough power to fuel EVERYTHING. If I grab a crowbar from the shed, plus some other things I have created, I'm sure we can grab it. " Sarah whispered as she grabbed her extra large coat.

"Sounds like a plan, but what about the security cameras?" Katie questioned, trying to put together a makeshift toga from one of Sarah's blankets.

"that's where this bad boy comes in." Sarah said pulling out a black spherical orb with wires attached to it. " before I started working on pregnancy inventions, I made a series of interesting gadgets. This one helps businesses restart their circuitry with a massive and incredibly short power gigajolt to the wiring if there was a power outage or a black out. If I hook this up to a generator, the power in the street will go out."

"Excellent, now how will this help us?" Katie said as they snuck out of the room and down the stairs.

"Well that's simple, we hook this up to the electrical generator on the street and Boom! Power outage for a long time." Sarah said as they left the house and took the crowbar and torches from the shed. Looking at the cars they realised the only car they could take was Tanners Rangerover. After 20 minutes they found the keys and got in the car. Sarah being the smaller one drove with the seat back at maximum. Katie pushed the passenger seat down, squeezed into the back door and placed her gargantuan belly on chair in front of her.

-----

Leaving Burger Queens drive through, Erin parked and gobbled down 2 of her 6 burgers in record time. Wiping her mouth she brought the cola up to her fuller cheeks to take a sip. "How could he" was the only thing going on in her mind, she needed to distract herself. She ate and ate, downing the next burger and the one after that, plus the fries.

Drowning the food with more drink she looked in the mirror. Staring back was a larger than ever pregnant woman, all that food she had been eating was going straight to her thighs, butt, belly and breasts. Her face and arms somehow looked like they did before she became pregnant. " maybe it's because I have gained all this stupid weight... He probably wants some slutty skinny bitch who is pregnant"

Erin's emotions were like a typhoon. At one point she was upset, then depressed, now a large burgeoning rage poured upon her. Funnelling down the last two burgers she went to start the car.

Nothing

She tried again to start it up.

Nothing again...

On the third time she pushed it too far and flooded the engine. " god damn it!" She angrily yelled punching the wheel, setting the air bag off. Luckily her breasts took most of the impact. Coming to she used her still delicate fingers to fish for her phone in her purse. " mum, can you pick me up? "

Ten minutes later

Louisa turned up in a taxi, asked the taxi man to wait and waddled to Erin's car. Erin was shocked by how her mum looked. Her clothes remained as pristine as ever, but her hair was incredibly dirty, her face had smears of mud and her body looked like she had swam through a swamp. Louisa saw Erin with her arms over the deflated airbag and tear stained makeup " are you okay honey?" She asked sympathetically.

" I could say the same thing about you" Erin said, curious as to how her mother was looking the way she was now. Grabbing her things, she squeezed herself out of the car and waddled over to embrace her mum. They locked the car and took the taxi home. On the way Erin started to tear up again, grabbing tissues from her bag she sobbed to her mother " mum, why are men jerks?"

" oh honey, they aren't, they are just idiots" Louisa said putting her arm around her massively pregnant daughter. " why? What did Brandon do?"

" oh it's just the worst, he has been so unfaithful" Erin said as she blew into her tissue. Stuffing it into her bra, she brushed up against her amulet.

PING!

" I mean, this whole pregnancy business has been such a tricky mess" Erin continued to cry as Louisa's belly expanded with an extra occupant.

" oh honey, I'm sorry. Brandon is a very busy man, but he is an arse, don't worry about him, the only thing that matters is that you are here, safe with mum." Louisa said, getting angry at Brandon. "Look, how about we stay up, drinking tea and Talking about how stupid men can be? I mean, being this heavily pregnant, it's not like we are going to have that much sleep, are we?" Going home they spent the night in the living room talking, with tea.

-----

Back in Tanners car Sarah and Katie headed straight to the restaurant district. " wait, how heavy is this thing?" Katie asked Sarah, whom now just remembered the incredible size of the thing.

"Frap, do you know where we can get a forklift?" Sarah questioned as she let out a large sigh.

"I know just the place" Katie said directing her through town.

------

Tanner's car zoomed through the somewhat empty city, the only place open was "DUALSHOCK" the geekiest gaming bar in town. Joel, Grant and Mara went there after things went down hill at the Page house. Joel was talking to Mara about who would win in a fight between Hercules and Kratos. " listen here mortal, I swear, I, I, oh god" Joel said as the alcohol took it's final effects on Yarals mind. He felt trapped, caught in a bear trap, he needed out, HE NEEDED OUT!!! " I, am, out" was all Yaral could say before leaving Joel's head and escaping to the night. Joel collapsed onto the ground, unconscious. " help! Help!" Grant said as Mara tried to read a pulse.

-----

Driving up close to the mall the two walked into the mall's delivery zone. 2 factory workers walked inside leaving the forklift out in the open with the keys in the ignition. " finally a stroke of luck" Sarah said grinning.

Sneaking over was taxing for Katie, that decatuplet belly was really straining her. Sarah handed Katie the robo spine, then got behind the stearing wheel. " aaand attached, HEY WHOA" katie yelled as Sarah pushed a lever, causing the forklift to lift up her belly. Quickly she jumped on top of her belly, making herself comfortable. " I guess you can go now." She said not realising in her position she was flashing the world her ghetto sized pale booty. Madly they drove out before the two lady workers came back.

"Katie, do you see if they followed us?" Sarah said lifting her up so she could look over the forklift. As she did so Katie's makeshift toga was caught on a passing branch.

"Nothing, hey, what the?" Katie said alarmed as the silk sheets were torn from her body. Her breasts flew free, turning Sarah on. " hey go back!

"Chilly tonight?" Sarah said laughing " I'm sorry, I can't, if I get off now, the forklift will flip under your pressure." Katie gave her a furious look and tried to swipe at her. " hey! Relax, there is no one here! Don't worry, the restaurant will have sheets.

The two made it to the street. Lowering Katie, Sarah grabbed her blackout device and hooked it up to the generator. Pressing the green button the energy flowed through at an incredible rate. The generator and the entire street blacked out in seconds. the electronic doors to all places opened. "Wow for such high class places they have such bad security." Katie said, waddling naked through the darkness with Sarah.

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Antonio collapsed onto his wheelchair, the oxygen mask on. Moving over to the window he looked out at the empire he built over the past nine months. It's funny how quickly they were able to build, almost irregular. Looking at the time he realised how long he made his scientists work. Picking up his phone with his good hand he called his right hand man. " yes sir?" Bills voice came from the other side.

" I *COUGH**COUGH*** realise you guys have been putting in a lot of hard effort and time."The weapon should be ready for testing tomorrow, let your lab assistants know they are free to go home. Oh, and can you check up on Petissiyum on your way *CCOOUUGH** home? I just want to make sure it's all locked up, take some knock out gas there if anything goes wrong."

"Understood" Bill said, hanging up. Turning to the large laboratory he said " okay, you guys have worked for long enough now, boss says it's home time, take tomorrow off, I can do tests on my own". He collected his belongings from his locker and switched off the main lights as he and his lab partners left the facility.

-----

Half way up the restaurant district our two pregnant heroines found " Petissiyum". The same place Sarah found the device. They easily opened up the place without triggering any alarms. Everything was offline. Walking through Katie found a large sheet to cover up her breasts. She found another for her backside. They continued past the kitchen and into the supply area.

Bill Jobson parked his car outside the restaurant district. There was no light what so ever, it was darker than a trip to Isengard. Grabbing a torch and his gas canister, he put on a gas mask and walked down the shadowy district of open restaurants. Looking into Petissiyum, he saw torch lights moving through the kitchen. Turning off his torch he snuck in and readied his canister. As he neared closer he stuck to the shadows and pulled the pin and threw the can into the room our two pregnant heroines were sneaking.

There it stood, the menacing machine looked like it would need twenty people to lift it. " I'll grab the forklift and we can- wait, what smells funny" Sarah said as she started getting drowsy. " Im afraid it's past your bed time ladies" came a voice from the shadows. Bill revealed himself from the shadowy areas as Sarah and Katie collapsed on the ground in a matter of seconds. " say goodnight" Bill said smirking.

Morning for other characters
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Sarah opened her eyes as she felt herself being bumped and shaken awake. She moved one hand to her belly to discover that it wasn't coming from her babies. Well, not exclusively from her babies. There was always at least one kicking around in Sarah's womb at any given time. But as Sarah felt soft light wash across her face over and over again, she figured out where she was: in the back of a van with Katie resting against her.

"Katie," Sarah said, nudging her companion a bit. "Katie wake up." Katie let out a low moan but didn't stir much. Sarah knew how she felt. As she tried to move around, there wasn't much Sarah could do and she still felt tired and groggy as sleep beckoned back to her. The last thing she could remember was looking at the inner paneling of the energy device in Antonio's compound, then falling asleep. "Must have been...some sort of tranquilizer," Sarah mumbled, trying to get to her feet. Sarah's pregnancy robospine increased her body's ability greatly, not only making it easier to lug around such a heavy pregnant belly, but also giving her some resistance to the sleep-inducing gas. But not much. At least she managed to wake up before...Sarah shuddered at the thought of wherever she and Katie were being taken. The last time Antonio help Sarah captive, it was not a pleasant experience.

Sarah looked around the van's interior, understanding its designs and mechanisms quickly. She shook loose some paneling and exposed the wiring. With a quick pull, she disconnected them and the van began to sputter and slow down. Sarah could hear the driver curse in the front. It was only a matter of time before he walked around to get them.

"Katie, hurry and get up!" Sarah said, scurrying on her knees to unlock the back door. In her condition, the element of surprise was all she could hope for if she wanted to escape. "We need to be ready to make a run for it!"

"Mmm, Ashley, you're so loud," Katie slurred, a coy smile forming on her lips. "I barely touched you there." Sarah felt her envy burn in her chest again as she heard Katie continue to go on about Sarah's mother. That split-second distraction prevented Sarah from taking her weight off the door when Bill opened it and her pregnant weight knocked the wiry scientist over.

"Easy now, easy!" Bill yelled, getting up and holding one hand out at Sarah, keeping the other hand by his hip. "Just get back in the van and no one gets hurt!"

"Get in the van?" Sarah said, holding one hand to her head. She was on the verge of passing out again and stumbled toward Bill. Being the coward that he is, Bill yelped and pulled out his weapon, firing a shot at Sarah.

Or so he thought. Antonio had Bill working on two inventions over the past days: one was a device built from the gem from Catalina's amulet to make it easier to make people pregnant. The other was a new, non-lethal weapon to incapacitate attackers, hopefully cornering the market on tasers and giving Antonio another source of wealth. Bill took the wrong weapon with him and instead of a stunning burst, he fired a blast of pure pregnancy energy at Sarah.

Instantly, she doubled over, gasping as her belly swelled. Her clothes, which only held onto her preposterous size by a thread of elastic, gave out, snapping and ripping as her belly, breasts, and ass reached incredible proportions. The discharge from Bill's weapon added to Sarah's belly immensely, making her pregnant with 15 babies. Her moans grew and grew as the robospine stopped being able to compensate for her size, making her knees wobble along with the rest of her.

But it didn't stop there. Bill's weapon was vastly inferior to Sarah's own similar device and it exploded in his hands. A shockwave of pregnant energy spread across the city, affecting those closest to its epicenter the most strongly. That was bad news for Katie, who was in the van just behind Sarah. The swelling in her belly snapped her awake and she moaned loudly, feeling five more babies appear in her womb. What little of her body was actually covered by her makeshift toga was on display to the world now as Katie nearly rolled out of the van, running her hand under her gigantic, 15-baby belly for support.

"Run!" Sarah yelped, trying to waddle away as best she could. The robospine might not have negated her pregnancy, but it at least reduced the weight to more like a twin pregnancy than a 15-baby one. Katie was not so lucky, barely making it a few steps before succumbing to her pregnant weight and drug-enduced lethargy. Bill cursed again, reaching his non-burned hand for Katie.

"You're the one the boss wants," he growled, stopping when police sirens blared. Bill ran off, leaving the sabotaged van behind. The police cruiser nearly followed him, but stopped when the driver saw Sarah and Katie. Officer McCulley stepped out, one hand resting on her prominent pregnant bulge which had recently tripled in size.

"You two alright?" she said, chewing her gum with care.

"W-we're fine," Sarah gulped. "Our baby shower went a little...crazy."

"Looks like it," Officer McCulley said, looking right at Katie and her toga. "Say, did you both...just feel your bellies grow? I was only carrying one in here until a few seconds ago, poof, triplets doing a jig on my bladder."

His device must not have included a reality shift Sarah thought, a little happy that she could build a better pregnancy weapon. "Y-yes it did. Officer, can you drive us home?"

Officer McCulley sighed and smiled. "Guess I can empathize with you two. If you can fit in my car, I'll give you both a ride home."

-----

Brandon was sitting in his kitchen. Except it wasn't his kitchen. It was enormous and ornate and magnificent. One familiar sight was Ashley humming as she cooked in front of the stove, although she wasn't wearing anything but an apron and underwear.

"Ready for breakfast?" she said sweetly, turning around to face Brandon. But her voice wasn't the same motherly tone as usual. It was more...familiar. She also had a more intrigued curl to her lips than before. Brandon had never seen his mother like this. Just as he was processing her alluring face, his eyes moved to her colossal belly and he couldn't believe it. She was much, much bigger than he remembered her with 10 babies. What was going on?

"Mom, I told you," Sarah scoffed, walking into the kitchen in a blazer and pinstripe pants. Her outfit was tailored to allow her own big belly, just as big as Brandon remembered, to stick out bare and proud. "I'm the CEO of PregTech. We can afford a maid to do these kinds of things."

"Oh no, no one can cook for Brandon but me," Ashley cooed.

"And me. Don't be selfish," Sarah pouted.

"Of course, of course," Ashley smiled. "We share him. Isn't that right, Brandon?"

He was already running out the door, only to bump into the bellies of Katie, Janice, and Catalina, all of them smiling at him.

"Hello Brandon," Janice said. "Good morning, though we all know you had a good night."

"What's that supposed to mean?" Brandon choked.

"Oh, come on now," Katie said, rolling her eyes. "If I was with Ashley every night, the woman who tests PregTech's pregnancy enhancements, I know how my nights would be. Look at the position you're in."

"W-what position?" Brandon yelled. He was getting scared. This was all too real.

"Really now?" Catalina smiled, holding Brandon's chin. "Honey, just open your eyes to see."

Brandon jolted awake, just in time to see Ashley move to sit on the edge of the bed, stretching her arms above her head and giving out a little peep that Brandon had to admit was...cute. Without making any noise, Brandon watched his pregnant mother stand up and stretch her belly out, the light from the blinds illuminating her like the work of art she was. Brandon could see much of her bare belly and even parts of her cleavage. But what nearly made him cry out was seeing that all night, Ashley hadn't worn any underwear, as evidenced by her naked, plentiful ass right in his range of vision.

"Oh, Brandon," Ashley smiled, turning around to face him. "I didn't wake you, did I?"

"N-na," Brandon managed to get out. Ashley smiled more gently, running her hands up and down her belly.

I've got to tell him today Ashley said, sensing today was the best day to tell Brandon he wasn't her biological son. Whether she would include the ways she'd been thinking about him lately...she wasn't sure. "Brandon, do I look...bigger to you?"

"B-bigger?" Brandon sputtered, holding his blanket close to conceal his erection.

"My belly feels heavier and I think there's more movement inside me," Ashley sighed, looking at her hugeness. "Could you get your sister? I need a second opinion."

Brandon nodded quickly and wrapped the bedsheet around him, going to Sarah's door. Officer McCulley brought her back in the middle of the night without disturbing anyone before taking Katie to her own apartment, so when Sarah heard her door begin to open, she slowly sat up, glaring at Brandon.

"Are you peeping on me now?" she snorted.

"N-no!" Brandon said, face flushing. "Mom just wants your help. She thinks she's...bigger."

"Bigger, huh?" Sarah sighed, turning over in bed to reveal her own gigantic, bare, 15-baby belly. "Well, tell her I think I've got bad news: she is bigger."
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: A confusing start to the day

choices: Check back in at the Page house
Follow more characters' mornings?
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Erin grumbled as she woke up, running her hands on her bare, octuplet belly. Not only did she not fully fit in her bed, due to her immense size, but she was incredibly hungry. It made sense: with eight babies inside her womb, the gluttony of her amulet was greatly multiplied.

Before she could get move, a tray with breakfast was placed on top of her bed and Erin looked up to see Louisa's smiling face. "Mom?"

"Good morning, dear," Louisa said. "After your night, I thought you'd appreciate some breakfast in bed."

"Aw, you didn't have to," Erin said, shifting in bed slightly. With just an adjustment of a few inches, her colossal belly knocked over her tray and Erin scrambled to catch all the plates, snatching a few loose pieces of food in her mouth on the way.

"Seems I did," Louisa chuckled, heaving her own impressive pregnant weight down so she could sit by her daughter. "Feeling any better this morning?"

"No," Erin sighed. "I mean...I dunno. I really liked Brandon, Mom. When I was with him, it was...it was like no one had ever treated me that way before." She coughed out a little laugh and put one hand on her belly. "I guess I know why now. You were right about the Page family."

"I don't know if that's fair," Louisa sighed, running her hands through her daughter's hair.

"It is. That whole family is pregnancy-obsessed," Erin scoffed. "That's the only reason he showed me any affection, you know. He likes the bellies."

"You're just feeling upset right now, honey. It's normal," Louisa said, petting her daughter a bit more. Still, her words made Louisa stumble a little. The Page boy is turned on by pregnancy? I guess there has to be someone. Douglass certainly doesn't care for it. "If you want, I do know...something that can get your mind off of all this business with the men in your life."

"I'll do anything, Mom," Erin said, shaking her head. Louisa took a big sigh and ran her hand up and down her belly.

"Well, you know my 'Book Club' at the country club?" Louisa asked. Erin gave a little nod. "Well, we don't typically talk about books. We gossip over drinks. But now that we've all got babies on the way, we've had to find a new outlet. The women and I, we-"

"Mama," Brody, Louisa's younger son, chirped, walking up to Erin's bed. "Mama, I wanna go to the library."

"Brody, in a few minutes," Louisa smiled sweetly.

"We're already late, Mama!" Louisa frowned and looked at her watch.

"Damn, I forgot," Louisa said, getting up slowly and waddling toward the door. "I've got to take Brody to his reading circle at the library." She turned and winked at her daughter. "I'm sure there's a lot more reading going on there than at my meetings."

"Wait, Mom," Erin said, managing to get herself out of bed and waddling. Brody's jaw dropped as he looked back at his pregnant sister.

"Erin! You're so big!" he blurted. Brandon's amulet rewrote reality so Brody was used to having a sister pregnant with octuplets, but he'd never seen her bare belly at this size before. Louisa grabbed him by the back of the shirt and hurried Brody out of the room, scolding him for being rude. It was a little too late, though: it was the birth of a future pregnancy fetishist.

Erin pushed her hands into her back and moaned. "Great, now what?" Erin never had all that many friends, with her family's wealth driving most people away. But luckily, amid the chaos of last night's D&D game, Erin managed to make one new girlfriend. Bending and gasping to get at her phone, Erin called Mara up to organize a get-together.

"Sounds fun!" Mara said on the other end. Deep down, she was just happy to hang out with such a massively pregnant woman, always curious about what the experience was like. "Park or mall?"

"I haven't been to the mall in a while," Erin said. "That sounds good. Besides..." she looked down at her massive, fertile size. "I think I need some new clothes and the best maternity store for miles is there." Erin hung up and looked at her belly for a few seconds. "Wait a minute...am I...bigger?"

----

The radio started playing the top 40 pop hits as Kim groaned, reaching one arm over to hit her alarm clock off. Moving her hand back to her midsection, Kim saw that what happened yesterday was not just a vivid nightmare. She was still pregnant with what felt like 20 brats but in reality was only nine very active fetuses. Thanks to Bill's weapon exploding, the pregnancy energy shockwave added one more mouth to feed inside her bloated middle, without Kim's knowledge. Slowly, Kim sat up in bed, spreading her legs to accommodate her incredible size.

Kim went over the positives and negatives in her head. There were no stretch marks and her unnatural tan had now become a nice glow. Her tits managed to grow a few cup sizes too. And the way things were going in the city, it wasn't like she was the only woman with a huge pregnant belly.

The first negative was pretty obvious: she was pregnant. Soon (and very soon, by the looks of her), Kim would have to give birth and be a mother to eight babies at once. Another sharp kick made Kim rethink that "eight" number. Kim also hated the "pregnant look." It was bad enough when her best friend got a bun in the oven, but now Kim would have to look at her own enormous belly all day and all night too. Plus, Kim would now need a whole new wardrobe, even if was just her underwear.

A new thought and potential positive entered Kim's mind. This belly didn't have to be a burden. At least not for her alone. Tanner should have to support her. She was fucking him and his wife had a belly the size of a moon too. Hell, maybe this weird jumbo-pregnancy took a while to show up and Kim had been pregnant with Tanner's babies all along.

She swung her legs over the side of the bed and picked up her phone, calling Tanner while she looked (or dare she say, admired) her pregnant body in one of her many full-body mirrors that made for such good selfies.

On the Page family sofa, while Sarah and Ashley were discovering one another's new "sizes," Tanner groaned and reached for his phone. "Hello?"

"Hey handsome," Kim purred. "I think you should come see me today. And soon."

"It's not a great time," Tanner said, bringing his voice down as he looked up the staircase. "My wife knows and...I think my kids know too."

"You've got more kids to worry about than just those two D-listers," Kim sighed. "Come over, because if you thought your wife was big, well..."

Tanner nearly dropped the phone as his face lost all color. He opened his rapidly drying mouth. "I-I-I'll be over s-soon."

----

Rebecca let out a loud groan as she threw her blanket off. "Fine! I'll pick up!" She picked up her buzzing phone and put it up to her ear. "What?"

"That's no way to talk to your employer," Antonio said stoically on the other end. "Unless you no longer wish to work for me."

"No, no, it's fine, I'm sorry," Rebecca sighed, wrapping her covers back around her, looking curiously down at her pregnant body as her cover no longer covered as much as it used to. Did she get bigger? "What's up?"

Antonio sighed. "We had a break-in last night. Wasn't security one of your concerns?"

"Right, right...well, what did they take?" Rebecca said, reaching for some cold pizza near her bed.

"Nothing, thanks to one of our other researchers. We got lucky, but we can't find him," Antonio said. "I'm at the restaurant now. Come over here now."

"Sure, yeah," Rebecca said, hanging up and looking around for some clothes. After less than a second of searching, Rebecca sniffed the outfit she fell asleep in. "Good enough."

Back in the lab hidden in Antonio's restaurant, he admired his device that turned pregnancies into energy. "Killing two birds with one stone, Mr. Greene?" Wendy said, hands crossed behind her back.

"Absolutely. We'll get to make sure the laser still works and I'll give Rebecca some much needed punishment," Antonio smiled.

"And...did you think at all about what I told you?" Wendy said, putting one hand on top of her soft bulge.

Antonio stood speechless for a few seconds, gazing at one of his most impressive inventions.

"Let's focus on making sure business at the mall runs smoothly today," he said. "No time to discuss...personal matters."

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
The sun rose on another day at St. Paul's hospital. Doctors had just finished life saving surgery on Tyler Cegill, one Joel Sagan was in a coma with what could only be suspected as either an unnatural event, or alcohol poisoning and in the waiting room were 30 pregnant women believing their pregnancies had been alerted some how. And now to cap off this hectic start to the day, leading news reporter Ray Roberts pulls in with his cameras to talk about this "baby boom".

Ray strided through into the waiting room. It was fairly packed. Every woman except for Erin and Lousia was there, trying to book an appointment for their "sudden burst". " come on guys, we have a day of pregnancy to film, let's see if we can handle it better than they do!" Ray said putting on his fake smile and walking up to the counter. A heavily pregnant Indian woman shot up at the sight on the almost Disney-prince-handsomeness that he bore. "Oh my god! IT'S RAY ROBERTS!" She squeezed in a high pitched tone. Instantly, well, slowly everyone struggled to get up, then waddled over to Ray. Ray could see he large swarm close in on him quickly.

Thinking on his feet he called out "who wants autographs?" . Hands shot up in the air. Grabbing one of his many markers from his jacket he started signing peoples belongings until one very attractive cheerleader asked " could you please kiss my belly instead? I don't know when I would get a chance like this again." Ray looked down at her triplet filled belly. " you're legal right?" He muttered " I mean, sure, why not!" He said getting on his knees and kissing and rubbing the belly. The crowd awed as the lips touched the tanned surface.

People started showing up revealing their bellies, sending Ray over the edge. Pulling out moistening creme he gave his lips a layer of moisturiser before kissing and signing every, single, belly, there. " kiss belly, shake hand, kiss belly shake hand, kiss belly, kiss hand, shake belly, shake hand" he said doing exactly what he was saying. By the end of it, he either shook of kissed everyone's belly. Out of breath he lay on the ground, panting. The camera man looked down and asked him, " yo mate, do yah still wanna film now? Ooorrr should we uuhhhh, take 5?"

Bringing up his hand to signal five, he collapsed.

------

In L ward, Joel lay in his coma as rant patiently waited by his side. When grant had to get a lung transplant, Joel waited with him, night and day, except for uni and work of course. They had been friends longer than when Brandon came to school. This was the second time they faced danger, the first time was when they got in a bar fight with an old bully, Michael and his girlfriend Amy. There was a knock at the door. " hello?" Came a feminine voice. " come in" said grant, hoping for a sexy nurse to come in. He was wrong. Grace, the lovely woman that gave Brandon her number came inside. Looking at that enormous belly, Grant sighed. " oh finally, a room without other large bellies." Grace said popping herself down on the chair on the other side of the room. " I mean, you may think I look great with all this" she motioned to her spectacular face " but being pregnant is hard work. It's good to not talk about it with someone"

Hmmm, Grant thought, she is different, " so, what do you do?"

" men, atleast I would if I had a boyfriend. Haha, I was working here at the hospital as a nurse until my maternity leave started. 8 oh, wait, 9 babies is the real work." She said rubbing her massive middle. She didn't know how that extra one didn't make it into there.

" I see. I am currently studying biology at Whitman University, it's fantastic. My friend Brandon has been there studying engineering, we've had a great holiday but next week it's back to work." Grant said, adjusting his glasses.

" you guys go to Whitman?" Erin said almost jumping out of her chair. " I have always wanted to go! I actually was going to go there to study psychology until these guys came into the picture" Erin looked at her belly. How much chaos had it put into her world? Not only pregnant, but octuples!? She let out a defeated sigh.

" what's wrong?" Grant asked, curious as to what she was thinking.

" I just want to know why, why all this happened. One stage you are a highly respected nurse that's going to start studying psychology, next thing you are 8 months pregnant with 8, sigh, 9 bastards"

" if only they slept as well as my friend here" Grant said chuckling.

" wait, I know that guy, I bumped into him at the mall. Twice" Erin pondered as she waddled over to his bed. Hmm, something doesn't seem right."

" what's wrong?" Grant said scratching his head.

" his brain is different, look." Erin said showing grant an X-ray of his head. A red mark was left in the shape of what looks like a red fish hook with a bump in it.

" what the hell is that?" Grant weirdly asked " I need to get Joel's parents down here now."

---------------


Over in D ward Tyler was just coming to in front of two pale white orbs. What the hell are they? Tyler thought to him self as he reached for one. " He's awake!" Clara yelled as Tyler touched her belly. Shocked his hand flew back and hit him in the eye. "Ooww... Damn it" he said as he rubbed his face. His left side was completely patched up, shattered glass tore up his face pretty badly. Looking down he saw his left let was wrapped up like a mummy and suspended more than Pinocchio. His right arm was out of commission and right foot had bandages on it. His ribs were badly broken, he he lost the big toe on his left foot and broke a finger nail.

Looking around he saw his wife and daughter there, upset. What was he thinking, he was going to cheat on his loving wife and daughter and this was the price he was going to pay. He started to tear up. " honey, I'm so sorry" Tyler said as he looked into his wife's eyes.

" it's okay, I'm just so glad you are awake" Clara forgivingly said to her bed ridden husband. This near death experience had made them put things in perspective.

" dad, I'm just so glad you are alive!" She cried as she threw a hair away from her eyes. The rushed to hug him, but bounced off each other " OOMPH! Sorry, here you go first mum" Katherine said as Clara went to hug him.

" oh and some of the people from the country club are coming today to wish you well" Clara said as she wiped away the tears.

" well, hopefully this month will be our month to join their family!" Tyler chuckled as they all tried to hug again.

" Oh shoot, I forgot" Clara said grabbing her phone. " I need to make a call to one of your employees"

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Catalina could hear the faint sounds of trades work as she awoke from her gigantic bed, ready to start the new day. Walking over to the windowsill of her apartment she could see the construction of several sky scrapers. " huh, why hadn't I seen those before?" She pondered as she rubbed coconut oil on her bare skin. Grabbing her tablet she checked her schedule.

She had to go to the malls sports section to be at some kind of signing midday. Once finished, she needed to go down to the food court to be the celebrity contestant on the pie eating contest. With that over she had to promote one of her many other movies "the queens hive". To round off the night she was going to a wet t shirt competition at "ROGERS" a bar that hadn't been taken over by Antonio. This was being run by the Alpha Trios at Whitman University.

Catalina loved the shenanigans she got up to whilst studying, so this would be a great way to end her day. A day controlled by that old, weird man. She had enough, calling up her agent she was starting to get stressed. " yo, Catty! How are you? Have a good sleep?" Her agent said eagerly.

Catalina's amulet started to burn. " look I told you not to call me that name, skip the pleasantries, have you found where the DVDs are?" She sternly told the man on the other line.

" Yes, I'll need to show you in person though, meet me at Pieces, the cafe near the hospital." Said the agent the happy tones in his voice disappearing faster than you can say alakazm.

------

Over in Newton Parade an auction had just started. On sale, lot 34 a strip mall that could fit 10 good businesses, or for someone more daring, could be torn down for their own purposes. There were several people there, ready to purchase the place with a lot of foot traffic, including people who owned the mall, businesses in the area and Katie.

The auctioneer started. People were sending their numbers up faster than a coding machine. The auctioneers voice got faster and faster as the hour went on. Until 3 people remained. Katie looked over to one of the people she was competing against. It was Bill! That man who tried to kidnap him. Shooting up she yelled " I know you! You tried to kidnap me and my friend!". Bill was stunned, he had no idea what to do. As quickly as he could he ran for his truck before anyone else could get to him. " uuhh, okay I guess that leaves two people." The auctioneer said as they got down to the nitty gritty. The number soared higher and higher, closer to the 7 figure digits. Katie was sweating, any further and she wouldn't have a business to run. Defeated she dropped her paddle.

"Going once"

She couldn't beat that.

"Going twice"

WHACK!

"Sold to the mysterious man in the yellow scarf." The auctioneer said.

Everyone dispersed. Katie was disappointed, talking with Sarah, she was hing to show Dr Schultz something. It was time to look for another property.

The man in the yellow scarf tapped on his earpiece " yeah, Clara? The place is purchased. You guys can start work tomorrow after signing the property"

-------

Janice was going for her daily run, well more like a jog, okay a walk. As she walked allong the large bridge that ran over Smallton river she decided to take rested her weight against the bench that was there. She looked at the birds flying, the summer wind blowing in from the east and the cars passing by and felt at peace. That's when a she heard it, over the bridge there was a massive protest going on. Waddling over Janice saw the mayor on his podium trying to calm them down.

" my fellow Smalltonions, please calm down. After the trouble we had in the restaurant district, we have had to make the laws that applied to normal people apply to pregnant people too."

Janice was shocked. How could they do such a thing to these poor defenceless women.

"What pregnant woman would try to break into anything?" One man yelled.

" this is madness, you've gone crazy with power!!" A pregnant woman shouted, fiercely angry.

A bad egg came hurtling through the sky and hit the mayor with exact precision." Trying to wipe the rotten yolk from his eye his guards helped him off stage. " do what you need to do" he said as he entered town hall. Policemen gathered around the crowd of men and pregnant women. " That's it! You are all under arrest for resisting a government address" said the captain.

" you can't do this, only one person threw something" Janice said to one of the policemen.

" sorry, Captains orders. Now I need you tole your hands in the air madam." The police man said, shrugging his arms.

" what's wrong with you men?" Janice groaned angrily. Men. Men had always been there to ruin everything. First it was her father leaving her mother for some skank, Joel left her after she became pregnant, Antonio at the mall kept raising the rent on her gym and now the mayor was taking away pregnant women's rights? Not anymore.

Bring her belly back she thrusted it forwards knocking down the poor police guard. He fell quickly to the ground, thank god he had a helmet on, otherwise he would have had some serious damage.

The police were shocked, looking at the young fit woman take down a muscle bound police man with a single thrust. " let, my people GO!" Janice screamed as she ran at another police Sargent. Men and women dispersed from the scene as the rest of the police troopers arrested Janice. As she hit the ground Janice yelled " RUN, RUN AND TELL WHAT YOU HEARD HERE, AND TELL THEM ABOUT HOW I JANICE, SET YOU FREE!" She was knocked out and carried by several men into the police man.

-------

"This is Jennifer Armstrong reporting at the scene, a heavily pregnant woman by the name of Janice fought off the police. Being one of the very few non pregnant women in Smallton, I can only feel compassion for these poor pregnant women. Back to you"

Ashley looked at the scene going on from the tv as she got ready for her day, she was eating jam on toast, but can't remember where she placed one of her pieces. " oh my, I hope they are okay. " she said as she put on a blazer. Sarah finally made it down stairs, 15 foetuses was incredible, she needed a way to get that energy machine working and her robo-spine ready for her interview with Dr Schultz today. Walking into the kitchen her belly collided with Ashley's sending causing Ash to slip onto her large derrière.

"Oh crap." Ashley said as she realised where she landed. Getting up a piece of jam toast clung to her backside. " I'm so sorry! Are you okay?" Sarah panicked as she tried to move her titanic belly away so she could help Ashley up. "Oh this was my favourite" Ashley complained as she removed the sticky jam for her backside.

Going back up stairs she heard the shower running. Thinking it was Brandon she walked into the bedroom and slipped off her skirt. " oh man, even these?" She said feeling jam on her knickers. Brandon unbeknownst to all this was still in Ashley's bed. Bending over she took off her colourful undies. As he woke from his slumber he was presented with a fantastic or in his case a shocking sight of his 'mother's' plump, shapely butt.

Ashley was struggling to get her undies off, " stupid jam" she muttered to herself. Brandon was fixated on her curvaesious, mouth watering like bum. It was hypnotic, he almost want to grab- no, he couldn't, that's his mum he thought to himself. Getting her knickers off she bounced over to the cupboard and grabbed another skirt and undies, spinning around she saw Brandon staring with a full blown erection. " Brandon!" She squeaked, Tanner and Sarah almost heard her squeal.

Brandon covered his face in shame, " mum, I'm so sorry!" Brandon cried. He ran into his own bedroom embarrassed. Attracted to his own mother, that was sick, disgusting. He threw up in the bin. The phone on his bed buzzed, it was from Clara. <hey. forget everything, you don't have to worry any more, just don't screw my daughter>. Well, at least there was that.

Ashley sat down, after putting her undies and skirt on and hung her head in shame. "I'm going to have to tell him now, high school can wait". Walking over to Brandon's bedroom, she took a deep breath, then knocked. " Brandon? Are you okay? Look, I have some news to tell you"
