1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Brandon looked at his phone. Forget everything? So Clara didn’t want him to have sex with her after all. Brandon was partially relieved he wouldn’t be blackmailed into sneaking around to fuck his boss’s wife anymore, but, thanks in part to his current erection, he was partially disappointed to. Since Erin made it clear she didn’t want anything to do with Brandon anymore, he could have had guilt-free sex with Clara. And Kristina too. After all, they were both extremely good-looking women and they were both pregnant. Where else would he find two pregnant women so eager to have sex with him?

“Brandon? Are you okay?” Ashley said on the other side of the door, knocking. Brandon seized up. Bad time to start thinking about pregnancy again. The door opened and in came Ashely’s enormous belly, full and round with 11 babies. Her top didn’t do much to cover it, but just the attempt of her XXXL maternity blouse to make a difference made her whole appearance cuter. After a few seconds of waddling, the rest of Ashley came in, a worried look on her face as she looked Brandon over. Her radiant brown hair was tossed messily around her. “I have some news to tell you.”

Brandon felt his face get redder and redder as the women he only knew as his mother struggled her way across his bedroom to sit beside him, the bed creaking under her. She was centimeters away from him, her belly and breasts still jiggling as she sat down. Ashley’s piercing eyes were looking over Brandon and her full lips were already mid-pout as she searched for the words. Brandon knew if he didn’t blurt something out now, he’d “blurt out” from another part of his body. “M-Mom, I’m sorry!”

“Sorry?” Ashley said with surprise.

“I-I’ve just had a lot of crazy things going on. Erin dumped me last night, works been hectic, and m-my dreams have been so…confusing and vivid, so when you saw me, I…” Brandon looked down in shame. “L-like I said; things have been crazy.”

Ashley put her hand on Brandon’s cheek and patted it gently. “I’m not upset with you, honey. And I’m sorry things didn’t work out between you and Erin.” She held back before adding a nice I told you so in, choosing instead to lean in and give him a peck on the corners of his lips. When she withdrew, Ashley took a deep breath, wrapping both hands around her belly. “That’s not what I wanted to talk to you about.”

Brandon looked at his mother, too stunned to respond.

“Brandon…sweetie…your father and I love you, and we’d meant to tell you sooner, but…” Ashley looked down at her belly. “Brandon, this is only my second pregnancy.”

“W-what do you mean?” Brandon said, raising an eyebrow.

“Your…your mother and I were very good friends and when she and her husband got into a car accident and died…you were just a baby. I promised I’d take care of you and...” Ashley let out another long sigh and ran her hands through Brandon’s hair. “And I hope I have.”

“O-of course you have, M-mom,” Brandon said. He was stunned. He’d gone through 20+ years of life without ever knowing he was adopted.

Ashley sighed and smiled. “Then I’ve done my job. You’re an adult now and you deserve the truth. I’ll always love you and…” Ashley felt her own face start to turn red now too. The lust in her amulet was burning up and, now that it was out in the open that nothing between them was…the “i-word,” every cell of her body wanted to jump Brandon. Ever since she became pregnant, she’d felt something drawing her toward Brandon and it had only gotten stronger in the past few days. “And…if you’d like, you can just call me Ashley from now on.”

“Okay,” Brandon gulped, looking the pregnant woman he once knew as his mother over. “A-Ashley.” Just saying her name made him quiver. If she wasn’t his biological mother, then…the way he’d been thinking and feeling about her wasn’t weird. Same for Sarah. “Does Sarah know?”

Ashley nodded. “She only found out recently too. I’d love to talk more about this with you, honey,” she said, heaving herself off of Brandon’s bed. As she groaned, Brandon put his hand on her arm to push her more. When that wasn’t doing the trick, he pushed on her hip as much as he could, getting contact with her tight rear. “Oof, thank you,” Ashley said when she was upright. “But like I was saying: I’d love to talk more, but I have to go…I’ve got work.”

“Work?” Brandon asked, but Ashley just grinned and waddled out the door, letting Brandon watch her big ass shake as she left.

Back downstairs, Sarah was still eating breakfast, giving up on trying to fasten the buttons on her blazer. Hopefully Katie would have something new for her. Ashley sighed and fluffed her hair out, checking herself in the mirror. “What took you so long?” Sarah asked.

“I told Brandon,” Ashley sighed. “He knows he’s adopted.”

“At least I found out before him,” Sarah said, looking up the stairs. With 15 babies in her womb, her envy was incredibly strong and any little victory over…well, anyone felt good. And since she was outsizing Ashley in the belly department, her self-confidence was at new heights. “So you’re really doing this?”

“If you’re expecting 15 babies, you bet,” Ashley said, trying to stretch her blouse down her belly another extra inch, revealing two more inches of her cleavage in the process. “I’ll see you this afternoon.”

“See you,” Sarah said, puffing out her own chest, both with confidence and to compete with her bosomy mother. “When you come back, you’ll be seeing a newly funded and active PregTech CEO.”

Ashley smiled, happy for her daughter, and headed out the door. Before she took maternity leave, Ashley was a high school teacher who was well liked among her students. Now that she was eight months pregnant, and with 10 (now 11) babies, the school naturally wanted her to stay away. As healthy as she told the other teachers she was, the other faculty and were skeptical, assuming that if Ashley so much as sneezed, she’d go into labor and squeeze out nearly a dozen babies right on school property.

But with the recent rash of pregnancies around the city, thanks to the amulets and Yaral in Joel’s body, most of the school’s teachers were hugely pregnant and the school system couldn’t afford maternity leave anymore. Ashley was called back, at least until she was a week or two away from birth. Ashley stood on the street corner, a few confused students looking at her and her belly. She couldn’t exactly fit into a car anymore and even if she could, she wouldn’t ask her husband for a ride to work. Ashley had to ride the school bus.

-----

Sarah was trembling, her fist inches away from Brandon’s door. Now that he knew they weren’t biologically brother-and-sister, Sarah thought he’d be less hesitant to give her a belly rub. With 15 babies in there now, she needed it. And maybe, they could go a little further. Brandon may be a dweeb, but no one had been more caring to her during her pregnancy.

Just as Sarah was about to bring her hand against the door, it flew open and Brandon hurried out, bumping against his sister’s huge belly. “Whoa!” Brandon cried out, stopping in his tracks to look at her incredible size in awe. “S-Sarah! You’re…you’re…”

“Bigger, I know,” Sarah sighed, rolling her eyes. “There are some pregnancy experiments around the city that I can’t get into now, but…we’re all bigger,” she said, patting her roundness. “I already explained it all to Mom.” Sarah stopped and sighed. “I mean…you know.”

“It’s fine,” Brandon said, forcing a calm smile. “I’m fine. I guess it makes sense. You and Ashley look so much alike and I’m so unlike either of you.”

“L-look, Brandon,” Sarah said, her face turning a little red as she turned away. “If you ever want to talk about this more…y-you know where to find me. Okay?”

“Okay,” Brandon nodded, gulping as he looked Sarah over. A pregnant belly even bigger than Ashley’s. He couldn’t believe he was actually thinking about who he was more attracted to: Sarah or Ashley. This news would take some getting used to.

“Now that that’s out of the way, why were you in such a rush?” Sarah said, rubbing as much of her belly as she could. “I’ve got a sore belly I can’t reach now thanks to you running into me.”

“Sorry! I got a text and I have to be at work today!” Brandon said. “I was told there was big news!”

“Mind driving me?” Sarah asked. “I mean…I’ll have to put down some seats, but I can fit in.”

Brandon checked his phone. “The mall, right? You go there more than teenage girls.”

Sarah rolled her eyes. “I’ve got business there, weirdo. And it’s on the way. Just let me grab some things and we can go.” Grabbing two armfuls of gear and electronics, Sarah bustled down the stairs, feeling Brandon’s hand on her back and arms to support her. “T-thanks,” she mumbled.

“Anytime,” Brandon said back, both of their faces burning. “Dad’s car is already gone. Wonder where he is?”

“With his girlfriend, probably,” Sarah grumbled as she struggled to bend over and put Brandon’s seats down. “You’re lucky you’re not a Page, Brandon. Dad got Mom knocked up and cheated on her. My baby daddy ditched me. The men in our family are a bad bunch.”

“H-hope you and Ashley raise your sons right, then,” Brandon chuckled, getting into the driver’s seat and powering the car up. “Ready?”

“As I’ll ever be,” Sarah sighed. No matter how far back she could lean, her belly stuck out between the driver and passenger’s seat, right next to Brandon. “Let’s go.”

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Catalina rested one hand on her chin while the other one stroked her bare belly. She’d thought about covering it up, but after rubbing oil and cocoa butter all over her dark brown skin, it looked so good she couldn’t bear to hide it. Instead, Catalina had on a thin tank top that managed to hold her breasts in while showing plenty of sideboob, and if you were close enough, nipples too. Catalina never wanted to pose nude for money again, but that didn’t mean she was against being a little flirty with her body. Especially if it meant getting attention.

Her sweaty agent plopped down across from her at the table, handing Catalina a smoothie and a plate of sandwiches. “T-these are the ones you like, right?”

“It’ll do, Maurice,” Catalina sighed, eating with gusto. “What did you find out?”

“His name is Grant,” Maurice said, sliding Catalina a security photo. “Stocky, bearded. I also managed to get some of his past purchases at the store. He’s a typical nerd.”

“Like you,” Catalina said with a tiny grin.

Another bead of sweat. “I-if you say so.” Since her pride amulet, Catalina had become much more demanding on her agent and Maurice folded under pressure easily. “But here’s what you’ll really like: I had some paparazzi around town look for him and guess where he is now?”

Catalina rolled her eyes. “A comic book store? How should I know what nerds do? Just because they buy my tickets doesn’t mean I understand them.”

“He’s in the hospital,” Maurice said, pointing his thumb at the nearby building. “ICU.”

Catalina took a big slurp of her smoothie, finishing the drink in one big suck. “How did you manage all this?”

“I may have promised the store clerk some autographed Catalina Corazon movies and promised the paparazzi you’d cause some drama on the streets tomorrow,” Maurice said, tugging at his collar. “M-maybe a nip-slip.”

Catalina grabbed her agent by the tie and pulled him close. “If you didn’t find me those DVDs, I’d have Antonio himself throw you off a balcony,” she growled. “See you later, Maurice.”

“G-goodbye,” Maurice nodded as Catalina pushed away from her table and waddled toward the hospital. Grant, whoever you are, you’re in for a surprise, Catalina smiled. I’m getting those DVDs and we can do it the easy way or the fun way.

---

The maternity store was packed as women of various sizes saw what fit their new bellies and busts, thanks to the swelling last night. Katie was waddling around, admiring business as much as she admired her pregnant customers. Still, no one held a flame to Ashley. To think: now Katie was the bigger one of the two. “This amulet is definitely not boring,” she sighed, looking up to see Sarah waddle through the crowd, looking nearly as radiant as her mother. “Laura, keep an eye on things.”

“Y-yes ma’am,” Laura, the store’s old owner said. She was still afraid of what Rebecca would do to her if she didn’t let Katie be in full control of the store. Plus, profits were up many times over since Katie took over. Who knew that mousey girl was such a saavy businesswoman.

“What can I do for you, Ms. Page?” Katie grinned, rubbing her belly slowly. “Shouldn’t you be getting ready for your investment meeting today?”

“I need an outfit that actually fits,” Sarah said, motioning to her mostly exposed belly. “The last time I had one of these meetings, being half-naked and pregnant really sank my boat.”

Katie stroked her belly in thought. She rocks the sexy pregnant businesswoman look a lot better than I expected…this could be a new style. Shaking her head to return to the real world, Katie waddled over to a rack in the back. “I ordered these in today. They’re just plain white button-up shirts, but they should fit you.”

“As quick as always,” Sarah said, feeling the material.

“Not quick enough. I got beat at an auction for some great new property,” Katie fumed. “PregTech would be in the clear if I’d gotten that. Instead, we’ll be battling Antonio on his own terf.”

“We can beat him,” Sarah smiled, holding up her equipment. “I got a pretty good look at the energy device last night. I can design most of it if you let me work in the back, except I really need someone it’s been tested on to compare."

“A test subject, huh?” Katie said. “That’s a tough one. Only one of those things exist in the world and the guy who uses it probably won’t share it with us.”

----

Rebecca struggled for a few milliseconds before giving up. Antonio’s constraints weren’t that bad, but she got bored. “You sure about this, Antonio?”

“Positive,” he smiled, angling the laser at Rebecca, her clothes opened up to reveal her pale pregnant belly. “You need to learn what happens when you disappoint me and this ought to give you an extra kick to do your job too.”

“Alright,” Rebecca shrugged. “Not much I can do right now.”

Antonio knew that wasn’t right. In fact, she was one of the few women in the world he actually feared. With her training, Rebecca on a normal day could break out of her confinement and break his neck in seconds. But with the sloth amulet, that wasn’t likely.

“This won’t be as strong as the first test, since we don’t have as many amulets here,” Antonio said. “But I think the results should still be what we desire.” He flipped the switch and a blue beam shot into Rebecca’s bloated belly, causing it to swell slightly as Rebecca cried out in ecstasy and passed out.

“When you wake up, pay our businesswoman friend a visit,” Antonio whispered in Rebecca’s ear as he walked away, ordering Wendy to untie her. He didn’t want to spend any more time with her than he needed to. In truth, while Antonio found pregnant women a good source of revenue and marketing, he was disgusted by them. He found them fat, obnoxious, complaining, and thinking about a baby or multiple ones growing and squirming around inside them made him nauseous. Well, it wasn’t like Rebecca had any kicking fetuses inside her anymore. For the next few hours, her womb was pure energy.

----

“How is this possible?” Tanner said, hands in his head. Kim smiled and ran her hands over her belly, pretending to be happy to be pregnant.

“How? Look at your wife and daughter, stud. Super-fertility runs in the family,” Kim chuckled.

“But…I just saw you yesterday and you had abs,” Tanner yelled. “You can’t just be full-term with octuplets now!”

“More like nine now,” Kim sighed, looking back down at her tan orb. “Feels like more, at least.”

“Nine, whatever!” Tanner yelled, standing up. “It’s impossible!”

“Is it really so crazy?” Kim said. “I mean, think back. I remember seeing your wife and it felt like one day, boom, she’s a whale.”

The veins on Tanner’s forehead throbbed. Reality had been rewritten, sure, but there weren’t many details added. He couldn’t honestly say he remembered seeing Ashley’s belly grow over time to its current titanic proportions.

“S-still, how do I know it’s…they’re mine? I know I’m not the only guy you sleep with,” Tanner said, a cruel little grin on his lips.

“I don’t, you’re right,” Kim said, batting her eyelashes at him. “But you’re the only one manly enough to make me this big.”

“Oh, please,” Tanner groaned. “This is no time for games.”

“Maybe I’ll go visit your wife and tell her that it’s just a possibility that I’m carrying your kids,” Kim purred. “And if it turns out they’re not yours, no harm, no foul.”

Tanner bit his tongue. Ashley knowing about his affair was one thing. Finding out that Kim might be pregnant with nine of his babies was another. “Alright, alright. What do you want?”

“To be supported,” Kim smiled. “These little ones are going to need a home once they’re out of mine. And medicine. And food. And clothes. And college.”

“We’ll…talk about it,” Tanner said. “Okay?”

“Okay,” Kim grinned. “Now then, I didn’t realize being pregnant made me so horny. Come here,” she said, opening her arms wide.

Tanner scoffed. “Are you crazy? I’m not having sex with a pregnant woman.” With that, he left, slamming the door behind him.

“Huh,” Kim said, tapping her fingertips on her belly. “Never thought I would get turned down for sex. Being pregnant has more downsides than I thought.”

Let's see what REBECCA: SUPER SLOTH can do
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Joel still laid there, like a log on a river, unmoving despite the chaos that had happened around him. Grace and Grant were still trying to decipher what on earth is wrong with him.

" it's not a tumor" Grace said looking through her findings. Grant chuckled at her comment. She looked at Grant quizzically " what's funny?" .

"IT'S NOTTA TUUMMUUORR" Grant blurted out loud in his best Arnold Schwarzenegger impression. Grace laughed, looking at him with glee.

" stop it, you're distracting me" she said playfully. Something that the two people didn't notice was that from behind them a somewhat invisible spirit had floated up behind them. It was similar to Yarals, but bared the figure of a woman. Lania, Yaral's brother was awoken last night after Erin slapped Brandon's amulet from his hand. She had explored the city, looking at all the mayhem in the town. Recently she felt a familiar presence and came to the hospital to inspect it.

" I mean, it looks like the work of some wizard or whatever!" Grant said looking at the X-ray again. It looks like flames were escaping this weird wound.

Catalina walked up to Joel's room, quietly she opened the door. " is there anyone by the name of Grant here?" Catalina asked slyly. Grant turned around and saw Catalina with her large almond skinned belly.

" I am sorry madam but we are trying to solve a mystery here" Grant said shooing her out of the room.

" bu-bu-but do you know who I am?" Catalina stammered, confused by what's happening.

" yes, pregnant, and I assure you, the maternity ward is in the next building, good day!" Grant said closing the door behind her. Catalina was furious! No one ever treated her that way before. But it was also, different. She went to bang on the door, but stopped. She was better than this, she needed to plan how to get the DVDs from that ewok with glasses.

Lania saw the mark that the Yaral left on his brain. In one quick motion she flew into and out of Joel's head, removing the mark. With her work done she let Joel rest and flew out the window without anyone noticing.

Grace rubbed her belly as she looked at the short hairy man. " you don't like pregnant women, do you?" She said, walking over to him.

" what do you mean? How can someone hate something like that?" He said looking to the ceiling. Grace's belly was really close now, it was getting weird for him.

" I understand if you don't like it, it's just a big amount of flesh." Grace said rolling up her shirt. " but wait isn't that what breasts are?"

" it's not like that!" Grant said obtusely, dodging around Grace and her wide, pale belly.

" haha! You DO hate bellies!" Grace said laughing at Grant's awkwardness.

"Alright, alright. I do. How could you tell?" Grant sighed in defeat. He collapsed in the chair.

"Well, the first sign was how you looked at me when I looked in." Grace said in her best sherlockian impression. " the second was how you have steered clear from my belly, hell you don't even want to look at it." She rubbed her belly, soothing the kicks inside of her. " my final deduction was when the very famous 'Catalina' Coraza- Cozza- whatever, the famous 'Catalina' came in and you instantly pushed her massive pregnant belly out of there."

" are you sure you are a nurse? Maybe you should have been a detective" Grant said, looking up at Grace who was looking smug.

---------

Erin waddled into the mall, she needed to do something whilst her mother took Brody to reading class. She was bored, upset, but bored. Looking over at the newspaper agency she saw most of the 'planned parenthood' and 'pregnancy' magazines were gone. The sports section was filled however. Picking up one of the golfing magazines she started reading some tips to pick up her game. Her game was pretty good. Actually it was really good.

Purchasing the magazine she took he elevator upstairs she saw the cinemas were out with a bunch of films out. Surprisingly they were all pregnancy related. There was a double "viewing for two" feature on in ten minutes, first up was a sports movie called " hole in one for a game for two" starring Catalina Corazon, followed up by "Heads or Tails: The tale of Jack Jr and his magical coin". Grabbing literally everything from the lobby she brought her trolley sized amount of snacks to the double feature.

--------

Lania flew through the sky observing the chaos happening below her. She knew who did this, her brother Yaral has ruined many cities in his chaotic reign over the amulets, now it was time for Lania to bring in some order. She just needed to hone in one Yaral's signal.

Flying down through the city she could see women days away from labour, going about their lives. She noticed a bus struggling to travel with its added weight. Flying in she needed to find a way to alleviate the weight before the bus broke down, adding extra chaos into the cities lives. Noticing a 22 and a 50 year old women sitting together, each pregnant with twins, she thought fast. Using her time/pregnant abilities, she teleported the 4 babies into her own stomach whilst rewriting time to seem as if they weren't pregnant at all.

Now she needed to get rid of these babies before they became a permanent fixture to herself. Flying slightly slower she came across one of the ladies from the country club, Barbara. Focusing in on her belly, she added the extra babies to her uterus, giving her a grand total of 6. Rewriting history she watched as Barbara continued wig her day like nothing happened.

Looking at what she was doing, she realised it was only a start. She needed to take control of someone who has been causing a lot of chaos in the city...

----

Yaral saw the blue spirit honing in on the mall. He was still sick, from infecting Joel, that young mans body was too strong to control. He realised he needed another body, something weaker, but had a mind that could work with him. Someone like Antonio... That's when it dawned on him. Lania was honing in on him to eliminate his chaotic ways. He needed to do something, and quick. He bolted for the mall.

Flying through the mall he couldn't find him anywhere. The shops, his headquarters and his laboratory didn't have him. His panicking increased until he felt a disruption in the energy waves. He flew to the disturbance.

Who is Lania trying to take over?
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Rebecca awoke in her chair remembering her bosses orders. Thinking like the agent she was she picked up her phone and dialled 911. "Yes, I thought you should know there is an disturbance at the mall, you may need a van to bustle these criminals under your new laws." She had read a day before that this was being planned, she had her own plans too, and she would need the polices help.

Leaping out of the chair she dashed outside. She saw the distance to the mall was littered with homeless people, she needed to get up somewhere she wouldn't have to deal with them. The machine's laser had reunited Rebecca with her strength, motivation and agility. Seeing the narrow ladder up to the roof she realised there would only be one other way up. Grabbing onto a pole she swung up two floors, balanced over a railing and jumped onto a drain pipe that bent under her weight. As the metal pipe bent over Rebecca used the motion to get her to the other side of the alley way to scale the building to the rooftops.

Looking at the sun shining from behind the clouds she smiled as she jumped, cartwheeled, ran and bounced to the mall.

-----

Katie was selling so much maternity wear she was down to her emergence stock. Sarah worked in the room behind trying to recalibrate the robo spine and some other pregnancy equipment like 'the pregkent' a sheet with built in microfibres made to calm the baby and stop it from kicking whilst the mother sleeps and 'nause-gone' a head massager that stops headaches, relaxes the stress levels and boosts brain activity.

She was getting incredibly sweaty, she had taken her clothes off and was now only working in a singlet and undies. Sarah was coated in sweat, dirt and grease, she was working against time now. She had finished everything else and now her 'piece to a resistance' was her robo-spine was the only thing left. She also had to battle against the weight of her gargantuan belly which took up a lot of room. Reattaching some materials the robo-spine was active again with a low hum. Attaching it to her back it finished loading and was as silent as a mouse.

Katie came in and saw Sarah hard at work. Katie looked at Sarah in the dim light, the sweat glistened her incredible cleavage in the light, the singlet she was wearing barely covered her belly, that fantastic, eye popping belly of hers. It was so perfect, fantastically round and oh so plump. A slight oil stain appeared on her upper thigh as she turned around to reveal an amazing, mouth watering backside. It swayed as she tested her robo-spine, it worked perfectly.

Turning around she saw those juicy lips of hers moved hypnotically, looking like they were saying "Katie.."

"Huh?" Was all Katie could say as Sarah walked up to her.

" I said are you okay?" Sarah asked, as her huge belly rubbed up against Katie's.

" oh, I uhhh, I'm fine? Everything is sold, and literally have nothing else to sell for the day, how are you?"

" I'm okay, I'm ready now, I was going to go to the gym to. wash off, oh my god!" Sarah yelped as she got down on her knees. She realised she left a smudge on Katie's clothes. Well with this size it was easier for her to just roll onto her belly. Wiping the smudge off of Katie's work shirt Katie cooed at getting her belly rubbed. Sarah noticed this and decided to rub her belly more.

Katie was on the tip of heaven. She started remembering what happened last night. She just had to have more. Bringing Sarah back up she leant in for a kiss. Sarah looked down at the short brunette. This was it, she was finally going to get what she wanted for the past nine months. Leaning in her lips were a rabbits hair apart.

CRASH!!!!

"Katie! We, oh I'm sorry, we have an emergency out here " Laura called from the door. Sarah and Katie both sighed.

" to be continued" Katie said as she waddled out into the store front.

----

Rebecca triumphantly stood above a broken mannequin. " oh I'm sorry" Rebecca smugly stated as she motioned towards Katie. " I have been told by the head office that this place is been taken down, today. You have 5 minutes to grab your things and go"

Katie was stunned out of her life. Another set back today? She couldn't stand for it. " and what if I refuse?" Katie stammered out.

" oh you really don't want that, right Laura?" Rebecca said revealing Laura with her arm twisted around her back. She was scared out of her wits, Rebecca laughed at her pleas to let her go.

" let her go!" Katie shouted. Rebecca dropped Laura's hand, said "boo" and Laura scampered away. " well

In a flash Rebecca ran straight to Katie, pinning her to the ground. Sarah saw from the window what was going on and sent a text to Brandon. <remember Katie's store? I need you to come by quickly and pick up some stuff from behind the store in a green box, please hurry.> detaching the spine she placed her 6 inventions in the large green box, then putting on some maternity shorts she went to confront Rebecca.

"Oh look, another hen wants to join the coop" Rebecca said smirking at Sarah's size.

" what?" Was all Sarah could say about the strange comment.

" you know, coop, where chickens go in, and you're a hen Bec- forget it. You two are trespassing on mall property, you both are under arrest." Rebecca said, a tiny bit of slothness coming back in. Katie struggled but could do nothing as Rebecca stood on top of her hands behind her back.

" you can't arrest a pregnant woman!" Katie cried out, struggling

" true, I can't. However these bad boys can, come in big boys!" Rebecca called out to the police out the front of the mall.

Ashley's first day back in school
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Sarah flustered as the cops swarmed into Katie's maternity store. Every pregnant woman was being dragged out, either in handcuffs or with two burly arms wrapped around them. Sarah turned back to Rebecca and saw her content smirk fade into a look of exhaustion and boredom.

"Excuse me Ms..."

"Quo, but just call me Rebecca," Rebecca yawned, resting one hand on her belly for a second before a spark of energy made her arm jolt.

"Rebecca," Sarah said, waddling closer to Antonio's top agent. "How about I show you a recent invention of mine for mothers-to-be like yourself who need a good bit of rest and relaxation."

"R&R, huh?" Rebecca said, raising an eyebrow. Antonio's notes said this one was a talented inventor and she was feeling awfully tired lately. "Like what?"

"How does a non-invasive massage and no kicking babies waking you up sound?" Sarah gulped as two police officers stormed over to her.

"Alright, you cow, come with us," one of them growled.

"Wait, wait," Rebecca said, holding up one hand. "Let her stay. I want to talk with PregTech employees."

"So should I let this one go too?" another officer said, currently cuffing Katie's hands behind her. Sarah looked at Katie and opened her mouth, then paused. Her envy was building up again and she thought about Katie having sex with Ashley and getting all the attention with PregTech. Why should she get all the credit and all the fun while pregnant?

"I don't know her," Sarah said, turning back to Rebecca. "Take her away if you want."

Katie barked out some muffled protests but Sarah was already leading Rebecca to the back of the store, where she got out her pregkent and nause-gone, putting them both on Rebecca.

"Oh, this is nice," Rebecca sighed, closing her eyes and lying back in a seat in the storage room. Sarah let out a relieved gasp and looked over the small but strong woman Antonio had sent after them. Where did she get all her power and mobility from? Curious, Sarah reached a hand out and placed it on Rebecca's belly. A small zap made Sarah take her hand off and a light bulb went off in her brain.

This is the same thing that happened to me! Sarah realized, digging through her box for the prototype pregnancy-energy machine. If I run a few tests on her belly, I'll be able to complete this.

Minutes later, Sarah had monitors stuck all over Rebecca's belly and was studying the readings carefully while taking notes with one hand and rubbing her own belly with the other.

"Everything alright out there?" Rebecca mumbled. "It sounds a little loud and weird."

"Sorry, let me fix that," Sarah said, turning up the levels on her nause-gone. "This is just a prototype. The next version will have some headphones."

"Good idea," Rebecca replied as she drifted back to sleep, bare belly on display for Sarah to research.

----

Kim was looking at her sixth outfit choice so far, turning around to see how every angle looked in her full-body mirror. Luckily for her, she'd sprung for a large model early on so her entire nine-baby body could fit in the frame.

"The ass looks better in this one," she sighed before turning back to face her reflection, placing both hands on her belly. The fabric did nothing to conceal her enormous fake-tan-orange ball of babies. "But the bulge doesn't look good in this one." Kim sighed and stripped off the top, stopping to look down at her cleavage. "At least this bra is holding up," she said, cupping her breasts. "Best gag gift ever."

As Kim undid the straps on her tight pants and slid them off, Lania's disembodied spirit hovered around her apartment. "I'm getting too weak," Lania moaned softly. "I knew I wouldn't be able to stay in this world for too long. I need a body to stay here for a day. If I'm out, there must be trouble."

Passing into the room, Lania could feel Kim's maternal energy. There were many, many pregnant women in the vicinity, but Kim was the only one giving off a very familiar signature.

"Yaral was here," she scowled. "Somehow, he's responsible for her pregnancy more than usual. She's the best bet for me to stay on Earth."

"Maybe if I went with black," Kim pouted, turning her underwear-clad pregnant body to the side as Lania passed through her body and entered her. Kim let out a small yelp and her head bent back. Her hands clutched her huge belly tightly before she relaxed and leaned back down. "Good, it worked. Now I just need to find the master amulet," Kim said in a much calmer, less whiny voice as she headed for the door, still clothed only in her bra and underwear.

----

The bus ride to the high school was slow since the district's buses hadn't been upgraded to carry so much extra weight yet. About 3/4 of the women on the bus were pregnant and with several children. Ashley alone was responsible for plenty of drag, with her 11-baby belly and pronounced ass putting a deep dent in the long seat.

"Why don't you rub her belly and make a wish?" the boys in the seat across from Ashley sneered and laughed. Their comments weren't directed at Ashley: sitting next to her was Abby, one of the least popular people in the school. She was a senior with short, straight black hair that obscured a surprisingly cute face. Abby had little in the way of curves and she was one of the students not made pregnant by the events of the past few days.

"Yeah, wish that some of her roundness would make its way to you," a girl behind the boys laughed, rubbing her own wide belly. "You'd think you'd get something."

Abby just hunched down even more, biting her lip. Ashley glared at the students but didn't say anything. Abby reminded her of Sarah. While later in life, Sarah's looks began to take after her mother's, Sarah was always a quiet, odd girl with no friends. Ashley placed her hand on Abby's back and rubbed it softly. "Don't listen to them."

"I don't need pity," Abby muttered. "Especially from one of the teachers here. They give me just as bad a time as the kids."

"You don't remember me?" Ashley smiled, patting Abby on the shoulder. Abby scoffed and looked up at Ashley's face, her jaw dropping.

"M-Mrs. Page?" Abby said, looking at her in awe. "You're...I mean, you were big in class, but now..."

"They gave me maternity leave pretty early on," Ashley smiled, patting her enormous belly. She barely fit in the bus seats with her maternal size. "And there was a bit of a...mishap in the city yesterday that added another one in here."

"I noticed," Abby said, looking around at all the twin and triplet bellies now on the bus that were one baby and twin bellies yesterday. "Sorry I snapped at you," she said, running her hands through her hair. "You were always...nice to me."

As Abby parted her hair, Ashley got a good look at Abby's face and bit her lip. The lust in her amulet was building up again and she wanted Abby. She already cheated on her husband while pregnant, then flirted with her adopted son. Would she tempt fate with one of her high school students now?

"You're nice too," Ashley smiled, leaning in for a quick kiss on the lips. She smiled at Abby's shocked face. "Very nice." The bus began to slow down as it stopped in front of the high school and Ashley heaved herself up, pressing her belly against Abby. "Hope to see you in class."

"Y-you too," Abby said, eyes wide and fixed on Ashley. Ashley chuckled as she got off the bus slowly. She had some self-control when it was just 10 babies, but with her lust multiplied 11 times, it was too much for her. She was going to have fun.

----

"Ah, Brandon!" Clara smiled, sitting behind her husband's desk. "So good to see you again. You're handsome as always."

"I thought you weren't going to do this anymore," Brandon grumbled, standing by the chair with his arms crossed. The desk was covering Clara's belly so his libido was calmed. Slightly.

"We're not," she chuckled, taking out some paperwork. "At least, not yet. Tyler might go back to his old ways. Who knows?"

"Is he going to be okay?" Brandon gulped. He might not like his boss, but he didn't want him to die in a car accident.

"He'll be fine," Clara said, pushing some documents forward. "But while he's out of commission, I'm in charge of the company."

"Y-you're in charge?" Brandon stuttered.

"I did a lot of things behind his back," Clara sighed. "This company would be a loose piece of paper in the back of some bank cabinet if it weren't for me. But times now are tougher than ever. This baby boom is doing a number on us."

"So I'm fired?" Brandon asked. Clara let out another chuckle. Brandon didn't like the sound of it.

"No, I...like having you around," Clara nodded. "It's nice knowing there's someone here who thinks I'm sexy besides me. No, what I have there are a few investment opportunities I'm looking into to keep us afloat. I need you to pick one."

"That's a little...beyond my usual duties," Brandon said, his voice trailing off as Clara stood, resting a hand on her belly. "B-but I'll get right on it!"

Brandon left the office and saw Kristina prowling toward him on one end of the hall. Panicking, he ran for the stairs and left the building.

"Hope Clara will be a better boss than Tyler and let me look over these at the coffee shop," Brandon gasped, images of Ashley flashing into his head. "I need a break from bellies for the day."

"Good, I was right," Kim said, making Brandon turn around in surprise. His legs nearly buckled and gave out when he saw her pregnant hugeness in nothing but underwear. "I need to talk to you."
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: Who is Lania trying to take over?

choices: Who haven't we seen in a while?
Who else haven't we seen in a while?
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Brandon's face was bright red as his waiter brought him a cup of coffee. "T-thank you," he said, watching her waddle off as she looked at Kim. "Are you sure you wouldn't rather talk inside somewhere?"

"I miss feeling the breeze," Kim replied, still possessed by Lania. "I do not see the concern. Modesty should have wained since I was around and I have seen other expectant women in similar states of undress."

"Maybe that's true," Brandon said, wondering where all these half-naked pregnant women are, "but you're a little...bigger than most pregnant women and you're a hell of a lot better looking."

"Interesting," Kim said, drinking her glass of water. "Well, now that we are comfortable, I can begin."

"B-begin?" Brandon said, hand shaking as he drank his coffee. "You help my dad cheat on my mom while she's pregnant, insult me at the mall before I try and hook you up with my boss, show up colossally pregnant, and then you just drag me off the street saying you want to talk? What's going on?"

"I should explain," Kim said. "I am not...this woman, whoever she is. I'm only using her body as a host."

"A...host?" Brandon said. Dozens of fantasy and sci-fi movies flashed through his head. "You're possessing her?"

"Yes, that's a good way to put it," Kim smiled. "I'm a projection, a spirit of Lania, a sorceress from over a millennia ago."

Brandon was listening as best he could. Now that he knew this wasn't really Kim, he felt less guilty about staring at her chest and belly. "Uh huh..."

"To summarize, I was the daughter of a powerful royal family, but I was born with a demonic spirit inside me. I was taken to another sorceress who expelled the demon from me, but it impregnated her instead, and in seconds, she gave birth to a baby the same age as me, only he was covered in bizarre discolorations on his skin."

"Is he...also a spirit floating around possessing people?" Brandon asked.

"Yes, but I will get to that soon. We were raised like brother and sister by the royal family, but my brother was clearly intent on evil. He was obsessed with creating chaos and when he was older and left home, I learned he took up sorcery as well. I followed him and learned some of his same tricks, and on the way, I learned who my brother really was: Yaral."

"Yaral," Brandon repeated. "Should I know who that is?"

"His name is recorded throughout history: a malevolent spirit that causes and feeds off of chaos. He particularly likes to do it through the creation of sudden, unexplainable pregnancies," Kim said, leaning in closer.

Brandon gulped. "So the amulets..."

"I am getting to that," Kim said, shaking her head. "Humans are much more impatient in your time. Yaral has existed for thousands of years, but he thought that by taking human form, he could become stronger. As my brother, he had all the power he needed to create some of his strongest tools for chaos: the amulets."

Brandon heard a strong bolt of dramatic thunder, but it turns out it was only some silverware being dropped on the floor as two pregnant waiters bumped bellies.

"Fool that I was, I actually used my magic to help him build the first one. He told me it was a Preg-Transferer to help women who can't have children and I thought my brother was becoming more noble. When I realized how dangerous it truly was, I sent it away and created instructions to go along with it. Yaral then left and created seven more amulets, but I know little about those."

"They're out there, alright," Brandon gulped. "So...that booklet with the amulet was real?"

"Of course it was real," Kim said, raising an eyebrow. "You did...read it, right?" Brandon gulped and Kim smacked her forehead. "Humans..."

"So all the pregnancies around the city...even Sarah and my mo...Ashley?" Brandon said.

"Yes, if you'd read the instructions, you would have known how to make the reality shift not affect you," Kim said, rubbing the side of her huge belly, bumping up against the table a few times. "But now you have that power. Almost everyone you've met who is pregnant was either made that way by the amulets or by my brother directly."

"Directly?" Brandon asked.

"He possessed someone too," Kim said, looking out at the street. "I could sense it. The real Lania left a piece of her soul in the master amulet when she cast it away, so if she ever needed to help out, I could come in her place."

"So where's the real Lania?" Brandon asked.

"Unlike my brother, I am mortal," Kim sighed. "I died many years ago, and somewhat strangely, I was only pregnant once with one child." She looked into the air. "I can sense my descendent in this city somewhere...two of them, actually. A mother and daughter."

Don't tell me Brandon panicked.

"I'm getting a family name too..."

Oh no.

"Page. Is that familiar to you?" Kim asked.

"Easy, easy!" Katie said as the police pushed her into the holding cell. She turned around and saw that she was being pushed into a wall of big, round, and often bare pregnant bellies. "Actually...go ahead and push me in a little deeper."

"Quiet down," the police lieutenant barked. "You crazy women...you're pregnant! You should be at home with your husbands, cooking dinner, knitting little sweaters for your babies."

"Some of us don't exactly have husbands," Katie grinned. "Or, in some of our cases, wives."

"Disgusting," the lieutenant said, shaking his head and walking away.

"Katie?" a voice said. Katie was short even before her belly weighed her down and she could only see something coming through the bellies. "Out of my way. Out of my way! I said out of my way!" Janice growled, finally pushing her way to Katie. "Good, you're here."

"Yeah, I'm here," Katie sighed, crossing her arms. "Sarah sold me out. It was probably to protect PregTech, but still..."

"Sarah," Janice snarled, punching her fist into her palm. "I'll get even with her...a workout from hell ought to even the score."

"Well I can bail us out, at least," Katie said. "Once Sarah's spines start selling, we'll make up the money easily."

"Can you get us out too?" some women started asking, hands pressing against Katie's enormous belly.

"Hey, hands off my partner!" Janice yelled.

"N-now now, we're all pregnant women here," Katie grinned. "We can touch each other's bellies if we want."

"Did you say partner?" one woman said, getting close to Katie. "Partner with Janice?"

"Yeah, she's part of PregTech with me," Katie said, but in no time, a group of women were around her, on the verge of tears and bending to kiss her belly.

"Janice gave us hope!" they cried out. "That pregnant women can be more than a big, slow burden! She's our hero!"

"What is PregTech?" more women asked. "Is it part of your pregnant philosophy?"

"Y...es," Katie grinned, profits and possibilities entering her head. "PregTech is many things, but one thing to remember is that PregTech is a company for pregnant women, by pregnant women. Fitness, mobility, clothing, food...energy, entertainment. Everything a pregnant woman could want." Katie waddled to the center of the cell, holding her hands up as the rest of the women supported her belly. "And most of all, freedom! Live your life like you're a normal woman. No, better! Because being pregnant is better!"

"Pregnant women are better!" the women chanted with joy as Janice waddled up to PregTech's business manager.

"Great sales pitch," Janice said, rolling her eyes. "Now can we go?"

Katie waddled back with Janice to the cell's bars as Janice called for a guard. "And remember...um...we're having a kick-off event tomorrow all day at the mall!" Katie said. "Bring all your friends. All your pregnant friends!"

The guards had to lean in close to hear Janice talk about bail as cheers and moans filled the jail. The two were led out of the cell and down the hallway, with Katie still waving and giving thumbs-up to the women.

Catalina paced around outside the hospital room, stroking her chin. How could he turn her down? I mean, the pregnant bump wasn't always ideal, but she was still Catalina Corazon! She was damn sexy. The sexiest, biggest star in Hollywood, in fact! As Catalina paced, she butted bellies with Grace, who actually outsized her.

"Sorry," Grace smiled, trying to waddle away as Catalina grabbed her arm.

"Let me ask you," Catalina said. "I'm attractive, right? Even with the belly?"

"Um..." Grace said, before turning to Catalina and grinning. "I mean, I think you're good-looking. You're Catalina Cor-"

"Yes, yes, you're a huge fan, I know," Catalina said, waving her hand around. "But look, I need something from that weird bearded guy in there and flirting isn't working."

"If you want something from someone who thinks you're attractive, I can help," Grace smiled, rubbing her belly against Catalina's.

"Miss, please. I know it's intimidating being around such a legendary actress, but I need to focus," Catalina said.

"Don't bother. He doesn't like pregnant bellies," Grace shrugged.

"I don't give up that easily," Catalina boasted. "In Expect Danger, I defeated the leader of the Drake Crime Syndicate all while carrying the president's illegitimate twins. I can get this guy to give me my freedom."

"Freedom?" Grace said, but Catalina was already bursting into Joel's room. Grace let out a sigh and put her hand on her belly. "That crazy woman's acting hornier than I am..."

Joyce stood there ordering the hell out of the poor immigrants that were working for her. Joyce's son Harold delicately walked in, through the vast mess that encapsulated the place. " Dear god mother, what the devil happened here?" He said brushing a lot of hair away from his eyes.

" Harold, what on earth are you doing here?" Joyce said with much alert. " look, I'm currently very busy, it looks like the horses broke through and trampled through the house, I'll make sure to fire one of the help today."

Harold grabbed the keys from his pocket and went to leave. " I guess I'll check out some of the sports equipment in the mall, bye mum". Joyce waddled over to Lord Pharel and grabbed the bikini from the moustached statue. She took one look at the intimidating figure whilst thinking what happened last night.

Pharels stare could pierce the heavens with its intensity, he stood for what everything important to the country club stood for.

INTEGRITY
STRUCTURE
PRIDE

Infact that was chiseled into the plaque below him. He fought against legendary beasts and much much more. Joyce's husband had mirrored himself in his image, believed in his ideals and would never deal with what they got up to last night. " oh god" Joyce whispered under her breath. Rubbing her twin filled belly she grabbed a mop and cleaned harder than the help.

" I heard her friends had a stripper here last night" whispered another.

Erin was watching the ads before movie 1 began. For some reason she was the one person in there and she was enjoying it, if only she had a friend to- " oh crap" she said fishing her phone form her bra. " Mara? I'm so sorry! Come up to the cinemas, I got tickets to see a double feature."

" okay will do" Mara said on the other line. Looking at the swarm of pregnant women, the chubby girl had to think of a way to get up 5 floors in 3 minutes. The first floor was both the hardest and the awkwardest. Her short frame meant her big boobs brushed up against a few tall women's bellies. Pushing her thick frames glasses in she dashed up the escalator to the second floor.

Second floor being the sports floor she wasn't dealing with any pregnant women but a lot of male partners to pregnant women, there was a line to get into the prenatal yoga. After being stuck behind two begrudging husbands pushing prams she took the elevator up two floors.

The entertainment area on level four was almost deserted for some reason. Not many people were splurging money on entertainment with families on the way. She sped to the escalator taking it to the high end market section and cinemas. Racing in she paid the ticket holder and got in just in time for the feature presentation.

" this... mall.... needs some.... changes..." Mara breathed as she stole one of Erin's drinks.

" help yourself" Erin laughed as the film began.

With second period over the school was having recess. Ashley waddled past several pregnant teens over to the teachers lounge. Opening the door was like something out of a sitcom. The male teachers were taking over the left quarter of the room while the pregnant ladies took up the other three quarters. Ashley strode in and made her way over to the cups. Pouring herself a cup of green tea she was interrupted by a tall tanned bald gentleman. " hello miss Page" came a deep voice from the gentlemen. " Alfonso!" Ashley said, her voice varying, " it's so good to see you! how's music class?"

" the class, is doing tremendously well, our musicans are going to regionals next week, I would love to see if you still have the... How you say, moves?" Alfonso said bring up her left delicate hand.

" oh stop it you, you know I'm mar-" Ashley started. She realised she and tanner were no longer a couple. " you know what, I would be happy to, but what about my figure?" She rubbed her large expanse. Alfonso seemed unfazed by it, In fact his large Spanish hands stroked Ashley's belly.

" are you kidding? You have never looked more attractive in your life" he said chuckling. Ashley's amulet started to burn with lust, as he stroked her incredible midsection she became slightly wet. Time slowed down, it wasn't until he let go of her belly did she realised her worse night mare was right next to her.

"HHHHHHIIIIIIIIII" said Tracy, Tracy was a woman so wildly wound up she could power a truck with her energy. "Hello Tracy" Ashley groaned, " what is it?"

Tracy grabbed her iPad and ran through some pages on some ebooks " I'm afraid you two are violating rule 627, deliberately making contact with a pregnant woman's belly" she said with a mocking smile " now rules are rules and women of your, size have needs, but we here as teachers of this high school need to set an example."

" hmm, funny" Ashley said, thinking quickly. " now, firstly I am so sorry about your condition, not all of us can be pregnant, but if you watched the news today, women are now considered just like everyone else in terms of the law, making your, little, rule, invalid."

" we will see about that" Tracy said and the skinny Indian left.

"Eer, okay my spanish dancer, how about I visit you during period 4 and we can tango until we tanstop." Ashley flirted before slapping herself in the face . " that sounded better in my head"

Still in her undies and singlet she worked quickly in the room as the heat started to rise. " Katie really should have had a fan, how are you doing under there?" Sarah quietly asked Rebecca. She was in a deep sleep, those years she spent in Saudi Arabia were coming back to her. She remembered the vacation she had there after eliminating several government officials.

Sarah applied suction like cups up to her belly, trying to understand the type of energy. They were off the charts. But we're reacting slowly. The energy cells in her were synced to her amulets sloth like behaviour, anything that activated that feeling enhanced it by hundred more. Sarah's mini-sound machine evaluated the contents in her belly. " okay so the matter that the foetuses were made from were converted to energy, that mused have been from the radiation from the Ray gun" Sarah said as she took the suction cups off. She needed a sample from the energy though. A needle would pierce the energy, the end result would be catastrophic. She needed a sample from up her vagina. How the hell was she going to do that!?

Whilst Rebecca let out a small snore Sarah waddled to her her kit. She had a small beacon and some synthetic analysis pills. Attaching the two together she needed an excuse to insert the makeshift pill in there. Looking around she saw Katie left a container of 'coconut oil' on the desk. Grabbing some of the stuff she started to rub it on Rebecca's belly. Immediately startled Rebecca grabbed Sarah's arm, Sarah winced in pain. " what the hell are you doing?" Rebecca sternly said, ready to introduce Sarah's left hand to her left elbow.

" yeah, I mean, ouch, a girl like you is quite a catch. Not a whale like me" Sarah said, trying to reach the innocent person behind that iron hard shell. " and isn't this relaxing, I mean if I rub here..." Sarah rubbed some warm coconut oil into the lower half of her belly. The sensation hit Rebecca like a ton of bricks

" IIIOooooOoOOOOOOOOoooooo" Rebecca said her legs spreading, she came a little with how sensual Sarah was with her touch. Rebecca plaited there and then, her bellies glow starting to disappear. The officers came and saw Rebecca lying unconscious. " we were getting a little hot and heavy and I think she suffered from heat stroke" Sarah was thanking her year 11 drama teacher for her believable performance. " the two men came in and carried her out " don't worry mam, we will take her to the hospital, we would ask you to come but, we only have the one police car and we couldn't fit the both of you"

" no worries mam, we will make sure your friend makes it safely to the hospital." One of the men said as the hauled the assassin out of there. Clearing up the mess she got ready to analyse the material"

"Katie" Janice said trying to snap her out of it " Katie!" She slapped her only to get no response. " It's useless, what the hell is wrong with you?" Janice shouted at her but Katie was lost on a high...

She looked around her and all she could see was a multi skin coloured sea of large, plump bellies. Her greed amulet started to amplify, her belly had grown so large last night it was having an adverse reaction to her mind.

Janice looked as Katie grabbed a Chinese woman's belly and started to rub it and kiss it like was her God. " okay that's it, I need someone with law expertise, is there anybody here that is a lawyer?"

There is a mad man behind that place and he needs to know that this town, no make that this city belongs to us Amazonian goddesses!"

Every pregnant woman started roaring with applause, except for Katie who was massaging belly after belly, without anyone complaining. Janice could see that it was time to take back this place. Waddling through the cramp space she went up to the Latina lawyer. " now, you are our key to freedom. What can we do to get out of here?"

Catalina paced back and forth in the hallway, waiting for Grant to come back out. The hospital in the normally lazy town was full of activity. Women with humungous bellies were beings moved around, either in wheelchairs or by waddling, as police officers followed them.

"It's not a crime to love being pregnant!" one woman with a sextuplet belly extending far beyond the constraints of her clothing, protested.

"It is a crime to join with others in inciting protests," a cop growled. "We saw your posts on Facebook. New city pregnancy laws make that a crime."

"This is insane," the woman cried out. "I'm creating life inside my womb! You should be bowing down to me!"

As the crowd of police and pregnant women passed, Grant stepped out of the room and walked one of the hospital's vending machines. Catalina stepped from behind the machine and leaned against it, a sultry smile on her face. "Hi there."

"H-hi," Grant sighed, recognizing Catalina.

"Hope I didn't startle you," she giggled.

"No, I could see your belly sticking out," Grant said, turning back to the machine. Catalina took his chin in her hand and turned Grant back to face her. She winced a little as she gripped him: his beard obviously hadn't been washed in a day or two.

"I'm glad," Catalina purred. "Because I wanted to talk to you, Grant. I've been wanting to talk to you for a while."

"How do you know my name?" he said.

Catalina just smiled and continued to pet his hairy face. "Grant...sweetie, I know you have some old movies of mine." Grant immediately started to turn pale. It was embarrassing enough that someone was telling him they knew he bought porn. But the woman in the video itself? Grant started to stutter, but Catalina kept going. "You know, I've been looking for those for a long, long time. I was wondering if I could...have them?"

Grant started to relax. She wanted the DVDs back. He hadn't even gotten to watch them yet. "I-I dunno..."

"I'm sure we could think of a trade," Catalina smiled. "An autographed copy of 'Elite Belly Force?' Or an advanced screening of my next movie, 'Birth of Danger?'"

"No thanks," Grant said, getting his soda out of the machine. Catalina was increasingly desperate and snatched the drink out of Grant's hands.

"Or maybe...I can do something else for you," Catalina said, shaking up the drink and opening it. The soda shot foam onto her chest, making her top even tighter than before and giving her heaping exposed cleavage an enticing shine. She really, really didn't want to have sex with Grant, but if it meant getting away from Antonio, she'd sleep with a hundred dweebs.

"Look, I don't-" Grant started to say, before hesitating. He remembered some of Joel's words days earlier and had an idea. "Actually...hold that thought for a second."

"And that's how the amulet is used. Understand?" Kim said, hand against Brandon's chest. She was still possessed by Lania, still pregnant with nine fetuses, and still completely naked aside from her bra and underwear.

"Y-yes," Brandon said, her face inches from his own as she leaned in to grip his amulet. Her soft fingers were touching his chest and her huge belly was bumping against his thigh. "T-thanks."

"Of course," Kim said, returning to her seat at the café. "You have the master amulet, so to stop Yaral's spread of chaos, you're the most important person."

"How do I stop it?" Brandon asked. "I tried to make Sarah and Ashley's bellies smaller and that didn't work."

"The eight amulets are in a state of maximum stimulation," Kim said, hand on her belly. "Now they're at their strongest and the most chaos can come out of this. You will need to find a way to stop the chaotic influence and make things return to a state of normalcy."

"How the hell do I do that?" Brandon said. Kim shrugged.

"Your amulet is stronger than the others," she said. "Use it to your advantage. But you should be warned: as the amulets grow in power, so do their individual abilities."

"You mean besides the whole 'pregnancy transfer' thing?" Brandon asked.

"Yes. The other seven, to add more chaos to the mix, were infused with various evils. Greed, wrath, lust, etc." Brandon gulped when he heard this news. He hoped the owner of the lust amulet wasn't anyone he knew. "But yours comes with two."

"Two evils?" Brandon said. "I haven't felt my personality change at all...except I'm more nervous with all these pregnant women around now."

Kim ignored Brandon's tiny admission of pregnant love and kept explaining. "For one, you can increase the sizes of pregnancies by greater amounts than any other amulet. And as it grows in strength, pregnant women will find themselves...drawn to you."

"Drawn to me?" Brandon said.

"Yes. Even in this body, though she feels a certain amount of disdain for you, this woman wants to get intimate with you on a primal level," Kim said, looking down at the body she was taking over. "Curious. Would you like to have sex now so this feeling can pass or would you like to continue?"

"C-continue," Brandon shuddered. This would explain Clara and Kristina's behavior lately...and that girl in the mall who gave Brandon her number. But did this extend to Sarah and Ashley. Flashes of Ashley's naked rear and bare belly flashed into his head and he let out a tiny groan. "I-is there anything else I need to know?"

"Not at the moment," Kim sighed. "My focus is beginning to break. I need to recharge by letting this body be around more pregnant women." Kim stood up, stretching out so her nine-baby belly jutted out an extra few inches, then proceeded to stroke it. "Are you sure you would not like to lay with this body? It feels like she is more than willing."

"I'll pass," Brandon choked out. Kim was, even before she got pregnant, a super-sexy woman, but he was still reeling from his break-up with Erin and his confusing moment with Ashley. Plus, the idea of having sex with his father's mistress was not exactly appealing.

"Very well," Kim nodded. "I will likely see you again before the day is over. I may have new information once I've rested."

"Bye, Lania," Brandon muttered, waving to Kim as she waddled back down the street, catching looks wherever she went. The waiter put down the bill and let out a sigh.

"Those new pregnancy laws still can't keep pregnant women from wearing as little as they can when they come over here," he said. "If the owner wasn't a big preggo too, your lady friend would have had to put on some real clothes...although she did have a great face and ass."

"A-and belly," Brandon said, putting his credit card on the bill.

"Bellies are gross," the waiter scoffed. "But her tits were really nice too."

Grant tapped Joel on the shoulder a few times until his tall friend woke up. "Hey pal, you alright?"

"Fine," Joel smiled. "Just getting some rest, but otherwise I feel good as new."

"Glad to hear it," Grant said. "If you hadn't been healthy enough, you may not have been able to beta-test the new roleplaying expansion."

"I would have hated to miss that," Joel chuckled. Joel had been randomly selected from just a handful of people in the country to test a new, wide expansion for their usual D&D routines.

"About that," Grant said, leaning in closely. "I think I might have something you'd want to trade for your spot."

"Give up my spot?" Joel said. "No way. I'm in the hospital, I know, but I'm not delirious. Nice try."

"Really!" Grant said. "Remember what you told me about...pregnant women?" He was glad Grace wasn't in the room to hear this.

"I'm listening," Joel said.

"W-well, I just happen to have a very attractive pregnant woman who'd be willing to have sex with you," Grant smiled.

"Who, the nurse?" Joel said. "She's hot, sure, but this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity."

"Not the nurse," Grant said, holding up one of his DVDs. "Her."

"Catalina?" Joel yelled, sitting up in his hospital bed. "Catalina Corazon will have sex with me?" He narrowed his eyes. "What do you get out of this?"

"Beta-testing," Grant grinned. "Deal?"

Joel hesitated before reaching one hand out to Grant. "Deal."

Grant shook Joel's hand and darted back to the door, opening it up. "Alright, he's ready for you in here." Catalina waddled in slowly, one hand on her belly. She looked Joel over for a few seconds.

Slightly less gross than this one, Catalina thought, turning back to Grant. "You're a good friend."

"I am, aren't I?" Grant smiled, before Catalina grabbed him by the collar. Her alluring tone was gone and her prideful, powerful voice was back.

"Leave the DVDs on the table. When I'm finished, I'm taking them and leaving. Understand?" Catalina whispered.

"U-understand," Grant squeaked out, putting the DVDs near the door and running out.

Catalina turned back to Joel and smiled. "Now then...think you're ready?"

"Always ready," Joel grinned. "Though...I've never done it in a hospital bed before."

Catalina sighed. Just get it over with. Just get it over with. Just get it over with. "We'll find a way, babe."

Sarah typed away at her laptop, still huddled in the tiny workroom she managed to put together in the back of Katie's store. To anyone else, the space might have seemed roomier, but Sarah was pregnant with 15 full-term fetuses and space was in short supply. Still, despite the cramps, the kicks, the occasional craving, Sarah was confident that she'd finished the device: one zap from this beam and a woman's womb would transform into a generator of immense amounts of biological and thermic energy. The pregnancy, if it could still be called that, would be permanent as a result and the woman would stay incredibly healthy as the energy filled her body. The more pregnant a woman was, the more energy she generated and the more that could be shared with others. And, if the woman wanted to resume her pregnancy and one day give birth to her children, it was an easily reversed procedure.

"Perfect," Sarah sighed, hands on her hips. "I think this might be my greatest invention. Better than what those goons who kidnapped me put together, for sure." Her envy had not dissipated one iota. She wondered whether she should use the beam on her own womb again. The idea of not going into labor and taking care of 15 babies appealed to her, but did she also want to look pregnant forever? And when Antonio used similar technology on her, it made her have an...orgasm and then pass out. That made her shiver a bit. "Well, someone's got to-" Sarah began to say before her cellphone buzzed. Sarah pried it out of her increasingly tight pants and saw a reminder she left herself. "Shit, I have to meet with that investor in like 10 minutes!"

Sarah fastened her robo-spine on and loaded up as many of her pregnant inventions as she could. Of course, the laser and her pregnancy creating/removing gun were the first to go in, but she'd made so much more. A revolution for pregnant women around the world was in this little cardboard box she clumsily tried to pick up and rest on her belly. As Sarah waddled, struggling even with the new-and-improved robospine, a helping hand held the other side of the box. "Do you need help?"

"I do, thanks," Sarah smiled, glad to have the weight relieved a bit. Her view was still blocked by the box, but if she'd seen the stranger, she probably would have yelled out loud. Kim, still mostly nude, was holding part of the box as she waddled along with Sarah. With nothing else to do, Lania sought out her descendants and the closest one was Sarah Page. Kim smiled softly as she admired Sarah: beautiful, brilliant, hugely pregnant. But Lania could tell she lacked confidence.

"Excuse me," Kim said. "How long have you had that amulet?"

Sarah gulped. "A day or so. Why?"

"Just asking," Kim sighed. She didn't want to worry her great-great-great-many-times-great-granddaughter just yet. "It just makes you look so...strong and sure-headed."

"Oh," Sarah said, never hearing such an odd compliment before. "T-thanks."

"You're welcome," Kim smiled as Sarah made it through the mall's doors. "Just remember to believe in yourself."

That hasn't been easy lately, Sarah thought. "Thank you," she said, trying to peek behind her boxes to see the woman who helped her, but Kim was already off, exploring the mall for what it had to offer a thousand-year-old spirit. "Oh well. Taxi!"

Mara sighed, crossing her arms as she fidgeted in her seat. She liked having Erin as a new friend and even thought it was cool that her friend was pregnant, but in the theater, the problems with having a hugely pregnant friend were starting to make themselves known. For one, Erin had the armrests down so she could fit her nine-baby belly into the tiny seats. Normally, Mara would be happy to be able to rest her arm on Erin's pregnant stomach, but Erin fidgeted just as much as Mara, constantly readjusting after her fetuses squirmed and kicked inside her.

On top of that, Mara couldn't hear the movie over the sound of Erin snacking. Her fingers rustled the popcorn in the bucket, her teeth cracked the hard peanuts and chocolates, and her lips slurped up cups of lemonade until the straw made a horrible "empty" sound. It was driving Mara crazy.

"Ugh, I shouldn't be eating this stuff," Erin whispered to her new friend, unaware how much noise she was already making in the theater. "I have more golf games planned and I should be trying to stay in shape." Erin placed a hand on her pregnant belly, rubbing her bare skin. "Then again, I already look plenty big. I doubt anyone will notice."

"Aw, Mara," Erin said, stuffing her mouth instead of telling her friend otherwise. "Oof, I regret drinking so much here. When these kids kick my bladder, I feel like I have to let a waterfall loose in here. But this concession stand food is so salty."

"Miss?" a voice whispered, looking in Erin's row.

"Is it the noise?" Mara asked, assuming the voice was coming from an usher.

"No, I'm looking for Erin Parker," the voice said, leaning in closer. It was Antonio's assistant, Wendy. When her eyes fell on Erin's belly, Wendy felt like she found the right woman.

"That's me," Erin said, wiping her lips clean. "May I help you?"

"Yes, you can," Wendy smiled. "I'm part of the mall's administration. Would you mind coming with me?"

"O-oh," Erin blushed, heavily herself up slowly, her belly jiggling around as she moved. "Alright then. Mara, do you want to-"

"This is a private conversation, I'm afraid," Wendy said, crossing her arms behind her back. Emulating Rebecca's imposing look was tricky to pull off.

"Ok...well, it was nice to spend time with you again," Erin said, smiling at her friend. "Sorry about this."

"It's fine," Mara smiled back. She liked Erin too, but she was looking forward to being able to hear the movie. "Have...fun I guess."

"Yeah," Erin said with a nervous laugh, going off with Wendy. When the two left, Mara snatched a few snacks from the cart before the theater's employees came back to whisk it away.

"Now what's happening in this thing?" Mara said to herself, dropping a maltball in her mouth. "Why are there three coins now?"

"You're kidding," Sarah said, hands on her belly.

"No, I've devoted a lot of research to this," Dr. Schultz said. He had just finished telling Sarah about the amulets and their powers. His history was not as complete as Lania's, but he knew the basics: somehow, the amulets led to spikes in pregnancies and came with the seven evils to tempt the women who were unlucky enough to wear the amulets themselves. "Throughout the past few millennia, you can find a few instances of unexplained population growth, accompanied by rumors about magical jewelry."

Sarah gulped, stroking the amulet nestled between her breasts. She couldn't dismiss him outright: from her own testing of the amulet on her technology, what he was saying was obviously true. But the news about bringing out negative behavior in people was news to her. Why did he have to be the one to understand these things about the amulets but not have to face its consequences? Her envy built up in her, still ignorant to its effects.

"I would have dismissed it all as rumor and coincidence too...except for one case in a small town in what is now Southern Germany," Dr. Schultz said. "Very few people know about it and of those who do, most have dismissed it as a fairy tale. But I know better."

"What happened?" Sarah asked, getting nervous.

"What the records show is the same thing: seven women began wearing these amulets and the entire female population of childbearing age began bearing enormously large pregnancies," Dr. Schultz continued. "But it didn't end there. The women with amulets...started a war."

"A war?" Sarah said, confused.

"On a very small scale, but yes. The seven women divided themselves into two sides and manipulated the people of the town to pick a group to support. In the end, everyone ended up having to leave the village and it disappeared from memory," Dr. Schultz sighed. "But allegedly, one of the women with an amulet, the one with the largest pregnancy, said of the ruined town: 'This will happen once more.'" That sent shivers down Sarah's spine. "So you can understand my curiosity now that I appear to see the very amulet before me."

"I-I see your point," Sarah said, "but I've got things under control. I've actually found a way to harness the amulet's power into my inventions. That's why I need your funding."

"Inventions?" Dr. Schultz said, crossing his arms. "Forgive me, but I don't see how you can turn a magical amulet into a...household accessory."

Sarah pouted. Men were constantly looking down on her genius. Why did they have to have all the success? Why couldn't she be recognized as a great inventor? She'd show them...she'd show them all. Sarah heaved herself up and took out a metallic armband.

"Here is a prototype for a commercial version of what I've already developed," Sarah said. "Imagine pregnant women all over the world being able to change the size of their pregnancy size. Right now, I'm pregnant with 15, but with one button, I can have 16." Sarah tapped her armband and her belly swelled out another half a foot. "Or 17." Another swell. Her clothes were beginning to audibly strain. "Or hell, this thing is so good, I could go up to 20!" With that, Sarah ballooned to an incredible size, her pregnancy reaching unbelievable proportions. Multiple feet of belly jutted out from her stomach and it was perfectly round, firm, and smooth.

"Oh my," Dr. Schultz said, adjusting his glasses. "This really...um..."

"And women all over the world can have this same level of control," Sarah boasted. "Bigger bellies, smaller bellies, quick pregnancies, longer pregnancies. Women who can't conceive can have as many babies in their belly as they want with the press of a button. I even have a way to make pregnancies permanent while generating endless energy."

Dr. Schultz moped his brow with a handkerchief. "T-this is quite a bit more than a device to help pregnant women walk around more easily like you said in your emails."

Sarah blushed, realizing that she may have laid too much on her prospective shareholder at once.

"B-but this will revolutionize...everything!" Dr. Schultz said, standing up. "If you can get this amulet thing under control then...then I'm in," he said, sticking out his hand to Sarah. "Consider me PregTech's first investor."

"Fantastic!" Sarah squealed, shaking the doctor's hand quickly. "You won't regret this! N-now if you excuse me, I want to go finish building these for the grand opening tomorrow."

Sarah bolted out the door, getting out her phone and checking the PregTech corporate bank account. It had millions in it now and she attempted to make a few transfers before the mechanics of business tripped her up too much. "This isn't for me," Sarah sighed, sending money to bail Katie and Janice out of jail.

"She'd better have. Getting us stuck in there...if it was all for nothing, I'll smash that stupid spine of hers so she can feel what it's like to waddle around for once," Janice growled.

"I am now," Katie grinned.
