Preggomall was reaching the climax to its presentations. Wendy was taking a drink to collect herself as Ashley and Kim demonstrated the apps on their smartphones. That's when she got a call from Erin. “Oh hello boss, how are you?” Wendy said in the utmost professional tone.

“Good, good. Tell me, how are you handling the presentation?” Erin asked as she looked out into the afternoon sky. “ Last time I tuned in an Indian woman was orgasming on stage.”

“I assure you that's just a simple thing that happens in the system. We are about to introduce the new car. Did you know your chauffeur is currently driving you where you need to go in one?”

“Really? I thought we were making driverless versions, just like Pregtech” Erin said, a little disappointed.

“We were until we noticed how much of this ‘pregnant energy’ can be transmitted to fuel.”Wendy started. “Then we remembered how you wanted this ‘pregnant feminist movement’ so we realised that being able to drive has its own type of power to it.”

“Okay that sounds fair” Erin said, convinced by her soon to be backstabbers persuasions. “You are sure we tested it?”

“Yes, it turns out that the car can only be driven by pregnant women, one of our henchmen, Bill tested it out today and it crashed on the freeway. Don't worry he isn't injured, the friend he was with was though.” Wendy stated, trying for it to not sound all bad.

“Jesus, did it have any of Preggomalls logos?” Erin asked not worried about the mans life.

“No, but chances are it may be why you're in traffic right now.” Wendy answered “see the car hooks up to the belly ring and from there it can help the driver detect any traffic or chances of collisions.”

“Ah right, we'll make sure to mention that men can't drive it, otherwise we may have a lawsuit on our hands” Erin said before saying goodbye and hanging up.

Wendy went on and gave a thrilling presentation about the new car. Everyone loved it, they were just begging for more at this point. With five fantastic inventions shown it was time for the grand finale. “Ladies and gentlemen, I can't give you all these fantastic inventions without leaving you wanting more.”Wendy politely said to her audience “ Now I present to you a place to store your new car, our final item for today, we present to you Preggomalls Home-suite!”

A hologram of a house came up with a series of purple cords throughout it. “Now you can charge your home appliances, have the perfect security and you will no longer have a care in the world for any chores with your new home plan!” Wendy said as she rotated the house around, and englargened it for everyone to see. “What was scifi a decade ago is now only a purchase away, the Home-Suite is a cleverly inbuilt system that will make anyone feel safe and comfortable at home, with as much freedom as possible.” Wendy announced to the drooling public. “ Our systems detect a hostile person, man or woman in each house and will emit a high pitch noise that will incapacitate the Subject if they don't leave imediately. It will also render any of their Preggomall items ineffective until it they leave.”

Wendy went on and on and when she was finished people were thrusting cash towards her. “Uh, uh, uh…” She delightfully turned back. “Whilst you all were here we had all of today's items brought in for you to purchase and have in your home by the end of the day.”

People ran out the door like a stampede. The room was empty in seconds.

“Do we have enough?” Kim asked Wendy, worried that they would run out.

“Kim my sweet, we have enough for half off he country…” Wendy said with a grand smile.


Grace struggled to get out of her chair as her belly laid firmly on the ground. Her giant orb of flesh took up a good four feet in circumference in front of her. Trying to push up with her legs all she ended up doing was falling forward and rolling on top of her belly. She tried to bring her mini skirt back over her now large arse as she sighed in defeat. “Well it's not like things can get any worse” Grace said sarcastically.

“Ladies and gentlemen, we now present to you a two hour marathon of My Little Pony, in this hall.” The announcer called out. “Would all the bronies please file in.

“NNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!” Grace screamed as she wailed her legs. Desperately she pushed her belly along the smooth concrete floor. After a minute of trying she managed to gain momentum. The neck beards and the fedoras were swarming the hall as she tried her best to leave. She wished she hadn't have given Joel her robospine…

“Good afternoon m’lady” one particular Brony said, as he tipped his fedora. “Can I get a picture?”

“Ugh, no, wait, I said no!” Grace shouted as the guy took the photo. “Fuck off!”

“Heh, bitch…” The guy said as he walked over to sit down. Grace was furious, when she gets her hands on Brandon, he would have a lot to pay for. Looking around she saw Becka sobbing off stage. If she saw grace in this state, all hell would break loose! That's when she saw a couple of familiar faces. Grant! It was Joel's friend from the hospital. “GRANT!” Grace called out.

Grant and Mara were walking through the shops when Grant heard his name call out. Turning to the hall he saw a great ball of flesh with a Grace attached. “Oh great.” Grant said under his breath.

“What is it honey?” Mara asked, as she adjusted her cleavage.

“Ohh nothing, I just saw someone I know.” Grant grudgingly said. “Let's go see her” he dragged her over, trying not to show off his displeasure.

“Oh who, OH GOD… Grace?” Mara asked as she saw the immensely pregnant woman before her. “Tony didn't do this to you, did he?”

“Wait, you two know each other?” Grant asked confused with the situation. “Whose tony?”

“Grace and I used to play DnD together with Tony” Mara started.

“Yeah, we stopped hanging out after I broke up with Him” Grace added. “Can you guys help me with this?” Pointing to her belly, she groaned as she felt a baby kick…

“Sure, we'll help. Right Grant?” Mara said looking at her handsome ‘iron man’ boyfriend.

“Ooohh, alright…” Grant resigned to answering.

On three the three costumed heroes lifted the massive belly and took her away from prying eyes. “Thanks guys. Can you go get Brandon for me? He has my bag and I am craving some food right now…

As Grant and Mara searched around for Brandon, Ashlee and Hayley were walking over to an incredibly pregnant Catalina. “ Catalina, what a pleasant surprise. Who knew you would come in and steal the show, like you always do.” Ashlee said as she rubbed her significantly smaller belly.

“Oh you know me, I can't help it if I do that…” Catalina said with a pleasant smile. “I understand you two B-grade celebrities have such a hard time drawing in the crowds…”

“That's okay, don't worry Ashlee, our ‘superior actor’ here will obviously have her hands full when she gives birth.” Hayley said as she pressed her petite belly against Catalinas gargantuan one. “Doesn't matter anyway, Catalina obviously understands the rules behind being a celebrity at a con”

“Rules?” Catalina asked as her ears perked up. She was Queen Catalina, she didn't need to obey rules.

“Oh yes.” Ashlee said as four Galacti-con security guards came up to her. “As a celebrity at a con, you must sign and get a photo with every last one of your trusting fans! Let's just make sure the belly doesn't take up the entire shot.” She said as she slapped Catalinas jeep sized belly.

Catalina was shocked, no one should mistreat her belly like that! Breathing in she said“Oh is that so huh? Well I'm sure you wouldn't be all high and mighty if you were as pregnant a- “

Just before Catalina could finish, Ashlee Byron and Hayley Hewitts bellies surged out at an phenomenal rate, a few metres away Brandon could hear what sounded like rubber stretching. He walked towards the noise saw his two favourite celebrities bellies expand out tremendously. Ashlee had to take a few steps back her belly was rubbing up against Hayley's and Catalinas. 57, 58, 59…..

PING!

“Let me start that again.” Catalina said as she cleared her throat. “We may be the same size, but that doesn't mean we are on equal grounds.”

“I'm afraid you are” Hayley said with a smirk. “Now, sweetie, let's get you prepped. There's three hours left of today's session of the con and I'm certain you won't be here tomorrow. So let's make sure EVERYONE gets photos and signatures from you!”

“Bu-bu-but” Catalina started

“But nothing!” Ashlee said dominantly “oh and boys remember, don't believe what she says about giving you a role in her up and coming film… It's just her pathetic way of getting people to do what she wants.”

“Oh you’ll pay for that” Catalina called out as she was lead to her table to sign autographs.

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
That was it, It was all over. Sarah stood up, turned off her Tv and walked outside. She had shouted, got mad, ordered and cried. She was still envious of that blasted Preggomall and she knew she was steps away from victory, but she knew the only way she could achieve that victory was by biding her time.

Looking back through her life she had remembered every moment she lost out on an opportunity because of someone richer than her. Her father Tanner helped her study day in, day out for a chance to be on the robo olympics, only to lose from some rich kid from Charlesberg who had bought a more expensive processing system. In high school She found out that James, the quarterback on the schools NFL team broke it off with her to be with Vivian Qwong, the bitchy Asian girl whose father ran the fourth highest accounting firm in Northern America.

And now, she sat with her many inventions stolen from underneath her. She spent so much time building up these concepts, testing the inventions and buying patents, but Preggomall swooped in and took the lot! But if there was one thing she knew, it was that she was clever! The problem was that she had sent off everyone that could help her, so now she has no one to help her with the final stage of her plan. She needed to go around the edge of Freyjaton and place antennas that would transmit the deactivation command. She needed to find someone.

She went back in to see the Pregtech crew hard at work. Unfortunately a lot of the women there were off at collective ultrasounds. She realised that the men there did not appreciate the pregnant form, but Sarah would soon change that. Unbuttoning the top of her blouse she accentuated her valley of alluring cleavage. She let down her hair and rolled up her skirt, giving a new definition to the term ‘mini skirt’.

The men working there weren't too happy with Sarah. She had no work ethic to anyone that wasn't a woman and to add onto that they just found out this morning that they hadn't been paid for the time they've worked. One muscular worker by the name of Tony had been putting some research into the matter.

“Hey Tony” Sarah breathily said to the well built worker. Biting her lip slightly she continued “I need, a favour… If you can by any chance help me put up these pillars in my car, I promise I can make it worth your while…”

“No can do missy.” Tony said, leaning against the first aid box. “ you my friend haven’t payed us in ages so we have no reason to be working.”

“What?” Sarah shockingly asked, her whimsical, sexual self behind. “That can't be, we have one of the richest men alive funding us.”

“Oh really?” Tony asked with a sly grin on his face. “How about we go to your office and find out for ourselves..”

Tony and Sarah walked into her office and they both looked up the status of Pregtech’s funds. A unintelligible sound of fear came from Sarah as she saw The number that appeared on screen. What was originally in the seven digit figures had plummeted to less than ten thousand dollars. Her company would be bankrupt by sunrise tomorrow. She needed to act fast. Grabbing Tony and the antennas they both ran down to the car.




Brandon stood there as he watched 3 astronomically pregnant women head their separate ways. He already had the entrée, but now Brandon wanted the main and dessert of pregnant celebrities. Lining up he looked at how far the queue was until he would get a photo with the two sensually sexy celebs. It wasn't looking too good.

Just before he knew it, he got a tap on the shoulder. It was Mara! “Brandon… You… Oh god… You need to… Ugh… Go see… Grace…” Mara panted in her Black Widow costume.

“Crap” Brandon said, looking as another twenty people started lining up behind him. “Can you keep my spot as I wait?”

“Fine, just let Grant know where I am. “ Mara said as she took his spot in line.”

After finding out where Grace was, Brandon ran over to her location. The first thing Brandon could see as he made his way over, was her perfectly toned legs. History had rewritten so that he legs were much more juicy now, but they still retained definition. Up next was he now huge derrière. It bounced a little with every movement that Graces legs made. As the crowds started to thin he could make out her huge pale belly that she was resting on and lastly her now furious face which had seen Brandon coming a mile away. That's what happens when you wear a bright blue costume.

“You…” Grace meniacally growled to the hero of our story. “Change me back right now!” She ordered

“Of course, I'm sorry…” Brandon said, quickly transferring the chaotic energy back to his amulet. His tesseract started to give over a reddish glow, but he thought nothing of it. Graces belly continued to shrink, she got up as the belly became more manageable. It shrunk and shrunk until her belly was flat again and her well worked out six pack abs came back.

“Thank you” Grace said with a smile. “I’m still quite annoyed at you, but all I want right now is to hold Joel. Let's exchange numbers just in case this happens again.”

After they exchanged numbers Brandon headed back to the line. On the way over he noticed his tesseract was feeling a little different. He opened up the box and saw that the amulets gems were glowing bright red and it had started humming. If Brandon had read the manual he would have realised the amulet could hold up to five pregnancies, 40 was way too many for such a fragile magic device to handle. Brandon played it off as nothing and continued walked back to Mara.

Becka tried her best to keep her now very tight zero Suit Samus Costume together. Thank Christ she went with the two piece, work out suit rather than the one piece high heel outfit. A brief breeze brushed up against her exposed belly, causing her to shudder. Trying to manage a quintuplet sized belly was one thing but her outfit was straining her breasts. Her cleavage was over flowing and her butt felt like two watermelons trying to hide in a thong. She was having the worst wedgie!

As she waddled through the con, trying her best to pose for photos, she tried to pin point how she became pregnant. She remembered there wasn't many pregnant people at the convention. There was that captain America cosplayer who said something about pregnant devices, he was a bit weird… He was also hanging out with Grace, maybe one of them could undo what happened to her belly!


Rey?

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
With her skin-tight blue costume barely holding together thanks to the recent mass pregnancy transfer, Becka waddled toward Brandon fuming. She was waddling but determined.

“You!” She began to say, pointing a gloved finger at the young man now holding an amulet with different, unnerving colors. Becka stopped once she actually lay eyes on him. Now that she was pregnant, the master amulet changed more about Becka than just her maternal state and she didn’t realize how attractive Brandon seemed to her. Her jaw began to relax as she gazed at him.

“Yes?” Brandon said, his voice choking a little.

She shook her head and got back on track. “You did this somehow, didn’t you?” Her non-judging finger patted her belly, which only made Brandon’s blush grow. “I saw you talking with Super-Preggo and things kept getting weird.”

“I-I don’t know what you’re talking about,” Brandon said, looking around for one of his friends to help him find a way out of this confrontation. Mara and Grant were out testing video games or standing in line for over-priced autographs. Joel and Grace were hitting it off too well for Brandon’s fellow pregnancy fetishist to get distracted over Becka.

“Don’t play dumb. I did my research. Grace is from that pregnancy town and you are too. Something really weird is going on,” Becka said, her belly pressing against Brandon and shoving him back a few steps. “Now spill it.”

“Brandon, there you are,” Catalina’s booming voice said as she waddled over, pushing both Brandon and Becka away with her absolutely colossal belly. Brandon marveled over her silently, now getting a better look at the 60-baby-carrying actress. Her outfit was essentially tatters now, and not just around where her stomach and hips needed room. A few days ago, Catalina’s belly was the size her breasts were now so there was no scrap of fabric untorn by her latest transformation.

“C-Catalina, hey,” Brandon said, his mind immediately turning to their past sexual encounters and wondering if she would take him up on another round. He also began to think of his other recent pregnant trysts and how they would go if the women in his life were as big as Catalina. Ashley, Sarah, Janice, and of course, Erin. Brandon felt himself get light-headed.

“I finally got a break from signing autographs. I swear, no one here knows how to treat a celebrity. Or a pregnant woman, for that matter! Everyone keeps bumping into my belly,” Catalina fumed, putting her hands on her wide hips and looking over the convention floor. “I was actually relieved to see you. You know how to be polite around a big-bellied woman.”

“Does he now?” Becka said, raising an eyebrow and turning back to Brandon. He continued to turn red, but not out of arousal. Too many people knew about the amulet and its powers already and if Becka let the cat out of the back, what would happen? Would the reality changing undo itself? What kind of chaos would that unleash? He could feel his amulet pulsing as the questions crossed his mind.

“Wait…I know you…” Catalina said, pointing at Becka as she stroked her belly. “You’re that cosplay star, aren’t you?”

Becka’s ears perked up. If anyone rivaled Catalina in their love for fan attention, it was Princess Becka. “Why yes, I am.”

“You never played any of my characters,” Catalina said with a low growl, prodding one finger into Becka’s big belly. “What, stuck playing women who were never even pregnant?”

“What? No, you don’t understand, this just happ-“

“Still…this may be a perfect opportunity,” Catalina said, her plump caramel lips turning into a smile. “If I give you access to my real costumes, you could start a real trend. Move over Star Wars and comic books, Catalina Corazon will be the new go-to for conventions and Halloween!”

To Becka, this sounded like a chance to increase the attention she got, maybe even a potential paid gig. “Let’s talk, Ms. Corazon.”

Catalina put her arm around Becka’s shoulder and turned her around, getting ready to waddle away. “Wait, before I forget.” She reached between her swollen breasts and handed Brandon a card. “I won an invitation to dinner with these two nobody actresses. Take this off my hands, will you?”

With trembling hands, Brandon took the card and read it over. A private dinner with Hayley Hewitt. And Ashlee Byron. Both of who were now as pregnant as Catalina thanks to the mix-up with the amulets. He looked over his shoulder to see if he could find his friends, then checked the card again. “Only room for one guest…sorry guys, looks like you’ll have to spend your night without me.”



Meanwhile, outside the convention center, Erin’s limousine had just parked. Due to the massive foot traffic, they had to be dozens of rows back, which meant a lot of walking for Erin. She still had her robo-spine but it would be a trek even if she wasn’t pregnant.

“That was a hell of a drive,” Dana groaned, stepping out of the car to stretch out, her belly jutting out far and pushing her shirt up and her pants down, though she didn’t seem to pay it any mind. “Sorry, guess your chauffer shouldn’t complain like that.”

“No worries, you’re right,” Erin said, wiping barbecue sauce from her lips. “You didn’t complain when I kept asking you to pull over for food.”

“Hey, if I had a belly like yours, I bet I’d be hungry too…ma’am,” Dana said, looking at Erin’s much larger pregnant stomach.

Erin chuckled and looked toward the main building where the event was taking place. “Any plans for the rest of the day, Dana?”

“No, I think I’ll just find us a hotel and relax, maybe waddle around town,” Dana said, stroking her fingers around the device attached to her navel. “This makes that a lot easier after all.”

“Have fun,” Erin nodded. “I’ll contact you if I need anything.” Dana got back in the car as Erin began her walk toward the convention. As she walked, passersby noted her Agent Carter costume.

“That red dress is wrong. It's not period-accurate.”

“Yeah, okay,” Erin said, nodding at them.

“And her pregnancy isn’t canon.”

“Thanks, whatever,” Erin sighed, rolling her eyes.

“And your neckline s-shouldn't be so low,” one noted with a nervous gulp. “You know, to be comic-accurate.”

“My neckline is just fine,” Erin said, glaring back at them. “Now leave me alone.”

“Rich girls,” they said with a scoff, shaking their heads and going on their way. Erin groaned again and refocused her efforts on the convention hall before thinking about Brandon and checking how much of her cleavage was being revealed. She was more than satisfied.



As Erin was getting closer, Sarah was letting out a relieved sigh as she and Tony planted the final antennae in the outskirts of Freyjaton. Both were covered in sweat, though Sarah was much more worn. “What are you so tired about? I did all the heavy lifting,” Tony snapped.

“Hey, this belly isn’t full of hot air. It’s heavy,” Sarah panted.

“No, it’s not full of hot air,” Tony grumbled.

“What was that?”

“Nothing. So about my payment-“

“Once this is done, people will be flocking to PregTech and our profits will more than make up for the lost investment,” Sarah said, tapping on one of her remote controls. She still wasn’t sure why Dr. Schultz’s funds vanished but she was sure it had something to do with PreggoMall. It wasn’t the time to worry about such things. Her moment of triumph was at hand.

“That’s not reassuring. I need payment. Real payment,” Tony said. “Or else…”

Sarah stopped and looked over at him. “Or else what?”

“Clearly you have some way to remotely fuck with PreggoMall’s products. A quick phone call and they may be able to stave the tide, so to speak,” Tony said with a growing smile.

“Good point,” Sarah said, rolling her eyes and reaching into her bag for her personalized tablet. With a few taps, she showed Tony the screen. “There, I transferred half of my shares in the company to you. That enough collateral?”

“Should be,” Tony cackled. “Nice doing business with you.”

“Happy to. And you’ll need it to support your new family,” Sarah said, reaching for another remote control.

“Family? I’m a happy bachelor, Ms. Page,” Tony said.

“And you still will be,” Sarah said, pointing a new device at Tony. “I suppose now is as good a time to test this as any.”

“Test what?” Tony said just before Sarah powered it up. A beam of yellow light hit Tony and he cried out in surprise. His outfit contorted, with certain parts becoming too roomy and certain others becoming far too tight. Tony’s musculature shrank as his chest and belly grew and grew. In just seconds, one of Sarah’s few male employees was now a very, very pregnant woman.

“Just as I feared. It’s a little too effective and not practical,” Sarah sighed. “Oh well.”

“What did you do to me?” the woman outside the car squeaked.

“Don’t worry, I already had your company file changed to ‘Tonya.’ I know you’ve been planning on selling me out to PreggoMall and obviously I wouldn’t let you get away with it,” Sarah said. “Any more complaints?”

“N-no ma’am,” Tonya said with a quick nod.

“Good, now then,” Sarah said, grabbing a third remote control. “Time to turn PreggoMall’s lights off.” And with that, she started up her antennas and hit the switch.

“You’re one to talk,” Jaccara chuckled back, her octuplet belly still not as large as Becka’s large, round stomach. “And yes, I did leave the house like this. I’ve been pregnant for…for…” Jaccara paused and looked at Brandon. “Wait…I don’t remember being pregnant before today.”

“Okay, I think it’s time for you to go,” Brandon said quickly, putting his hand on Jaccara’s back and ushering her away. “D-do you want my number?”

“Don’t bother,” Jaccara said. “There’s something fishy going on with you…even if you are great at pleasuring pregnant women.”

Becka blushed as Jaccara waddled away. As part of the amulet’s effects, she had found something about Brandon suspiciously charming since she gained the belly. And now that she’d heard and seen that he was good with pregnant women…her curiosity was perked even more. “So, I have hard evidence now,” Becka said when Jaccara had gone. “You really can control women’s pregnancies somehow. And…you even like having sex with pregnant women.” Brandon’s blush continued to flair up. “So then why’d you take away dumb Grace’s belly? She may have no style but I can see how someone’d find her attractive.”

Brandon sighed, not seeing any way around the issue now. “Grace is a good friend and she wanted the pregnancy out of her way. Plus, she and another friend of mine may be going out and I wanted to give them both a chance.”

“Hmph,” Becka said, putting her hands on her widened hips and pouting. “You’re all so boring. ‘I did it for my friend,’ ‘I wanted to be nice,’ blah blah blah.” She stepped closer, shoving Brandon a little with her pregnancy. “So then why’d you give me a belly, huh?”

Brandon gulped. “Sometimes it happens by accident,” he lied.

Becka nodded and started to rub her belly against him. “So if you can take away Grace’s pregnancy…can you make mine bigger?”

Now he was really getting flustered. “B-bigger?”

“Yeah, maybe I’m starting to get the hang of it,” Becka purred, finding the tip of his new erection with the underside of her large belly. “I’d like to see what it’s like to be the biggest pregnant woman in the building. I’ve got a long way to go to catch up to that diva Catalina, right?”

Brandon hesitated. He knew the more pregnant she got, the more she would want to sleep with him and, as a champion cosplayer, she was very good looking. Brandon’s hands started to grip his tesseract before-

“No,” Brandon said, stepping away and maneuvering around Becka’s enormous swollen middle.

“No?” Becka pouted.

“No,” Brandon repeated with a nod. “After all you did and said to Grace…you don’t deserve it.” He turned around and hurried away before he changed his mind.

Becka stomped the ground with her foot, chewing on her bottom lip. Now she was stuck with an octuplet pregnancy and no one to satisfy this new craving inside her. Guess I’ll have to find someone else who likes to sleep with pregnant women, Becka thought to herself. But where can I find someone like that?

Her train of thought was derailed as Catalina swung her arm around Becka’s shoulder and gripped her tightly. “Hey! Don’t keep running off on me. It’s hard enough to move around with a belly this size, even with the robo-spine!”

“Robo…spine?” Becka said, always intimidated by Catalina’s huge belly size.

“Long story. Anyway, let’s talk about planning your next convention and which of my characters you’ll cosplay as,” Catalina said, stroking her enormous curves. With each step, her hips swung and her rear and belly smacked against Becka.

“S-sure,” Becka said. “But how about we talk over dinner? It’s getting late, anyway.”

“Dinner,” Catalina said, stroking her belly in thought. “Sure. There’s a country club nearby that should have plenty of wealthy admirers. I may not even have to pay if we go there.”

“Sounds good,” Becka said, putting one arm under her sore belly. Anything to sit down and not be smothered by this enormous woman…

Hours later, after scurrying around, Brandon met up with Joel, Grace, Grant, and Mara on the main floor of the convention. “There you are,” Grant said with a sigh. “We really got split up, huh?”

“Yeah,” Brandon said, breathing heavily. “W-was it all fun for you?”

“Sure, we had a great time,” Mara said, she and Grant giggling. “Can’t wait to come back tomorrow. But for now, I am tired and I am hungry.”

“Dinner then?” Joel said. “We can take our costumes off, shower, and then eat.”

Before Brandon could chime in, a convention employee jogged over, just as out of breath as Brandon. “Thank god…I finally found you…” he said, bending over. “This year’s convention is such a chaotic mess…”

“Um…can I help you?” Brandon said.

“You were given the ticket to the celebrity dinner tonight, yeah?” the employee said. Brandon reached into his pocket to see the ticket Catalina had won after gifting it to him. “Perfect, let’s go. Ms. Hewitt and Ms. Byron have been waiting long enough already.”

Brandon’s face turned bright red. Both women were preposterously pregnant thanks to a run in between Brandon and Catalina’s amulets and they were already his favorite actresses when it came to…personal fantasies.

“Can my friends come?” Brandon said with a shaking voice.

“Sorry, just one person,” the employee said. “You should have talked this over earlier.”

Brandon gulped and told his friends sorry before following the convention employee to a date with two sexy pregnant women.

“I guess the rest of us are just going to get dinner on our own?” Joel said with a shrug before his phone rang. “Sorry, one sec…hello?”

“Hello Joel,” Janice’s voice said on the other end. Joel immediately froze. She’d been extremely angry lately and always left him trembling.

“H-hi Janice,” Joel said. Grace’s eyebrows rose as she turned to him. “W-what’s up?”

“I’ve just been thinking,” Janice said with a sniffle. She’d been crying. “About how I’m carrying your babies inside my belly.”

“Listen, Janice-“

“All 40 of ‘em,” Janice said. Joel froze in place, not remembering the number being that high. “But we have been through our ups and downs and with PregTech…I can be my own woman and I can be independent. I’m just calling you to let you know that I have no intention of giving birth to these babies anytime soon.”

Joel paused. “I…don’t understand.”

“But as far as I’m concerned, you gave up your rights to be their father when you started hitting on Sarah’s whale of a mother while I was gestating these babies,” Janice said. “Goodbye Joel.”

“Good…bye?” Joel said as the receiver clicked off. He looked at his phone, confused. None of her usual wrath was present in her voice.

“An old friend of yours?” Grace grumbled, still glaring at Joel.

“Um…sorta?” Joel said as Grace turned her back and walked away.

“Grant, Mara, can I drive with you two?” Grace said.

“We took the same car,” Mara said as she hurried after Grace.

Grant followed suit, flashing a quick look at Joel. “Nice going, dude.”

“W-what’s going on?” Joel mumbled to himself. How was Janice’s wrath gone? And where did it go?

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Rebecca’s foot stomped into a puddle in the PreggoMall parking lot, Janice's wrath amulet wrapped around her neck. Before all of the pregnancy incidents, Rebecca had been a more than formidable agent in Antonio’s organization. But with the sloth amulet, her abilities had been restricted but when she actually did her job, it went off perfectly. Now she had Janice’s wrath amulet and she was no longer Antonio’s effective spy and commando.

Now she was dangerous.

Rebecca stormed into the mall, pushing past writhing pregnant women still dealing with the malfunctioning PreggoMall devices and the ensuing furor of fear and hormones. As she bumped into their bumps, her new amulet made up for the fetuses she'd transferred to Janice.

PING!

Rebecca didn't totally steal anyone's pregnancies, but with the explosion of magic and technology in the town as of late, most women were carrying quadruplets at the least. As they slimmed down by a few inches each, Rebecca's belly swelled, its golden smooth bulge pushing out past her shirt. By the time Rebecca made it to the main lobby, she was pregnant with 30 babies and each addition to her womb only made her anger grow and grow.

"H-hey there," the muscular pregnant spa owner wheezed, one hand clutching her big belly as the other gripped the door frame to her business. Her belly ring was buzzing like crazy and putting her mind on one thing and one thing only. “You’re Rebecca, aren’t you?”

Rebecca sneered, remembering how careless she was with the other employees in the mall while she had her sloth amulet. “What do you want?”

“You said you might want a private massage some time,” the woman said with a sultry laugh, waddling forward and touching her belly against Rebecca’s. The wrath amulet glowed and Rebecca’s belly surged forward again. “What do you say?”

Rebecca looked the woman over a few times. Like Rebecca, this woman had clearly trained her body but she got to have a life of frolic and luxury while Rebecca was dedicated to silent duty. That enraged her and she grabbed the woman by the strap of her tank top, making her breasts fall out naked.

“I’ll call you when I need a massage, not the other way around,” Rebecca growled. “And you’d better bring some better looking friends when I do. Understand?”

The spa owner squeaked a reply and nodded quickly as Rebecca released her. A bemused chuckle left Rebecca’s lips as she turned around, stroking her belly as she headed for the main office. With all the fallout from the PreggoMall technology crashing, conquering this place would be even easier than Rebecca had expected. Maybe she wouldn’t just have to get revenge. Maybe she could make some money off of this as well.

In the CEO’s office, Wendy was sitting in a large chair, originally built for Erin’s specific pregnant weight, but she was taking charge now. Hurriedly, Wendy was tapping away at her private computer, hooked up to a separate system from the rest of the mall. The news of the disaster was already spreading and she was doing her best to do damage control.

“Damn it,” Wendy hissed as she kept learning of the full extent of the damage to the company. “I’m losing millions every second. All my good employees are pregnant and useless. And where the hell is Rebecca?”

“You called?” Rebecca said as the doors to Wendy’s office broke down and skidded across the floor. Rebecca had a ferocious grin across her face as she waddled in, her arms outstretched and flexing. “Oh, we certainly have some things to discuss, Wendy.”

“Rebecca,” Wendy said, standing up and straightening her skirt. “Glad to see you were not affected by our…malfunction. It seems someone has hit us with a cyberattack of sorts and I have one good guess as to whom the culprit is. Start-“

Before Wendy could continue, Rebecca had smashed both fists down on her desk, breaking the legs and making the whole structure crash to the floor. Her belly pushed against Wendy’s, forcing the diminutive woman against the window.

“You don’t get to call the shots anymore,” Rebecca sneered. “Or Antonio. Where is he, anyway?”

“Away. Far away. And there is no need for him to come back,” Wendy said. “I will take charge of his legacy.”

“Then you will take the blame,” Rebecca said, lifting her fists again.

“I’m not the one you should be angry with,” Wendy said, holding out her hand and stopping Rebecca in her tracks. “I am here to correct the path of PreggoMall. The one who led us astray was our last CEO…Erin.”

“But Erin wasn’t the one who kept me chained up with the amulet,” Rebecca said, lifting the sloth amulet into the air, dangling it in front of Wendy. “I know all about these now.”

Wendy gulped. Her letter to Rebecca had backfired. “Yes, it was a mistake to suppress you like that but the amulets needed to be with those we could trust. And I trust you, Rebecca. No woman is more competent.” She placed one hand on Rebecca’s. “No woman is better suited to lead this company.”

“What do you mean?” Rebecca growled, angry at the thought that Wendy was trying to manipulate her.

“I mean this company will need strong leaders for our true purpose to come into fruition,” Wendy said. “A world of pregnant women, with us as the financial queens. Imagine it.”

Rebecca looked into Wendy’s eyes. Her training could not detect any deceit coming from her. “Then maybe you should take this amulet,” Rebecca said with a sneer, pushing the sloth amulet forward. “Join me with a big belly.”

“No!” Wendy barked. It was so loud and fierce that Rebecca stepped a few feet back. Wendy placed her hand against her flat stomach. “I will only carry Antonio’s child inside me. No chaotic magic or PregTech super science will interfere.”

“Antonio’s child…” Rebecca murmured.

“And once she is born, I will train her to take charge of this company in my place,” Wendy said, looking at her midsection. “And I will let no one stop us.”

“No one, huh?” Rebecca said, looking down at the display from the PreggoMall security cameras. It showed Sarah, Katie, Martiza, and Tonya headed toward the mall in the parking lot. “I think I see a few who want to try.”

As Rebecca turned around to leave, Wendy stopped her. “Wait, let them think they can shut us down. They don’t know about my secret weapon.”

“Secret weapon?” Rebecca said.

“A device to transfer pregnancy into energy,” Wendy said with a smile. “In the basement. I’ll show you…later. First, let them get their attack in. Then surprise them.”

Rebecca grunted. “You had better let me go on the attack soon. I can’t contain all this rage for long and I may just lash out at you.”

“Patience,” Wendy cooed, stroking Rebecca’s bare belly. “You will get to go on a rampage, I promise.”

Rebecca gave Wendy a sickening smile before leaving the office. Wendy chuckled and walked to her crumbling desk and hit the intercom. “Ashley? Please come to my office. I feel we need to discuss…your daughter.” Wendy got a moaning affirmative reply and walked around the office, cackling to herself before touching one hand to her stomach again. “With our technology, I could make you grow to full term in an instant, couldn’t I? But no, I want to savor this. Feel you gestate inside me. After all, once PreggoMall is back up and running, you will be the last natural pregnancy in the world.”



Back downstairs in the mall, Sarah was hiding in one of the least trafficked parts of PreggoMall: the shoe store. Now that women couldn’t see their feet, there wasn’t much interest in what shoes they wore. Sarah had her laptop hooked into the mall’s network and was preparing to hit them with one last strike before PregTech stepped in and reaped its massive reward.

In the meantime, Katie, Tonya, and Martiza were making their way to the sea of bellies to convince the women to start buying from PregTech instead. “It’s like heaven,” Katie said with wide eyes.

“Why, because they’re new customers or new bellies?” Maritza chuckled.

“Both,” Katie giggled, turning to Tonya. She may have been a burly man a few hours ago but Sarah’s invention had turned her into quite the appealing pregnant woman. “So Tonya…how do you like being pregnant?”

“It’s…weird,” Tonya whimpered, cautiously touching her own belly.

“Well listen, if you ever need any help or want someone to talk to,” Katie said, placing one hand on Tonya’s belly. “I’m always here.”

“I thought you wanted to go out with me,” Maritza whispered to Katie.

“Of course,” Katie whispered back. “Just a little friendly advice. Besides, we’re getting that drink tonight. I’m sure of it.”

Maritza chuckled as her blush grew. “We’ll see.”



Who does Rebecca find and confront?

Ashley’s legs were weak as she waddled slowly into Wendy’s office. Eventually she made it into the room and landed belly first onto the broken down doors. Ashley once again looked over the office, filled with artefacts and painting all depicting pregnancy. From modern art to early aztecan models, the room was swimming with fertile curves. “Hi Wendy, how are you?” Ashley barely made out trying withhold her orgasmic pleasure.

Wendy on the other hand knew it was going to be a struggle for Her model to annunciate with the devices attached to her. “Rebecca!” Ashley said clicking her fingers and pointing at the tanned beauty. Rebecca gave a pretty loud growl as she waddled over and detached all the products from today's expo. Rebecca really had a hard time getting to obey Wendy now that she had the wrath amulet. She had to keep her place though, so she placed Ashley in one of the ‘chairs’

“My dear Ashley, look how nice and big you've become! 40 babies and you still haven't given birth yet, you must be a fantastic role model for all middle aged mothers out there!” Wendy said with a convincing smile.

Ashley was quite proud of how far she had come. Taking a deep breath she said“Yeah, it's good to finally feel good about myself, after Tanner left me I didn't think anyone would want me again…”

“Yes of course, hell I fired 98 percent of my male workforce because of their piggish ways.” Wendy said remembering Bill, her lab assistant that built gadgets using a gem from Catalinas amulet. That same gem was now the centrepiece of her necklace, stopping chaotic energy from changing her. “You see, there's a price for being so popular…” She continued as she flipped a switch on her desk. Ashley's arms and legs became strapped to the confines of the steel chair.

“AH! What are you doing to me!” Ashley squealed, trying to escape.

“You see your daughter has cause all this mess, and now I need to fix the cards so that they play once more, in my favour…” Wendy menacingly said topped off with a cackle. “REBECCA, GO GET- Rebecca?” Wendy turned around to see the elevator in front of her leaving the top floor. “Damn it, why do all the hot ones disobey?”. Frustrated with her staff, Wendy grabbed her laptop and started creating a video link.

----

Rebecca got off the elevator and ran like a woman on a mission to the outdoor parking lot where Katie, Tonya and Marita were set up. A huge crowd of women who were able to stand had formed and it would nearly be impossible to reach the 3 Pregtech employees. The plan from PT was simple; they sell their “better version” of their products at a reduced cost in exchange for Preggomalls items. Then they take those back to the warehouse, swap the batteries and then sell Preggomalls equipment without paying for heavy machinery costs!

Rebecca realised that shouldn't carry all three PT employees at once, but she needed some way to pick them all off, one by one. Looking at how the employees were placed, she realised the easiest to pick off first would be Katie. In Katie's profile Rebecca had read that she was a bit too overly fond of pregnant women and if by any chance she had an amulet, it would either be Greed, or Lust. Rebecca unbuttoned some of her shirt making sure she had a seductive valley of cleavage and suggestively walked over to greed filled brunette. “Hey…” Rebecca whispered into Katie's ear “what brings a pretty girl like you here?”

“Hey yourself, aren't you familiar?” Katie asked the raven haired assassin. She swore she looked familiar, but with all the chaotic energy floating around, it was starting to affect her memory.

“I can believe you remembered! I used to be one of your customers!” Rebecca convincingly lied, she had to act fast before Katie's memory kicked in. “You remember how you promised we would exchange some things next time we met up?”

Katie was quite confused by the ordeal, on one hand she couldn't quite place where she saw Rebecca before. On the other hand she was really hot and would give anything to snatch herself another beauty. “Hmmm, yeah I get you. Tonya, Marita I just gotta check up on Sarah, I'll be back in five!” Katie called out.

“No problem, hurry back!” Marita replied.

Katie grabbed Rebecca and ran into the indoor deserted parking lot. All the other women were outside trying to get a more reliable product at Pregtech. Rebecca was about to knock Katie out when she was welcomed by two of the sexiest lips she had ever faced. Katie launched herself on the Preggomall employee, knocking her to the ground in a flurry of passionate kisses. With three of the amulets close together the two pregnant women swelled to new proportions. 40, 50, 60, 70 babies filled each of the women.

Rebecca had been overwhelmed by new found emotions, but quickly snapped out of it. Trying her hardest she rolled onto her feet and knocked out Katie. Rebecca could feel her newly found extra weight as she tried to walk around, that was even with the support from the robo spine. Rebecca realised she couldn't lift up Katie and pulling wasn't an option, so slowly but surely she pushed Katie over to the service elevator where she would meet her fate.

Now it was time to grab the other two employees.

----

Sarah was having a fantastic time in the shoe store. She was one click away from shutting down her competition. All the back breaking work, the backstabbing and endless hurdles had lead her to this moment.

[EXECUTE ENERGY SHUT DOWN?]

She saw the command on her computer. With this, she would nail the final coffin on Preggomalls schemes. Plus her choice would begin the chain of events that would also cause one of the biggest chaotic events in America since the global financial crisis. Her finger hovered over the screen…

[EXECUTE]

Nothing happened…

[EXECUTE]

Again nothing

[EXECUTE]
[EXECUTE]
[EXECUTE]

Sarah couldn't deactivate the mall’s main power, unless they were no longer using electricity, hey were powered by-

“I see you have found your way into our humble abode” Wendy said as her face appeared on Sarah’s Tablet. “Don't worry, you aren't the first Page we have looked at today.” Wendy moved the camera to a tied up panicking Ashley. “I'll make my request fairly simple. Come to the elevator by the store your friend Katie used to own and come down to the basement.”

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Sarah ran over to the elevator at break neck speed, dodging belly after belly of fallen women. With her amulet and gun at the ready and her tablet nuzzled in between her bountiful breasts, Sarah was not going to be fucked with, and neither was her mother.

She made it to the elevator and pressed the basement button. After a couple of strange sounds and camera movements, the elevator proceeded to take her down. As the doors opened she saw Katie, Tonya and Katie down there, immensely pregnant. Tonya and Marita each had 40 babies inside of them whilst Katie had 70 on her own. Sarah also noticed that Katie had lost her amulet as she lay there, trying to sit up. The robo spines were starting to reach their limit and Sarah wanted to help them, but she knew that would mean becoming bigger herself.

“Katie! Wake up! What's going on?” Sarah panically asked the massive beauty.

“Sexy Asian… destroyed me… Save yourself…” Katie breathed out.

“No, I'll get you out of here, somehow, just let me save my mother first” Sarah passionately replied. She got up and snuck down the laboratory halls underneath the popular mall. She could hear muffled “HELP”s far down the hall. Walking past the first couple of doors she could see scientists and assembly lines unaffected by he chaos outside. Only men worked the lines, making sure everything was in order, a couple of women lay over to the side, trying to handle items they thought were safe.

Further down she could her a strange hum come from a room that was giving an unearthly grow. She peered through the window to see several incredibly pregnant women orgasming over and over, their naked bodies raw and glowing from the ordeal they have been through. There were a couple of models, a mother and daughter and a news reporter that had been lured in by Erin’s charisma. Little did Sarah know of the history Brandon had with a couple of the women.

“Those poor women… it looks like they've been in there for days.” Sarah sadly said to herself, shedding a tear. “ There must be a way to turn this off.” She followed the cables to a T intersection. The cables went one way whilst the cables ran another. Sarah’s envy amulet was pulsating, almost calling for her to go hunt down the machine that was manipulating the pregnant energy. “Sorry mum, I gotta take down the competition!” Sarah regretted as she ran the opposite direction.

After 10 minutes of running Sarah collapsed at the door where the cables lead. Opening the door Sarah got a wicked sense of déjà Vu. She remembered climbing into that restaurant a week ago, only to be tested on the same machine that stood in front of her. Waddling over she observed the intimidating nature of the gargantuan machine. At the dead centre was 8 strangely shaped holes that looked oddly familiar, but over to the left hand side was a series of levers and buttons.

A huge input and output lever on the far end that was down in output mode, a series of strange lights and buttons determining energy production and storage and lastly a big red button that said ‘Master Off Button’. She knew what to press.


Brandon put his costume in a specially allocated locker and put on the exquisite suit that was given to him. He left the green rooms and was about to jump in the limo to see two of the Sci Fi worlds hottest actresses when she saw Grace angrily scrunching up flyers. “Hey what's up Supergirl?” Brandon asked jokingly

“Oh its you whose up!” Grace frustratingly stammered. “You make these pregnant women pop up everywhere and just before I think Joel and I are going to be happy together, he gets a call from some floozy!”

“Whoa, hold on, how did you know a girl was calling him?” Brandon asked, try to grasp what was going on.

“Well this wasn't the first time I've hung out with Joel…” Grace said, dropping her head. “We may have done stuff… but now that we might be serious, I found out he has another girl

“Okay, you must think of Janice right?” Brandon asked as he lead grace over to a bench under a lamp post. Grace angrily nodded at him “And you know that He didn’t really knock her up, this was all work from my magical little device right?”

“Yeahhhh, I guess so…” Grace submitted, realising her anger was somewhat over the top. “But that means he is the type of guy to leave a girl if anything happens!”

“I don't think so… Remember the riot?” Brandon said as he pulled out his phone.

“Yeah, I was there!” Grace answered with a bit of a chuckle. “So was Joel.”

“See that was back when he liked pregnant bellies” Brandon said as he loaded a YouTube clip of the riot.

“Can I ask what happened that turned him away from the ‘big curve’?” Grace asked

“I haven't a clue, but I do know that this is what Janice is like.” Brandon said as he loaded a video of Janice viciously putting people in their place.

Grace was shocked as she watched Janice fight off several police guards. Clearing her through Grace said “I can see why Joel would not want to spend his life with someone like that, what does she do?”

“Yoga instructor” Brandon said. The two cracked up laughing as Grace’s remaining anger left her.

“You know what, maybe it's not so bad, as a nurse I could probably help Janice out” Grace said getting up from the bench. “Hey before I go, can I ask you a personal question?”

“Shoot” Brandon answered getting up as well

“You know what, I'll ask after your dinner with the bounty hunter and the Amazonian Queen” Grace said with a giggle.

“You know what? We can make a quick detour” Brandon said as he grabbed Graces hand and lead her to the Limo. Getting in, Brandon tapped on the drivers barrier. “Hey, do you think we could quickly stop off somewhere before we get to the restaurant?” Brandon asked the driver.

“Sure” the driver answered as he drove off. As the car headed to he hotel where Brandon's friends were staying, Grace decided to go on Facebook.

“Hey look at this, apparently a really pregnant woman won the Charlesberg charity golf in!” Grace said as she went to show her friend the article, not realising she had passed hundreds of articles the Preggomall in a foul and notorious light. Brandon on the other hand was distracted by the sights of the city they were in. For so long Brandon lived his life in a small town, only leaving to go to uni in another city miles away, but this place was magnificent!

“Hmm? What's going on?” Brandon asked as Grace tapped her on the shoulder. Before Grace could reiterate the limousine had pulled up outside the hotel.

“I'm afraid this is your stop lil’ lady” the driver said as the barrier came down once more.

“All good, have fun and make sure you keep your tesseract close by” Grace said with a smile and a wink. The amulet was still pulsating and glowing oddly, so Brandon decided it would be best to keep it in the confines of the box. After a deep breath he was ready to meet his two biggest crushes.

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Erin had a big grin on her face as she sat at the champions table at the charity golf tournament. 18 hours, a record scored, a luxurious gold jacket and an endless supply of food at her disposal. It was almost a recipe for delight when she found out who she was sitting next to. When the hosts of the tournament found out the legendary Catalina Corazon was coming with a plus one, they just had to invite her in, especially after her hit comedy ‘A Hole in One, Golfing for Two!”.

“You realise the champions table is a special area for people who have won golf tournaments” Erin belittled her neighbour as she piled corn cobs on her plate, with a huge side of butter.

“Don't mind Erin, Becka” Catalina said as she stole one of the remaining cobs from Erin's grasp. “A true celebrity never belittles fans, or spectators. They already know how important and valuable they are…”

Erin almost quipped back, but chose to bite her tongue. As she continued to eat, she was approached by a large greasy man with a badly stylised wig. With a slur in his speech and sway in his step, anyone could tell that this big man, was drunk. He slowly came up behind Erin and planted his arse down in the seat next to her. “Hey love, what are you doin’ in tha champions table…” the drunk bellowed.

The entire room was mortified, the only waiter out there was a poor petite girl that would have no chance in stopping a man of that size. Sadly no one could do anything about it, for this was Reggie Bohorn, one of two Billionaires from Chalesberg and owner of the few casinos in the city. Anyone who would try to face him, would not find themselves in a good place.

For once in her life Erin was lost, she didn't know what to do. If she acted poorly, the Preggomall would be no more. On the other hand, she really didn't want to deal with this man. “Ooohh Bohorn, let's get you out of here, and get you a nice jug of water.”

Catalina couldn't believe what she was seeing. The way this man was behaving was completely atrocious, yet no one would do anything about it. She almost felt bad for her competitor.

It was like a horror movie." He shuddered, his aversion to pregnancy clearly still not worked out of his system. "Since I was the only one not affected, the women running the place just shrugged and let me out. They said it's a new age in the city and there was no point in keeping me here."

"I may have some answers," Mara called down from the second floor. She had the door open to Sarah's room and looked over all the inventions she had gathered in there. "I'm guessing these sex changes are thanks to your sister. Well there's a ton of gadgets in here and they're all still pretty warm. Your dad may have been immunized from her weird experiments."

"Makes about as much sense as anything else going on now," Brandon sighed. He was about to call Tanner "dad" but stopped himself. He appreciated Tanner for raising him but he couldn't forgive him for the way he treated Ashley. "Tanner, listen, a lot's happened recently but Ashley and Sarah and probably the whole city are in danger. We need to go help them."

"Sarah? And Ashley?" Tanner said. "What's happened? I have to go save them." He saw Brandon's hesitancy and groaned. "Look, I can tell you don't like me very much but they're still my wife and daughter."

"Actually, she's with me now," Kim said, wiggling her eyebrows. "And I don't think you want to know who else she's slept with recently." Brandon blushed, not wanting to give Tanner that sort of information just yet.

"Look, Tanner, we need to find a manual I brought home when I bought this necklace," Brandon said, holding up his amulet to show Tanner, trying carefully not to touch it in the wrong spot and give everyone new pregnancies.

"Oh, that thing? I saw it laying around and thought it was paper trash. It's in the recycling in the garage," Tanner said. Brandon rushed out to dig it out from a pile of old newspapers. One good thing about the chaos in the city was it delayed trash collection. Opening it up, however, Brandon was less optimistic.

What's up, kid? Maybe you've heard of me by now: Yaral. Yeah, I get to rewrite the rules as I choose and I think your window of opportunity for reading this is closed. Not that I would have let you read anyway. But look, I do want to make some things sporting and you've already given me lots of chaotic energy to feed off of so I owe you one.

Here's what's going on: when the eight amulets are nice and warmed up with constant use (Nice job on that, by the way. We should work together more often), then they're ready to be rejoined. Once all the amulets are together, they can be fused back into one single master amulet. Whoever wears that has total control over pregnancy. And I mean total. And for kicks, I'll throw in the title of my emissary in your dimension. Cool, right? Anyway, now you now what you're getting yourself into. Have fun, kid.

Brandon watched as the ink on the page slowly faded until the entire manual was just blank, white paper. With a nervous gulp, he went back to the living room where everyone was now gathered, stroking their bellies in silence. Except for Tanner, of course, who was as far away from a pregnant belly as he could be.

"What'd it say?" Erin asked.

"Nothing," Brandon said, choking out his lie. "We just have to keep the same plan and save our friends."

"And stop Wendy," Kim said with a nod. "Okay, let's do this."

"I'm still coming along," Tanner said, his breathing a little heavy.

"No, Tanner, you should stay and rest," Brandon said. "Being in jail so long clearly took a lot out of you. If you get some rest and still feel like coming along...then we'll see you at the mall. But be careful."

"Pff, 'be careful.' How tough can a bunch of pregnant sluts be?" Tanner spat.

"You'd be surprised," Erin murmured as she took Brandon's hand and the group left the house.

"Ooh, we should come up with a cool action movie team name!" Catalina said.

"I'll leave that to you," Kim chuckled as they loaded into the helicopter.
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: The group finds the amulet manual

choices: Follow Kim and Erin's group
Follow Catalina's group
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
From her office on the top floor, Wendy looked out the window and saw the approaching helicopter carrying the mall's previous CEO, Erin, and several the amulets she needed to execute her plan. One hand lightly caressed her budding pregnant belly, largely hidden under her suit and shirt. When she saw all of her employees with their hulking stomachs, massaging their curves as babies, sometimes dozens of them, kicked inside them, Wendy sometimes got the urge to use the PreggoMall technology to advance her pregnancy and feel Antonio's child inside her.

But she wanted this pregnancy to be as detached from all that mystical nonsense as possible. Once she had the amulets, this would be the last naturally born human in the world as no corner of the globe would be free from her tendrils. From the busiest mega-city to the smallest, oldest village, everyone would be waddling slowly with a gigantic pregnancy, dependent on her products and hers alone. Wendy chuckled at the thought, even considering lowering the power of the new line of robo-spines so women would have to struggle more.

The polish and Indian models Erin had originally initiated into the company hurried in, their clothes and hair disheveled from the orgy Sarah's virus kicked into motion. Wendy turned from the window and smiled at both women. "Ola, Malati. Did you do what I asked?"

Both women nodded and stroked their bellies, eyes fixated on Wendy. "W-we did what you asked," Malati whimpered. "Now can we..."

"Ah, yes," Wendy said, lifting a small remote and pointing at both of them. Instantly, both women's bellies began to slowly swell until they were so big, they pushed each other away with their size. "There. Five fetuses each for both of you."

"Thank you!" Ola gasped as both women clumsily ran out, their hands fondling one another as they exited the doors. Wendy chuckled, glad that she had managed to find gravidophiles in her ranks. Erin may have hired both women but Wendy found a way to buy their loyalty.

"Now, time to spring the trap," Wendy said to herself, looking down as the helicopter landed and the women on-board slowly made their way off.

<hr>

The mall's doors were unlocked and open. Brandon didn't know why he expected any different. It was still an operating business, after all, and it wasn't like people could go to PregTech's shopping center to buy anything. Its employees were either locked up inside the mall or waddling with Brandon inside Wendy's headquarters.

"So what's our actual plan?" Joelle finally chimed in. "I mean, maybe you all formulated something but me and Mara and Gwen are new to a lot of this."

"Yeah, the city is weirdly quiet," Mara said. "I guess we missed a lot at the convention."

"That's for sure," Kim chuckled, one hand on her chest as she felt her greed amulet continuing to pulsate. "I think our best option is to split up. Half of us try to find Sarah and the rest of the PregTech crew and free as many of them as we can. The other half should try to meet up with Wendy and strike some kind of a deal."

"A deal?" Erin repeated, raising an eyebrow.

"Trust me. I've got the head of business," Kim smiled, her greed amulet filling her with plans.

"I'll go on the rescue mission," Catalina volunteered. "I want to take Joelle and Gwen too. They still have some of their strength from when they were men."

"I have training as a nurse so I should go with you," Grace nodded, stepping with Catalina's side.

"Then I'll go with Kim to find Wendy," Erin said. "Brandon, your amulet makes you kind of a wild card so you come with us. And Mara, maybe seeing a non-pregnant woman will throw Wendy off-guard. You come with us."

"I-I guess so," Mara gulped. "I don't even know who Wendy is."

"Worry more about recognizing Rebecca," Erin and Kim said in unison, before Kim added. "She's gotten a lot meaner since any of you met her so watch out. Hopefully she's still a few hours away in Charleston."

With that plan in mind, both teams split up and hurried inside the mall. It was dead empty, which only made Brandon more nervous. As he jogged through, he heard a familiar voice calling his name. It belonged to Ashley.

"Brandon! Help!" it was faint but as Brandon followed it, the voice got louder and louder. Soon, Brandon found himself inside the mall's famous pregnant spa and was separated from Erin and the rest of his team. But, inside, was Ashley, loosely tied to a chair, wearing nothing but enticing lingerie.

"H-hi Ashley," Brandon said, blushing a little. Ashley now had a belly that carried close to 100 babies and she had become even more buxom on top of it. Since she was sitting down, he couldn't see if her rear was rounder too but he had a good feeling about it. "Glad I found you. I could hear your calls."

"I-I didn't say anything," Ashley whimpered, biting her lip. Even now, her lust amulet was glowing and sending energy through her body and it had been a long time since she saw the last man to have sex with her. She wanted to warn him but she also wanted him to jump into her arms and ride her like a stallion. "Brandon, run," she slowly managed to get out. "It's a...a..."

"I think the word she's looking for is 'trap,'" said Ola, closing the door to the spa behind her. Out from around corners and behind counters came all of the mall's pregnant models, all with cooing smiles on their face. "Hello Brandon."

"H-hi," Brandon squeaked out. Everyone here was unbelievably gorgeous.

"You're cute up close," Malati said, pressing her round stomach against Brandon. "This doesn't just feel like a job."

"A job?" Brandon said but Malati pressed her finger to his lips and shushed him. Other pregnant beauties came over and began to slowly undress Brandon, making sure no inch of skin was not in contact with one of their bellies, butts, or breasts.

"Just relax," Ola said, moving to Ashley and undoing her straps. "We're all here to have a good time."

"N-no, I have to go," Brandon stammered. "I-I have to stop Wendy from taking over the world!"

"Mmm, but doesn't her world seem more fun?" Malati purred as she kissed Brandon on the cheek.

"Move," Ashley weakly said. The women continued to toy with Brandon so she sucked in a deep breath. "Move!" Ashley said with a roar. The pregnant models quickly darted away, differing to the colossal Ashley. Each waddling step shook the room as she got as close to Brandon as she could with her belly in the way. She shivered when she felt the tip of his erection touch her tight, round stomach. "Do you remember the first time we had sex?"

"Of course!" Brandon yelped. "How could I forget? It was amazing."

Ashley fondled her breasts, bouncing her glowing amulet around, before settling both hands on her belly. "Then let's do it again."

Brandon wanted to say no. He had to save Sarah and Katie and Janice and so many other women. He had the master amulet and all the responsibility was on him. And he was loyal to Erin now. But he couldn't resist. He bent down to start kissing Ashley's exposed navel. She moaned and repositioned herself so she was on top of him. With a groan, she lowered herself and let Brandon's erection enter her once again.

Then, Brandon felt a tight clench and was stuck in place. "Get ready! Hold on!" Ashley bellowed. He did as he was told, tightly gripping her belly as Ashley stood up, holding Brandon suspended with her vagina. With a yell, Ashley ran at the door. Some of the models tried to stop her but it was like a bowling ball going through pins. Ashley charged past them, made it out the door, and headed into the mall plaza before she had to stop. Her muscles relaxed and Brandon fell to the ground.

"H-how the hell did you do that?" Brandon panted.

"I've been having a lot of sex lately," Ashley said with a wink. "My muscles down there have gotten pretty handy."

Brandon sighed and looked around. "I need to find Wendy's office. Do you know where it is?"

"Head for those elevators. The top offices need a password. It's 'Antonio,'" Ashley said, pointing off in the distance. Brandon nodded but before he could get up, Ashley scooped him up in a big hug. "I missed you."

"I missed you too," Brandon said.

"You know, Erin left the mall to go find you," Ashley said quietly.

Brandon paused. "She found me. We're...back together."

"Then you'd better not sleep with the next pregnant beauty you see," Ashley scolded him. She may not have been his biological mother but she could still impart some parental advice. "Now go, hurry. Before I try to pin you under me again and finish what we started."

Brandon obliged, making a mental note to ask Erin about sex with Ashley at a future date.
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: There are more pressing issues than team names
