Brandon is intercepted by a returning Rebecca
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Erin looked around the corridors of the mall. "Coast's clear," she said before waddling out. "Security has gotten really relaxed here since I left."

"Wendy's turned it into a 'cult of personality' sort of workplace," Kim said. "Everyone's loyal to her so there's no point in keeping much under wraps."

"You didn't turn out to be too loyal," Mara interjected. Kim just smiled and kept walking with the others. Erin made it to the corporate elevator but found that the top floors were locked out from access. "You don't happen to remember the code, do you?" Mara asked.

"I sure do. I changed it when I took over to my favorite meal: an entire stock pot filled with spicy linguine," Erin said, typing in her complex password.

"Doesn't spicy food induce contractions?" Mara asked.

Erin paused. "When Brandon and I broke up and I took over, I wanted my pregnancy to be over and done with as soon as possible so I tried to speed things up. Not that it worked, clearly."

"So...is it still your favorite food?" Mara said.

"Oh no. I have a different favorite food every hour," Erin chuckled before the keypad flashed red. "Shit, password's not working. Wendy must have changed it."

"Then we have to take the other way up," Kim sighed. "The stairs."

"The stairs aren't locked out?" Mara asked.

"It's a mall built for pregnant women. The stairs don't get a lot of use," Erin said with a sigh, stroking her belly as she waddled toward the nearest emergency stairwell. "Ooh, the food court is totally abandoned to. It's like an all-you-can-eat buffet!"

"Focus," Kim said, putting one hand on Erin's shoulder to redirect her to the stairwell. "I know it's not going to be fun but let's make our way up."

Slowly both pregnant women struggled up the steps, their bellies jiggling with each labored move. Erin and Kim both kept one arm cupped under their bellies to help add support but the accompanying kicking from inside them only evened out the discomfort. Sweat dripped down their bodies and Kim took no time in stripping down to just her bra and underwear.

"After I got...possessed or whatever, I found that I actually enjoyed wearing less," Kim said with a shrug when Erin and Mara questioned her clothing choice. Erin considered making the same decision to make things easier for herself but her belly was so large and it had pushed away so much of her clothing already, she doubted it would make much of a difference.

While both pregnant women tried to slowly ascend the steps, Mara was able to stay ahead of them easily. She was not in great shape but compared to Erin and Kim, she was as light as a feather.

Eventually, all three made it to the top and entered Wendy's office, where she seemed to be waiting for them. "Hello everyone," Wendy said with a smile. Brandon wasn't with them so Wendy assumed her trap to use recordings of Ashley's voice to guide him to the spa worked. "You seem winded. Can I get you something to drink?"

"No, but some food would be great," Erin panted, wiping her brow with one hand before resting it back on her bare belly. "I love to talk business over a dinner meeting."

"I'll have my personal chefs start right on that. It's the least I can do for you since this will mark the end of your time in PreggoMall," Wendy said, tapping her computer to send an email. "But Kim, I didn't expect to see you back so soon."

"You sent Rebecca after us so you must have had some suspicions," Kim mused, stroking the side of her belly.

"Some," Wendy agreed with a smile, walking toward them and eyeing their bellies. Finally, Wendy stopped on Mara. "And who might you be?"

"M-Mara," she said, not used to Wendy's terrifying aura.

"You didn't get the memo?" Wendy said, unbuttoning her blouse to show her curved stomach. "All my guests were supposed to be pregnant."

"I'm infertile. Result of a surgery I had when I was little," Mara replied with a gulp.

"I'm sorry to hear that. Would you like me to correct that?" Wendy said, lifting the remote she'd been using to add to women's pregnancies. "It's very easy."

"No thank you," Mara said. "My boyfriend...now girlfriend...is really pregnant now and I think she needs my help getting around. But maybe later...I would consider it. Everyone seems to be having fun being pregnant."

"You see?" Wendy said, turning to Erin with a grin. "I'm making people's lives better. This company should remain with me, and while we're at it, PregTech should remain with me too."

"I don't know about that," Erin said. "Maybe Sarah should get control of PregTech. Competition in business is always good."

"This isn't about business anymore," Wendy said. "It's about changing this world inside out. And I'm going to stand at the top of it all." She placed her hand on her now exposed belly. "With my daughter by my side."

"That must be hard, all that pressure," Kim said, slowly walking up to Wendy until their bellies touched. "Maybe you should divide your tasks and delegate responsibility."

"What do you have in mind?" Wendy said, raising one eyebrow.

"How about letting me run the operations here at the mall?" Kim smiled. "After all, I get the job done. I brought you Erin, didn't I?"

Erin's face lost all color. "Kim...you betrayed me?"

"I go where the money is," Kim chuckled, her greed amulet glowing brightly. "Now, Wendy, would you like to know where everyone else is headed?"

"I have an idea," Wendy said, turning on a video screen on the wall. Catalina, Grace, Joelle, and Gwen were waddling around near the basement. "Getting awfully close to our power supply. Though I don't recognize most of these women."

"Two of them used to be men, thanks to you," Mara said.

"Ah. Quite an improvement, I'd say," Wendy laughed. "Let's watch a little of this."


Down near the basement, Catalina skulked around as Grace, Joelle, and Gwen slowly moved, huddling together. "Where exactly are we?" Grace asked.

"The mall has secret compartments beneath the main plaza. When I worked here, I heard about some of them. If they've hidden away Sarah and the rest, this is where they'd be," Catalina answered. "Come on, let's move quickly."

"Easy for you to say," Gwen grumbled, patting her belly.

Catalina rolled her eyes. "I'm bigger than you."

"Oh...right," Gwen said, noting the difference in the size of their pregnancies. Joelle noticed it to and made a mental note to find ways to get bigger. Grace, on the other hand, was fine where she was.

Descending one more level, Catalina saw a long hallway, lined with dozens of solid metal doors. They all peeked inside and gasped when they saw pregnant women inside, with cords hooked up to their navels.

"Janice is in this one!" Joelle yelled, banging on one door. All four hurried over and opened the cell, where Janice and Katie were both laying naked. They unhooked them and both women cooed and started to wake up.

"Mmm...who are you?" Janice said slowly.

"It's...a long story," Joelle said. "But I'm Joel."

"Joel? You mean..." Janice noticed Joelle ginger hair and height and gasped. "Sarah turned Tony into Tonya...so you really are Joel!"

"Still going by that name, sorta," Joelle chuckled. "And this is Gwen, formerly Grant."

"Hello there," Katie finally said, looking both women up and down. She'd met them a few times. Katie wondered, since neither were especially handsome men before and they were gorgeous pregnant women now...what would happen if this sex-change technology were used on a seriously hot guy? Katie had never gotten so turned on by the idea of an attractive man before.

"We have lots of other things to tell you but we'd better move quickly now," Grace said. "Do you know where Sarah is?"

"I have the answer to that," a woman's voice said. They poked their heads out of the cell and saw a small army of pregnant women in torn clothing. The one in front had on a lab coat.

"Uh oh," Gwen quietly said.

Catalina noticed the name tag on the lab coat. "Bill?" she asked, remembering him from her time at the mall.

"I go by Jill now. And I think you should all come with me," Jill said with a grin. "As for Joelle and Gwen, I've wanted to do some tests on a transformed pregnant woman for a while now but I didn't want to work on my coworkers. But you two should do nicely."
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: Follow Kim and Erin's group

choices: What are Grace and Catalina doing?
Wait hold on, what will Wendy do next?
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Brandon walked around the mall, his amulet in one hand and the book in the other. He knew at this was the only way that “Yaral” would talk to him and if he was going to make any final decisions, he could use the book to his advantage.

He snuck past a couple of pregnant looters, grabbing some baby wears and things, head he lurked deeper into the Preggomall mall he made his way onto the next floor, hearing footsteps behind him. Brandon needed to find a way to get up to Wendy's office, but he had no idea where said office was!

Looking through the book he tried to see if there were any other pieces of information, but there was nothing. Frustrated with his time and effort put to waste he slammed the book shut. Looking at the cover he saw a large pregnant belly with the amulet at the centre. He carried on, not realising the noise that he caused.

An assassin like Rebecca had always learned to tread lightly, it was what made her so great at executing plans. The assassination of Captain Mel Matthau, the theft of masterpiece known as “fruitful life”, the Green Pike Offensive were some of her famous missions. Now she was hunting down some chubby engineer to claim an ancient artifact. “My talents are wasted here” Rebecca thought to herself “but if everything goes as planned, the payoff will be incredible.”

She lurked behind her pray, her pregnant belly was quite the hinderance, she had to delicately manoeuvre around the damage that everyone had left in the wake of the riots. With power low in the mall, she knew what the excess power was being used for alas it was hard for any ordinary man to see. Slowly she stalked her pray, the unsuspecting Brandon on his exploration of the Preggomall.

Making a turn just past the place he took Ashley and Sarah to for maternity wear, Brandon found himself at a dead end. “Damn it” he cursed under his breath. Looking around he saw some building equipment, machines used to help expand the mall itself.

From behind Rebecca lurched over shatter potted plants and broken cords. Her pace quickening, a grin forming as she knew Brandon was all hers. The unsuspecting victim was ready to turn around, not knowing his impending doom. Seconds felt so much longer as Rebecca made every one count. Using her strong toned legs she leapt into the air, ready to take down the last threat in her goal of victory.

Brandon felt a cold breeze flow past the back of his neck, he turned around to see what it was, but regretted it. Rebecca came crashing down on him, damaging the floor tiles in progress.

“Oooowww…” Brandon winced out, his hazey vision introducing himself to the Asian assassin. “Okay who the… Devil are you…?” Brandon asked, feeling the full extent of Rebecca's massive 70.

“Oh you don't need to know about me…” Rebecca said as she punched Brandon in the face. “ I just need to take your sorry ass to my boss” she hit Brandon once again, delighted she finally got her job done. She got up picked Brandon with one hand and dragged him to the elevator

Technically this was good for Brandon, but bad for the situation was in. As soon as he went up to face Wendy, he would lose his book, his amulet and whatever spell was happening to Freyjaton, would happen to him too. “So you're gunna carry me, an adult male, whilst carrying everyone else over to your boss?” Brandon asked as he looked around for things he could escape with.

“Shut up…” Rebecca said, kicking her prisoner before pressing the elevator button.

“Well I guess whilst my friends free the rest of Pregtech, you will just be happy dealing with me.” Brandon pursuaded a little further.

“Silence!” Rebecca shouted, twisting Brandons arm.

“Ow,ow ow… Okay I just thought an impressive woman like yourself would want anything tarnishing your career, I mean look at the fashionable stealth suit!” Brandon continued, getting ready for whatever Rebecca did next.

The asian assassin stood there for a moment, she could keep Brandon tied up with current prisoner, then come back and take him to custody. Grabbing her walkie talkie she asked “Bill, is there any disruption going on down there in the lab?”

“Firstly, it's Jill” Jill said on the other said from he other side of the line. “Secondly yes we just caught some intruders.”

“Okay, wait do any of them have any odd jewellery on them?” Rebecca asked, a hint of concern in her voice.

“Not that I know of…” Jill said as she looked over the her captives, “no wait, I can see one.”

“oh god they won't stand a chance…” Rebecca said as she put Brandon in the sleeper hold and took him to the gym.


Wendy, Erin, Mara and Kim waddled (or in Maras case, walked) into the massive lab under the mall. As they entered they saw Janice, Tonya, Katie and Sarah dealing with their new roles, as women attached to giant bellies filled with energy. Walls started to close down as the basement started looking more like a hangar.

“I never wanted it to turn out like this…” Erin sadly said. Sure she wanted revenge here and there, she hated herself for a long time, but she never wanted this much chaos to ensue.

“Come now, you've helped start the new world!” Wendy said with a laugh. “Sure Antonio is the one who had the plan to rule the world, but he never liked pregnant women. Now, I will be an Empress to a world in my favourite image!” She tapped her iPad and the largest wall of the centre dispersed. “Welcome to my end game.” Wendy said as she revealed a massive satellite.

“This is what will take my domination from some inland city, to a global event. One beautiful pregnant woman will take control of the satalite and pilot across the USA and around the world, powering the Preg-tator they will change city after city, changing their populations to entirely pregnant women!”

“Okay, that's great and all but aren't satellites supposed to have solar panels?” Kim asked looking at the huge thing that lay infront of them. “Is that what helps them stay up there?”

“That's where the beauty of this all comes into play!” Wendy happily answered, the look of madness in her eyes growing. “It turns out I can't use solar power to convert the worlds populous, I need an energy store on the inside.” Walking over she picked up some of the inventions that the Preggomall actually made. Wendy couldn't decide what to pick up, that's when she saw the mask that was used on Sarah and Janice to erase certain memories. “Guards, hold Erin for me” Wendy said as she placed the mask on.

Before Erin could react, two guards came up behind her and grabbed her by her arms. “Let go of me!” Erin screamed as she struggled to break free. As the now Ex-CEO of Preggomall struggled and squirmed Wendy tried to figure out what the best way to make Erin work for her. She knew she couldn't remove any knowledge about the Preggomall or about the amulets, because then she wouldn’t be able to navigate the satalite

Erin was best focused when she hated that Brandon fellow that made all those visits to the mall, but then again any memory of him would cause the buxom red head to stop working on the satellite. Realising what she needed to do she put the mask on.

“Okay, Erin…” Wendy said turning around to face her victim. “You remember this, you used it on Sarah some time ago. Now you are going to forget everything you know about Brandon Page…”

“No, please, not that ANYTHING BUT THAT!” Erin screamed trying to look away. As much as she tried to look away the gaze of the mask was just too much. Her eyes, head and mind felt heavy as she began to forget everything about her love. She forgot the love they made for the first time, arguments they had, the times Brandon helped her out. Everything gone, dispersed from the mind…
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: Brandon is intercepted by a returning Rebecca

choices: Rebecca deals with Grace and Catalina
Joelle and Gwen go through further experiments
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Kim walked with Wendy as Mara tried to talk to Erin. Forgetting every little detail of Brandon, Erin had become fixated on learning everything that made the satellite run. “How did you make all of this happen within a week?” Kim asked, trying to understand the logic behind everything that happened.

“Oh Kim you have still got so much to learn, these amulets have dilated the existence of time around us” looking at Kim she realised she needed an example. “now let's say Brandon got his amulet on a Wednesday afternoon and now it's Saturday night the next week, well over those 11 days things have happened in a ludicrous pace, building a satellite, research, maintaining a growing business with tons of products and growing a city takes time. Hell pregnancy itself takes nine months to happen.”

Wendy continued to talk as she went back to her throne. “Once the amulets are brought back together, the amulets will expand the past 11 days into let's say nine months, thus reverting time to its normal non chaotic self. But if I keep one of those amulets somewhere far away, then I can speed up the whole process of converting the worlds’ populous to pregnant women.”

The women sat down at their respective places. “Now, should we see who else is trying to disrupt my future empire?” Wendy asked as she brought up the security app on her tablet.


Brandon awoke woozily, woken up by a loud rumbling sound. He took in his surroundings , being tied up in a chair he looked around. He could feel a giant weight was behind him, so there was no chance of trying to destroy the chair. He tried to shake his hands free from behind his back but stopped when he felt a soft supple backside behind him. “Hey, who’s there?” Brandon questioned, failing to look over his shoulder.

“Wait I know that voice.” The fellow trapped woman said from behind him. “Were you at Galacti-con yesterday?”

“Princess Becka?” Brandon asked, thinking why on earth she would be here.

“Well, seeing as how I'm not in costume, just call me Becka.” Becka answered, sighing as she looked down on the bra that barely covered her breasts and the pyjama bottoms that were skin tight. “How on earth are we going to get out of here?”

Brandon had an idea, he knew Becka was pregnant, even if she had been turned back she would have reverted to a pregnant body because of the affect Wendy was using on the land. If she shrunk down a couple of sizes the rope would be free enough for her to escape and free Brandon.

Looking down at the amulet Brandon inhaled as he tried to focus his magic on reducing Becka’s size.

Nothing.

He tried again! Nope
Frustrated with the amulet he silently cursed at it. Becka turned around, hearing some kind of commotion. “ are you okay?”

“I’m fine, just dealing a with a snotty second rate piece of junk!” Brandon said before being zapped by the ancient piece of jewellery. “Ow damn it!” .

“1976!” Katie shouted as she punched the number in and pressed enter. “ I studied fashion and international business, so I can easily tell what year a photo is taken by looking at what the people are wearing.”

They were waited but nothing happened [voice command needed]. Catalina leaned over, cleared her throught and in the best Wendy impersonation said “open vault door”

The massive vault door creaked open. “AAACCCTTTIIINNNNGGGG!” Catalina announced proudly. As they opened the door, they saw Sarah in the process of dismantling her amulet.

“How the hell am I going to get out of here!” Sarah cried, wiping away tears. Her belly had significantly grown since coming to he Preggomall, she now rivalled Brandon’s belly. “Oh my god, you guys are here!” She squealed as she rubbed her sides. Wiping away the tears she wanted to give them all a big hug but couldn't reach them from the sheer size of her belly.

“Sarah, we are going to get you out of here, but we need you to help us out first…” Catalina said as she looked to Katie to continue the conversation. Sadly she was currently sucking on Sarah’s huge belly, nuzzling it lovingly.

“Alright, I have been feeling really lonely lately…” Sarah replied as she reached over and lightly played with Katie's hair.

“Four down, three to go.” She said as Kim and Ashley were brought into the room. The pregnant women carrying her collapsed as they let go off the models. “You 8 have done very nicely, reward for your efforts!” Wendy announced as she doubled the bellies of each of the women. Every Preggomall employee now had their bellies filled with energy rather than foetuses, so the extra energy had them jumping for joy and running out the door.

Now sadly I didn't have enough resources for another satellite, but this should work just nicely.”

I want you two to help me, but Jackie and Samantha, go use Brandons blood to find a remedy for our pregnant bodies.

Brandon struggled on the floor with her new, enormously pregnant body as she tried to get up. Rebecca was coming and lately, that meant bad news. Brandon grabbed onto the wall and managed to at least get to her knees, her belly rubbing against the floor as she moved.
Rebecca stomped forward, her hands clutching her belly like she was holding onto it for dear life. Brandon could see all of Rebecca's muscles flexing as she grit her jaw so tightly, it looked like her teeth might break.
"You," Rebecca growled, pointing at Brandon. "Somehow, this is all your fault!"
"Me?" Brandon said, trying out her new, feminine voice, trying to make it even more high-pitched. "I-I don't know what you're talking about. My name's not Brandon, it's...Brenda!"
"Who said I was looking for anyone named Brandon?" Rebecca scowled.
"Oops," Brandon said to herself, stroking her twitching belly. "Pregnancy brain, sorry."
"I'm a trained spy. I can trace and track someone across the whole planet," Rebecca said, pressing her belly against Brandon's. Brandon could feel how strong the super-soldier's contractions were when they touched, with each clench hitting Brandon like a punch. "A little thing like a sex change can't fool me."
"I wouldn't call this little," Brandon wheezed, balancing against the wall with her enormous ass so both hands could stroke her belly. Her fear of Rebecca was making her heart race and that was exciting the 200 fetuses she was now carrying. "So...what are you going to do to me?"

"What am I going to do to you?" Rebecca said, a terrifying smile on her face. "I've been thinking about that for a long time. I'm going to...going to..." Rebecca grunted and stumbled, holding onto the wall for support while her other hand held fast against her belly. "I can't take it anymore! I'm about ready to burst!"
Brandon knew she was just being euphemistic about childbirth but with Rebecca's belly as big and tight as it was, one never knows. "What about the PreggoMall scientists that were all over you a little while ago?" Brandon asked.
"They're idiots! I thought they might get a little brighter after turning into women but their heads are as empty as their bellies are full," Rebecca panted, sweat starting to cover her face. "Oh god, these contractions keep getting tighter."
"Just...um...breathe," Brandon said, waddling a little closer. "Try not to be so angry."
"I CAN'T FUCKING HELP IT! I'M ABOUT TO GIVE BIRTH TO MORE THAN 100 BABIES!" Rebecca screamed, her eyes closing as she sucked in a deep breath. "Here it comes..."
Brandon took Rebecca's hand and held it against her swollen breasts. "It's okay, I'm here," Brandon said. "Just squeeze when you have a contraction and-" She spoke a little too soon. Rebecca squeezed and Brandon let out a silent shout, falling back to her knees. "g-good...just like that..."

Back upstairs, Grace, Catalina, and Katie were supporting Sarah as they tried to make it back upstairs. Grace and Catalina each took an arm while Katie had the heaviest load, holding Sarah's big belly on her back. But Katie hardly looked upset with her station. "Where to?" Katie said, hiding her glee some, as they looked around the empty halls of the mall.
"I think I left my gear in the old clothing store you used to work at," Sarah said.
"Oh yeah, I wonder if I still technically own it," Katie said. "I've probably missed a lot of shifts...but I can chalk it up to maternity leave."
Sarah giggled, looking down at Katie, seeing tufts of her short brown hair next to her enormous pregnant middle. Without Sarah's envy amulet, she was seeing things more clearly and didn't realize how much she enjoyed working with Katie...and being around her. The four of them made the turn and headed toward the store. But once inside, they saw another familiar face there: Becka.

"What. Is. Going. On?" Becka yelled, her voice wavering. She was clearly shaken up. "This place is so weird. They said something about a satellite launch, there's orgies in the spa, and women keep getting thrown in a dungeon." Becka rested her hands on her huge belly. "I don't even want to be pregnant! Help!"
"Okay, okay," Catalina said, letting Sarah down to rest on the floor as she waddled up to Becka. "Catalina Corazon is here to help."
"Help? You aren't a real action hero! You just play one in movies!" Becka shouted. "And not even that well!"

Sarah, Grace, and Katie all froze. No one had ever criticized Catalina's acting to her face, at least not since she got her amulet. The pride Catalina carried had already been multiplied dozens of times over and her psyche couldn't shake the insult.
"Not...I'm not...but everyone loves me," Catalina murmured.
"Because you have big tits, a bigger ass, and a hot face," Becka yelled, her face turning pale as her exhaustion overwhelmed her. "And because being a pregnant hero is weird!"
Catalina gulped and touched one hand to her dark belly. "Well then...I thought you were one of my biggest fans..." She moved one hand to her amulet and tapped it.

PING!

"But it turns out you're just the biggest," Catalina purred as Becka instantly swelled. Her belly expanded with 100 additional fetuses and she collapsed to the floor, moaning and stroking her pregnant middle.
"She's almost as big as me," Sarah whispered.
"Yeah but you're hotter," Katie whispered back. "And besides, I like smart girls too."
Sarah blushed as Grace looked at Catalina with shock. "I guess...we'd better hope she's as mad at Wendy as she was with Becka."
Catalina waddled over and picked up the belt Sarah brought with her. "This it?"
"Yeah. They must have taken everything else and not realized this was more PregTech gear," Sarah said, wrapping the belt around her belly and beginning to tinker with its components. "And Becka, just..stay put."
"Shouldn't be too hard for her," Katie said to herself, watching Becka's little legs kick as she struggled to get upright.
"Let's go," Grace said. "Seeing her so big creeps me out."
"What about me?" Sarah said, patting her pregnant belly.
Grace shrugged. "You carry it better."

"Okay...I think you're fully dilated," Brandon said, pulling her hand back out of Rebecca's vagina. She had wanted to get to third base with Rebecca but...this was not what she had in mind. "But my sister should be back soon so if you want to hold off on pushing, we can-"
"I want to push!" Rebecca screamed. She was sitting on the floor, legs spread incredibly far thanks to her flexible body. Brandon was right beneath her enormous, quivering belly. She could see Rebecca's golden belly skin tighten and pulse with veins.
"Then now's as good a time as ever," Brandon sighed. "Push!"
"I...I'm nervous," Rebecca said. "I don't really want to be a mother. I'm too...bad."
"You're fine," Brandon said. "You don't have to let the amulet define you."
Rebecca grunted and lurched forward. "I was bad before the amulets! Before the belly!"
"Then just change! It's hard but you can do it! Just look around the city! Lots of things have changed!" Brandon said, having to yell over the sound of Rebecca's groans. "Now you need to push!"

Rebecca sucked in a deep breath and howled, pushing both hands into her boulder-like belly as she pushed. Rebecca had never given birth before but her powerful muscles helped ease one of her babies out, and in a few minutes, Brandon was holding a wet, crying infant in her hands.
"H-how does it look?" Rebecca panted. "Did it come out okay?"
"Yes, he's fine," Brandon said, supporting the baby in her arms. "Guess Wendy's plan to turn all the men into pregnant women doesn't affect those in the womb."
Rebecca let out a little laugh before groaning and shifting forward. "T-there's another one coming!"
"Fine, just do the same thing. You are doing great," Brandon said, placing one hand on Rebecca's upper thigh. "Push!"
As Rebecca screamed and pushed, Sarah and her valets hurried forward. "There, found her!" Grace yelled.
"It was easy. Just follow the sound of the shouting and cursing," Katie said, helping set Sarah down. Sarah couldn't quite stand yet but she was able to lie on the floor, propped up by her belly, and calibrate her energy converter. Just as Rebecca pushed out her second baby, Sarah zapped Rebecca's belly. Rebecca let out a cry of sexual bliss and relaxed, stroking her belly as she felt the contractions vanished.

"Ooh, it's over," Rebecca cooed. "And...the babies?"
"One boy and one girl," Brandon said, handing them both to their mother. Instantly, they latched onto her nipples and began to feed. Rebecca laughed, tears welling up in her eyes.
"They're beautiful," she whimpered, turning to Sarah and Brandon. "Thank you...so much."
"We want to help more people but Wendy is proving tricky," Sarah said. "Any help with that?"
"I'm quitting the mall," Rebecca scowled. "No paid maternity leave." She looked between her ample breasts at her amulet and frowned. "I can't be a good mother with this thing poisoning my mind. Take it away."
Gladly, Brandon took it. With a flash and a PING, Brandon became a man again and his fetuses were distributed among the nearest 200 pregnant women. "Feels good to have an amulet in my hands again," Brandon said.
"It looks good in your hands," Rebecca said, looking him up and down. The charismatic effect the master amulet gave him over pregnant women seemed to be rekindled by the new amulet.
"I just won't wear it or else...who knows what might happen," Brandon gulped, thinking about Janice and Rebecca's violent tantrums. "Now then...what next?"
"The scientists will stay on your side," Rebecca said. "Or else."
"I'll stay here to take care of Rebecca's babies," Grace said. "I'm a nurse after all."
"Then let's free everyone else and head upstairs," Sarah said. "I think Wendy and I need to have a chat again."

While Rebecca's groans and howls from her expedient childbirth rocked the entire mall and echoed through every store, Wendy was far away, driving toward the site where Erin's satellite was touching down. It was on a far side of town but Wendy had a secret weapon up her sleeve for getting there quickly. Secretly, she had her science team develop a hover car off the books. It ran solely off of the converted pregnant energy of PreggoMall's prisoners and employees and didn't use the copied PregTech computer chips so it was immune to Sarah's virus. Wendy knew when she ruled the world, she'd have to travel quickly.

"Comfortable back there?" Wendy asked with a laugh. Ashley was in the back seat, lying on her back as her truly gigantic pregnant belly stuck straight up. Wendy wanted to find some way to restrain Ashley's arms and legs but with her body so heavy, it was unnecessary. Ashley was in no condition to run away.

"W-why do you need me?" Ashley whined, rubbing her big belly as it constantly trembled with movement from her hundreds of fetuses. Wisely, Wendy's flying vehicle was large enough to accommodate pregnant women of Ashley's size, though she couldn't fit many more on board. There was room for just one more pregnant woman, particularly one of Erin's size.

With a whir, Wendy's mechanical chariot landed on the golf course of the country club Erin once dominated. Confused pregnant women huddled around the steaming satellite stuck in the earth like nervous peasants around an idol. Many of them had their clothes torn to shreds, making it clear they were once ordinary men before Wendy's energy washed over them and turned them into curvaceous expectant women with a minimum of 30 kicking babies inside their bellies.

"Move aside," Wendy said, holding up the amulet. It glowed and flashed and, as if by instinct, the pregnant women waddled back, giving Wendy a clear path to walk to the satellite. With a glad smile, she stroked her small belly and opened the door to the satellite. Erin was standing inside, a blank look on her face. "Welcome back to Earth, Ms. Parker."

"Thank you, Empress," Erin said in a monotone, walking out of the satellite to the grassy hills of the golf course. "I am sorry my mission was unsuccessful."

"It wasn't a total failure. Look at all these new, wonderfully huge pregnant subjects," Wendy said, holding her arms outstretched and cackling. "We can get another shot at transforming and controlling the world if I can just get the other remaining amulets." She held the amulet up to her eye level and watched it glisten in the sunlight. "Just Catalina's and then Rebecca's will be easy. After that...the world is mine." She touched one hand back to her belly. "The world is ours."

"What is my mission?" Erin asked, her voice unchanged. Wendy's device not only wiped Erin's memory. It made her a blank slate, open to suggestion and easy to turn into a willing pawn of Wendy's, with no recollection of her time with anyone else back in Freyjaton.

"For now, be alert," Wendy said, turning to the rest of the pregnant women on the golf course. She strode up to one woman, her torn polo shirt and shorts making it clear she used to be a man. "Ma'am, it looks like you have put on some weight."

"Did you do this to us?" the woman whimpered, touching her swollen middle. Wendy smiled and wrapped her hands around the woman's pregnant stomach, squeezing her popped out navel. "O-oh! That feels...funny."

"Yes, I did this. All over this country, everyone is turning into pregnant women – the pinnacle of human evolution," Wendy said, lifting her amulet. It glowed brightly and the women all gasped.

PING!

They all grew in size instantly. The woman Wendy had spoken to fell to her knees, growing to carry 50 babies as her long blond hair fluttered in the sunlight.

"The only one who can lead this new world of pregnant women is me, your empress, Wendy Greene!" Wendy bellowed. The women all looked at one another before turning back to Wendy and bowing their heads, touching the fronts of their bellies as a sign of supplication. "Now kneel!" There was a chorus of groans and huffs as the heavy women tried to bend down, moving slowly and jutting their hips out as their stomachs swung around. "Okay, forget about kneeling. I have something else you can do for me."

Before Wendy could speak, there was a muffled buzzing from the flying vehicle. Ashley started to moan and squeal in rhythm with the sound. Wendy made her way over and realized her tablet computer was right under Ashley, its buzzing stimulating her lap. Wendy pulled it out and answered the incoming video call, stroking Ashley's thigh as she turned it on.

"Wendy! Where are you?" Sarah yelled, standing in front of Wendy's office computer.

"Where am I? You don't need to be concerned with that now. All you need to...ohmygodhe'snaked."

Sarah and the other pregnant women gathered around the computer turned around to see Brandon standing there, nude. "He...tore through some outfits," Sarah said. "Long story."

"I have changes of clothes in the office closet. Get him to put something on," Wendy grumbled, looking away from the screen. After a few minute, she turned back and resumed her talk. "Alright, now then, let me speak to Mr. Page."

Sarah looked confused but waved Brandon over. "H-hello?" Brandon asked, trembling a little.

"Ah, Mr. Page," Wendy cackled. "I see you've found yourself another amulet."

"I'm going to get them all back," Brandon said, trying to be tough.

"No, I think not," Wendy sighed. "I have a proposal for you. Since you seem to have some sort of connection with these amulets, you should be the one to hand the last ones over to me."

"Why would I do that?" Brandon asked.

"Because I have the two women you care the most about with me and I have a way to make them very susceptible," Wendy purred. "In my new pregnant world, they could be made to worship you almost as much as they worship me...and be willing to do anything for you. And to you."

Brandon gulped. "T-the amulets have a connection to me, huh? You know why that is? Because I love pregnant women and I don't want to hurt them."

"I love pregnant women too," Wendy said.

"You love to control them. It's different," Brandon said, feeling confident for the first time.

Wendy sighed. "There's no getting through to you. Well, my offer still stands." She pointed the tablet to the mountain of belly and breasts that was Ashley. "Say hi."

"B-Brandon!" Ashley cried out before Wendy turned off the call.

"Now then, let's head back," Wendy said, hopping in the vehicle and bringing Erin in with her.

"What should we do?" the transformed pregnant women called out.

"You see that satellite?" Wendy said, pointing to the structure rooted in the ground. "There are enough of you here. Pick it up and bring it back to PreggoMall."

"Where?" they cried.

"You know where it is. Maternal instinct," Wendy cackled as the vehicle lifted into the air and zipped off back toward the mall.

"Empress? Who is Brandon?" Erin asked.

"The last man on Earth. Or he will be soon," Wendy said. "A very bad man. An enemy of the empress."

"I see," Erin nodded, her brainwashed mind starting to churn. If men are needed to impregnate a woman...and I am pregnant...then this Brandon must be the father of my children. She touched one hand to her quivering belly. I am curious to meet him. Evil or not.

“You know it doesn't matter if they're ducks or strange flying machines, the bigger the target” Duke said as she pulled the trigger, “the easier the shot.”

The women screamed as the car was struck from below. “One of the turbines are out!” Wendy stated trying to manoeuvre the Car in for landing.

Yes, but not at this weight!” Wendy shouted as the car slowly dropped altitude. “The 3 last turbines managed to make landing a little softer than a full on crash landing.”

Wendy's car flew over the Mansions driveway and onto one of the hills. With extensive damage and a busted engine, the prototype wasn’t gunna fly without some scientists fixing it.

Remarkably no one was hurt inside. Wendy had made it a priority that the insides of the car would be encased with a superior shock absorption technology. “Check in everyone…” Wendy said as she looked over to her pregnant prisoners.

“Im fine, but Erin looks deranged” Ashley said as she looked over to Erin who looked worse for wear, whilst retaining her trance.

“I am good, is there anything I can do to help?” Erin asked as she turned her gaze to Wendy.

“Okay, firstly stop giving me that creepy look.” Wendy answered disturbed by Erin's look. “Secondly go collect my new pregnant slaves and tell them to bring the satellite to the top of that mansion up there.”

Erin nodded and waddled out of the car. Climbing up such a massive driveway would be hell for anyone as pregnant as Erin, but in her state right now, she felt no pain. Wendy pressed a few buttons and the rooftop parted. As she stood on the seat she noticed something, there were no buildings to block out the sky from this area of town.

“What are you going to do with me?” Ashley asked, as she tried to inch away from the soon to be Empress.

“Well, there's more than one way to send a signal out to the world, I just need the right platform to send it from!” Wendy yelled back. “Your son has no chance in stopping me now, the amulets are mostly gone, and once my transformation signal goes out, it just needs to hit the international space station, and then the whole world can be mine!”

That's when she realised she needed Ashley to power the satellite. “But how the hell am I going to get you up this god damn hill?”


Brandon raced towards the elevator, Catalina grabbed his arm before he nearly ran into a wall. “Brandon!” Catalina sternly shouted “think, you cannot win this with an unsteady mind!”

“But she's got Erin and Ashley!” Brandon shouted back. A swift strong palm slapped the poor fool on the face.

“CALM DOWN” Catalina bellowed. The rest of the crew stood there in silence, amazed by the sheer strength her lungs had. Brandon halted, his mind racing. After a couple of slow calm breaths he regained his cool.

“Now, maybe we can find someone who has had an inside scoop with the company. Maybe someone that can turn us around.” Catalina wondered as she rubbed her chin. “ Rebecca, would you know where the Preggomall employees would be?”

“Well some would be in the labs, others would be at the top of the mall where Wendy hosted the press conference.” Catalina answered. She looked down and saw her two newborns latching onto her breasts. “This is going to be hard for me, I don't want any harm to come to my little ones…”

“Don't worry, I'll be here to support you.” Grace replied, rubbing the assassins back. “It's what nurses do.”

They ran into the lab and saw the small army of Lab technicians working on Joelle and Gwen. The prisoners breasts and butts had become astronomical now, their bellies dwarfed by the presence of their much larger assets.

“Please, no more…” Joelle cried “I just feel so raw… I don't know how much more I can take…” Tears were streaming down their eyes as their massive bodies surrounded the casing of their test chambers.

“Don't worry, your next test will try to turn back time…” Jill answered as she extracted the appropriate chemicals from Brandon’s blood.

“Wait!” Brandon said as he saw the Lab people about to move. “You people have fought tooth and nail for an evil woman that wouldn't even give you your proper lives back! You can be free once again, broken away from a society that acts like some kind of stupid pyramid scheme! You guys are scientists, King's of Intelligence, but you cow tow to that hag! What do you say? Isn’t it time you think for yourselves?”

Catalina and Grace cried as they were moved by Brandon’s motivational speech, Sarah stood in awe and Katie actually took her mind off of Sarah’s belly to pay attention. The scientists on the other hand, weren't phased, except Jill.

“Can you change us back into men?” Jill asked as did several of the other scientists that went through a sex change.

“Sure why not!” Brandon called out to which most of the characters cheered. The pregnant women who were women from the start had other ideas.

“Now hold on!” One of the women called out. “You have worked for Wendy for how long now? A lot of you were unemployed before this all started! You owe Wendy your loyalty, your respect, your”

A hand came out from no where and grabbed the unfortunate woman's neck. The owner of said hand, Rebecca pulled her in and threatened “You need to know about our terms... Either you run back home now, side with us, or learn how furious a new mother can be!”

The original women did not take too kindly to their ultimatum and ran off. With a small army on their side, it was time to take the fight to Wendy.

“Why don't we get Wendy? It's time to start a bitch hunt!” Brandon called out.

Katie quickly pulled Brandon over to ask “don’t you mean witch hunt?”

Brandon looked back, chuckled and answered “no, I'm right this time.”
