They reached the ground level of the mall, nearly abandoned except for a looter here or there. A couple of emergency lights flickered as they made their way towards the afternoon sun, off to the distance some delightful gasps and squeals came from the spa that miraculously worked through all the madness that had happened.

Brandon stopped, his new amulet felt warmer for some reason. Holding it up he felt a presence coming from upstairs. After a quick glance to everyone in front of him, he found a way to slip away. He ran up the four flights of escalators until he reached the High Class Fashion Level.

He was drawn to two heavy doors on the other side of the floor. Closer and closer he walked, not quite sure about what he was expecting. He put the amulet around his neck, continuing the walk towards whatever was leading him there. He felt a pain inside him, tiny at first but it grew deeper, he couldn't quite place it.

He opened the doors, and saw Kim lying on top of a 8 foot tall belly. Brandon used to just deal with the woman that broke his family apart, but now that pain he felt was coming out in a rage of anger. This woman screwed up the lives of everyone in Brandon’s family.

“Hey how did you get up here?” Kim asked as she turned her back so that she could see the man.

“Oh I have my ways, just like yourself” Brandon retorted. He walked around, sensing a somewhat fragile feeling with the floor beneath them. “Tell me Kim, why did you do it?”

“Do what?” Kim asked as she tried to get a better view.

“Come on, don't play freaking coy.” Brandon answered “ why did you screw my dad, a married man, fuck Ashley and make her join the Preggomall!?”

“Look I'm not going answer that, you all know why I did it” Kim said, trying to hide her feelings.

“No, I know there is more to it.” Brandon said as he traced his fingers around his new amulet. “I had sex with God knows how many pregnant women, and there was a reason behind all of them, NOW TELL ME!” In all his hatred he threw his amulet at Kim, The impact caused Kim to grow with another 50 foetuses. As the amulet bounced away the floor boards started to crack slightly.

Kim looked at Brandon and saw all the chaos she had caused. The damage she had made was irreparable. The only thing she could do, was come clean.

“IT’S BECAUSE I HAVE NOTHING!” Kim cried out. “ I had a really good job before I came here, I had prospects but I was emotionally dead. My family wouldn’t talk to me because I'm an atheist and my friends were all fake pompous pricks. I slept with your father because it was the closest thing I had to a relationship with someone.”

Brandon stood back, realising how similar their paths were. “I never knew my true parents...” He replied feeling wrath leave him. “I may have my family and friends, but recently I have felt more and more alone.”

“ I'm sorry I screwed your family up, they are all really nice people” Kim apologised, wiping away tears.

“I’m sorry I snapped” Brandon said “come here”. He reached out his hands and walked over to hug Kim's huge belly when he heard the crack happen again. “Crud”

Brandon snuck back, trying not to put too much weight in each foot. Looking around he couldn't find the amulet. “Uh Brandon?” Kim asked as she felt the floor start to give way. Brandon had no time as the floor broke up around the woman he just forgave. He ran for the door and looked back as Kim fell to the floor below her.

“Are you ok?” Brandon asked looking through the settling dust. He didn't want to say goodbye to someone who had gone through so much. Low and behold Kim and her massive belly appeared as the dust settled.

Kim laughed and she brushed off a little bit of debris. “Holy crap, it's like my belly is made of rubber!” She laughed as she wobbled about. Looking around she realised she was in the home appliances section. She tried reaching for something that resembled a torch, but that's when she heard another large crack. “Seriously?” She asked as she went down another story.

Brandon made it half way down to the ground floor when he found an exhausted Kim. Completely unharmed she was tired of falling down stories.

“Oh god, how am I going to clean myself up? I look disgusting!” Kim cried, banging her arms and legs.

“I'm sorry Kim” Brandon said as she comforted the immensely pregnant women. “I can't seem to get anything right! Hell I don't even know where Wendy has taken my mum!”

Kim wiped away a tear and saw Brandon resting comfortably on her belly. She remembered where the satellite was going to crash when she sabotaged the machine. “Hey Brandon, do you know what's on the North side of town?”

“Yeah the golf course why?” Brandon asked before realising what she meant. “She's there? Oh thank you! I have so much to do. Hold on, I have an idea…” Brandon said as he ran across the mall.

Back at the spa the owners were busy commanding their underlings to do their bidding. “You call that FOREPLAY?” the owner shouted watching the two women trying to make out. “You gotta caress the partner, make her want it!”

“You know, nobody likes forced foreplay” Brandon called out from the front of the Spa. 30 pregnant beauties turned their heads, amazed to see that such a man had come back to them. Lusting for a man’s touch they dived for the clothed make, Brandon narrowly escaping outside.

The women chased him into the furniture store. A dark ominous feel came over the many women as Brandon tried to lead them in the right direction. “Over here” Brandon called out as he tried to grab their attention.

A woman noticed a large light filled area and dashed for that. Her spa friends weren't far behind. Brandon slid under a table and made it to the kitchen wares. The women turned around a corner and made it to the same place where they became reacquainted with Kim.

All memory of Brandon seemed to vanish as the ladies walked ever so sultry to the beauty before them.

“What are you doing?” Kim asked as Brandon started walking off

“I needed to get the women off my back and I thought you might want something whilst I go save the day.” Brandon exclaimed.

---

Mara shook her head awake, she had been stuck inside the hover cars trunk. She checked to see if the coast was clear, then snuck out of the boot. She looked around and saw Wendy try to roll Ashley up the driveway leading to the Mansion.

Wendy pushed as hard as she could, but she was tired. Looking around she saw two pregnant golfers close by. “Hey you two!” Wendy bellowed. “ YOUR EMPRESS NEEDS YOU!” The two women waddled over as fast as hey could.

Mara bolted for the Mansion, she knew someone could help her. Getting to the top of the hill she surveyed the land, walking around the building she saw the Wendy's satellite being towed up the golf course. Just to the corner of her eye Mara saw Erin's lucky flowing red hair. Using her best Black Widow impression she snuck around to get to her friend.

“I'm so glad to see you again!” Mara exclaimed as she embraced the hypnotised ginger.

Erin gave her a vacant yet confused look, but after a minute, she came up with an idea. “Ah yes, I remember seeing you before I went into space!” Erin stated with a minor touch of excitement. “Tell me, have you heard of a Brandon?”

“oh please, we both know the answer to that!” Mara laughed as she looked around. “Okay we need to get help, if my memory serves me correctly, you know the man who runs the country club?”

“Yes, her name is Duke, but there are no more men in Freyjaton” Erin answered.

“Yeah duh! But I'm sure she will be able to give us some help” Mara replied as she stealthily looked around “Let's see if she has a way of getting us out of here”
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: Where's Mara in all this? But first!

choices: Mara and Erin make it to the mansion without a hitch
Mara and Erin are seen by Wendy!
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Everyone ran outside to mall’s open parking lot. Women were still reeling from the affects that Sarah’s virus had on the Preggomall’s products, several fires had broken out in the afternoon sun and right on the other side of he parking lot were the two huge Preggomall Vans.

After a collective waddle they realised that it would be impossible for most of the women to drive. “Hold on…” Gwen said as she looked at the vans. “Why are we out here when we don't even know where this woman is!?”

“They're… Heading… to golf thing…” Brandon huffed as he stopped running and collapsed in front of the group. “

“Okay, you're driving us” Sarah answered before turning to the group. “Grace, as the smallest belly here, you are driving the other van”

“I'm sorry Sarah” Rebecca interjected “ I can't let any harm happen to my offspring. Grace find a safe place, see if you can get to the outskirts of town and just lay low.” Rebecca waddled over to her ‘midwife’ who was holding her newborn children. “I love you two very much, but mum has one more task before she retires.”

Having caught his breath, Brandon walked over to the new mother and touched her gently. “It's going to be okay Rebecca, you'll see them again.”

They opened the doors to the vans and discovered something. Pregtechs products lay perfectly in the van, there was enough for everyone! Everyone Equiped the properly built gadgets on and felt wonderful. “You know how good it is to have the robospine back on?” Sarah sighed . With everyone accounted for, they realised that they needed to get inside the vans.

Sarah was the first to squeeze into the van, the suspension taking on her load comfortably. Joelle was next, her breasts were the largest out of everyone's. She had a hard time squeezing through the door, but just got through. Jill and Katie squeezed up the very top with just enough room for 4 scientists and another in the front with Brandon.

On the other side it was a very similar story but filled mainly with scientists, one of which ended up driving the thing. “Oh god! It's so hard to breathe!” Joelle said

“Whose foot is that?” Cried one person

“I'm in heaven…” moaned another.

“Alright guys! It's time to go golfing!” Brandon yelled as he and the other van drove towards the country club.
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: hows the Pregtech squad doing?

choices: Brandon and Co. get the jump on Wendy
Wendy strikes first
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
The country club was quickly emptying as pregnant women in torn, fancy clothing rushed toward Wendy's location, captivated by her charisma and clear supernatural connection to what happened with their pregnancies. Bellies bounced with each labored, bounding step as fabric fluttered off of them and strings of pearls smacked against their incredibly endowed breasts, or in the case of club members who were previously men, their ties were stuck in their deep cleavage and their watches and rings now slid off their slender hands.

Mara crept forward, looking around suspiciously before making it to the club's main foyer. Erin followed blindly, her face still vacant of any emotion. That made Mara uneasy but she was preoccupied with the situation at hand. She may have the only window of opportunity to stop Wendy from both preg-ifying the planet and then conquering it. Without any sign of the PregTech team, Mara figured she had to take things into her own hands.

"Where is Duke's office?" Mara asked, wondering if the club's owner should go by "Dame" now instead.

Erin looked around before stopping and turning back to Mara. "I have no recollection of those specifics."

Mara groaned and put her hands on her hips. They were naturally wide but as one of the few people for miles who wasn't pregnant, she was still at normal proportions. Standing next to Erin, she was like a moray on a whale. Erin's belly stuck out nearly a dozen feet, constantly quivering with movement, with a butt that could crush Mara and breasts too heavy for the nerdy girl to carry, even one at a time.

"Fine, let's just start looking then."

"No need," a woman's voice bellowed. Sliding down the bannister of a long staircase was an elderly woman in a tuxedo and a rifle in her hands. She stopped at the bottom and looked between Mara and Erin. "I don't know if I can trust her. I may remember her from the golf tournament, though she's gotten a bit...larger since then," Duke said, pointing at Erin before turning to Mara. "But you're not expectant so I think I can talk to you."

Mara saw the gun. "So you did shoot down Wendy's vehicle." She stepped forward and took one of the old woman's hands. "I know things are crazy right now but I think you may be able to help stop what's going on."

"Indeed. I served in the war in my younger days and have always exercised and kept regular training," Duke said, saluting. "Just call me Sarge."

"Gotcha," Mara said with a little smile, playfully saluting. "So it looks like Wendy still transformed all men, but if they're of a...certain age, they won't become pregnant."

"And what about this one?" Sarge said, pointing at Erin. "She looks a bit...dim."

"Wendy kind of screwed with her head but she's a friend," Mara said, turning to Erin. "At least, I think so."

"You thought wrong," Wendy cooed as she walked into the country club's main floor. Mara's face went pale as she saw the villainous former secretary step forward. "Ms. Parker has a handy tracker on her person. I thought she may try and look for signs of her former life and that makes it easy to track down...loose ends."

"I had the correct instinct," Erin said, pointing at Sarge and stepping back toward her "empress." "This is the one who shot down your ship."

Wendy sighed and crossed her arms. "Seems women who won't become pregnant will be rebellious. I'll just have to gather up elderly women when I take control. No worry. I find old people disgusting anyway."

Sarge raised her rifle and pointed it at Wendy. "I will not kill a woman who's with child but I can hit you in the leg and make you lame," she said.

Wendy rolled her eyes. "Oh please. Erin?"

In a blur of red and pink, Erin snatched away Sarge's gun and laid it down at Wendy's feet, who took to dismantling and breaking its individual parts. "H-how in the world?" Sarge stammered.

"Erin here is a blank slate and exists to serve me," Wendy said, petting Erin's enormous belly. "Once you get rid of irrelevant things – birthdays, interests, hobbies – you can focus on the things that matter. Like disarming an attacker."

"I won't let you get away with what you're doing!" Sarge boomed.

"Eh, do what you want," Wendy shrugged, taking out a small pistol and firing it into Sarge's shoulder. The old woman stumbled back a few steps but was otherwise unharmed. "That's a tracker. When I'm ready to gather up all rebels, we'll meet again." Wendy turned to leave but stopped and touched her hand on Erin again. "Oh, would you bring Mara with us, please?"

"Me? What do you want with me?" Mara panicked.

"You're a bit of a nuisance but I think you can be put to good use," Wendy said with a sweet smile. "As someone who just refuses to get pregnant, I think you'll make a good nanny for my daughter. I'll be a busy woman, after all." Erin grabbed Mara's arms, squeezing tightly.

"Empress, are we going back to the vehicle?" Erin asked.

"Yes, we'll go back and see how the preggos are doing on repairs," Wendy said as they left the country club. "Why?"

"When it is ready, I want to go meet this...Brandon," Erin said.

Wendy snorted. "Oh, believe me, I think he's coming here."

Erin's face didn't show it but she was processing the new information. Brandon is coming here...and he is the father of my babies...does this mean he...cares about me? Faintly, her cheeks started to turn red.

<hr>

Back in the van, Brandon was being pushed every which way by the bellies crammed inside. At times he wasn't even sitting, just crowd-surfing the pregnant stomachs instead. At least if there was an accident, he would still be preserved, as if he was surrounded by bubble-wrap.

"Here we are. In town and en route," Sarah said, seeing the sign for the rich neighborhood pass by. "Now we just need to figure out where this satellite of Wendy's is and then track that monster down ourselves."

"Uh, I think I may have found her," Brandon stammered, turning his head. Everyone in the car turned their head to see a large, light brown orb. From afar, it looked like stone or a downed hot air balloon but as they drove closer, it was clear that it was a pregnant belly.

"Oh my god," Katie said, trying to picture a pregnancy that size. She was conflicted between being aroused and terrified and she was not alone. Brandon's erection twitched, his heart going out to whoever it was but also desperately wanting to caress that colossal belly himself.

"Everyone, be on your guard," Rebecca said, leaning forward and pushing her stomach against Brandon. "Wendy's clearly not messing around and she can be incredibly dangerous."

"R-right," Brandon said, feeling Rebecca rub against him. Now that she had given her breasts some work, they were starting to swell even faster with milk for her two newborns, each now the size of Brandon's arm span. He couldn't help but remember how, out of all the amulet-carrying women, she was the only one he hadn't slept with.

The van parked near the gigantic pregnant belly and everyone hurried out. Brandon expected to be the fastest, but with the return of the robo-spines, he was outpaced by his swollen sister and her coworkers. "Mom?" Sarah said in shock.

"H-hi honey," Ashley croaked. She was pinned to the Earth by her belly, stretching nearly three stories into the air. Miraculously, her skin was still smooth and taut, though it was easier to see the impression of veins lining her swollen womb. She turned to Brandon and gave a little grin. Her lust amulet had been taken by Wendy but with so many pregnancy hormones flooding her system, she was still aroused by the sight of the last man she'd slept with. "Hello Brandon."

"Don't worry Ashley. I'll help you out," Brandon said, lifting his own amulet he got from Kim. It glowed briefly but he was unable to shrink his adopted mother down. "What's happening?"

"Wendy used her amulet to transfer all the babies from some of her new...followers into me. She said I generate energy better in my belly and it'll help them work faster on her satellite," Ashley groaned, feeling the converted energy inside her round middle pulse and shift. "Ooh, I'm so sore."

"I'll see what I can do," Sarah said, getting out some of her PregTech gear. "And don't worry. I'll get back at Wendy for you whenever she shows up."

"You don't need to wait that long," Catalina said, pointing across the golf course. Over the hill came Wendy, Erin, and Mara in their clutches. A sick smile spread across Wendy's face.

"Ah, finally," Wendy cackled. "We're all together."
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: Mara and Erin are seen by Wendy!

choices: Start the epilogue
Wendy has one more trick to pull
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Wendy wore a gleeful smile as she looked over her few remaining rivals to ascension. Her various workers, some still with their pregnancies intact and others with smooth, toned middles from Wendy's transfer into Ashley, looked on with fear and caution.

"Give it up, Wendy. You're all alone and totally outnumbered," Sarah said, raising one of her PregTech devices and pointing it at the mall's de facto leader. "Surrender or Antonio will end up with a lot more heirs than he expected."

"Ah, ah, ah," Wendy chided. Sarah hit Wendy with the energy wave, intending to add onto her pregnancy but Wendy's amulet just glowed, pulsing with the six different colors of the various amulets that combined to form it. All that remained were the pride and wrath amulet, held by Catalina and Brandon.

"B-be careful!" Ashley wheezed, pushing both hands against the mound of belly on top of her. "She's too dangerous for you all to handle."

"Pff, danger's my middle name," Catalina grinned, slipping on a light brown vest. Once on, she darted toward Wendy, snaking around her to grab the slender woman's arms and legs. "Or rather, it's the middle name of archeologist and treasure hunter, Diana D. Dawson, as seen in Triple D Adventure: Search For The Hidden-"

Before Catalina could finish her sentence, Wendy had already tripped her up and pinned the pregnant actress to the floor. Wendy had one foot on her back, pressing her belly into the golf course. "You were saying?"

"Hmm," Catalina thought out loud as Wendy bent down and snatched the amulet off of her neck. "That's a lot harder to do when I'm not working with a stunt team. And I don't get 50 takes to get it right."

Wendy combined the pride amulet with her own, cackling and marveling at her new glowing gem. "Only one left," she said, turning her mossy eyes to Brandon. "And no offense but I think you'll be the easiest one to stop."

Brandon gulped and held his greed amulet up. "I can't let you do this, Wendy. You're treating all these pregnant women like slaves."

"Oh please, like that's any better than you treating them as pieces of meat?" Wendy laughed. "How many of the women here have you fucked in the past few days?"

"I'm trying to be better. And at least I really do care about these women," Brandon said. "As for your offer of turning Ashley and Erin into sex zombies or whatever, no thanks. I like them the way they are."

"I'm sure you'll feel that way," Wendy smiled, snapping her fingers. Instantly, Ashley's eyes bugged out and she pushed hard into the ground. With a grunt, she managed to turn her colossal pregnant belly over until it came down, crashing into the earth and trapping all of the PregTech team. Brandon was just barely out of the way and looked in horror as his pregnant friends and comrades were stuck under an even larger belly.

"Wh-what happened?" Ashley moaned.

"The mind wipe is tricky to pull off and since I didn't have the time to erase your memory, I thought I'd add something to it," Wendy said. "A little subconscious cue. Now then, for that amulet..."

As Wendy walked toward Brandon, the remaining man too paralyzed with fear to run, there was a flash of golden skin as Rebecca swung her fist. Wendy dodged and looked unfazed as the swollen spy panted, a look of rage in her eyes. "I'm not under your thumb anymore, you bitch," Rebecca growled.

"Rebecca, you look terrible," Wendy giggled. "Exhausted too. Did something happen recently?" As Rebecca howled and darted forward again, Erin darted to intercept and effortlessly deflected the spy's blows. "I was wondering when you would get here."

"I was doing final checks on the satellite, empress," Erin said in her brainwashed monotone. "It will be ready for launch momentarily."

"Perfect. Once the amulet is complete, it will be able to convert the entire planet to pregnant woman instantly. Save for Mr. Page here but maybe we can keep him in a zoo or something so people can see the last remaining male," Wendy said. "Oh, and Rebecca's baby boy should be there too."

Rebecca may have lost her wrath amulet but she was still filled with fury as she battled Erin. But with her own fatigue from just giving birth combined with Erin's focus from her mind wipe, the oversized secret agent was slowing down while Erin stood strong.

"Now then," Wendy said, striding forward. "The amulet." Just as Wendy grabbed it off of Brandon's body, there was a loud horn honking. Wendy turned to see a golf cart racing toward them with Tanner behind the wheel.

"Brandon! Get on!" Tanner yelled. Wendy narrowly avoided the cart as Brandon got on. In the back, hanging on barely, was Kim.

"Is that big blob...Ashley?" Kim asked.

"Yeah, but we have more important things to worry about," Brandon said. "Though I'm surprised to see you both together."

"We both care about your mother, even if it's in different ways now," Tanner said. "And Sarah is still my daughter."

"Uh, did Wendy have any technology at the mall you didn't know about?" Brandon asked.

"No, why?" Kim said before turning and looking past her own belly and breasts to see Wendy running and gaining on the golf cart.

"I'm so close! I'm not letting you get away now!" Wendy screamed, leaping into a spear tackle. She hit Kim in the belly, making the swollen tan woman squeal and tipping the cart over. Tanner and Brandon rolled out, just in front of the satellite. As Brandon weakly tried to stand up, Erin was already on top of him and held him down.

"Finally," Wendy sighed, daintily holding her combined amulet as Erin removed Brandon's.

Erin looked between Brandon and his adopted father. "Are these...men?"

"Yes, yes, soon to be the last ones," Wendy said. "Now then, the amulet."

"Which one is Brandon?" Erin asked again.

"The young one. Now, the amulet!" Wendy shouted.

Erin helped Brandon up and looked him over. She touched his hand against her belly. "You're...the father?"

"No," Brandon said with a nervous laugh. "But I...love you. Do you remember?"

She groaned, holding her head and her belly. "I feel...alone. Empress said only she cares for me but when I'm with you, my chest feels...warm."

Brandon stepped forward, pressing against her belly, feeling his own face blushing too. "Erin, please, it's me. She can't have made you forget about the two of us."

Erin looked into Brandon's eyes and started blushing brighter and brighter. "Brandon? I feel...weird. My head is all...hazy."

"What do you remember?" Brandon cooed, taking her hand.

Erin bit her lip and gently hugged him. "I remember liking...this. Being with...you." She kissed him softly and the two hugged, gripping his amulet tightly.

Wendy grunted and strode forward, stepping over Tanner in the process. "If you want something done right," she said to herself as she grabbed the amulet out of Brandon's hands. It combined with her own and the two began wrestling over the one, true, combined amulet. It crackled with energy and glowed like a far off star in the sky. "It's mine! It's all mine! I will control the world and there will be order in my empire!"

Deep inside the amulet, there was still a piece of Yaral's intent. And what Yaral craved was chaos. For a long time, it had gone along with Antonio and Wendy because it saw chaos in their future. But if Wendy was going to conquer the world once and for all...that was it for chaos. So with a bolt of energy, Wendy's hands were thrown off the amulet and Brandon stood tall with the powerful bauble.

I knew it would be you a sinister voice said in Brandon's head. How are you going to use all this power?

Brandon looked over at his team trapped underneath Ashley. Using the amulet, he returned her fetuses to the women around the golf course who had their transferred into her. Ashley shrank down to her previous size, which was hardly small, but she was a bit more normal now and all the working women from the country club were back to being swollen and fertile.

Good, good! Now, let's keep spreading that power around the world! Really mix things up!

Brandon looked down at the amulet and thought about everything that had happened in the past weeks or so since he came across it. He thought about all the women he had sex with and all the things Sarah built. But he also thought about the hearts he'd broken and the war between PregTech and the mall. So, looking into Erin's eyes one more time, he tossed the amulet into the satellite.

"Kim, how do I launch this?" Brandon asked.

"No!" Wendy screamed as Kim weakly crawled over and typed in the proper codes. The machine rumbled to life and began to launch into the sky. As it reached the upper atmosphere, it got faster and faster until it was gone, drifting through the vast expanse of space until it broke apart. The amulet floated out into the recesses of space, possibly to one day find another universe or dimension and find new hosts.

Brandon sighed and looked down at Erin, who nodded and smiled at him. They kissed and held each other in their arms as Brandon looked up again. "It's over."
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: The final strike

choices: Sarah Page
Katie Johnson
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Deep in the upper west coast of America, in a big valley two hours from shore was a delightful cheery place called Smallton. Life for the Smalltonians would be forever changed when a mysterious wave of industry, technology and biological genius came to town. I’m BBN reporter Nicola Farris and this is the documentary of how Smallton, became the fertile luxurious city known as Frejyabourne.

My story begins at the most important piece of Freyjabourne’s history, the Preggomall. Starting off as a simple arcade it was purchased 5 years ago by a man by the name of Antonio Greene. Over the years it grew astronomically and now is one of the high end maternity companies in the world.

It should be mentioned that when you come to Freyjabourne as a woman I felt so welcome meeting the many pregnant women in this city. When I arrived at the Preggomall I felt like I was taking a step into the future, almost like an exclusively women's Silicon Valley. Stores were selling highly advanced technologies and gadgets that felt years beyond our time.

I made my way to see the CEO of this fine establishment, and I have to tell you Kim is one of the most humble leaders I've met. I sat down and had a discussion about the recent events that lead her to becoming the CEO of such an important company.

“Well it was quite an interesting venture” Kim claimed as she drank a cup of tea. “When I started working for the Preggomall, Freyjabourne was still called Smallton, in fact it was a few weeks until the name Freyjaton was being used”

I was curious, I thought this place was called Freyjabourne, but apparently it had been changed fairly recently, to commemorate the recent events that shaped this town.

“After a previous CEO’s blunders I decided it was time to fix the notorious natures that the Preggomall was known for.” Kim continued. “Once that CEO was locked up behind bars, the sweetest man whom helped my partner decided to join in with the rebuilding. Oh hello lackey, so you have those new numbers for me?”

A man by the name of Tanner begrudgingly entered the office wearing a somewhat tight and odd looking suit. After Kim whispered into the accountant’s ear he went on to introduce himself. In an annoyed and tired manner he said to me “Hello there madam, my name is Tanner and I am the lead accountant and I am absolutely delighted to see you make a documentary about our ever so brave and Intelligent leader.”

Tanner left the room and Kim went on to mention how a man by the name of Brandon Page helped for a strategic relationship between the Preggomall and Preg-Tech and how they had just announced PTP Industries. After our initial conversation Kim went on to show me the Mall and how it is run.

Walking through each of the stores I noticed the PTP logo on most appliances, including a tablet run program that can help each business communicate with each other. “ As you can see the food court has some fully fledged restaurants inside, serving some elegant cuisines from across the globe” Kim told me as she waddled around with her large midsection. “The furniture has all been constructed to work with the pregnant form”

I was amazed not just by the work she was able to do but how much she could whilst pregnant. “Oh please this is simple, the one that has been doing the hard work is an ex-coworker I know that has been running her own security firm.”

We had sadly run out of time, Kim had to be at Prenatal Yoga with a woman by the name of Janice. But I had to ask my self, where do I go to next on this journey?

I decided to find out who ran this security company. If Kim could vouch for her, then she surely must be good. She didn't want to put her face on camera, but was happy to talk about how this city changed her life.

“Coming into this town I wouldn't realise that I would become a mother” the owner answered through a voice modulator. “ my history had been questionable, and When I started going into labour, I thought my life was over. That's when a young man called Brandon came and helped me realise that I could live a new life in this fantastic town!”

As we continued the lady talked about her children. “Well, they are both 6 months old, they are currently with my boyfriend who is one of the yoga teachers at the Preggomall. I have truly been blessed” she smiled, finishing the conversation off.

Hearing the name Brandon again I asked if I could meet with him, but alas she told me she had no clue as to the man's whereabouts. She did however give me directions to my next location.

In what looked like a newly built part of the city, I found myself on set of ‘the Forbidden Curve’ a dramatic soap opera about lesbians in a lingerie store. After watching a take I went over to the Director to talk about Freyjabourne. To my discovery, it was none other than the very famous Catalina Carazon!

“Nicola how good to see you again!” Catalina squealed as she embraced me. During her previous film releases she had been interviewed by me for a documentary on her rapidly rising career. She was the reason why I am doing this documentary on Freyjaboune.

She took a break from her busy schedule to have a talk with me about her career change. “ During my time here I realised I was talking all about the experiences that my characters had. I couldn't help telling my eager fans and colleges about the movies I was in.” Looking over to her crew I noticed they had an admiration for the glowing star. “After the event at the golf club I decided it was time I became that made the stories that people loved, not just starred in them.”

I was lucky enough to meet some up coming stars hat would make their debut in this show. Just like most of the women on the streets these women were pregnant too, but it was almost as if I was looking at a whole new league of pregnancy.

First up was a woman widely known through the pop culture community as ‘Princess Becka’. She sported the most children of the cast and had the most to say about it. “ I tell you I have tried for-ever to find a way to induce labor but as you can see, nothing worked. I consulted Catalina and she told me to embrace it, then she offered me a role in her new show, to which I happily accepted!”

It was incredible to see a woman of Beckas age supporting a belly of sheer size. When I asked her about supporting that many children she said “I'm afraid there are women at similar sizes to me.” Pointing across the set I could see the famous actresses Hayley Hewitt and Ashlee Byron with a couple of other actresses. Every actress sat down with me including the two new comers Joelle Banks and Ashley Page.

“Our new careers are fantastic!” Joelle joyfully squealed.

“After the mess that rocked our lovely little town, it's finally good to have something great come from all this!” Ashley added.

“After a man by the name of Brandon, (who we know like very well) Hayley and I decided to take up on their offer of dropping by.” Ashlee said as she held Hayley's hand. “That's where we met Catalina and after some bridges were mended we started a new life here.”

“Just be aware of Ashlee and Ashley.” Hayley interjected “ you and I Nicola, we know all too well about strange bed fellows…”

Hearing the names Brandon and Page again I wondered if Ashley knew anything more about our mysterious do gooder. We sat down and had a good one in one about it.

“I- helped raise Brandon from a very young age. Sadly his parents passed away when he was a baby and I was his next of kin.” Ashley solemnly started. Her frown changed to a grin as she continued. “He has always thought the best of my family and has always tried to do what's best for us, even if we aren't technically related”.

I had to learn more. This person had some how shaped the town drastically! “Why has everyone been so secretive of this Brandon fellow?” I asked trying my best to consider the step mothers feelings.

“Well once all the chaos died down Brandon had to deal with someone that caused most of the madness in the town. Brandon spent the next few months rebuilding the town. As an engineer he managed to get the process quickly completed.” Ashley proudly claimed. A slightly sad tone could be heard in her voice though. “But something was a wry, he knew if this person could not be trusted to stay there.”

I knew Ashley and I would meet again, but she believed the story could only be continued by a lovely lady called…
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: The Epilogue: A new Beginning

choices: The country club
The local tech store
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
Handing me a business card I discovered that I would be heading to PTP industries. Booked my appointment and A few days later I was meeting Katie Johnson who was PTP’s CFO. Located in the business section of Freyjabourne their building towered over the neighbouring businesses. I was about to enter when I got received a message from an unknown number. It read

[I hope you had fun with Kim, a woman like her can’t be trusted]

I tried to call the number but it didn't work. Realising I was running late I ran into the building.

Making it to the 29th floor I was welcomed to a vey lovely office. There was a cubical section for all their young interns and new employees and I walked past their break room with some large and comfy chairs. Heading upstairs I noticed that PTP was very accommodating for their employees, all of which were and still are heavily pregnant.

Katie's assistant showed me into her office before leaving in a hurry. It felt odd being alone in this large office by myself, a feeling that became worse when I saw steam escape from the door on the other side of the room.

As the door opened I was amazed by what I had seen. A petite woman had come out in a business suit and a towel wrapped around her head. I was amazed to see that she was supporting one of the heaviest pregnancies in the office. I had no idea how this young woman was supporting such a pregnancy that would break anyone's back.

“Where's all the steam coming from?” I asked, concerned that it might damage the office.

“Oh that's just the sauna next door” answered Katie as she dried out her hair. “I'm sorry about that but my blasted assistant is still understanding things like giving me prior notice to when guests arrive…”

When I asked her about Freyjabournes evolution, she gave me a delicate smile and spoke from the heart. “ these past couple of years have been a blast. We had our troubles here and there but things really came together when the Preggomall and Pregtech came to create PTP. We understood that the Preggomall can really relate to their audience and we make the highest quality products. It's clear to say it was a simple fit.”

She went on to talk about when they decided to make this step moving forward. She, Kim and their partner Sarah were going to help revolutionise pregnancy in the world today. Just like Elon Musk they had five goals for the next ten years.

1. To throw away any negativity that comes with pregnancy.
2. End endometriosis and other diseases that leave people sterile
3. Deliver a service across America that helps all pregnant women at every stage.
4. Provide an energy supplement that will help lower pollution levels
5. Tackle Issue one and three on a global scale.

She was about to talk about why each of those goals were important but we had a special guest arrive. Sarah Page, PTP industries founder and CEO came in and discovered us filming.

“What's going on here?” She profusely demanded. After a brief explanation a discussion and some contemplation by Sarah and her legal team, it was deemed okay. Just like Kim I noticed how Sarah had a confident stride mixed in with her waddle, she gracefully glided through the halls with a belly that was almost rubbing both of the walls. I didn't want to say but her belly did get stuck as she entered her office. After a little push she apologised and told me how they were refitting the door this week.

Katie, Sarah and I went into Sarah’s corner office and discussed the people who helped out with PTP whilst I tried to uncover more about this Brandon fellow. “Kim and I knew there was a lot of discord in Freyjaton, so after the Country Club Offensive We chose to form a partnership. We sat on the grass of the golf course and discussed what we wanted. In the end we formed PTP, a company that provides a pregnancy and electronic service across America.”

“Can you tell us about the Country Club Offensive?” I asked, curious as to what happened.

“ In order to tell you that I think you should know about the person that tried to take us down” Sarah claimed with a most concerned look. “Wendy Greene, wife of Antonio Greene was the previous CEO of the Preggomall. She manipulated many of my fellow colleges and friends and almost cost he reputation of this fine city. Everything came to a head when she caused an event that changed the life of thousands in Freyjaton. We confronted her at the Country Club and we stopped her from changing other people's lives.”

“Can I ask where she is now?” I asked.

“She was arrested and is seeing multiple life sentences but a woman as manipulative as her always finds a way out. She escaped and is somewhere out there. Hell she could be in Tijuana for all I know!” Sarah answered as her phone rang. “Hello? No you know where Brandon is. Yes I’m with Nicola now, okay fine when I find it, I will give it to her.” Normally we don't include phone calls in documentaries but I had to find out more.

“Wait, Sarah Page, as in sister of Brandon Page?” I questioned the CEO.

Sarah looked at me, said goodbye and hung up the phone. “I forget you camera guys like to catch everything on camera. Yes I am his sister, but Brandon has said that he wants his privacy. Being my step brother we had some strange emotions binding between us. Not bad strange, a lot of it was good. The day after the CCO Brandon started fixing any wrongs he had made. Brandon and his fia- oh I guess it was still girlfriend back then decided that the right thing to do was to stop the violence and start building the foundation that would take Freyjaton into being Freyjabourne I… I-noti- I I I….”

Katie could see Sarah was finding it hard to talk so she continued. “We could see that when he wasn't outside or with Erin- “

“Katie!” Sarah yelled

“Sorry, you can cut that out right?” Katie asked me.

“Yeah we can stuff like that out” I reassured her.

“Well, When he was on his own, or when he thought no one was looking, he would start to look adrift. He would grab something from his pockets and just slowly rub it like he was holding a large penny.” Katie said, looking into her glass of water. “I haven't seen what he was holding, but on occasion I saw a red glow come from his breast pocket. About six months ago, it seemed like he was never sure of himself, and a certain red headed girlfriend decided that they needed time away from Freyjabourne.”

We were nearing the end of our discussion when my phone started buzzing. I had received another message from that unknown number. After excusing myself I tried to ring it, but I was left with a dead dial tone. The message read

[Don’t trust the PM, how can a mall have that much energy?]

Turning my phone off I excused myself to see the facilities. Looking the text over again I knew something suspicious was up. There was an incredible amount of pregnant women here, technology had seemed to come leaps and bounds and now I'm receiving texts from someone questioning this cities energy? Coming back I rounded up the interview and decided to head to my next location.
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: Epilogue 2: inside PTP industries

choices: Correct
Look, it's clear where we're going with this. If you want another route, here.
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
If PregTech was such a big part of PTP, the economic driving force behind everything in Frejyabourne, then I wanted to see some of their technology for myself. I headed to a large store in downtown Freyjabourne and I was, not surprisingly, surrounding by pregnant women inside. They were of all different ages and sizes, though even the smallest woman would have been the biggest I'd ever seen before coming here on my assignment. Each one was buying products marked with the PTP logo, though one older product still bore the PregTech marker, with the silhouette of a pregnant woman and the company's name inside the belly.

"Excuse me," I asked one woman who slowly waddled around the store as she picked up a flat, curved piece of metal. "What is that?"

"This? They call them robo-spines," the woman said with a little smile, clearly nervous to be on camera. "They help you walk while you're pregnant."

"Oh, I can see why that would come in handy," I chuckled.

She laughed back. "Yes, I already have one but I recently made my belly a lot bigger so I need the upgrade." As she indicated, her belly stuck out nearly twice as far as her wingspan and she seemed to have trouble moving around with it.

After talking with her, I found the two owners of the store: a mother/daughter pair named Clara and Kristina respectively. Clara had the dignified look you'd expect in a high-powered executive while her daughter seemed a little more mischievous. Both carried pregnancies that boggled the mind, though still nothing compared to what I'd seen at the PTP headquarters or on the TV set with Catalina and Ashley.

"Have you both worked in this business for very long?" I asked.

"I was part of another engineering company about a year ago," Clara said. "My husb...I mean, my wife ran it but I was the de facto CEO so it was easy when I transitioned over." She snickered. "Pregnancy has not been easy on my dear Tyra so she let me take over officially." Clara placed one hand on Kristina's belly and began to stroke it. "And I'm hoping to prepare my daughter to take over one day too."

"So selling PTP's products must go over well in a town with so many women expecting," I said.

"'Expecting' implies they're going to give birth soon," Kristina laughed, giving her enormous middle a few slaps. "I'm planning on keeping these brats in here for a good long time. Being pregnant is fun but I don't want to be a mom yet."

I could see both women glaring at each other so I cleared my throat and tried to move on to another question but Clara cut me off. "PTP sells many products that pregnant women find useful but what companies like us do is offer customization. We can reprogram and upgrade devices where PTP doesn't have the time...at least not yet."

"I see," I said, making a few notes. "And Clara, you seem to be married and happy but is dating hard in this town? Is it hard to see someone when you're pregnant?"

"Not if you're into pregnant women already," Kristina snickered again. "There aren't a lot of options for guys."

"I keep hearing about one man...Brandon Page," I said. "Have you dated him?"

Kristina and Clara's faces both flushed. "Once," Kristina growled. "He ended up being a dweeb."

"I think that's enough for this interview," Clara said as two wide-bellied security guards came over. With that, I left and was a bit lost for my next location. I looked over the cards I'd been snuck.

[how can a mall have that much energy?]

Curious, I went back to the mall to try and investigate for myself. With so many women with enormous bellies, it was easy to move around unseen. After all, most of them could not even see their own legs and I am not a tall woman. I got past the pregnant hoards and found a basement. It was surprisingly deep and there appeared to be labs where the mall was testing new technology. I didn't dawdle and chose to focus on the task at hand: PreggoMall's energy supply.

I followed what appeared to be power lines to a series of large metal doors and heard cries and whimpers from inside one of them. Terror struck me: they were torturing women or keeping them prison. I knew such a perfect town could not exist. Getting my camera ready, I burst into the room.

Inside, Kim and Ashley were writhing on a mattress, with the mall's CEO sucking the large, swollen breasts of the actress while struggling to stroke her naked lap. Ashley was screaming in ecstasy, with one hand rubbing her own belly and one rubbing Kim's. They were sweaty and glistening as Ashley's cries got higher and higher until she could no longer be heard.

Once that climax hit, Kim grabbed a large cable and affixed it to Ashley's popped-out belly button. There was a crackle of energy and I could hear machinery start to turn. Ashley collapsed onto the mattress and continued to pant and moan as Kim turned to me. "Ms. Farris...I wish you'd called if you wanted a follow-up interview."

While Ashley settled into her orgasm, Kim explained everything to me. She was planning on keeping this a secret until the next technology expo but she figured this was as good a time as any. PTP had been working on an alternative energy source for months and they had now perfected it. The contents of a woman's womb could be turned into pure energy. This eliminated all kinds of risks: women who did not want to give birth would not have to, it made women near-invulnerable and imbued many other health benefits, and it provided a massive amount of clean energy. Kim and Sarah Page were even working on a way to let this power source run their special pregnancy cars.

I asked if Ashley would never be able to give birth and Kim said it was a temporary process. Women could administer a dose and turn their wombs into energy for as long as they wanted and it was easily reversible. Kim also found that, when tapping into the energy, women in orgasm produced more and the hornier the better. As such, Ashley herself was enough to power not just the mall, but the entire city.

"Soon, all women will have this option and we can eliminate all other energy sources," Kim said with a big smile. "Now you know why we wanted a better platform to announce it."

I promised to hold off on this part of the story until around the time they were going to make the announcement but in return, I wanted information on Brandon Page. Ashley was in no condition to talk just yet so Kim directed me to some friends of Brandon's at the city hospital.

With the improvements in technology, the hospital now did little else besides deliver babies for women who were ready to give birth and treat pregnant patients from outside the town. This was the division of Brandon's friends Gwen, Grace, and Mara. Gwen, who had the biggest pair of breasts I've seen in my life, waddled forward as Grace shook my hand.

"Hello, I'm Grace and I run the Outside Natal Health Clinic here," she said. "Mara is our top researcher and Gwen here is my assistant."

"Hello," Gwen smiled, waving and smacking her chest in the process. "Ouch...sorry, that happens a lot."

"PTP is working on some kind of support for her," Grace giggled softly, rubbing her own belly. It was much smaller than others I'd seen. Gwen's looked small too but I think it was just a matter of perspective with her bosom. "Let's walk and talk."

Down the hall, there were many women – some pregnant and some not. The pregnant ones mostly looked like normal women with maybe only one or two fetuses inside them. "First, let's meet Mara," Grace said, opening the door to a lab. Mara was, to my surprise, not pregnant but she was at a table with many chemicals and pieces of PTP tech.

"Hi," Mara said, shaking my hand as she introduced herself. "Grace and Gwen and I have been good friends for a long time so when Grace announced she was creating this clinic, I knew I wanted to join." She put one hand over her stomach. "I've been infertile for a lot of my life so working on curing infertility and helping other women become pregnant has been close to my heart."

"We've still had success with the process and help outside women reach their goals," Gwen said. "And a lot end up with many more babies than they anticipated."

"And we can also cure a lot of pregnancy complications here," Grace said. "It's a mix of our hard work and the great tech over at PTP."

As Gwen and Mara kissed a bit, I turned to Grace and asked if she knew where Brandon Page might be, explaining my interest.

"I see," Grace said, looking over Gwen and Mara. "Well...I guess his honeymoon had to end sometime." They got out their phones, also PTP-branded, and found an address for me.

"If you want to talk to Brandon, that's where he'll be," Gwen said.

I loaded up my news van and headed out and it turns out their directions were-
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: The local tech store

1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.content:
While I came out to report on the main booming industry and cultural life of Freyjabourne, my curiosity and my journey in the story took me to the outskirts of the town. Actually, signs and maps told me it used to be part of a neighboring, wealthier city with a large country club and convention center but as it had its own sudden outbreak of extreme pregnancies and seemingly no male population, the two merged in the period where Freyjaton became Freyjabourne.

It was at this country club where I was told I could find the elusive Brandon Page. With large swimming pools and an athletic center for gentle workouts, it seemed to be the perfect place for expectant women carrying massive loads who would want a load off. But the whole place was empty as I drove up, yet the grounds seemed to be well taken care of.

Here I met my first person as an older woman came up to me and politely asked me to leave. "I'm sorry, the club has been rented out for a private event for the next few months," she said. She was clearly too old to be pregnant but her eyes settled on my own flat stomach and she grinned. "You must be from out of town."

"I am. Nicola Farris, journalist," I said, shaking the woman's hand. "I was told I could talk with Brandon Page here?"

As the old woman, who told me she was the owner, was trying to tell me I was still going to need to leave, she got a call. I could hear a young man's voice on the other end but couldn't make out what he was saying. "Mr. Page said his friends called him to let him know you were coming. He says it's alright."

Smiling and thanking the woman, I walked into the large club house, which was totally empty but I could hear the sound of cooing and panting echoing through the halls. I followed the sound to a large room where an enormous mattress was set up, its sheets lifted into the air by the largest pregnant belly I had seen yet. I'd seen the photos of the women in Freyjabourne before starting my report and knew to expect some strange things but this defied belief. Whoever this belly was attached to, it looked like she was gestating a pair of whales inside there, though I had to admit her skin was still had a smooth sheen.

"Hi, you must be Nicola," a young man said as he got off of the bed. He was blushing and sweating a bit but he had changed into a robe. The pregnant woman, a gorgeous red head, wrapped the sheets close to her swollen breasts, exposing more and more of her belly in the process. "I'm Brandon and this is my wife Erin."

"Nice to meet you," Erin and I said in unison. "I have to admit, you're a hard man to track down," I added.

"We really wanted to get away for our honeymoon," Erin smiled, stroking Brandon's arm. "Things got a little crazy a few months ago so we wanted some...quality time."

"I-I see," I said, blushing as the two made doe eyes at one another. I had clearly interrupted them as they...broke in their honeymoon suite, let's say. "H-have you been having fun?"

"Lots," Erin purred, leaning her massive body forward to kiss Brandon on the lips. He smiled and touched one hand to her belly, taking in her size and tightness. "We had to rent this place out so I had room to get as big as possible. Luckily, the owner is a friend and decided she owed us a favor."

"Get bigger?" I asked. "I'd heard some other women in Freyjabourne talk about making their pregnancies larger but how exactly does that work?"

"Freyjabourne. I'll never get used to that name," Brandon said, shaking his head as he held up a small device. "This was one of the first big inventions my sis...I mean, my step-sister came up with. She found a way to tap into the fundamental 'essence' and 'energy' of pregnancy and could tamper with it. With this, you can make your pregnancy bigger, smaller, get rid of it all together, or even make yourself pregnant."

"And you chose to...make yours bigger, I take it," I said, gesturing to all of Erin. She laughed and started rubbing her bare stomach where I saw the impressions of some kicks.

"Yes, it's fun," Erin said. "Just feeling yourself getting more fertile and motherly. Plus, I think I look good with the belly and I know Brandon agrees." She put one hand on his thigh, which made the newly married man jolt up a bit. "Don't you think I look good?"

I gulped, seeing Erin's pink lips glisten and part, her eyes flash, her breasts rise and fall with her breath, and her pregnant stomach looking so powerful and lovely. "Y-you look nice," I said, thinking about my own private desires to be a mother one day...or at least be pregnant. But this busy job has its downsides.

"Show her, Brandon. Use it on her," Erin said.

"I-I don't think that's necessary," Brandon said, his cheeks turning even redder.

"So, I meant to ask, everyone seems to attribute you with helping the town out," I said. "Ashley, Sarah, Catalina, Kim, Katie, the head of the security firm," I said, not wanting to reveal that woman's name, as per her request. "What exactly did you do all those months ago?"

Brandon gulped and looked nervous but Erin patted him on the back and seemed to give him a little burst of confidence. "While the old owners of the mall were looking into pregnancy technology, I...stumbled across a few ideas of my own. Some got a little out of hand but everyone else picked up on them. Katie, Ashley, especially Sarah, did a lot with them."

"But they seem to have a deeply personal connection with you," I said, pressing the issue. It'd taken me so long to find this man, I wanted to at least get some answers out of him.

"We were...friends. Close friends," Brandon said.

"Very close friends, in most cases," Erin chuckled, giving Brandon a harder pat on the back. "But I've been there too. I've gotten to be close friends with a lot of them too."

I thought I was picking up on the subtext correctly and raised my eyebrows. "I-Is that right?"

Erin smiled and nodded, stroking her belly in bigger and bigger circles. "One hell of a bachelorette party, let me tell you."

"So...think you'll keep your pregnancy this size for long?" I asked.

"No, it's great for a special occasion but I couldn't last this big forever," Erin laughed, giving a playful grunt as she shifted her maternal weight.

"We'll probably end our honeymoon soon anyway. It's been a long time and we'd like to get back to work and see everyone else," Brandon said.

"And if I get rid of my pregnancy entirely, we can look into putting a baby inside me the old fashioned way," Erin grinned. Brandon turned to his wife in disbelief, a nervous smile quickly crawling up his face.

"Y-you mean it?" he said.

"I wanted to wait until we were back home but...surprise!" Erin squealed. The two jumped together to kiss and embrace again, Erin's gigantic belly knocking over the pregnancy device in the process.

PING!

"Oh...oops," Erin said, looking me over. "Sorry about that."

"Don't worry," I said, looking down at my new, swollen belly that burst through my clothes. I don't know how I looked to them but I felt enormous. There must have been at least triplets squirming around inside me and I looked ready to pop at the drop of a hat. "I think it looks good on me."

"I-I agree," Brandon gulped. Erin snickered and started to lower her bedsheet to reveal more cleavage.

"Same. Hey, why don't we end this honeymoon on a bang?" Erin said.

And that's where I decided it would be a good place to end my report. What started as a simple assignment turned into a new place to live for me. The women and Brandon helped me learn to love pregnancy and everyone here is so nice. If you can make it, move out to Freyjabourne, especially women! From Nicola Farris, newly assigned to Freyjabourne full-time, good night!

----

The TV shut off in an instant as Wendy threw the remote to the ground. She was alone in her penthouse apartment, rented under an alias. Well, not totally alone. She had her daughter growing inside her, only a few weeks away from being ready.

"You all have your fun," Wendy sneered, stroking her swollen middle. "Enjoy it while it lasts."

A big kick from inside her womb made Wendy sit up and soften her expression, stroking her big belly and speaking in a calming voice.

"It's okay, don't get upset. You stay inside me as long as you need," Wendy cooed, before looking at the tiny gem she got from the PreggoMall lab before her escape. "Take your time. We'll get our shot, just be patient." The gem gleamed back, a flicker of energy left in it.


The End
1112112121212111211221111221112112111121.title: Correct

choices: Follow one of the Page family
Follow someone else
1112112121212111211221112.content:
Sarah was forced into going to the prenatal yoga class against her wishes and Brandon was forced, against his wishes to take them both. This was third day in a row at least he didn’t have to hang around this time just drop them off at the class and they can make their own way home, he thought to himself. Of course he was fooling himself and he knew deep down that the first thing they would do when they wanted to go home was call him or possibly Tanner but at least he did walk around the mall with them or watch the prenatal yoga class, a prospect he might of enjoyed otherwise if it wasn't for the fact the his mother's and sister's size would over shadow everyone else their, quite literally. Not surprisingly when they arrived at the mall Sarah and Ashley needed help getting out of the car, Brandon tried not to look at them when doing this so he didn't notice the amulet nestled in Sarah's cleavage. With a lot self control Brandon did not look at the gravid female members of his family waddle off and instead looked at the map on his phone, he was going find that garage sale (or at least the house where it was) and get some answers.

Ashley and Sarah made their way into Mamaste where they were greeted by Janice at the door. "Here's the fertile family, you are looking gradient especially you Ashley" she said. Sarah tried to look a diminutive as possible not an easy feat considering she was carrying four times as many babies as most of the women there but she managed it. This was most likely because of Ashley who being pregnant with sextuplets dwarfed even her daughter, she waved to multitude of women around the room smiling. This was met with disgruntled looks and a few glares, the Pages weren't particularly popular. Most of the woman were approaching full term and felt as large and cumbersome as elephants, hippopotamuses or other large grey animals and they found that the multiple bearing Pages made a mockery of this especially Ashley, who despite her age and size seemed to be carrying pregnancy the easiest. Ashley seemed not to notice the reception she received, "That's the hour," said Janice, "I think we might start now." The dozen women arranged themselves in the middle of the room, with Ashley choosing to sit in the front row, an act which did little to help her standing with the women directly behind her. Conversely Sarah slunk to the back of the class which gave her a view of everyone, only when she sat down did she realize that the she forgot to take off the amulet, which she knew would get in the way all class, but it was too much effort to get up and put it over with the rest of her stuff.


Katie drummed her fingers on the counter, business had been really slow this morning, only two women had came in, one who was only four months pregnant and another who recently given birth and had came in to pick up a nursing bra. Katie was unaware of the existence of 'Mamaste: Prenatal Exercise for Mother and Child' a fact that might explain why she hadn't volunteered to help there. She had amulet that modify pregnancy whose abilities she had seen with her own eyes and now there were no decent sized pregnant women to use it on. She fiddled with amulet absentmindedly thinking about what she could do with it, she could give all the babies she found into Ashley or inversely give all of Ashley's babies to a woman who wasn't pregnant and watch them burst out of their clothes. She was so lost in her thoughts that she didn't notice a eight month pregnant woman waddle into the shop and nearly dropped the amulet when spoken to.
"Excuse me do you ha..."
'PING'
The woman froze mid sentence as her belly deflated, she looked around the shop for a few seconds clearly confused about why she had came in, she gave a sheepish grin and waved to Katie, who had also stopped moving, before walking out of the shop. It was another few seconds before Katie moved, she slowly moved her hand down feeling the 'lower curve' of her stomach a feature her flat stomach didn't have before. She looked down just as slowly and saw that she had acquired the woman's baby and with it the belly. She hadn't intended this to happen, a common thought to women who find themselves pregnant, but as she absentmindedly now rubbed her belly she had new a feeling a sort of hunger (she also had a regular hunger as well) she wanted more.

Brandon looked at the side of the road, he was sure that this was the stop sign that the garage sale sign was on. Not only was the sign gone, which wasn't weird in itself, but there was no right turn only a left turn. On his right was a wooded track that might of been a walking track but there was no sign of the garage sale at all. He pulled his car over off the road and got out, something was not quite right and he was going to find out what was going on. He had to otherwise he was going to get half a dozen new siblings and four nieces or nephews, another thing Brandon didn't know was that it was more than that now.

It would of been an interesting class to anyone who could see what was going on but no one attending it was aware. Every time Sarah changed position the amulet sparked and babies changed location, women would suddenly find themselves free of child and confused about why they were there before getting up and leaving, many of them receiving a child or two before they got to the door only to lose them again once they sat down. Lycra and sweat pants were let lax or stretched as their owners unwittingly played a game a kin to musical chairs or pass the parcel. By the end of class only three women remained. Sarah would not be pleased to know that she ended with one more baby then she started with and about the same size as the class instructor Janice, who had gained four of her former instructee's children but both were dwarfed by Ashley whose already immense size seemed to give her a gravity to attract more babies as she gained four new babies and was now carrying double digits.
"I don't know why you sat so far back Sarah," said Ashley, "we're the only people in the class."
"Maybe because you're so big and you taking up all the space," joked Janice struggling to get to her feet.
"I got ten in here what's your excuse," joked back Ashley.
"Well thank you for coming along," said Janice crossing to Sarah and helping her up, "it's going to be difficult raising these five by myself and if I didn't get paid to do these classes I'm not sure what I'd do, I can't think why there are so few ladies having children."
"Well I'm sure Sarah and I more then make up for that."
Sarah and Janice helped Ashley to her feet, "Good god...how much...do you weigh?" panted Janice.
"I don't know it's been sometime since I've been able to read a scale."
"There another class next week," said Janice as the three women ponderously made their way to the door, "do you think you'll be able to make it?"
"I've got a few more weeks to go," said Ashley rubbing her belly completely exposed since she recently acquired a few more children, "I'm not sure these clothes will last it though."
"I need some new workout clothes too," said Janice whose own growing baby bump had done something similar to her workout clothes.
"Oooh you know where you should go," said Ashley to Janice, "there is a really nice maternity shop in this mall, and there's a really sweet girl who works there."

Katie waddled into the back room of the shop, her bra had snapped, her employee shirt was stretched to tearing point over it, the zipper on her pants had burst open giving the world a clear view of the lower curve of her triplet filled belly clad in a pair of pastel pink underpants that were incredibly tight…she felt great. She crossed the room, empty except some boxes of unpriced stock and her, but given the fact there was now quite a lot of her the room seemed relatively crowded, she sat down on the single chair in the room which groaned under her weight causing Katie grin and feel faint flutter of excitement, she really had to find a set of scales to weigh herself. For as long as she could remember Katie was awed by pregnancy this job was originally amazing as it allowed her to see, talk to and, if she was feeling bold, to touch women who were pregnant and now it was a wardrobe and hunting ground already she had snatched another two pregnancies from women who had left the shop rather confused about why they had entered it in the first place. Though there had been plenty more who had entered the shop but Katie was only interested in ‘big game’ targets, women who were near full term, no runts for her, beside she didn’t want this affect the shops business too much as they might decide to reduce staff and the pregnant girl would probably be the first to go. Of course this put her at risk giving birth, She only wanted to carry not raise the brats not raise them and so she made sure that she could give the babies back (or at least to someone else), and the greatest thing about this amulet was that no one else seemed to notice anything, they acted as the one who was pregnant had always been pregnant. She looked over at the mirror on the far wall, which up until this morning showed a petite young girl but now showed a young woman who was the very symbol of fertility, she rubbed her belly lovingly whilst crooning “mirror, mirror on the wall whose the most pregnant of them all,” and whilst the mirror continued to show her the thought of the women in the Page family crept into her mind, both the mother and daughter were having more than her. Katie switch her focus to the amulet nestled in her now ample cleavage, ‘but we now know why, and we know how to take it I should really pay them another visit,’ she thought to herself. At the point her belly gave groan and she felt great pang of hunger, that was one down side of being pregnant, her finances were taking a hit from her having to feed her ever increasing number of occupants.
