Finally, after a couple minutes of struggling, they both let out a tired side of relief as Emily was finally able prop herself up in her seat, her belly and breasts protruding out of the doorway a few feet.

"I suppose you'll probably be wanting a ride home from me eh?" At this, Emily nodded and took a deep breath before slowly heaving herself up to a standing position. Laura, figuring she might need some help, got behind her friend and wrapped an arm around her shoulder to help her steady herself once she stood up. However, once Emily stood up and stretched out to loosen herself up a bit Laura's eyes widened as she took in her friends figure. "Uh Emily you did go shopping for those maternity clothes right?

"H-hey what kind of question is that?!?" Emily yelled in outrage, but was unable to keep her face from turning a heavy shade of crimson from the inquiry. My clothes don't fit me that badly right? She thought to herself worriedly as she just now noticed the horribly tight feeling that her clothes were giving her, and she thought she heard some of the seams creak and groan as she moved her arms and legs. She shook her head in a small bit of hope that her clothes weren't in as dire a situation as Laura made it seem. Though her best friend was chuckling at this point.

"It's all good Em, I'm just teasing you!" Laura sheepishly grinned at the glare that her friend gave her in return, "aw come on don't be like that, besides, we need to get going if we're going to get you back home with all your stuff with enough time to get ready for your 'date.'" Laura added while making air quotes around the word date. With a sigh of resignation Emily shook her head, but began to slowly waddle to Laura's car while her friend began to transfer the mall purchases.

Emily knew that there was no way she was going to be able to sit in the back seat of Laura's car normally, her belly would stop that no question, and so she began trying many different angles and positions to try and fit herself inside. Luckily, this little shenanigan helped pass the time while Laura was putting all of the maternity clothes in the trunk. Finally, Emily found that she simply had to sit with her belly facing perpendicular to the car doors themselves, and that in doing so she was left with space to at least move around. Laura raised her eyebrow at Emily's victorious look, but then that look of triumph quickly turned into one that told Laura to stop looking and start driving, and so with that ordeal out of the way, and with a successful shopping spree of clothes that at this point at least covered her they drove back to Emily's house.

After parking in her driveway and taking a bit of time to get inside with a bit of help from Laura, Emily gave groaned tiredly as she fell back on her bed, which creaked loudly in protest at having to bear it's occupant's much heavier weight. She closed her eyes and began to rest for a little bit before she heard Laura call out to her.

"Hey Em I'm gonna head out for something to eat! I'll be back later!"

"Later Laura!" Emily heard the door close shortly after that, and was content to lay there for what seemed like an hour or two, but in reality was only a couple of minutes. After a little while though, she decided to get up. She then thought that since it took her a while to get just about anywhere in her current state, that she'd start to get ready for her "date" right now. Deciding that a change of clothes would be best, she waddled back to her living room and picked out black shirt similar to her current one, and a pair of gray sweatpants that would hopefully fit her better than the pants she had on now. Taking her ensemble of clothes in one hand, and using the other to soothe her children, who were kicking up a storm, by rubbing her belly, she headed over to her bathroom to change.

Once she was there she managed to get her current clothes off easily, and was able to get her new shirt on easily enough. Her sweatpants however gave her more trouble, and she could only manage to pull them up so far before she gave up and just let them be. Turning towards the mirror to see how she looked her jaw dropped and for the umpteenth time her cheeks flared a tomato red as she realized why Laura and the woman she met in the mall gave her the looks they did.

The new shirt did absolutely nothing to cover any part of her belly, letting the vast expanse of Emily's pale mountain of flesh hang out, topped with the tiny protrusion that was her outie belly button, but she was expecting this as she knew her belly was quite huge. What she didn't expect was the fact that the shirt had ridden up to cover only her massively swollen mammaries, and was showing an almost unreal amount of cleavage that she was sure wouldn't be legal under normal circumstances. However, the horror wasn't over yet as she yelped in surprise at seeing the state that her sweatpants were in. She knew that in pregnancy that a woman's posterior tended to grow out, but this was crazy! The sweatpants were riding down her back to the point where she figured that at least the top half of her cheeks and even a bit of her crack was showing. She gulped as she realized that even though she was sure she was wearing panties, that her butt had grown so large that the back bottom strap wasn't even visible anymore!

Guess this is as good as I'm gonna get... She thought to herself as she silently hoped that Jade wouldn't be too judgmental about the way she looked...
1211112121.title: Obviously she calls Laura, her best friend to t...

choices: Two or three other woman shopping that are all heavily pregnant
Just a clerk and the manager both who are pregnant but not as heavily as Emily
121112.content:
The door opens and in walks a woman who is easily bigger than Emily. The woman is stunning with G cup breasts and a belly that entered the bar a few steps before her. She was wearing a yellow sundress that covered her bump but did little to hide the swell. Emily looked at the woman and a thought popped in her head " Oh no I'm going to miss the maternity store if I don't hurry!" Laura giggles and retorts "That lady is much larger than you are and her clothes fit great you should see where she got it." And with that Emily stood up and approached the massive woman. "Hello miss I was wondering where you got the dress you're wearing? As you can see I'm in need of a wardrobe change." The woman looked over at Emily and smiled "well I got this at the maternity plus store just outside the mall. When you are 8 months pregnant with quadruplets a normal store won't do." Emily laughed and looked surprised at the woman's huge form. "I didn't realize there was another maternity store near the mall. Why is it called maternity plus?" "Because it caters to woman that are expecting multiples only as small as twins and I think the go up to septuplets in store. I do know they have larger sizes online though."

With that Emily started to leave but as she's walking away the woman asks her a question. "Since we're sharing clothing tips where did you get that lovely necklace you are wearing?" "Oh I got this at a garage sale just this afternoon and you wanna know a secret." Emily leaned in close to the woman "It a magical necklace that lets me transfer babies from one person to another." The woman looked at Emily with disbelief "That can't be tru you're pulling my leg."

Emily waved her hands in front of her face as she said "oooh beware the powers of my necklace if I point it at you I can transfer babies." With that Emily pointed the necklace at the woman and....

PING

"Ha I told you you were pulling my leg I didn't magical become pregnant with you're septuplets." The woman stated matter of factly. " Yea I know it has been a dud on the magic part but it has brought me and the little ones good luck" Emily said back. The woman laughs and replies "But I know I shouldn't have pried but I noticed your condition and I remember my sister being pregnant with triplets and going to the maternity plus by the mall, I hope it helps." With that Emily smiled and walked to her car to find she didn't fit anymore. She goes inside to ask Lauren for a ride thank god she has a SUV or else it would be a impossible squeeze.

"Thanks for giving me a ride to maternity plus Lauren I don't know how I've been getting any were in my car lately." Emily said as she strokes her now exposed belly her shirt is just barely acting as a bra for her breasts that are easily the size of cantaloupes. "Don't mention it Emily you are seriously out of any close that fit. I Don't know why you didn't just get new clothes already" Lauren smirks as she pulls into the maternity plus store. Emily gets out and walks into the store to find...
121112.title: a heavily pregnant woman walks in!

choices: Wait for your date with Jane
Let's head home and see if you still fit in your bed
1211121.content:
Opening the door to the maternity plus Emma was blinded by the harsh light of LED's. "Well at least they're environmentally safe!" Emily jokingly says to Lauren as she scans the interior of the store. Inside are hundreds of rows of clothes of all styles and sizes. Among the rows three, no wait, four heavily pregnant women scoured the aisles. Seven if you counted the three clerks who were lounging on stools behind their desks.

"Yeah, I mean the hundreds of thousand of plants that had to die so you could cover your giant belly," Lauren replies back.

"Oh come on, it was a joke you jackass." Emma laughingly says as Lauren dances out of punching distance. "Well where do you think we should start?"

"Probably in the dress section, you're shirts holding onto hope and desperation as of right now." Lauren was right, Emma's boobs were insanely large. Around HH cup her shirt was barley able to contain the massive fun bags that were Emma's chest let alone her massive stomach.

"Oh, I know!" Emma yelled as she waddled away as fast as she could.


~Several minutes later~


Lauren watched as Emma walked out of the changing room in the back of the store wearing a dress identical to the one the lady who told them about the store wore.

"Well what do you think?" Emma asked, twisting her body, making her sundress twirl around her. The yellow dress was a loose fit, surprising for her size. Her chest, belly and booty were all enhanced by the dress and made her look quite entrancing.

"Wow Emma, first try and it's perfect"

"It must be my lucky amulet."

"Ha, yeah, the magical amulet, tell me, how does it work again?" Lauren asked, barely able to contain herself, she was laughing so hard.

"Well Lauren, I just pick it up like this. Point it at the women I want to transfer to." Emma said, very theatrically, all the while waving her arm around sporadically.

PING

"and"

PING

"it"

PING

"doesn't"

PING

"work"

PING

"Are you sure it doesn't work, miss-know-it-all?"

"Yeah I am, see?" Emma retorted, waving her arm even harder.

PING

PING

PING

"See, I told you it doesn't work, it's just lucky."

"Well, Ms. Lucky Amulet, your dress certainly is stunning, too bad there's nothing bigger. Still it IS pretty damn perfect we could find anything to fit you at all. I mean it's pretty hard to find clothes that fit when you're carrying trigintuplets."

"I know right! This sundress is pretty but I'm surprised I could even get it to fit. I mean it's kinda hard to dress for 30 kids." Emma's massive breasts were barley contained in her dress at least a UUU cup, practically spilling out of the dress. Her belly was covered, but barely. The previously loose dress was now skin tight and squeaked loudly in protest around her 23 foot diameter belly. Her booty was another story, obscenely large and jiggled like a bowl of Jell-o, it was only half covered by the sundress. The bottom half of her bottom was completely exposed to the elements. Giving anyone who happened by a great view.

"After we pay for this thing, we should probably buy some custom-fitted stuff, huh?"

"That would be a good idea," Emma laughed, "how did we fit me into your car again?"
1211121.title: I told you it doesn't work

choices: Emily begins to head home but feels something is missing...
Emily heads home, everything is fine
12111212.content:
Emily paid for her new dress and began to slowly wobble her way out of the store behind her friend Laura. She drew the eye of every person she passed on their way to the car and Emily noticed with a smile.Look at all of these people looking at me! They can really tell how beautiful and fertile I am! I just wish it wasn't so hard to move or exist in a body like this. 30 babies is a lot of babies! And I don't remember going to see a doctor once! Emily looked down at herself almost bursting out of her dress and began to cry uncontrollably.

Laura heard her friend's distress and turned to console her, but was met with Emily's swollen body crashing into her. "Laura I'm massive!" cried Emily in despair, "I haven't been to the doctor, or bought any baby things. I don't even have a place to put them all!" This continued for several minutes in the parking lot of the mall and Laura did her best to console her super-sized friend. Eventually Emily cried herself out and she and Laura began discussing ways to 'catch Emily up' to where she should be.

Emily looked down at herself again and while she liked what she saw she also knew she was in way over her head. She lifted her lucky amulet out from her massive cleavage and held it close, "Looks like you were a little too lucky this time huh?" But as she was looking at it she saw that the gem in the middle was a little scratched. "Oh now how did that happen! This is my lucky amulet!" She pushed on the gem trying to rub it and see how deep the scratch was.

PONG

Emily finished inspecting the amulet and let it fall. Her body, Laura's baby, and all the other women's children had returned to normal. "Oh well I did get it super cheap at a yard sale. Anyway Laura after all of that partying we had better get you home." Emily looked down at herself in a dress that was now many sizes too small for her, "And me into some clothes that fit!" They both laughed together and climbed into Laura's van. Laura dropped Emily off at her car and they said their goodbyes. Emily got into her own vehicle and went home.
12111212.title: Let's head home!

choices: Something happens during the night
Emily wakes up nice and early, and gets her home baby ready.
Emily sleeps in, but wakes up in time for the 'date' with Jane
121112121.content:
Emily having just said goodbye to Laura got into her car, having to readjust her seat forward so that she could sit comfortably in the driver's side. "How strange. Ever since I noticed the little scuff on my amulet, everything's felt off. I'm wearing a tent, my seat's not positioned right, and my bra feels loose." Emily looked at herself in the rear view mirror, rubbing her hands across her face. "Nothing seems odd, but I just can't shake this feeling..." It was not unlike a gloom of sorts, like she was missing something important. "Well, I'm sure I'll remember it soon enough, maybe after some sleep"

Emily tried to focus on her driving, to get her mind out of this nameless funk. But it just stuck with her, like a nagging presence in the back of her mind. It was starting to irritate her, she was so certain she could almost remember what it was. But as she pulled in to park near her apartment, she still struggled to figure it out. Frustrated, Emily pulled her new bought clothes out of the car, still not sure what inspired her to buy different sized maternity clothes. Maybe she was planning some presents for Laura? But the clothes were much too big for her friend. "I'll just have to return them tomorrow I guess, and get a better size"

Just after getting the bags out of the car, Emily could hear footsteps coming closer. Turning to her side, she saw a woman out late, or early depending on who you asked. She was wearing some tight shorts and a sports top, and seemed to be jogging around the block. Emphasis on 'seems' as she was also sporting a round baby bump. She looked a little smaller then Emily's friend Laura, but that could just be because the woman clearly was keen to keep in shape.

Emily wasn't sure why she ended up staring, her hand hovering over her flat toned abdomen, at least not at first. But all of a sudden it hit her like a truck. She was envious, she was surrounded by women in the prime of their femininity and all carrying children. It happened so often today, from work, to the party, even now when she was home again. She felt her body twist as she realized she felt empty. "Damn biological clock... but, maybe I have been focusing on work to much. I mean I'm still single! Being a business women didn't stop Marget, why should it stop me? That's it, starting tomorrow, the amazon is going to find a partner!"

Emily declared, smiling as she announced this in the dead of night, blushing a little bit at her outburst. Still, she felt good about herself again. Reaching between her chest, she pulled out the amulet and smiled. "Well, hopefully you're still lucky after that scuff earlier, but just in case. I'll try and use your 'magic'" Emily chuckled, not beveling it, but it had ended up being lucky for her, so she didn't mind playing along. She saw the pregnant jogger start to make a turn and focused on her. Imaging her own belly swelling up to that firm round size and pressed on her amulet.

PING

Emily shook her head with a sigh. Just because the amulet was lucky didn't mean she wanted to be rid of her baby girl. Sure not being pregnant might make her goal of finding a partner easier, but she loved her soon to be bundle of joy too much! And that was the point wasn't it? To start a family? Happily rubbing her belly, Emily carried her slightly too big maternity clothes into her apartment with her, and got ready for bed.
121112121.title: Lingering feelings.

choices: There was room enough for one baby crib near her bed
She really should look for a bigger place, so her baby can have her own room
That it's really dirty, and she should clean it like right now!
1211121212.content:
An alarm rung out in Emily's room, as she was stirred awake by the familiar sound. She let out a unhappy groan as she blindly reached out and hit the snooze button, contemplating resting a little while longer. It was her day off, and she did just have a rather late party last night. Still the choice was taken from her as her baby chose that moment to start kicking, fully waking her mother up. "Alright, alright. message received. Guess you're not one for sleeping in either huh?" Emily said affectionately, patting her belly as she struggled to sit up.

It took a bit of wiggling, but eventually the mother to be was upright in her bra and underwear, and stretching her arms out as she took a look around her room. It was rather bare bones, with some dirty clothes hanging off furniture. "Mmm, seems like it's laundry day today. Though maybe I should finally go though my clothes and pack away what doesn't fit me anymore? I also got to order a crib for you. I know I still got a month left before you show up, but putting the crib together would be easier sooner rather then later." Emily let out a wince as her daughter kicked her roughly again. "You're really active today baby. Did I sleep on my back again?"

Emily found herself gently rubbing her slightly sore back, seems like she didn't sleep to well, though that might be because her mattress wasn't as soft as she'd like. "I guess I'll put a new mattress on the shopping list to. I can afford it now that we earned those promotions!" The mother to be grinned as she ran her hands over her taunt skin where she felt her daughter kick, enjoying playing with her uborn child for a little while, at least till her snooze alarm started making noise again. "Ahh, jeez, ok Em, no more getting distracted. You got a lot of work to do today! And a date of all things later"

Emily found herself a little excited, even though it was more like a friendly thing. But it would be good practice for her long term goal of finding a partner. And she had a good feeling about befriending Jane. Still, that was later in the day, for now..."Ok, I know you're hungry baby girl. Don't worry. mommy's gonna take care of it~" Emily hummed as she waddled into the kitchen, making a hearty breakfast and enjoying a few plates of eggs and toast. She ended it feeling a bit bloated, and lethargic. But pushed though the tiredness as she pulled out her laptop and ordered some baby supplies online.

Emily winced as she saw the price tag at the end, but she was fairly sure she needed it. A crib, diapers, changing station, formula? Emily thought about that one, and then looked down at her well endowed chest, that had only stood out more as her pregnancy made her body all but ready to produce milk. "Maybe I'll pass on the formula. Somehow I don't think you'll go hungry" She chuckled as she rubbed her bare belly, feeling a small series of light kicks that she could only interpret as agreement. "Well, that's that for buying stuff for now. I can stop by the mattress shop later.... I guess now I just gotta figure out where I'm going to put you once you deiced my belly's not comfortable anymore."

Looking around her small apartment, Emily decided..
1211121212.title: Working hard on her day off.

choices: Later on, Emily gets to meet her new subordinates.
After a long day of work, Emily rushes home to get ready for her date
Emily's a workaholic, someone has to interveen before she works too hard
12111212121.content:
Emily nodded to herself. She'd have to ask for some help moving the furniture around, but she could fit a crib next to her bed, that way her little girl could be close to her, just like she was now. Emily found herself tearing up suddenly, overcome with a wave of emotion. "Ahh, damned hormones..." She sniffed a bit, feeling herself on the verge of crying. She didn't like the thought of letting her baby out of her warm home just yet. Even though it would be out of her control. She felt a desire, no, a need to keep her baby as safe as long as she could. Emily sat herself down and just cradled her belly as her child moved inside of her, taking a moment to just remind herself that she still had awhile still like this.

"Heh... look at me. I can chew my way though the business world like no one else, I can out perform any man or woman with my body and mind... but motherhood? It seems I've met my match, and yet. I'm still happy." Emily wiped her tears away with a smile, before being interrupted by her phone vibrating on her nightstand. Curious she picked the phone up and opened the app that was making it's alarm go off. Emily felt her face freeze as she saw a reminder from herself, to attend the meeting of the board of directors today, at 10am sharp. "How could I forget this?! I just got promoted yesterday... did I skip a day somehow?!" Emily let out a groan of frustration, ready to blame her pregnancy brain when she got a look at the time.

"It's 9 already?! But I don't have any more time to waste!" The Amazon ran around her room in a panic, though ran might be a bit much. She did move fast, but given her pregnancy, she was naturally cautious about outright running. She also had to stop herself from reaching for her old suit, reminding herself that she barely fit into it during the deal she made with Megacorp yesterday. It would not be good for her to wear such a showy outfit to her first big meeting. That only left one other option, one of her hastily bought maternity dresses. Emily pored though her bags quickly, settling on a slightly loose black dress, that did well to cover her belly, but also highlight her height and fit body. She felt a bit embarrassed to not be in a suit, but as she looked at herself in the mirror, she had to admit that the femininity wasn't a bad look. She just had to embrace it as her.

"Shoot, it's almost 9:30. Ok enough gawking Em, lets move it!" The amazon grabbed her briefcase, and strutted out the door at a brisk pace, getting into the car, and having to readjust the seat once more. But she paid it no mind as she high tailed it to work, and arrived a solid five minutes early. Eager to make her mark on the board, and show them just why she was brought up to this position.

Walking in with a firm confidence to her waddle, that she wasn't quite feeling inwardly, Emily kept worrying that her dress might be too short, and showed off more of her legs then she intended, or maybe the change of outfit was too jarring to her image. She had her professional smile on, which is to say her standard almost predatory like grin, but she couldn't help but notice how everyone starred, and gossiped as she waddled past them into the meeting room. Thankfully, once she was in there, Emily got to let out a internal sight of relief, as the others on the board seemed to merely note her entrance with a polite nod.

Maybe there were a few long gazes, but they were not as obvious as Emily eased herself into the open seat. But all that was forgotten as Mr.Wazowski came into the room and closed the door, shutting them away from the noise in the larger part of the office space. "Ladies and Gentlemen of the board. Thank you for coming in for today's meeting. I'm happy to announce that shares are up another two percent since the deal made last afternoon with our newest partners at Megacorp." Emily smiled as eyes were drawn to her, and Mr.Wazowski took this as a cue to continue. "As you all know, this was in no small part thanks to Ms.Woodward here. Who's hustle and dedication earned her a position on the board. Where I have no doubt she'll continue to help grow IntraTech. Right Ms.Woodward?"

Emily nodded as she stood up, having the back up from the table a bit to avoid her belly bumping into it as she did so. She looked around at the faces before her, and started speaking. "Yes, I'm not stopping any time soon. I'm going to keep bringing great deals to the table, and snuff out anyone looking to exploit the company as I have been before now. I know that we still need to move forward to keep the deal between us and Megacorp profitable, and I'm going to make sure it stays that way, even if I have to do so mid-labor" Emily finally could let her hands touch her belly, feeling a little relieved to finally address it with some of the others laughing at her partial joke. Mr.Wazowski gave her a hard look though, knowing that she was all too serious about the claim.

As she sat down, one of the other, older board members stood up. A woman with greying hair, but a very sharp gaze as she stared down Emily. "I'm glad you feel that way Ms.Woodward, as the board had come to an agreement yesterday. You will be appointed head of operations for our dealings with Megacorp. Given that you already have a good rapport with them, and are eager, we believe it will be a good use of your talent until something more urgent comes up."

"Of course, the board has my thanks." Emily nodded, though internally she was a bit disappointed. She had expected something... well, bigger to handle. Though she supposed overseeing the biggest joint project in their company's history wasn't small... but she still felt like she was a step below the others on the board. Well, that only meant she had to show them just what kind of woman the Amazon was! "Now that we're all caught up, I would like to bring this first topic up to the board..." Mr.Wazowski said, as the meeting continued.
12111212121.title: Just enough room

choices: Get to know Jane a little better, as she wanted to be better friends...
Ask Jane advice on finding a Partner, she seemed knowledgeable...
Practice Some Light Flirting, and Then Get Jane's Critique...
121112121212.content:
Emily sighed in relief as she nearly leaped, or tried to in her current state, into the driver's seat of her car. She may have been energized and raring to go from her new promotion at the beginning of the day, but then she was barraged by endless introductions to the seemingly countless list of people under her new jurisdiction. Then after that came the many lectures and policies she was expected to both enforce and maintain herself, the usual corporate drivel. No social media posts that might reflect badly on the company, you represent us, etcetera etcetera. The same talk was given every time she managed to climb up in rank, and at this point she'd gone through it so many times she practically knew the speech by heart.

"Not that I'd care to be the one giving that speech anytime soon..." Emily shuddered, not relishing the thought of subjecting some other poor soul to that waste of a day. As if agreeing with her, Emily's daughter started to kick, almost as if wanting to vocalize her disdain for the proceedings, which made Emily smile. "Guess you didn't care for all that company jargon either eh little girl?" She giggled, patting her belly lovingly, "I think you and I are gonna get along just fine."

*Brriiiing*

Emily jumped as her phone loudly blasted the alarm she'd set in place earlier that day. Checking her phone's reminder, she suddenly remembered that as much as she'd like to nap for the rest of the day, she still had business to attend to. "Better get home in a hurry, I've got a dinner to attend!" With that, she dismissed the alarm with a swipe of her finger and promptly started her car. Pulling out of her parking space, she figured she'd be better off taking the toll roads to get home quicker since she was running a bit short on time.

Fortunately for her, the toll roads were much less crowded than the main roads and let her arrive home in record time, leaving her just under an hour to prepare for her get together with Jane she'd promised. After arriving home and waddling her way into her home, she started off her long list of preparations, by hopping in the shower. Normally, she'd take her time and let the warm water's sweet touch melt the stress of the day away, but as she knew she was on a time limit, she had to cut her relaxation to a minimum to save time. She scrubbed and scrubbed away the residue of sweat and office dust bunnies off her belly and the rest of her body, humming a fast paced pop song that reflected her excitement for the evening.

Once she'd finished rinsing away the grime of a hard day's work, she stepped out of the shower and dried herself off. Luckily, she'd already had an idea of what she'd wanted to wear to the date, a white and black striped zebra patterned maternity blouse that both hugged her belly and showed off a hint of cleavage, and a gray skirt she'd picked up from the store earlier since she knew casual clothes were a section of her wardrobe she'd definitely need to expand in the near future. Next, she focused on straightening out her golden locks, straightening them out to perfection as she looked back at her reflection with a please nod. All she needed now was a dash of makeup, a light coating of lipstick, and she'd be good to go!

Choosing to go with a more natural shade of lip gloss, she meticulously applied each and every finishing touch to her look, finally stepping back after all was said and done with a nod and a smile. "Perfect!" Emily chirped, placing a hand on her hip as she admired her reflection in the mirror. If she turned heads at work, her amped up appearance now was sure to bring the house down! Now to text Jane with the address where they were meeting. Shooting a quick message to her newfound acquaintance for the nearby pasta diner. It was a family owned restaurant that very well kept, but wasn't so high brow as to be stifling. "Plus they have the best bread...mmm..." Emily paused as a dreamy smile came over her face at the thought of sinking her teeth into those buttery rolls that were baked to a golden brown state of nirvana.

"Okay I can drool over them at the restaurant!" Emily chastised herself, shaking her head to get her mind back on track. "Now, operation Get Back in the Game begins!" She giggled, heading out to her car and driving off to her destination.

Had she arrived at the diner at 6:00, Emily might have had a problem finding a seat in the diner, as the weird hours of the establishment shifted the usual dinner rush to a bit earlier in the day. This meant that at 7:30, after a good portion of the people had filed out and headed home for the night, Emily and Jane had their pick of most of the restaurant. The perfect amount of people to provide a relaxing atmosphere, while still having enough around so they weren't awkwardly sitting alone in the place as the only patrons.

"Daaaaaang girl, you're really going all out for this!" Jane whistled as she took in Emily's appearance, "I thought I looked good, but here you are putting me to shame!"

"I dress to impress!" The taller blonde giggled as she struck a pose, "it helps that I actually bought clothes so I could actually dress for the occasion."

"What, were your other options a suit or a dirty t-shirt?" Jane snorted, jokingly elbowing Emily who blushed and turned away in embarrassment. "Oh my god, those were actually what you had?" Jane's eyes widened in disbelief, before she broke down in another fit of giggles.

"I uh...was pretty focused on my job. What can I say?" Emily explained sheepishly, before joining in the laughter at her own forgetfulness. "At least I eventually solved that though." She pointed out, gesturing to her outfit proudly.

"Yeah, you aren't leaking through your shirt like the other day." Jane winked playfully, whilst giving her date a teasing round of golf claps, "so I'd say you've improved pretty well!"

"Oh my goooood, you aren't gonna let me live that down are you?" Emily groaned as she facepalmed, her face doing its best impression of a tomato as she recalled the mortification she'd felt during that experience.

"Ehhhhh, I think I can be inclined to forget it after a good meal." Jane chuckled, patting Emily on the shoulder in sympathy before she lightly tugged her arm, eager to head on inside, "now come on! I'm starving, and so are you two most likely, so let's keep the chit chat for once we sit down!"

"Got that right!" Emily chirped, pulling her face out of her hands and forgetting about her embarrassment as her stomach let out a loud rumble to signal her growing appetite. "I feel like I could eat everything on the menu at this point."

"I think that might be jr. talking hun." Jane smirked as the two beauties sat down and looked over the menu. After a light discussion on what Emily recommended, Jane decided to go with the pasta Alfredo dish and a side salad, while Emily stuck to her usual, pasta salad with a side of fruit, but with the extra addition of her all time favorite, half a dozen of those heavenly rolls she'd been desiring ever since she'd arrived.

Once they'd placed their order, and the server dutifully went to go put their desired dishes in, Emily figured now was a good time to get back into conversation. However, she wasn't sure where to begin the topic. She had a couple of ideas on what to discuss, but she was having a hard time deciding. In the end, she decided to...
121112121212.title: The Beginning of a Friendly Outing...

choices: The girls chat a little longer before the food arives.
Emily feels something brushing agaist her thigh under the table.
Emily goes for broke, and asks Jane to teach her how to flirt.
1211121212121.content:
Emily wanted to know more about Jane. She seemed a interesting woman, and very easily and naturally pushed the business woman outside of her comfort zone. Which, though reluctant to admit, is a benefit for Emily. She did need to get out of her profession routine more often. To that end Emily spoke up first. "So you know a little bit about me and how I tunnel vision a little too much..." Emily admitted with a flustered blush. "But I don't know nearly as much about you! Outside the fact that you don't react to badly to random kisses and dinner dates!"

Emily smiled as she tried to playfully embarrass Jane back for earlier tonight, but the bartender just smirked back. "Well yeah, it was surprising, but I don't think I'll ever be upset getting a kiss from a cutie" Ending the statement with a wink, it seemed Emily's plan backfired on her as she could hardly look Jane in the face now. "Though, I do love free food. I used to get asked out multiple times a night at work. They set me up as a bartender to attract more people into buying drinks, but apparently I'm too good at that part of my job for my own good. At least until jr. here started showing." Jane gave a few light pats to her own round bump "He's been great at chasing away all the pervs, and I'm gonna miss it when he finally decides to come out."

"So, guys started thinking you were spoken for?" Emily asked, not wanting to make the same assumption, even though this was a friend date, and that Jane was almost as pregnant as her. "Ehh, maybe? I more think they're just put off by the bump. Either because they don't want to be dads, or because they don't find it as sexy as when I was thinner. Their loss though, I'm sure I don't have to tell you, but everything's felt much better since I got knocked up" Jane gave Emily a big smirk as the later broke out into a deep blush as her mind went wild with implications. "Oh you're too much fun! I mean massages, showers, anything where I can feel something on my bump Em. And I guess when I can feel the kid move around. It just feels right."

Emily took a deep breath to calm herself, fanning her face a bit. Her heart was racing, and although she was having fun, she quickly realized she was at a big disadvantage socially compared to Jane. Who was now running the conversation even though Emily initially directed it. At the least she was learning things, and 'getting back into the game' as she put it. Still, as Emily took a sip of water to calm herself down, Jane went in for the kill "That's not to say I'm sure sex would feel great. But I'm thinking we're both in the same position there. Single, and not a interested soul in sight"

The pregnant amazon had to keep her mouth closed tight, her body wanting to do a variety of things all at the same time. All of them ending with her spitting out the water she was desperately trying to swallow. But she endured, fighting against her body and getting the liquid down. She ended up having a small coughing fit as she got air back into her lungs, and gave a light glare at her date. "You're a piece of work, you know that?" To which Jane could only laugh, Emily joining her a few seconds afterward.
1211121212121.title: Ice breaker.

choices: Just then, Emily gets a very strong craving for Alfrado, and kisses it off Jane
Emily points it out, and reaches over to clean it up.
Jane notices before Emily could say anything, and asks Emily about her baby dad.
12111212121211.content:
"Yeah, the bouncers at work are actually sweethearts, though they don't look it. James, the big quiet one? He's actually going to be a grandfather soon, so he ends up being the first one around whenever someone's too drunk around the bar near me. He's actually a big worry wort, and keeps trying to get me to go on leave. Which is all well and good, but I love my job, and I'm pregnant, not inept! " Jane explained with a small bite in her tone.

"I know what you mean, The first thing they assumed after I got my promotion was that I should take leave till my daughter was born. And I had to tell them, and show them no. Just because I'm close to term doesn't mean I can't put out just as much, if not more work then them! Honestly? I think they're just intimated by us. We're doing something not many can do in our wombs. Making life, and I don't know about you, but that's exciting and empowering, it makes me feel like I can do anything" The blond amazon let out a happy sigh as she felt her child kick. "And I think you agree too huh? Though it might be a bit too early for you to be thinking about having kids" Emily had a easy smile as she playful corrected her unborn girl.

The conversation was dying down, and the pair were getting a little impatient for their food, just as the waiter came back around with a pair of plate. "Ma'am's? Please enjoy" Setting down the alfredo for Jane, and the pasta salad for Emily, the girls offered him a quick thanks before digging into their dinner. Emily, despite being very hungry tried to pace herself, up until she saw Jane eating quite fast, shoveling mouthfuls of pasta and large bites of salad and chewing and swallowing at a fever pace.

Emily realized she had forgotten, Jane was expecting too. So certain things she was used to having to hide, or hold back on. She could just be more natural on around her, because Jane would understand. It's not like Emily herself thought less of Jane for the way she was eating, she just thought that the baby must be making her hungry. So, letting go of her reservations, Emily took large bites out of the wonderfully buttery bread sticks, while chasing each bite down with some of the sweet tangyness of the pasta salad.

The most wonderful thing about it all Emily found. Is she was actually relaxing and being herself. Not just the Amazon of the business world, not just a mother to be. But she got to be Emily, a combination of them both here. It was refreshing, and if all dates could go like this, she'd be very happy to keep going on them.

The girls started to slow down their dinner as they reached the last quarter of their respective plates. Now that they were somewhat full, there wasn't a pressing need to eat, and they were both taking light bites and enjoying the flavors. Though, Emily couldn't help but giggle a little, it seems Jane was a little more hungry then she let on, she had some alfrado sauce stuck on her face, around her lips.
12111212121211.title: The girls chat a little longer before the food ...

121112121212113.content:
Just as Emily opened her mouth to make a move however, Jane's tongue flicked out, mopping up the remainder of her dish that had left its mark on her luscious lips.

"Oh man that was great!" Jane sighed happily, patting her stomach in satisfaction after the conclusion of her meal before letting out a small belch. "Aw, excuse me, guess that's a sign junior liked it too!" Jane grinned, before gesturing to Emily's plate, also licked clean with a diligence that surprised the redhead, seeing as how the taller woman seemed to usually maintain a more collected attitude. "How was yours? Pretty good or nah?"

"O-Oh uh..." Emily shook her head lightly as her date's voice snapped her back out of her thoughts, "yeah it was great as always. I kinda wish my little cinnamon bun in here would let me enjoy my food though instead of scarfing it down." she playfully glared down at her belly, giving it a light flick as if to chastise her unborn.

"Oh come on," Jane snorted, hiding her smirk behind a hand, "you seemed to enjoy those half a dozen rolls." She pointed to basket, which had once been filled with a pile of steaming dinner rolls that had looked absolutely tantalizing to her taste buds. Unfortunately, Emily had instantly dragged the container to her and massacred the entire batch before she'd even finished her meal. Emily, at Jane's teasing, burned a bright red as she realized she'd hoarded the bread for the table all to herself.

"Oh my gosh I'm sorry!" Emily looked around in a frenzy, trying to spot a waiter somewhere, anywhere to come over and help, "I can get you more bread I was just so hungry I-"

"Chill girl! Relax!" Jane laughed at how flustered the other woman was getting, almost like she'd gone and broken the window or table rather than deny the opportunity for her to get a dinner roll. "It's no biggie!"

"I just...ooohhh those rolls are too good..." Emily planted her face on the table, cheek resting on the cool fabric of the tablecloth in a desperate attempt to hide her crimson cheeks flaring up in embarrassment. Maybe if she burrowed hard enough she could recover from the social faux pa.

"Like I said, it's all good." Jane insisted, rolling her eyes in amusement at Emily's discomfort at her own appetite and sat back in her chair, "we're kinda eating for two on both our parts, and everyone has a certain food that's a weakness, so don't sweat it. I'll come back here sometime, after all, I gotta try the rest of the menu!" Jane then smirked, patting Emily's head before rubbing her chin in thought, "though I suppose in return for pilfering those pastries, you can tell me a little more about who got you into such a well-rounded person."

"Huh?" Emily looked up at this, confused on what Jane meant. "I mean I kind of practiced at work-"

"No no no! Not that," Jane giggled, holding up a hand to cut Emily off, before pointing to the abdomen where the blonde's daughter to be rested in, "I meant well-rounded."

"Oh! Ohhhhh!" Emily blushed as she finally caught the wordplay being used on her. "Well I uh...I-I'm...huh..." Emily stammered, at first mortified on giving the details of the conception of her bundle of joy, before halting in surprise as she realized she really couldn't recall the events that had led to her current condition. "I...I can't honestly remember..."

"Nothing at all?" Jane scratched her head in bewilderment, "hair color, skin tone, favorite band? Anything?" Jane only got more and more shocked as she listed off common items on someone's physical characteristics, only for Emily to deflect each one with a shake of her head. "Did he even get your name?"

"Probably not..." Emily sighed, a guilty look washing over her face, "I mean if I didn't even remember a single thing about him..." Emily paused, a feeling of sadness washing over her as she looked down at her stomach, all filled and gravid with child from a man she by all accounts hadn't technically met on any personal level. To not even get a name from him? She thought, did it really mean so little to the both of us? Did I leave him or did he leave me? The more she thought, the more uncomfortable she became.

As Emily started to entrench herself in her thoughts, plagued with both worry and fear, Jane realized that the conversation had taken a very awkward turn, and sought to remedy the situation.

"Hey uh, Em?" She called, though the woman didn't respond to her voice, still staring distantly at her belly, "Em? Hey Em!" Another try, this time as she leaned over to snap her fingers to try and wake Emily out of her stupor.

"H-huh? Oh Sorry Jane! Must've spaced out there...haha..."

"Uh yeah..." Jane frowned at the woman's nervous titter, still obviously jarred by the thoughts posed Jane's previous question had created. Rather than apologize for bringing up something so heavy however, Jane figured right now it was best to move on and continue on another topic. Smiling, she nodded as she realized she had the perfect one. "So uh Emily? I noticed something on our little outing so far."

"Oh?"

"You've got no flirting game!" Jane exclaimed, pointing an accusatory finger lazily at her target, "if you're gonna get back out there and nab yourself someone to help take care of your little lady you've gotta open up more and lay on the charm!"

"Hey! I didn't think I did that bad!" Emily gasped, placing a hand on her chest and flashing a hurt look at Jane, before bursting into a light giggle fit, "I mean come on I'm out with you right now aren't I?"

"Yeah but most people aren't as unfazed by a stranger jumping them in public and attacking their mouth out of nowhere." Jane pointed out, smirking as her observation produced the desired effect and made Emily avert her eyes, the seemingly ever-present blush making it's not so awaited return to her cheeks. "Mostly that might get you a shove or a restraining order."

"Okay okay I get it!" Emily sighed, before looking back to Jane, twirling a strand of hair in her index finger, "Soooo, in that case, what's the master got in terms of Flirting 101?"

"Honestly, I guess in your case treat it like one of your big business deals." Jane shrugged, "I've seen too many men and women in my job trying to seem all puffed up and self important. Never really attracts the right attention they want usually."

"So what, just try and talk to them and learn what you can?" Emily blinked, staring at the ceiling in thought, "that's a surprisingly simple way to put it, but it makes sense."

"Well, a date is kinda like a business deal anyways." Jane noted, before grinning cheekily, "just replace stuffy suits and paperwork with well placed complements and a good time at a place both people enjoy."

"So would you say I've been doing good so far?" Emily questioned, looking at the other woman, who was currently eyeing her with an intense look of concentration.

"Mmm...well I honestly can't say for sure, this was more of a friendly thing so we'll have to find some other way to test your skills. Maybe-" Jane was cut off as a bell rang, signaling the entrance of another customer. The two girls turned to see if they could catch a glimpse of the patrons who had shared their idea of coming to this place, and Jane smiled as she couldn't believe her luck.

A man and a woman had walked into the establishment, laughing to themselves after one of them had told a joke both had obviously found funny, and seemed quite comfortable with each other. The man was quite attractive, Jane noted, standing at a height of around 6 foot 2 or so, with a medium length mane of auburn hair and a fair skin tone. His emerald eyes were what stuck out the most however, besides the well toned musculature that his arms and legs betrayed from the t-shirt and khaki shorts he was wearing.

The woman, not to be outdone in the looks department, was gorgeous, at a much smaller 5 foot 4 her jet black her pulled back in a ponytail flowed behind her, with pale skin that shone so brightly in the glare of the lights in the restaurant. Wearing a lovely blue blouse and a white knee length skirt, she carried herself with a confident walk, or waddle in this case as Jane's eyes made their way down to the woman's middle. Apparently this place attracted mother's to be like the plague, as the woman had a pregnant belly to match the size of both Jane and Emily both, which put her almost to full term like they were. However, Jane, having had many years of practice with people reading in her profession, realized that the two were not together. They had no rings, didn't hold hands, or acted in the way so many couples did. They simply seemed like two friends on a night out. Perfect... Jane grinned, the smile only widening as she looked back to Emily and noticed that she was staring at the pair of newcomers with heavy shade of red.

"Alright here's the plan," Jane whispered, leaning over to Emily who looked back at her, "you pick who you want and we get you some hands on flirting practice."

"W-What!" Emily hissed harshly, though she couldn't bring herself to refuse Jane's offer, "but we don't-"

"Oh we'll know em soon enough!" Jane giggled, pulling Emily out of her seat, "you go first and introduce yourself to the one you want, I'll keep the other one occupied!"

"Wait you swing both ways?" Emily questioned, a surprised look on her face.

"Nah, I'm into guys," Jane chuckled, "but if you want the guy I can keep the lady busy with some light girl talk while you strut your stuff. Now come on, clock's ticking!"

"B-But I...Jane!" Emily yelped, feeling herself forcefully dragged over to the man and woman against her will. Gulping, she realized she couldn't deny that the two were both very attractive. In the end though, as Jane shoved her toward the two, Emily found herself especially interested in...
121112121212113.title: Delving a Little Deeper before the Diversion...

There was no indication it was anything but profesional.

1211121212121132.content:
Emily gulped as the man and woman noticed them on their approach, there was no backing out of this now. So on a split second choice Emily waddled herself towards the lady. It was initially so that Jane could enjoy herself flirting with someone she would be into, but Emily was also curious about herself. Obvious she was more then willing to be intimate with a guy, but she couldn't even remember anything about the night! So maybe she might enjoy women more?

It was something she never bothered to really figure out about herself. At the least it might be easier to bond with the women given that she was also pregnant. Emily felt her amulet jingle between her breasts, a fallback plan if things went south. But she wanted to try and see if she still had game without her good luck charm.

'Just relax, think of it like a business deal Emily' The blond reminded herself, before taking a confident step forward and introducing herself to the bemused looking woman. "Hey there, I'm Emily. And I just needed to say you really make that outfit work. It looks like it was tailored for you. Really accents your figure and makes it pop" Emily's smile seemed to strain a little bit as she realized what she said about popping, the woman looked so close to term, was that a bad thing to say?

Emily kept her cool on the outside, as she heard Jane and the man start to chat beside her. She was too focused on the woman in front of her to hear what her new friend was saying. Still there was a little bit of relief as the woman returned Emily's smile as she rubbed one hand over her prominent swell. "I am Stephanie, and It sure looks like I'm about to pop doesn't it? But if you're worried, I still have a couple months to go with these two. I'm glad you think the clothes fit me, I thought I made them a size too big. You wouldn't think it matters much at our size, but it's the difference between just feeling comfortable, and feeling attractive."

Emily blinked for a second, digesting what the woman said. "You made the clothes? Wow, that's cool. Sounds like you'll never run out of cute things to wear then. I can only imagine how good you must be with your hands." Emily found herself blushing at the implication of her words. They just came out naturally! Still, it was rather good if she was intent on flirting with the woman, if a bit bold. But what was the Amazon if not bold?

Stephanie seemed to respond with a subtle smile, drumming her fingers along her belly as she seemed to look Emily up and down. "Yes, my profession tends to require a certain amount of dexterity. If you'd like, I could show you some time. After all I rather dislike seeing my old projects being worn, when I have made such large improvements since then." The smaller woman motions towards Emily's dress.

"Wait, you made this too? Oh, uhh wow. Talk about a coincidence. I just got it yesterday, is it really that old?" the amazon asked, while trying to inspect the outfit.

"Well, yes and no. First off, it was made with a bigger woman in mind then you, width wise at least. But it works for you since you're much taller then my intended audience. Still I can't help but think there's some parts that feel baggy yes?" Emily found herself nodding, there was a slight discomfort of her dress rubbing against her skin whenever she stood up or sat down.

"So, I want to do better for your figure Emily. To design something not just for the small, thin pregnant women, but the taller, more amazon like moms to be like yourself. Maybe you can find the time to visit my studio? And I can get you out of that ill fitting outfit, and into something you'll like much better" Stephanie writes her number and address down on a nearby napkin and hands it to Emily.

Emily for her part, was trying not to get too flustered with all the implications and innuendos that she passed back and forth with Stephanie, or maybe she wouldn't mind being called Steph? Either way, she counted it a minor success as she felt a light tug on her shoulder. "Hey Em, I think I gotta bail soon, you wanna walk and talk for a bit?" Emily nodded, before turning back to Stephanie "It was lovely meeting you, and I'm a little excited to see what you have in mind for me!" Before waddling off with Jane.

Emily, as promised paid for her and Emily's dinner, and soon the pair were out walking in the direction of her car. "Soooo, how'd it go? Did you wow your way into her pants, or strike out Em?" The ever curious, and quite blunt Jane asked with a smile. Once again making her new friend blush very easily. "I-I think I did well? I got her number at least, and she wants to see me so that she can make me a maternity outfit." Emily opens the napkin, gasping as.

12111212121211322.content:
Emily had never seen such a stable hand written number in her life. If it wasn't on a napkin in her hands, she would have thought herself looking at a business card. "There's nothing but the number, though she seems to have rather good penmanship."

"Hmm, well. She might just be the type to hold her cards close to her face. Or she might be like me and not into other girls. At least you didn't have to bribe her with food though. So small improvement Em"

Emily pouted and rolled her eyes at Jane, but she did have a point. She at least felt like she made a good impression. "I'll call her tomorrow, and take it from there. Though.. I'm feeling a little intimated, she's some kind of fashion designer, and I barely have enough maternity outfits for work. Maybe this is a mistake, I'm not used to dressing up so often. I normally just wear suits and recently some maternity outfits."

"What if I show up in the wrong kinda clothes? What if she gets fed up with me trying to flirt poorly? I am very likely to put my foot in my mo-" Emily was interrupted as she felt a oddly familiar pair of lips press against hers, muffling any protest until Jane pulled back, with a worried glance. Emily let out a confused, but not displeased gasp as she took in air, wondering why Jane would do such a thing.

"Ok, please don't make me do that again Em. You're really bad with going down a spiral of what if's. You just need to relax, take it one step at a time. Feel things out with this fashion girl, and if it dosen't work? Then we'll find you another hookup Sunday. This is supposed to be fun, not stressful"

Jane rubbed the back of her head as the pair got to the parking lot, where Emily's car was currently sitting. "Hey, Em. If nothing else you had fun tonight right? I mean I did, you're really easy to tease, and the look on your face every time I bring up the mil-"

"Jane! please! Ugh... yeah I had fun. I haven't been out as much as I used to, and it shows. But I had fun, and learned a few things." Emily had a momentary thought about bringing up the fact that Jane seemed rather good at kissing women for being strait. But it felt a bit mean spirited. "We should do this again sometime soon, I mean, us single moms have to stick together right?"

"Right, after all, who else will watch our feet when we can't see our own?" Jane laughed as she lightly bumped her belly into Emily's "Don't be a strange either, just because I work at a bar, dosen't mean you can't come bother me at work. It just means I can't serve you any drinks"

Emily found herself giggling from the sensation of the smaller girl pressing her belly against Emily's own. It wasn't something she allowed herself to do often, as she felt it didn't suit her work personality, but around Jane she felt more at ease. "Maybe I will, the girls do like dancing at that club. I'll see you around" Emily gave a quick wave, before settling back into her car and driving back to her place.

She was a little pumped. Sure it didn't go exactly the way she had thought it would, but she considered her first date since finding out she got pregnant a success. She even got a number of someone who might be attracted to her? Or at the very least was somewhat interested. At the very least Jane seemed more then happy to play wing man for her now. "Maybe I'll have to return the favor? Not that Jane needs the help I think. But she's single too." Emily mussed on her trip up the stairs back to her place.

The pregnant businesswoman let out a unhappy groan as she stepped into her apartment "Ok, one more for the 'I should move' list. Stairs. Stairs are not my friend anymore." Emily let out a tired sigh as she started to slowly undress, waddling into the bathroom with both hands rubbing her near term bump. She could feel her daughter moving around, and getting rather dangerously close to kicking her bladder "Hey, calm down in there. I'm sure you agree with me, but that's no reason to abuse my body. Just wait a little bit, you love baths right? Mommy's going to take a nice long warm one soon."

Emily started running the water, filling up the tub. In the meantime she felt some kind of pull as she walked towards the mirror, getting a view of herself in the nude. She was taken aback, she looked huge, like she had a small basketball under her skin. She turned from side to side, still amazed by how far forward her bump reached. "I guess you're going to be a big girl like your mother huh? And a hungry one too if my body's getting ready for you.. " Emily lightly cupped her engorged breasts, she was always rather stacked compared to most, but so late in her pregnancy, they had grown to a rather absurd proportion in preparation to feed her child. "It's a bit silly to think I could try and hide the changes as long as I did with normal clothes... " Emily let out a wishful sigh, wondering how else she could embrace her feminine, motherly parts without compromising her strong, cutthroat business self. At the very least she had the weekend to think it over, but for now, she earned her warm bath as she slowly slide down into the prefect temperature water.

121112121212113221.content:
*BEEP! BEEP! BEEP!*

"Ugh..." Emily groaned. It was early the next morning (very early, in fact. Around 6:30), and Emily was NOT pleased. All she wanted to do was sleep in. But her extra occupant starting kicking up a storm, putting an end to that idea.

"I know, I know." Emily said. Slowly, she threw off the covers and slowly slid herself out of bed. She'd felt rather lethargic after her bath, so she had gone to bed only in her underwear. Cradeling her swollen womb, she slowly stood up. Taking one hand off her belly and putting it on the small of her back, Emily stretched. Now she was ready to start the day.

"Morning, you." Emily said to her unborn occupant. "Thank goodness it's Saturday." One of the perks of her new promotion: Saturday's off.

Smiling, Emily waddled over to her closet, and opened it. Looking inside, she frowned. What on Earth had possessed her to keep her pre-pregnancy clothes? At the moment, there was very little that would fit her.

"Damn." Emily muttered. She looked over at the maternity clothes she had bought a little while ago. They would cover her, but were all far too big (why had she gotten that size again?). Looking around her room, she saw the napkin with Stephenies number on it laying on the nightstand. Waddling over to it, she picked it up.

"Let's hop she's not too upset at being woken up." Emily said, before picking up her cell phone off the nightstand and dialing the number.

After 2 rings, someone answered the phone.

"Hello?" Emily heard the other person say. It definitely was Stephenie. They did sound a bit tired.

"Hi, it's Emily from last night." Emily replied.

"Oh, hello Emily." Stephenie said. "Sorry, I wasn't expecting a call so early in the morning."

"Well, I wasn't expecting to wake up so early, but a certain someone didn't want to stay in bed." Emily said, patting her large tummy.

"I know that feeling." Stephenie replied. "So, to what do I owe the honor?"

"Well, I just had a look in my closet, and I don't think I'm going to fit in much of my wardrobe." Emily said. "I was wondering if I could schedule a fitting later today? I'm off work today, so I've got plenty of time."

"Sure, my schedule's open today." Stephenie said. "If you give me your address, I can stop by around 4. That sound good?"

"It does." Emily replied. She then gave Stephenie her address, and thanked her for agreeing to help.

"Not a problem." Stephanie said. "See you around 4." With that, Stephanie hung up.

Emily set her phone on the nightstand and sighed, patting her tummy. She looked at her closet and the maternity clothes again.

"Hope Stephenie doesn't mind me being in my underwear." Emily said. "Anyway, time for breakfast."

As she turned to waddle out of her room, she remembered her amulet. Quickly going over to her dresser, she picked the amulet up from it and put it around her neck. Now satisfied, she waddled out of the room.
------
A few minutes later, Emily was sitting in her kitchen, happily eating a small stack of fluffy pancakes drenched in syrup. Her unborn daughter was kicking in her womb, evidently happy with the meal.

Emily smiled as she saw Mrs.Jamison outside the door. Resting some kind of platter on her prominent baby bump and looking in Emily's professional opinion the shining example of motherhood. As a mother to two, and with her third on the way the stay at home mom really wore the pregnancy well. Betting then Emily did that was for sure.

The semi nude business woman opened the door, comfortable enough with her neighbor to not be too embarrassed about being in nothing but her underwear. "Mrs.Jamison, good morning. I guess you had just as much trouble sleeping as I did?"

The homely neighbor smiled and laughed. "The little one kicked you awake again dear? No, I was just up early to send Lilly and Michal off to school. And I thought you and your baby would appreciate some home made breakfast since I seemed to have made more then I needed~"

Mrs.Jamison handed over the still warm plate as Emily couldn't help but take it. Her cooking was always too good, and was part of the reason Emily had trouble getting her old pants past her thighs. At least Emily liked to think. The stay at home mom was always feeding her, often times encouraging Emily to eat past her full 'for the baby's sake'. Emily didn't think much of it.

"Thank you Mrs.Jamison, though if you keep this up I might have to send my baby over to your place. Nothing I make could compare if they got used to your cooking!" The two shared a laugh as the full time mother noticed Emily's jewelry. "That's new dear, did you find it at an antique store? It really brings out your eyes."

Emily looked down and lifted up her necklace, shaking her head. "No I got it from a old guy on the street. Said it was a good luck charm for the baby. I don't know if it works out not, but it's not hurting anyone. I could try it on you too!" Emily didn't wait at all, using the necklace instantly.

PING

"Well, the necklace must be doing something dear. Your twins look healthy and big, Just like they should be" The now flat Mrs.Jamison said with a cheery smile as Emily rubbed her large belly happily, the plate in her other hand.

"That's only because you feed me so well. Thanks again for that, and actually if you don't mind. I was thinking of naming one of the girls Jamie." Emily's neighbor gasped and went to hug the business woman. "I'd be honored sweetie. Do take care though, my kids are eager to get to play with yours."

The two woman waved their goodbyes as Emily sat down with a wince, rubbing her belly as the twins kicked. "Easy guys, I know I know. I'll eat your favorite food in a second." She wasn't a fan of how much weight she was gaining from the twins. But she knew it was the price of being a good mom. And Emily was never one to do thing by halves. If the girls were hungry enough for her to finish two breakfasts then she'd just work harder to lose the weight after they were born.

That being said, she still had a little bit of time to kill before Stephenie showed up, maybe she could get a head start on working out?

He had a small table with a red cloth where he displayed his mechendise. Curiousity got the best of her so she checked it out.

1353221.content:
Emiko slowly walked between the stacks of dusty tomes, supposedly arcane items, and other assorted creepy and decorative items. Her knee length coat softly swished as she walked and her luminous green eyes flicked this way and that as she perused the items scattered throughout the store, looking for something that might help spark her creativity. Her career as a freelance comic book artist usually went swimmingly, and then she would occasionally run into the mother of all creative blocks, much like she did today. After trying and failing half a dozen times to finish even a single page frame without throwing it out, she got up and left her home, coming here in the hopes that she could find something to prove an inspiration. So far, that idea had worked about as well as her day’s work. Monkey’s paw, been done; an old and dusty book with the word Liponomicon barely visible on the spine, something felt familiar about that to Emiko, but she shook her head and moved along; a crystal ball with what appeared to be a puff of black smoke forever shifting and flowing through the interior, that held a possibility but Emiko eventually passed, keeping it in mind though; an odd looking coin with rough etchings of what appeared to be a man and woman facing each other and holding round swollen stomachs, Emiko almost thought that it looked like they were both pregnant, the thought of a male pregnancy helped dissuade her, and a quiet whispering that distracted her as she looked around for the source finished it when she set the coin down and continued walking.

Emiko was just about to give up and head out to see if anywhere else might stir her imagination when her eyes alighted on a golden amulet resting on one of the shelves. Six bluish/pinkish jewels were arrayed around what appeared to be a ruby carved into the shape of a small x in the center, and the attached chain was thin but strong gold as well. Holding it up to the light, Emiko didn’t feel much inspiration from the amulet, but something about it was seemingly calling to her, she had to have it. Setting a quicker pace towards the back of the store, she inwardly groaned as she saw the person sitting behind the counter; Alexandra had always been a bit of a lazy and unambitious person, and she had only gotten worse since she had gotten pregnant months before. Every time that Emiko had seen her, she had always felt her pulse quicken, seeing that pale orb of her stomach stretching out of clothes definitely not meant for a pregnant woman. After taking a moment to cool off, Emiko moved closer. Alexandra barely looked up from the magazine she had spread across the counter, and only dimly acknowledged Emiko. On her face was a glum expression that was there so often, that it could have been painted on in the thick layers of makeup.

“Hey, Alexandra, how much for this thing?” Emiko asked, putting on as cheerful a face as she could to hide her frustration. “There’s no tag on it.”

Even her speaking had gotten slower, and that was saying quite a bit, as Alexandra slowly and lowly murmured, “That thing, I think the boss meant to mark it as twenty dollars.”

Emiko hemmed and hawed a bit, thinking that it was a bit more than she wanted to spend on a trinket. Alexandra seemed to perk up a tiny fraction though, sensing that there was the possibility of a sale.

“Some woman brought it in a little while back, wanting to sell it. She said that it was magic and would allow the wearer to transfer pregnancies, right.” Emiko felt her breath quicken a bit again as she heard that, even as Alexandra let out a mirthless laugh. “‘All you have to do is hold It up and think about the baby or babies moving to or fro and the amulet will transfer the children into your target, into you, or even into the amulet,’ she said. She even told me to try it out, and I did, but it didn’t get rid of this little girl at all,” she said, reaching down to touch the smooth orb of her womb.

Despite Alexandra’s denial of anything happening, Emiko still felt drawn to the amulet for some reason. Even if the pregnancy transference part didn’t work out, the amulet still looked pretty nice, and it might be something that Tara would like. Making her mind up, Emiko paid the twenty dollars, before spinning on her heel and walking towards the front of the store. Along the way, she slipped the chain over her head, and felt the amulet settle against her tanned skin. It felt oddly warm, and holding it up to the light made it almost seem as there was a glow within the various jewels dotted across the front. She stopped just inside the door, lacy curtains were across drawn to darken the inside of the store, but still allow some visibility outside. Emiko now felt her pulse quicken as she saw a woman walking along the sidewalk on the opposite side of the street, slowly making her way despite the bulge of what appeared to be a triplet-laden belly beneath the tent-like sundress. Looking back, Emiko could also see Alexandra still seated at the counter, back to reading the magazine before her. Now looking down at the amulet, the Asian-American woman was overcome with the desire to go ahead and try out this supposedly magical trinket and see if she could fulfill her deepest fantasy of being pregnant. Holding the amulet up, she pointed it and imagined the pregnancy of her target being moved into her; and she continued to concentrate on…

It was a chore to get Emiko into the car, but working together, she and Tara managed it—with more than a little extra touching and caressing involved, much to the delight of both women. The drive didn’t take very long, and soon enough Emiko had to be freed from the confines of the vehicle and together they walked out along the boardwalk with the moon hanging low over the water casting its pale glow across the beachfront. Despite both Emiko and Tara’s desire to get to the Silver Dollar, they adopted a sedate pace, enjoying the cool breeze wafting from the ocean that sent any loose material fluttering. A smile curled the edges of Emiko’s lips as she felt Tara reaching out and touching her massively swollen stomach again; reaching down, Emiko interlaced her fingers with Tara’s, feeling her belly just as much, and drawing a light laugh from her girlfriend.

The line leading inside was somewhat long, but the time passed quickly. Emiko’s smile grew as she saw how many second, third, and even fourth glances she attracted; most of the faces just seemed extremely surprised by seeing a woman walking around with such a massive belly, though she noted that there were more than a few envious and even lustful expressions being thrown her way too. The music within was loud, but not so much to make it so that people would have to shout in ears to be heard, and the light was low enough to cast almost everything in shadows without rendering everyone completely blind. The inside of the club was full of people but Emiko had no problem getting through, her enormous belly parting the crowd like the Red Sea, with Tara following in her wake. Emiko felt a tickle on her neck as Tara leaned in close and asked if she felt up to a bit of dancing. Emiko nodded vigorously, reaching back and taking ahold of Tara’s hand and tugging her along.

The dance floor was full of people but again, Emiko’s body quickly cleared a space for her and Tara. The extremely pregnant woman started simply and slowly, getting a feel for how her center of gravity shifted due to her own rapidly shifting mass. Tara snuggled up close, helping to support Emiko, keeping her dancing simpler as well. As the next song started, Emiko kicked it up a notch, adding more gyrating and wiggling that sent her body shifting in every direction; Tara drifting a bit further away to expand on her dancing as well, but still keeping close enough to be there if it looked like Emiko was having trouble. Emiko still had to be careful though, as it was harder to stop her body than it was to start any movements. By the end of the third song, a slight sheen of sweat started to appear across Emiko’s body, noticeable even in the dim lighting, but she was enjoying herself too much to think about stopping.

With the end of the fourth song though, Emiko could feel her energy fading quickly, especially in her legs as they valiantly held her mass up through ever more complex movements. Tara was on her like a flash, helping her off of the dance floor and towards the seating around the edge. It took a while to find a spot that could take her huge size, but once they did, Emiko collapsed into the seat, swearing that she could hear it creaking under the impact.

“I’m sorry we had to stop,” Emiko said, looking up at her girlfriend.

Tara waved it off, “It’s no problem, dear, just rest up and we can see if you feel better in a while. It’s just nice to get out and about when we can.” Before she sat down, Tara looked across the room before turning back to Emiko and asking, “Do you want something to drink?”

Emiko nodded and the white haired woman dutifully darted off through the crowd towards the bar. Emiko waited, fanning herself with a hand, while the other rubbed what little bit it could of her belly, feeling the frenzied motions within. Her eyes roamed the crowd, catching more than a few people looking her way with what looked like complimenting glances, some even applauded her incredible display. As she continued to rest her weary body, her eyes came to rest on something that really held her attention.
