Of course, it might not be real, but who knows, right? Anyway, enjoy it. Sincerely, Erin Parker."

Emilia smiled, set the note down, and picked up the necklace. It was gorgeous. Emilia put the necklace on and looked in the mirror.

The necklack complimented her purple dyed hair, numerous piercings (in particular her garnet belly button piercing and diamond studded lip ring), torn skull tee-shirt, and torn jeans with black, high-heeled boots.

Smiling, Emilia went back to the couch, fell belly first on it, and nodded off. Today had been long, and she needed her rest.
-----------
The next morning, a knock woke Emilia up. Worried it was yet another parent saying her music was harming the youth, she got up, walked over to the door, and opened it. On the other side was...
1353222222221.title: Emilia Crane

choices: "...a fan meet and greet."
"...a meeting with the record label."
13532222222211.content:
Emilia pinched the bridge of her nose in annoyance. Standing in the door frame was a blonde woman in a sundress. But even that sundress couldn't hide her pregnant gut. She was clearly having 1 kid.

"You should be ashamed of yourself!" The woman yelled. "How dare you sing such vulgar lyrics. You're-"

"Corrupting the youth, singing vile songs, shamelessly showing off, blah blah blah." Emilia interrupted. "Look lady, I've heard all this before. You're hardly new."

The lady looked even more annoyed. "Well, I wouldn't let my child grow up listening to trash like that." She said, placing an hand on her belly.

Emilia started gripping the amulet in annoyance. "Listen, I've said this a thousand times already to other angry parents-"

PING!

"-if I want to rock out pregnant, then I'll do it!" Emilia yelled, placing a hand on her swollen belly.

"You are a disgrace! Dressing like that in your condition. You're going to be a mother, show some respect!" The woman yelled back, fiddling with her loose sundress.

Before anymore yelling could be done, security walked in and escorted the woman out, who kept ranting.

Emilia sighed and shut the dressing room door. Leaning against it, she rubbed her belly.

"I hate it when they do that." Emilia said to herself. "So what if I'm pregnant?"

She then looked at the mirror on the other side of the room, and grinned. She made pregnancy look good on her. Her tan belly wasn't even covered by her torn shirt, which was barely holding her milk-filled G cup breasts already. Her garnet belly button piercing was even more obvious on her popped belly button.

"Eh, screw them." She said. "I'm gonna make sure you grow up listening to real music." She felt a small kick on her left side. "Ha! Glad you agree."

Giving her belly a loving pat, Emilia decided it was shower time. Removing the amulet, she dropped it on her dresser and headed for the bathroom.
-----------
25 minutes later, Emilia stepped out of the shower, wrapped in a towel that barely covered her breasts and belly. She had another towel wrapped around her hair, since the dye had washed out. She hated seeing her natural color. As she stepped out, she saw Tanya sitting on her couch.

"Oh, Tanya." She said. "When'd you get here?"

"20 minutes ago." Tanya replied. "I saw security escorting a woman out. Another angry person?"

Emilia nodded. "Same old, same old." She said. "They just don't get that I like rocking, even with a second passenger."

Tanya got up and, walking over to Emilia, placed her hands on Emilia's belly. "How is the little rocker doing?" She asked.

"Fine. Been quiet most of the day." Emilia answered.

Tanya smiled. "Well, I think you need to get dressed. You've got a busy day ahead." She said, before walking over to the door. "I'll be at the end of the hall. And be careful. I don't want you stuck on the floor like last time." On that, she left the room.

Emilia snickered at that memory, and waddled over to her closet to get dressed.
-----------
After 10 minutes of stuggle, Emilia finally finished getting dressed. She went with a purple tanktop with a skull and crossbones symbol that didn't even try to cover her belly, black leather maternity jeans, and black biker boots. She had also redyed her hair. She was just about to leave when she noticed the amulet. She grabbed it and put it on, then waddled out of the dressing room.

At the end of the hall, Tanya was waiting. She smilied as Emilia waddled up.

"Took ya long enough." Tanya joked.

"Well, it isn't really easy putting on jeans and boots with this." Emilia replied, patting her belly.

"I'm kidding." Tanya said. "Well, first up, we have..."
13532222222211.title: Rocker with a Belly

choices: ...go get dinner?"
...go for a stroll?"
135322222222111.content:
"We've got that meet-and-greet set up in front of the stadium." Tanya said. "The line to meet you is forming around almost 2 blocks!"

"Well, damn!" Emilia said. She then looked down at her belly. "Here that, kiddo? Mama's got one hell of a fanbase!"

Tanya grinned even wider. "See you in 20 minutes." She said. She then turned and walked out.

Emilia smiled and gave her belly a pat. "We're really going places, buddy." She said. "Been a hell of a ride. Can't wait to actually see you. Then I can teach you REAL music." Then her smile faded as she rubbed her belly. "Though, to be honest, I kind of wish I was pregnant forever. Wouldn't that make for a gimmick?"

Emilia chuckled to herself as she waddled down the corridor, unaware of the amulet glowing softly, granting her wish.
---------
20 minutes later, Emilia was sitting a table in front of a giant poster of herself. She was sitting in a way that put her belly in full view. On the table were hundreds of smaller posters, all signed. In the middle of the table was a microphone. In front of her, a huge line of screaming, adoring fans.

"OK, everyone!" Emilia yelled into the microphone. "You all ready for me? I've got free signed posters for ya. 5 bucks nets ya a picture of me. Got 10 bucks? I'll sign somethin' else. And 20 means you get to rub the belly!" To illustrate that point, she gave her belly a few pats. "So, let's get this started!"

And for the next half hour, Emilia interacted with her fans. She gave out nearly 5 dozen posters, got a few pics taken, signed at least two CD's (and one set of boobs), and got a couple nice belly rubs. This was the part she loved about her concerts: the fans.

She had just taken another picture when the next fan walked up. She was about a year younger then Emilia, and about 5 feet 11 inches with wild electric blue hair, piercing blue eyes, pale skin and a massive grin on her face. She was wearing what looked like a carbon copy of Emilia's usual getup.

What stood out most though was that like Emilia, this woman was pregnant. Her belly was twice the size of Emilia's, and her boobs were bigger then Emilia's, but smaller then Tanya's.

"Oh, hey there!" Emilia said to the fan. "Another mom-to-be, huh? How many?"

"Triplets!" The fan practically screamed.

"Oh, nice." Emilia said, idly rubbing the amulet. The fan then placed 5 one hundred dollar bills on the table.

"Wow!" Emilia said. "You must really want me to sign something."

"Actually, I was hoping for something else." The fan said. She nervously rubbed her huge belly. "Could I... spend a few days with you? I mean, you're my idol! I've been to as many concerts as I can, own every CD, gotten as much merchandise as I can-"

"Woah, woah, take a breath!" Emilia said. "Well, I can see your devoted. Anyone that devoted deserves something. Meet me backstage, we'll work something out, miss..."

"Raven!" The fan said. "Raven Matthews! And thank you!"

Emilia smiled, and turned to Tanya. "Take her to my dressing room. I'll catch up when I'm done here." Tanya nodded, and motioned for Raven to follow.

Emilia turned back to the line. "Alright, who's next?"
---------
An hour later, Emilia was finally able to waddle back to her dressing room.

"Sheesh!" Emilia said. "Meet and greets can take a lot out of a girl, can't they? Well, time to see how that Raven is doing."

Entering her dressing room, Emilia saw Raven sitting on the couch, rubbing her massive belly. She was babbling on and on.

"...and of course, I'll name one of you Emilia!" Raven said, before looking up. "Emilia! How much did you hear?"

"Just the tail end. Naming a kid after me? Nice." Emilia said, before sitting down next to Raven. She leaned back as she idly played with her amulet. "So, how long you been a fan?"

"Years!" Raven replied. "I saw your first concert when I was 20, and was hooked ever since."

"Long time fan, I see." Emilia said. She gripped the amulet and looked at Raven's belly. "What about them?"

PING!

"Oh, the twins?" Raven asked, placing a hand on her now slightly smaller belly. "I took a surrogate job. Actually got pregnant around the time you announced yours. B-but don't take it the wrong way. It wasn't to emulate you." She then looked at Emilia's twin filled tummy. "Though, to be honest, seeing you grow bigger and bigger gave me a pregnancy fetish."

"Oh?" Emilia said. She then moved herself so her belly was touching Raven's. "Well, you're a lucky fan tonight. Why don't we..."
135322222222111.title: Her (literally) Biggest Fan

1353222222221111.content:
“Grab a bite,” she placed a hand on Raven’s exposed stomach, “I’m starving.”

“O-oh! Yeah, I could eat, um, definitely!” Raven shot up, babbling through her blush. Emilia grinned. The obsessive fans usually had a type; strong, assertive personalities were rare. Like a proper host, she led Raven out the door first, fingertips dragging across the exposed skin on her back. A squeal burst forth from her expectant companion scooting out of reach.

The pair waddled in tandem, Raven fighting her way through a fog of anxiety, Emilia fighting off the urge to grin like mad. She did “accidentally” bump bellies with her admirer a few times. She was so cute when she was embarrassed, the blush contrasted wonderfully with her hair. After a couple blocks, they stopped.

“This is my favorite food truck when I’m in town, everything is made to order. You can’t imagine how good something fresh tastes after a show.” Emilia made a show of rolling her eyes back, tongue lolling out of her mouth.

“G-good I’d imagine.” Hands swept across her sweaty stomach with increasing speed.

“And no waiting time either. You can grab anything you like and then well, do, anything you like.” Emilia advanced until their shoulders were parallel. She drew a calloused hand to the shorter woman’s face, brushing a strand of neon hair behind her ear. Stroking her soft skin, she drew her face closer.

“Would you like that, Raven?”

She looked up at the enormous woman. Brilliant sapphire eyes almost lost in her wide-eyed stare. Her mouth moved, but no words passed over the lump in her throat. Eventually, she nodded.

Emilia’s grin almost split her face. She took Raven’s hand in hers, food forgotten. The pair stumbled and hurriedly waddled back to the dressing room. Emilia smashed her lips into Raven’s, mashing her into the door. A moan escaped from her lips as a hand fumbled for the doorknob. She fell backwards into the well-carpeted room, wincing slightly.

Her idol loomed over her. A leg whipped out, boot sailing across the room into a cluster of bottles, Emilia almost toppling over herself. A smile finally cut through the blush, Raven eagerly pulled her flimsy shirt over her head. Her breasts fell lazily from the torn garment, pale, pert and palm-filling. Emilia grabbed at her top, attempting to follow suit, but instead her impatient fingers found the necklace around her neck.

PING

Finally pulling the purple tank over her bloated torso, her roving eyes found an almost petite Raven waiting for her. Emilia made to dive in but her body would not cooperate. Her legs quivered and almost buckled, unaccustomed to the weight that had been placed on them. Raven noticed the superstar struggling and guided her to the futon in the corner.

Emilia laid back, her large breasts quacking from the movement. Her hands roved the surface of her tanned stomach. Wide as her shoulders it pushed out far enough to prevent her from locking her hands around it. Raven drew her lips to the side of Emilia’s engorged belly, kissing the tender skin. She kissed higher and higher finally ending on her nipple. Emilia had to bite her knuckle to keep from crying out as the agile tongue teased her sensitive breast. Raven finally came up for air, her eyes roving over her gravid idol.

“I can’t believe this is happening.”

“You’re gonna love what happens next.” Emilia flipped the smaller girl onto the cushion with a squeal. Emilia’s phone flashed and vibrated but fell on deaf ears. A few minutes later Tanya poked her head in the still-open door. Letting out a short sigh, she closed the door.

1353222222222221.content:
Victoria walked down the hall, rehearsing her valedictorian speech on the way to class. Entering the restroom she could hear someone crying in one of the stalls. She knocked on it. "Hi, is everything ok in there?", Victoria asked.

"Just leave.", the girl asked.

"Whatever the problem is, maybe I can help you.", Victoria said. The girl did not respond. "If you don't want to tell me, we can just talk.

The stall door then opened, it was a freshman girl, 14 year old Annie. Victoria didn't know her well, but she saw her a few times around school. She usually dressed very nicely, but now she was wearing sweat pants and a baggie sweater.

Annie exited the stall, wiping her face of tears. "Your Victoria right.", Annie asked.

"Yeah, so do you want to tell me what happened or do you just want to talk?", Victoria asked.

"Nothing.", Annie said, before breaking down. "Just ruined my life!", she said as tears rolled down her face.

"It can't be that bad.", Victoria said handing her some paper towels.

"My boyfriend just dumped me.", Annie said.

"Everyone gets dumped, its not the end of the world.", Victoria said.

"Everyone doesn't get left like this", Annie said, crossing her arms over her stomach.

"What do you mean like this?", Victoria asked.

Annie slowly lifted her sweater, revealing a decently sized pregnant belly. "It's too late to abort it, and my parent's will probably kick me out when I tell them. How is a freshmen suppose to raise a kid and finish school, let alone get into college.", Annie asked, hopelessly.

Victoria held onto the amulet that her grandmother had given her. She hadn't been told much about it, only that, her grandmother knew, she would be willing to help anyone, and that this could help her do that. If what her grandmother said was true, she might be able to take this burden from Annie. She was already accepted to college so it could work. It might take longer, but if it helped Annie, it might be worth it.

"Annie, I think I can help you. All I need you to do is hold onto this with me.", Victoria said holding out the amulet. "Then just focus on everything you hope to do."

Annie looked at Victoria strangely, but if this could help her, she was willing to try anything.

The two held onto the amulet, Victoria then felt some kind of energy pass into her. Opening her eyes, Victoria looked down and saw that she was now sporting a four month old pregnant belly.

When Annie opened her eyes

info.brief_description: An amulet has the ability to transfer a pregnancy into ANYONE. Add a chapter, earn GP!
info.description:
Wow, over 1,000 Views!

There is a amulet that exists purely for the purpose of easing the burden of child-bearing for a woman. Nobody knows where it came from, or how it exactly works. Only that it takes a woman's pregnancy and puts it into someone else, ANYONE else in fact, even men, should the need ever arise.

Now this amulet has found it's way into the modern day world, and who knows what might happen?

Thanks to "a" for getting started on the "Mom" storyline! Keep up the good work!

Get any stories or chapters and earn GP! I have a lot of GP to give away!


The Rules (Follow Them. Respect Them. Don't Break Em)
1. No characters under 18. Seriously bro, don't do it.
2. Pregnancy/Male Pregnancy.
3. Good Grammar/Spelling. It doesn't have to be flawless, but make an effort.
4. No one sentence, one paragraph chapters. Come on son.

How The Amulet Works:
So maybe it's magic, or maybe it's an advanced piece of alien technology. Who knows? But here how it works:
1.The device can transfer a pregnancy from one person to another (male or female). Once a pregnancy has been transferred, the now-pregnant person believes themselves to have been pregnant the whole time, HOWEVER, Reality DOES NOT CHANGE, to reflect this.
(Clothes will not change, cribs will not magically appear, so on).

2. Once a pregnancy is transfered from one person to the next, the traits of the child (should they be born from this now-pregnant person) will genetically match the person it was transferred into. (TL,DR The kid biologically changes to be like the now-pregnant person)

3.The amulet can safely store 6 pregnancies at anytime to be transferred into anyone. Once the person holding the amulet wishes to set everything back the way it was, they just press the big "X" in the center of the amulet.

4. The amulet affects the minds of everyone. So a person who was pregnant but was transfer will remember the person not being pregnant, and vice-versa for someone the pregnancy is being transfer into.

5. I'm sure nothing could possibly go wrong and the device go haywire and start rewriting reality. You know if it was dropped or got damaged in some way, I'm sure nothing bad might happen.
